en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD shall go forth as a mighty man, he shall stir up jealousy like a man of war: he shall cry, yea, roar; he shall prevail against his enemies.
target: TUHAN keluar berperang seperti pahlawan, seperti orang perang Ia membangkitkan semangat-Nya untuk bertempur; Ia bertempik sorak, ya, Ia memekik, terhadap musuh-musuh-Nya Ia membuktikan kepahlawanan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of the sons also of Bigvai; Uthai, and Zabbud, and with them seventy males.
target: dan dari bani Bigwai: Utai dan Zabud dan bersama-sama dia tujuh puluh orang laki-laki.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore shalt thou make them turn their back, when thou shalt make ready thine arrows upon thy strings against the face of them.
target: Apabila mereka hendak mendatangkan malapetaka atasmu, merancangkan tipu muslihat, mereka tidak berdaya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And to the Reubenites, and to the Gadites, and to half the tribe of Manasseh, spake Joshua, saying,
target: Kepada orang Ruben, kepada orang Gad dan kepada suku Manasye yang setengah itu berkatalah Yosua, demikian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye shall therefore keep all my statutes, and all my judgments, and do them: that the land, whither I bring you to dwell therein, spue you not out.
target: Demikianlah kamu harus berpegang pada segala ketetapan-Ku dan segala peraturan-Ku serta melakukan semuanya itu, supaya jangan kamu dimuntahkan oleh negeri ke mana Aku membawa kamu untuk diam di sana.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Before the mountains were brought forth, or ever thou hadst formed the earth and the world, even from everlasting to everlasting, thou art God.
target: Sebelum gunung-gunung dilahirkan, dan bumi dan dunia diperanakkan, bahkan dari selama-lamanya sampai selama-lamanya Engkaulah Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Manasseh had in Issachar and in Asher Bethshean and her towns, and Ibleam and her towns, and the inhabitants of Dor and her towns, and the inhabitants of Endor and her towns, and the inhabitants of Taanach and her towns, and the inhabitants of Megiddo and her towns, even three countries.
target: Tetapi di daerah Isakhar dan Asyer ada juga kepunyaan suku Manasye, yakni Bet-Sean dengan segala anak kotanya, Yibleam dengan segala anak kotanya, penduduk Dor dengan segala anak kotanya, penduduk En-Dor dengan segala anak kotanya, penduduk Taanakh dengan segala anak kotanya, dan penduduk Megido dengan segala anak kotanya, yakni ketiga daerah bukit itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When thou goest with thine adversary to the magistrate, as thou art in the way, give diligence that thou mayest be delivered from him; lest he hale thee to the judge, and the judge deliver thee to the officer, and the officer cast thee into prison.
target: Sebab, jikalau engkau dengan lawanmu pergi menghadap pemerintah, berusahalah berdamai dengan dia selama di tengah jalan, supaya jangan engkau diseretnya kepada hakim dan hakim menyerahkan engkau kepada pembantunya dan pembantu itu melemparkan engkau ke dalam penjara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he came near, and kissed him: and he smelled the smell of his raiment, and blessed him, and said, See, the smell of my son is as the smell of a field which the LORD hath blessed:
target: Lalu datanglah Yakub dekat-dekat dan diciumnyalah ayahnya. Ketika Ishak mencium bau pakaian Yakub, diberkatinyalah dia, katanya: "Sesungguhnya bau anakku adalah sebagai bau padang yang diberkati TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And again, when he bringeth in the firstbegotten into the world, he saith, And let all the angels of God worship him.
target: Dan ketika Ia membawa pula Anak-Nya yang sulung ke dunia, Ia berkata: "Semua malaikat Allah harus menyembah Dia."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So shall ye divide this land unto you according to the tribes of Israel.
target: "Tanah inilah kamu harus bagi-bagi di antara kamu menurut suku-suku Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But this I confess unto thee, that after the way which they call heresy, so worship I the God of my fathers, believing all things which are written in the law and in the prophets:
target: Tetapi aku mengakui kepadamu, bahwa aku berbakti kepada Allah nenek moyang kami dengan menganut Jalan Tuhan, yaitu Jalan yang mereka sebut sekte. Aku percaya kepada segala sesuatu yang ada tertulis dalam hukum Taurat dan dalam kitab nabi-nabi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the barrel of meal wasted not, neither did the cruse of oil fail, according to the word of the LORD, which he spake by Elijah.
target: Tepung dalam tempayan itu tidak habis dan minyak dalam buli-buli itu tidak berkurang seperti firman TUHAN yang diucapkan-Nya dengan perantaraan Elia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then an herald cried aloud, To you it is commanded, O people, nations, and languages,
target: Dan berserulah seorang bentara dengan suara nyaring: "Beginilah dititahkan kepadamu, hai orang-orang dari segala bangsa, suku bangsa dan bahasa:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I have made Esau bare, I have uncovered his secret places, and he shall not be able to hide himself: his seed is spoiled, and his brethren, and his neighbours, and he is not.
target: Tetapi Aku ini telah menelanjangi Esau, telah menyingkapkan tempat-tempat persembunyiannya, sehingga ia tidak dapat menyembunyikan diri lagi. Keturunannya telah binasa dan saudara-saudaranya dan bangsa-bangsa tetangganya tidak ada lagi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thou hast broken the yoke of his burden, and the staff of his shoulder, the rod of his oppressor, as in the day of Midian.
target: Sebab setiap sepatu tentara yang berderap-derap dan setiap jubah yang berlumuran darah akan menjadi umpan api.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He stood, and measured the earth: he beheld, and drove asunder the nations; and the everlasting mountains were scattered, the perpetual hills did bow: his ways are everlasting.
target: Ia berdiri, maka bumi dibuat-Nya bergoyang; Ia melihat berkeliling, maka bangsa-bangsa dibuat-Nya melompat terkejut, hancur gunung-gunung yang ada sejak purba, merendah bukit-bukit yang berabad-abad; itulah perjalanan-Nya berabad-abad.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he hasted, and took the ashes away from his face; and the king of Israel discerned him that he was of the prophets.
target: Lalu segeralah ia membuka kain pembalut itu dari matanya, sehingga raja Israel mengenali dia sebagai seorang dari rombongan nabi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore they sought again to take him: but he escaped out of their hand,
target: Sekali lagi mereka mencoba menangkap Dia, tetapi Ia luput dari tangan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the administration of this service not only supplieth the want of the saints, but is abundant also by many thanksgivings unto God;
target: Sebab pelayanan kasih yang berisi pemberian ini bukan hanya mencukupkan keperluan-keperluan orang-orang kudus, tetapi juga melimpahkan ucapan syukur kepada Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Iron is taken out of the earth, and brass is molten out of the stone.
target: besi digali dari dalam tanah, dan dari batu dilelehkan tembaga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Are not five sparrows sold for two farthings, and not one of them is forgotten before God?
target: Bukankah burung pipit dijual lima ekor dua duit? Sungguhpun demikian tidak seekor pun dari padanya yang dilupakan Allah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For Moses of old time hath in every city them that preach him, being read in the synagogues every sabbath day.
target: Sebab sejak zaman dahulu hukum Musa diberitakan di tiap-tiap kota, dan sampai sekarang hukum itu dibacakan tiap-tiap hari Sabat di rumah-rumah ibadat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God said moreover unto Moses, Thus shalt thou say unto the children of Israel, the LORD God of your fathers, the God of Abraham, the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob, hath sent me unto you: this is my name for ever, and this is my memorial unto all generations.
target: Selanjutnya berfirmanlah Allah kepada Musa: "Beginilah kaukatakan kepada orang Israel: TUHAN, Allah nenek moyangmu, Allah Abraham, Allah Ishak dan Allah Yakub, telah mengutus aku kepadamu: itulah nama-Ku untuk selama-lamanya dan itulah sebutan-Ku turun-temurun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The officers answered, Never man spake like this man.
target: Jawab penjaga-penjaga itu: "Belum pernah seorang manusia berkata seperti orang itu!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thine ears shall hear a word behind thee, saying, This is the way, walk ye in it, when ye turn to the right hand, and when ye turn to the left.
target: dan telingamu akan mendengar perkataan ini dari belakangmu: "Inilah jalan, berjalanlah mengikutinya," entah kamu menganan atau mengiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore, O thou son of man, speak unto the house of Israel; Thus ye speak, saying, If our transgressions and our sins be upon us, and we pine away in them, how should we then live?
target: Dan engkau anak manusia, katakanlah kepada kaum Israel: Kamu berkata begini: Pelanggaran kami dan dosa kami sudah tertanggung atas kami dan karena itu kami hancur; bagaimanakah kami dapat tetap hidup?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will be found of you, saith the LORD: and I will turn away your captivity, and I will gather you from all the nations, and from all the places whither I have driven you, saith the LORD; and I will bring you again into the place whence I caused you to be carried away captive.
target: Aku akan memberi kamu menemukan Aku, demikianlah firman TUHAN, dan Aku akan memulihkan keadaanmu dan akan mengumpulkan kamu dari antara segala bangsa dan dari segala tempat ke mana kamu telah Kucerai-beraikan, demikianlah firman TUHAN, dan Aku akan mengembalikan kamu ke tempat yang dari mana Aku telah membuang kamu. —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Be it known unto the king, that the Jews which came up from thee to us are come unto Jerusalem, building the rebellious and the bad city, and have set up the walls thereof, and joined the foundations.
target: kiranya raja maklum, bahwa orang-orang Yahudi, yang berangkat dari tuanku ke tempat kami, telah tiba di Yerusalem. Mereka sedang membangun kembali kota yang durhaka dan jahat itu; mereka menyelesaikan pembangunan tembok-tembok dan memperbaiki dasarnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Baasha king of Israel went up against Judah, and built Ramah, that he might not suffer any to go out or come in to Asa king of Judah.
target: Baesa, raja Israel, maju berperang melawan Yehuda, dan ia memperkuat Rama, dengan maksud mencegah lalu lintas kepada Asa, raja Yehuda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the names of them were Aholah the elder, and Aholibah her sister: and they were mine, and they bare sons and daughters. Thus were their names; Samaria is Aholah, and Jerusalem Aholibah.
target: Nama yang tertua ialah Ohola dan nama adiknya ialah Oholiba. Mereka Aku punya dan mereka melahirkan anak-anak lelaki dan perempuan. Mengenai nama-nama mereka, Ohola ialah Samaria dan Oholiba ialah Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them, Is he well? And they said, He is well: and, behold, Rachel his daughter cometh with the sheep.
target: Selanjutnya katanya kepada mereka: "Selamatkah ia?" Jawab mereka: "Selamat! Tetapi lihat, itu datang anaknya perempuan, Rahel, dengan kambing dombanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, This will be the manner of the king that shall reign over you: He will take your sons, and appoint them for himself, for his chariots, and to be his horsemen; and some shall run before his chariots.
target: katanya: "Inilah yang menjadi hak raja yang akan memerintah kamu itu: anak-anakmu laki-laki akan diambilnya dan dipekerjakannya pada keretanya dan pada kudanya, dan mereka akan berlari di depan keretanya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt take two onyx stones, and grave on them the names of the children of Israel:
target: Haruslah kauambil dua permata krisopras dan mengukirkan nama para anak Israel pada permata itu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, that when they had made an end of eating the grass of the land, then I said, O Lord GOD, forgive, I beseech thee: by whom shall Jacob arise? for he is small.
target: Ketika belalang mulai menghabisi tumbuh-tumbuhan di tanah, berkatalah aku: "Tuhan ALLAH, berikanlah kiranya pengampunan! Bagaimanakah Yakub dapat bertahan? Bukankah ia kecil?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there fell some of Manasseh to David, when he came with the Philistines against Saul to battle: but they helped them not: for the lords of the Philistines upon advisement sent him away, saying, He will fall to his master Saul to the jeopardy of our heads.
target: Juga dari Manasye ada yang menyeberang memihak kepada Daud, ketika ia bersama-sama orang Filistin memerangi Saul. Sebenarnya ia tidak menolong mereka, sebab setelah mengambil keputusan raja-raja kota orang Filistin itu menyuruh dia pergi, katanya: "Mungkin, dengan taruhan kepala kita, ia menyeberang memihak kepada tuannya, Saul."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If we say that we have fellowship with him, and walk in darkness, we lie, and do not the truth:
target: Jika kita katakan, bahwa kita beroleh persekutuan dengan Dia, namun kita hidup di dalam kegelapan, kita berdusta dan kita tidak melakukan kebenaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore I say unto you, What things soever ye desire, when ye pray, believe that ye receive them, and ye shall have them.
target: Karena itu Aku berkata kepadamu: apa saja yang kamu minta dan doakan, percayalah bahwa kamu telah menerimanya, maka hal itu akan diberikan kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the priest shall command that they wash the thing wherein the plague is, and he shall shut it up seven days more:
target: maka imam harus memerintahkan orang mencuci barang yang mempunyai tanda itu, lalu ia harus mengasingkannya tujuh hari lagi untuk kedua kalinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Pharaoh's army was come forth out of Egypt: and when the Chaldeans that besieged Jerusalem heard tidings of them, they departed from Jerusalem.
target: Adapun tentara Firaun telah berangkat keluar dari Mesir; mendengar kabar itu maka orang-orang Kasdim yang mengepung Yerusalem angkat kaki dari Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And for them, even for the priests, shall be this holy oblation; toward the north five and twenty thousand in length, and toward the west ten thousand in breadth, and toward the east ten thousand in breadth, and toward the south five and twenty thousand in length: and the sanctuary of the LORD shall be in the midst thereof.
target: Dan bagi orang-orang inilah persembahan khusus yang kudus itu: Bagian imam-imam ialah panjangnya di utara dan selatan dua puluh lima ribu hasta, dan lebarnya di timur dan di barat sepuluh ribu hasta. Dan di tengah-tengahnyalah terletak tempat kudus TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it grew, and became a spreading vine of low stature, whose branches turned toward him, and the roots thereof were under him: so it became a vine, and brought forth branches, and shot forth sprigs.
target: sehingga ia tumbuh dan menjadi pohon anggur yang rimbun, yang tumbuhnya rendah dan cabang-cabangnya melengkung menuju burung itu dan akar-akarnya tetap di bawahnya. Demikianlah ia menjadi pohon anggur dan mengeluarkan tunas-tunas dan memancarkan taruk-taruk.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the Philistines yet again spread themselves abroad in the valley.
target: Ketika orang Filistin menyerbu sekali lagi di lembah itu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Their children also multipliedst thou as the stars of heaven, and broughtest them into the land, concerning which thou hadst promised to their fathers, that they should go in to possess it.
target: Engkau membuat anak-anak mereka menjadi banyak seperti bintang-bintang di langit dan membawa mereka ke tanah yang Kausuruh kepada nenek moyang mereka untuk dimasuki dan diduduki.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Barzillai the Gileadite came down from Rogelim, and went over Jordan with the king, to conduct him over Jordan.
target: Juga Barzilai, orang Gilead itu, telah datang dari Rogelim dan ikut bersama-sama raja ke sungai Yordan untuk mengantarkannya sampai di sana.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For David himself said by the Holy Ghost, The LORD said to my Lord, Sit thou on my right hand, till I make thine enemies thy footstool.
target: Daud sendiri oleh pimpinan Roh Kudus berkata: Tuhan telah berfirman kepada Tuanku: duduklah di sebelah kanan-Ku, sampai musuh-musuh-Mu Kutaruh di bawah kaki-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This second epistle, beloved, I now write unto you; in both which I stir up your pure minds by way of remembrance:
target: Saudara-saudara yang kekasih, ini sudah surat yang kedua, yang kutulis kepadamu. Di dalam kedua surat itu aku berusaha menghidupkan pengertian yang murni oleh peringatan-peringatan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the elders of the congregation said, How shall we do for wives for them that remain, seeing the women are destroyed out of Benjamin?
target: Kemudian berkatalah para tua-tua umat itu: "Apakah yang dapat kita lakukan kepada yang tinggal ini dalam hal mencarikan isteri? Sebab perempuan-perempuan telah punah dari antara suku Benyamin."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the fifteenth year of Amaziah the son of Joash king of Judah Jeroboam the son of Joash king of Israel began to reign in Samaria, and reigned forty and one years.
target: Dalam tahun kelima belas zaman Amazia bin Yoas, raja Yehuda, Yerobeam, anak Yoas, raja Israel, menjadi raja di Samaria. Ia memerintah empat puluh satu tahun lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then was Daniel brought in before the king. And the king spake and said unto Daniel, Art thou that Daniel, which art of the children of the captivity of Judah, whom the king my father brought out of Jewry?
target: Lalu dibawalah Daniel menghadap raja. Bertanyalah raja kepada Daniel: "Engkaukah Daniel itu, salah seorang buangan yang telah diangkut oleh raja, ayahku, dari tanah Yehuda?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So they went near, and carried them in their coats out of the camp; as Moses had said.
target: Mereka datang, dan mengangkat mayat keduanya, masih berpakaian kemeja, ke luar perkemahan, seperti yang dikatakan Musa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: How much less in them that dwell in houses of clay, whose foundation is in the dust, which are crushed before the moth?
target: lebih-lebih lagi mereka yang diam dalam pondok tanah liat, yang dasarnya dalam debu, yang mati terpijat seperti gegat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses called Bezaleel and Aholiab, and every wise hearted man, in whose heart the LORD had put wisdom, even every one whose heart stirred him up to come unto the work to do it:
target: Lalu Musa memanggil Bezaleel dan Aholiab dan setiap orang yang ahli, yang dalam hatinya telah ditanam TUHAN keahlian, setiap orang yang tergerak hatinya untuk datang melakukan pekerjaan itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when he had made an end of speaking unto Saul, that the soul of Jonathan was knit with the soul of David, and Jonathan loved him as his own soul.
target: Ketika Daud habis berbicara dengan Saul, berpadulah jiwa Yonatan dengan jiwa Daud; dan Yonatan mengasihi dia seperti jiwanya sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He reigned three years in Jerusalem. His mother's name also was Michaiah the daughter of Uriel of Gibeah. And there was war between Abijah and Jeroboam.
target: Tiga tahun lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem. Nama ibunya ialah Mikhaya, anak Uriel dari Gibea. Dan ada perang antara Abia dan Yerobeam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, the Lord hath a mighty and strong one, which as a tempest of hail and a destroying storm, as a flood of mighty waters overflowing, shall cast down to the earth with the hand.
target: Sesungguhnya, pada Tuhan ada seorang yang kuat dan tegap, seorang yang seperti angin ribut disertai hujan batu, yakni badai yang membinasakan, seorang yang seperti angin ribut disertai air hujan yang hebat menghanyutkan; ia akan menghempaskan mereka ke tanah dengan kekerasan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Balak the son of Zippor saw all that Israel had done to the Amorites.
target: Balak bin Zipor melihat segala yang dilakukan Israel kepada orang Amori.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But none saith, Where is God my maker, who giveth songs in the night;
target: tetapi orang tidak bertanya: Di mana Allah, yang membuat aku, dan yang memberi nyanyian pujian di waktu malam;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Herod the tetrarch, being reproved by him for Herodias his brother Philip's wife, and for all the evils which Herod had done,
target: Akan tetapi setelah ia menegor raja wilayah Herodes karena peristiwa Herodias, isteri saudaranya, dan karena segala kejahatan lain yang dilakukannya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: One golden spoon of ten shekels, full of incense:
target: satu cawan, sepuluh syikal emas beratnya, berisi ukupan;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Their webs shall not become garments, neither shall they cover themselves with their works: their works are works of iniquity, and the act of violence is in their hands.
target: Sarang yang ditenun itu tidak dapat dipergunakan sebagai pakaian, dan buatan mereka itu tidak dapat dipakai sebagai kain; perbuatan mereka adalah perbuatan kelaliman, dan yang dikerjakan tangan mereka adalah kekerasan belaka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So they brought the ark of God, and set it in the midst of the tent that David had pitched for it: and they offered burnt sacrifices and peace offerings before God.
target: Tabut Allah itu dibawa masuk, lalu diletakkan di tengah-tengah kemah yang dipasang Daud untuk itu, kemudian mereka mempersembahkan korban bakaran dan korban keselamatan di hadapan Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If thou shalt say in thine heart, These nations are more than I; how can I dispossess them?
target: Jika sekiranya engkau berkata dalam hatimu: Bangsa-bangsa ini lebih banyak dari padaku, bagaimanakah aku dapat menghalaukan mereka?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the south wind blew softly, supposing that they had obtained their purpose, loosing thence, they sailed close by Crete.
target: Pada waktu itu angin sepoi-sepoi bertiup dari selatan. Mereka menyangka, bahwa maksud mereka sudah tentu akan tercapai. Mereka membongkar sauh, lalu berlayar dekat sekali menyusur pantai Kreta.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Remember that Jesus Christ of the seed of David was raised from the dead according to my gospel:
target: Ingatlah ini: Yesus Kristus, yang telah bangkit dari antara orang mati, yang telah dilahirkan sebagai keturunan Daud, itulah yang kuberitakan dalam Injilku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore I abhor myself, and repent in dust and ashes.
target: Oleh sebab itu aku mencabut perkataanku dan dengan menyesal aku duduk dalam debu dan abu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the border went out unto the side of Ekron northward: and the border was drawn to Shicron, and passed along to mount Baalah, and went out unto Jabneel; and the goings out of the border were at the sea.
target: Kemudian batas itu keluar ke utara ke lereng gunung Ekron; kemudian batas itu melengkung ke Sikron, terus ke gunung Baala dan keluar dekat Yabneel, sehingga batas itu berakhir di laut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So I went in and saw; and behold every form of creeping things, and abominable beasts, and all the idols of the house of Israel, pourtrayed upon the wall round about.
target: Lalu aku masuk dan melihat, sungguh, segala gambar-gambar binatang melata dan binatang-binatang lain yang menjijikkan dan segala berhala-berhala kaum Israel terukir pada tembok sekelilingnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, mine anger and my fury shall be poured out upon this place, upon man, and upon beast, and upon the trees of the field, and upon the fruit of the ground; and it shall burn, and shall not be quenched.
target: Sebab itu beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Sesungguhnya, murka-Ku dan kehangatan amarah-Ku akan tercurah ke tempat ini, ke atas manusia, ke atas hewan, ke atas pohon-pohonan di padang dan ke atas hasil tanah; amarah itu akan menyala-nyala dengan tidak padam-padam."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore up by night, thou and the people that is with thee, and lie in wait in the field:
target: Oleh sebab itu, berangkatlah pada waktu malam, engkau dan rakyat yang bersama-sama dengan engkau itu, dan adakanlah penghadangan di padang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore have I also made you contemptible and base before all the people, according as ye have not kept my ways, but have been partial in the law.
target: Maka Aku pun akan membuat kamu hina dan rendah bagi seluruh umat ini, oleh karena kamu tidak mengikuti jalan yang Kutunjukkan, tetapi memandang bulu dalam pengajaranmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jacob rent his clothes, and put sackcloth upon his loins, and mourned for his son many days.
target: Dan Yakub mengoyakkan jubahnya, lalu mengenakan kain kabung pada pinggangnya dan berkabunglah ia berhari-hari lamanya karena anaknya itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Draw nigh unto my soul, and redeem it: deliver me because of mine enemies.
target: Janganlah sembunyikan wajah-Mu kepada hamba-Mu, sebab aku tersesak; segeralah menjawab aku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the king of Babylon slew the sons of Zedekiah in Riblah before his eyes: also the king of Babylon slew all the nobles of Judah.
target: Raja Babel menyuruh menyembelih anak-anak Zedekia di depan matanya di Ribla; juga semua pembesar Yehuda disembelih oleh raja Babel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the king, Let not Hezekiah deceive you: for he shall not be able to deliver you out of his hand:
target: Beginilah kata raja: Janganlah Hizkia memperdayakan kamu, sebab ia tidak sanggup melepaskan kamu dari tanganku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let them alone: they be blind leaders of the blind. And if the blind lead the blind, both shall fall into the ditch.
target: Biarkanlah mereka itu. Mereka orang buta yang menuntun orang buta. Jika orang buta menuntun orang buta, pasti keduanya jatuh ke dalam lobang."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now then it is no more I that do it, but sin that dwelleth in me.
target: Kalau demikian bukan aku lagi yang memperbuatnya, tetapi dosa yang ada di dalam aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Lead me, O LORD, in thy righteousness because of mine enemies; make thy way straight before my face.
target: Tetapi aku, berkat kasih setia-Mu yang besar, aku akan masuk ke dalam rumah-Mu, sujud menyembah ke arah bait-Mu yang kudus dengan takut akan Engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his power shall be mighty, but not by his own power: and he shall destroy wonderfully, and shall prosper, and practise, and shall destroy the mighty and the holy people.
target: Kekuatannya akan menjadi hebat, tetapi tidak sekuat yang terdahulu, dan ia akan mendatangkan kebinasaan yang mengerikan, dan apa yang dilakukannya akan berhasil; orang-orang berkuasa akan dibinasakannya, juga umat orang kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yet they say, The LORD shall not see, neither shall the God of Jacob regard it.
target: dan mereka berkata: "TUHAN tidak melihatnya, dan Allah Yakub tidak mengindahkannya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Carmi; Achar, the troubler of Israel, who transgressed in the thing accursed.
target: Keturunan Karmi ialah Ahar, yang mencelakakan orang Israel karena ia tidak taat dalam hal barang-barang yang dikhususkan itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the drinking was according to the law; none did compel: for so the king had appointed to all the officers of his house, that they should do according to every man's pleasure.
target: Adapun aturan minum ialah: tiada dengan paksa; karena beginilah disyaratkan raja kepada semua bentara dalam, supaya mereka berbuat menurut keinginan tiap-tiap orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye are of your father the devil, and the lusts of your father ye will do. He was a murderer from the beginning, and abode not in the truth, because there is no truth in him. When he speaketh a lie, he speaketh of his own: for he is a liar, and the father of it.
target: Iblislah yang menjadi bapamu dan kamu ingin melakukan keinginan-keinginan bapamu. Ia adalah pembunuh manusia sejak semula dan tidak hidup dalam kebenaran, sebab di dalam dia tidak ada kebenaran. Apabila ia berkata dusta, ia berkata atas kehendaknya sendiri, sebab ia adalah pendusta dan bapa segala dusta.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Blessed are they that mourn: for they shall be comforted.
target: Berbahagialah orang yang berdukacita, karena mereka akan dihibur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thy brethren also of the tribe of Levi, the tribe of thy father, bring thou with thee, that they may be joined unto thee, and minister unto thee: but thou and thy sons with thee shall minister before the tabernacle of witness.
target: Suruhlah juga saudara-saudaramu, suku Lewi, suku bapa leluhurmu, mendekat bersama-sama dengan engkau, supaya mereka menggabungkan diri kepadamu dan melayani engkau, apabila engkau ini beserta anak-anakmu ada di depan kemah hukum.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Sennacherib king of Assyria departed, and went and returned, and dwelt at Nineveh.
target: Sebab itu berangkatlah Sanherib, raja Asyur, dan pulang, lalu tinggallah ia di Niniwe.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jezreel, and Jokdeam, and Zanoah,
target: Yizreel, Yokdeam, Zanoah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then came forth unto him Eliakim, Hilkiah's son, which was over the house, and Shebna the scribe, and Joah, Asaph's son, the recorder.
target: Keluarlah mendapatkan dia Elyakim bin Hilkia, kepala istana, dan Sebna, panitera negara, serta Yoah bin Asaf, bendahara negara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Gedaliah the son of Ahikam the son of Shaphan sware unto them and to their men, saying, Fear not to serve the Chaldeans: dwell in the land, and serve the king of Babylon, and it shall be well with you.
target: Lalu bersumpahlah Gedalya bin Ahikam bin Safan kepada mereka dengan anak buah mereka: "Janganlah kamu takut untuk takluk kepada orang-orang Kasdim itu; tinggallah di negeri ini dan takluklah kepada raja Babel, maka keadaanmu akan menjadi baik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Look even out the best and meetest of your master's sons, and set him on his father's throne, and fight for your master's house.
target: maka pilihlah seorang yang terbaik dan yang paling tepat dari antara anak-anak tuanmu, lalu dudukkanlah dia di atas takhta ayahnya, kemudian berperanglah membela keluarga tuanmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Even of the children of Israel's half, Moses took one portion of fifty, both of man and of beast, and gave them unto the Levites, which kept the charge of the tabernacle of the LORD; as the LORD commanded Moses.
target: Lalu Musa mengambil dari yang setengah yang menjadi bagian orang Israel lain itu satu ambilan dari setiap lima puluh, baik dari manusia baik dari hewan, kemudian menyerahkan semuanya kepada orang Lewi yang memelihara Kemah Suci, seperti yang diperintahkan TUHAN kepada Musa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Unto which promise our twelve tribes, instantly serving God day and night, hope to come. For which hope's sake, king Agrippa, I am accused of the Jews.
target: dan yang dinantikan oleh kedua belas suku kita, sementara mereka siang malam melakukan ibadahnya dengan tekun. Dan karena pengharapan itulah, ya raja Agripa, aku dituduh orang-orang Yahudi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And this is the case of the slayer, which shall flee thither, that he may live: Whoso killeth his neighbour ignorantly, whom he hated not in time past;
target: Inilah ketentuan mengenai pembunuh yang melarikan diri ke sana dan boleh tinggal hidup: apabila ia membunuh sesamanya manusia dengan tidak sengaja dan dengan tidak membenci dia sebelumnya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And next unto him builded the men of Jericho. And next to them builded Zaccur the son of Imri.
target: Berdekatan dengan mereka orang-orang Yerikho membangun, dan berdekatan dengan orang-orang itu Zakur bin Imri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Jeremiah abode in the court of the prison until the day that Jerusalem was taken: and he was there when Jerusalem was taken.
target: Demikianlah Yeremia tinggal di pelataran penjagaan itu sampai kepada hari Yerusalem direbut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Whether it be in the warp, or woof; of linen, or of woollen; whether in a skin, or in any thing made of skin;
target: entah pada benang lungsin atau benang pakannya, entah pada kulit atau sesuatu barang kulit,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes.
target: dan orang yang sedang di ladang janganlah ia kembali untuk mengambil pakaiannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the heavens and the earth, which are now, by the same word are kept in store, reserved unto fire against the day of judgment and perdition of ungodly men.
target: Tetapi oleh firman itu juga langit dan bumi yang sekarang terpelihara dari api dan disimpan untuk hari penghakiman dan kebinasaan orang-orang fasik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The man answered and said unto them, Why herein is a marvellous thing, that ye know not from whence he is, and yet he hath opened mine eyes.
target: Jawab orang itu kepada mereka: "Aneh juga bahwa kamu tidak tahu dari mana Ia datang, sedangkan Ia telah memelekkan mataku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD God said, Behold, the man is become as one of us, to know good and evil: and now, lest he put forth his hand, and take also of the tree of life, and eat, and live for ever:
target: Berfirmanlah TUHAN Allah: "Sesungguhnya manusia itu telah menjadi seperti salah satu dari Kita, tahu tentang yang baik dan yang jahat; maka sekarang jangan sampai ia mengulurkan tangannya dan mengambil pula dari buah pohon kehidupan itu dan memakannya, sehingga ia hidup untuk selama-lamanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For if, when we were enemies, we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son, much more, being reconciled, we shall be saved by his life.
target: Sebab jikalau kita, ketika masih seteru, diperdamaikan dengan Allah oleh kematian Anak-Nya, lebih-lebih kita, yang sekarang telah diperdamaikan, pasti akan diselamatkan oleh hidup-Nya!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then he brought me forth into the utter court, the way toward the north: and he brought me into the chamber that was over against the separate place, and which was before the building toward the north.
target: Lalu diiringnya aku ke pelataran luar bagian utara dan dibawanya aku ke bilik-bilik sebelah utara yang berhadapan dengan lapangan tertutup dan berhadapan dengan bangunan yang di ujung barat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they departed from the presence of the council, rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name.
target: Rasul-rasul itu meninggalkan sidang Mahkamah Agama dengan gembira, karena mereka telah dianggap layak menderita penghinaan oleh karena Nama Yesus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold therefore the goodness and severity of God: on them which fell, severity; but toward thee, goodness, if thou continue in his goodness: otherwise thou also shalt be cut off.
target: Sebab itu perhatikanlah kemurahan Allah dan juga kekerasan-Nya, yaitu kekerasan atas orang-orang yang telah jatuh, tetapi atas kamu kemurahan-Nya, yaitu jika kamu tetap dalam kemurahan-Nya; jika tidak, kamu pun akan dipotong juga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If thou prepare thine heart, and stretch out thine hands toward him;
target: Jikalau engkau ini menyediakan hatimu, dan menadahkan tanganmu kepada-Nya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the priest shall offer the burnt offering and the meat offering upon the altar: and the priest shall make an atonement for him, and he shall be clean.
target: Kemudian imam harus mempersembahkan korban bakaran dan korban sajian di atas mezbah. Dengan demikian imam mengadakan pendamaian bagi orang itu, maka ia menjadi tahir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants, and to eat and drink with the drunken;
target: Tuanku tidak datang-datang, lalu ia mulai memukul hamba-hamba lain, dan makan minum bersama-sama pemabuk-pemabuk,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When he slew them, then they sought him: and they returned and enquired early after God.
target: Apabila Ia membunuh mereka, maka mereka mencari Dia, mereka berbalik dan mengingini Allah;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Every word of God is pure: he is a shield unto them that put their trust in him.
target: Semua firman Allah adalah murni. Ia adalah perisai bagi orang-orang yang berlindung pada-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And between the chambers was the wideness of twenty cubits round about the house on every side.
target: bilik-bilik ada jarak dua puluh hasta sekeliling bangunan itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them the third time, Why, what evil hath he done? I have found no cause of death in him: I will therefore chastise him, and let him go.
target: Kata Pilatus untuk ketiga kalinya kepada mereka: "Kejahatan apa yang sebenarnya telah dilakukan orang ini? Tidak ada suatu kesalahan pun yang kudapati pada-Nya, yang setimpal dengan hukuman mati. Jadi aku akan menghajar Dia, lalu melepaskan-Nya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou hast clothed me with skin and flesh, and hast fenced me with bones and sinews.
target: Engkau mengenakan kulit dan daging kepadaku, serta menjalin aku dengan tulang dan urat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But now is Christ risen from the dead, and become the firstfruits of them that slept.
target: Tetapi yang benar ialah, bahwa Kristus telah dibangkitkan dari antara orang mati, sebagai yang sulung dari orang-orang yang telah meninggal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Why hast thou prophesied in the name of the LORD, saying, This house shall be like Shiloh, and this city shall be desolate without an inhabitant? And all the people were gathered against Jeremiah in the house of the LORD.
target: Mengapa engkau bernubuat demi nama TUHAN dengan berkata: Rumah ini akan sama seperti Silo, dan kota ini akan menjadi reruntuhan, sehingga tidak ada lagi penduduknya?" Dan seluruh rakyat berkumpul mengerumuni Yeremia di rumah TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The word which came unto Jeremiah from the LORD in the days of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah, saying,
target: Firman yang datang dari TUHAN kepada Yeremia di zaman Yoyakim bin Yosia, raja Yehuda, bunyinya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When thou goest out to battle against thine enemies, and seest horses, and chariots, and a people more than thou, be not afraid of them: for the LORD thy God is with thee, which brought thee up out of the land of Egypt.
target: "Apabila engkau keluar berperang melawan musuhmu, dan engkau melihat kuda dan kereta, yakni tentara yang lebih banyak dari padamu, maka janganlah engkau takut kepadanya, sebab TUHAN, Allahmu, yang telah menuntun engkau keluar dari tanah Mesir, menyertai engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they said one to another, Behold, this dreamer cometh.
target: Kata mereka seorang kepada yang lain: "Lihat, tukang mimpi kita itu datang!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Leah said, God hath given me my hire, because I have given my maiden to my husband: and she called his name Issachar.
target: Lalu kata Lea: "Allah telah memberi upahku, karena aku telah memberi budakku perempuan kepada suamiku." Maka ia menamai anak itu Isakhar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the day of the Lord will come as a thief in the night; in the which the heavens shall pass away with a great noise, and the elements shall melt with fervent heat, the earth also and the works that are therein shall be burned up.
target: Tetapi hari Tuhan akan tiba seperti pencuri. Pada hari itu langit akan lenyap dengan gemuruh yang dahsyat dan unsur-unsur dunia akan hangus dalam nyala api, dan bumi dan segala yang ada di atasnya akan hilang lenyap.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sons of Mushi; Mahli, and Eder, and Jeremoth, three.
target: Anak-anak Musi ialah Mahli, Eder dan Yeremot, tiga orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And have put on the new man, which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him:
target: dan telah mengenakan manusia baru yang terus-menerus diperbaharui untuk memperoleh pengetahuan yang benar menurut gambar Khaliknya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And their windows, and their arches, and their palm trees, were after the measure of the gate that looketh toward the east; and they went up unto it by seven steps; and the arches thereof were before them.
target: Jendela-jendelanya, balai gerbangnya dan gambar-gambar pohon kormanya seukuran juga dengan pintu gerbang yang menghadap ke timur. Orang dapat naik ke situ melalui tangga yang tujuh tingkat dan balai gerbangnya ada sebelah dalam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he came and took the book out of the right hand of him that sat upon the throne.
target: Lalu datanglah Anak Domba itu dan menerima gulungan kitab itu dari tangan Dia yang duduk di atas takhta itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The children of Keros, the children of Sia, the children of Padon,
target: bani Keros, bani Sia, bani Padon;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he put the wood in order, and cut the bullock in pieces, and laid him on the wood, and said, Fill four barrels with water, and pour it on the burnt sacrifice, and on the wood.
target: Ia menyusun kayu api, memotong lembu itu dan menaruh potongan-potongannya di atas kayu api itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I am persuaded, that neither death, nor life, nor angels, nor principalities, nor powers, nor things present, nor things to come,
target: Sebab aku yakin, bahwa baik maut, maupun hidup, baik malaikat-malaikat, maupun pemerintah-pemerintah, baik yang ada sekarang, maupun yang akan datang,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The breath of our nostrils, the anointed of the LORD, was taken in their pits, of whom we said, Under his shadow we shall live among the heathen.
target: Orang yang diurapi TUHAN, nafas hidup kami, tertangkap dalam pelubang mereka, dia yang kami sangka: "Dalam naungannya kami akan hidup di antara bangsa-bangsa."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Tell me, ye that desire to be under the law, do ye not hear the law?
target: Katakanlah kepadaku, hai kamu yang mau hidup di bawah hukum Taurat, tidakkah kamu mendengarkan hukum Taurat?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David enquired of the LORD, saying, Shall I go up to the Philistines? wilt thou deliver them into mine hand? And the LORD said unto David, Go up: for I will doubtless deliver the Philistines into thine hand.
target: bertanyalah Daud kepada TUHAN: "Apakah aku harus maju melawan orang Filistin itu? Akan Kauserahkankah mereka ke dalam tanganku?" TUHAN menjawab Daud: "Majulah, sebab Aku pasti akan menyerahkan orang Filistin itu ke dalam tanganmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore his people return hither: and waters of a full cup are wrung out to them.
target: Sebab itu orang-orang berbalik kepada mereka, mendapatkan mereka seperti air yang berlimpah-limpah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all Judah rejoiced at the oath: for they had sworn with all their heart, and sought him with their whole desire; and he was found of them: and the LORD gave them rest round about.
target: Seluruh Yehuda bersukaria atas sumpah itu, karena dengan segenap hati mereka bersumpah setia dan dengan kehendak yang bulat mereka mencari TUHAN. TUHAN berkenan ditemui oleh mereka dan mengaruniakan keamanan kepada mereka di segala penjuru.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when they had prayed, the place was shaken where they were assembled together; and they were all filled with the Holy Ghost, and they spake the word of God with boldness.
target: Dan ketika mereka sedang berdoa, goyanglah tempat mereka berkumpul itu dan mereka semua penuh dengan Roh Kudus, lalu mereka memberitakan firman Allah dengan berani.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the way of peace have they not known:
target: dan jalan damai tidak mereka kenal;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou art worthy, O Lord, to receive glory and honour and power: for thou hast created all things, and for thy pleasure they are and were created.
target: "Ya Tuhan dan Allah kami, Engkau layak menerima puji-pujian dan hormat dan kuasa; sebab Engkau telah menciptakan segala sesuatu; dan oleh karena kehendak-Mu semuanya itu ada dan diciptakan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said unto Moses, Go unto the people, and sanctify them to day and to morrow, and let them wash their clothes,
target: Berfirmanlah TUHAN kepada Musa: "Pergilah kepada bangsa itu; suruhlah mereka menguduskan diri pada hari ini dan besok, dan mereka harus mencuci pakaiannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And many that believed came, and confessed, and shewed their deeds.
target: Banyak di antara mereka yang telah menjadi percaya, datang dan mengaku di muka umum, bahwa mereka pernah turut melakukan perbuatan-perbuatan seperti itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: She hath killed her beasts; she hath mingled her wine; she hath also furnished her table.
target: memotong ternak sembelihannya, mencampur anggurnya, dan menyediakan hidangannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us, which was contrary to us, and took it out of the way, nailing it to his cross;
target: dengan menghapuskan surat hutang, yang oleh ketentuan-ketentuan hukum mendakwa dan mengancam kita. Dan itu ditiadakan-Nya dengan memakukannya pada kayu salib:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they blessed Rebekah, and said unto her, Thou art our sister, be thou the mother of thousands of millions, and let thy seed possess the gate of those which hate them.
target: Dan mereka memberkati Ribka, kata mereka kepadanya: "Saudara kami, moga-moga engkau menjadi beribu-ribu laksa, dan moga-moga keturunanmu menduduki kota-kota musuhnya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The which Jeremiah the prophet spake unto all the people of Judah, and to all the inhabitants of Jerusalem, saying,
target: Firman itu telah disampaikan oleh nabi Yeremia kepada segenap kaum Yehuda dan kepada segenap penduduk Yerusalem, katanya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The eternal God is thy refuge, and underneath are the everlasting arms: and he shall thrust out the enemy from before thee; and shall say, Destroy them.
target: Allah yang abadi adalah tempat perlindunganmu, dan di bawahmu ada lengan-lengan yang kekal. Ia mengusir musuh dari depanmu dan berfirman: Punahkanlah!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As a thorn goeth up into the hand of a drunkard, so is a parable in the mouths of fools.
target: Amsal di mulut orang bebal adalah seperti duri yang menusuk tangan pemabuk.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For, lo, thou shalt conceive, and bear a son; and no razor shall come on his head: for the child shall be a Nazarite unto God from the womb: and he shall begin to deliver Israel out of the hand of the Philistines.
target: Sebab engkau akan mengandung dan melahirkan seorang anak laki-laki; kepalanya takkan kena pisau cukur, sebab sejak dari kandungan ibunya anak itu akan menjadi seorang nazir Allah dan dengan dia akan mulai penyelamatan orang Israel dari tangan orang Filistin."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The right hand of the LORD is exalted: the right hand of the LORD doeth valiantly.
target: tangan kanan TUHAN berkuasa meninggikan, tangan kanan TUHAN melakukan keperkasaan!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That ye receive her in the Lord, as becometh saints, and that ye assist her in whatsoever business she hath need of you: for she hath been a succourer of many, and of myself also.
target: supaya kamu menyambut dia dalam Tuhan, sebagaimana seharusnya bagi orang-orang kudus, dan berikanlah kepadanya bantuan bila diperlukannya. Sebab ia sendiri telah memberikan bantuan kepada banyak orang, juga kepadaku sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And whether one member suffer, all the members suffer with it; or one member be honoured, all the members rejoice with it.
target: Karena itu jika satu anggota menderita, semua anggota turut menderita; jika satu anggota dihormati, semua anggota turut bersukacita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So when his fellowservants saw what was done, they were very sorry, and came and told unto their lord all that was done.
target: Melihat itu kawan-kawannya yang lain sangat sedih lalu menyampaikan segala yang terjadi kepada tuan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And king Solomon sent by the hand of Benaiah the son of Jehoiada; and he fell upon him that he died.
target: Lalu raja Salomo menyerahkan hal itu kepada Benaya bin Yoyada; orang ini memancung dia sehingga mati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And this have ye done again, covering the altar of the LORD with tears, with weeping, and with crying out, insomuch that he regardeth not the offering any more, or receiveth it with good will at your hand.
target: Dan inilah yang kedua yang kamu lakukan: Kamu menutupi mezbah TUHAN dengan air mata, dengan tangisan dan rintihan, oleh karena Ia tidak lagi berpaling kepada persembahan dan tidak berkenan menerimanya dari tanganmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Libnah, and Ether, and Ashan,
target: Libna, Eter, Asan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Mark the perfect man, and behold the upright: for the end of that man is peace.
target: Perhatikanlah orang yang tulus dan lihatlah kepada orang yang jujur, sebab pada orang yang suka damai akan ada masa depan;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Hatach came and told Esther the words of Mordecai.
target: Lalu masuklah Hatah dan menyampaikan perkataan Mordekhai kepada Ester.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death.
target: Musuh yang terakhir, yang dibinasakan ialah maut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And were all baptized unto Moses in the cloud and in the sea;
target: Untuk menjadi pengikut Musa mereka semua telah dibaptis dalam awan dan dalam laut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hast thou with him spread out the sky, which is strong, and as a molten looking glass?
target: Dapatkah engkau seperti Dia menyusun awan menjadi cakrawala, keras seperti cermin tuangan?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the body of his flesh through death, to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight:
target: sekarang diperdamaikan-Nya, di dalam tubuh jasmani Kristus oleh kematian-Nya, untuk menempatkan kamu kudus dan tak bercela dan tak bercacat di hadapan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Isaiah said unto them, Thus shall ye say unto your master, Thus saith the LORD, Be not afraid of the words that thou hast heard, wherewith the servants of the king of Assyria have blasphemed me.
target: berkatalah Yesaya kepada mereka: "Beginilah kamu katakan kepada tuanmu: Beginilah firman TUHAN: Janganlah engkau takut terhadap perkataan yang kaudengar yang telah diucapkan oleh budak-budak raja Asyur untuk menghujat Aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Do good in thy good pleasure unto Zion: build thou the walls of Jerusalem.
target: Sebab Engkau tidak berkenan kepada korban sembelihan; sekiranya kupersembahkan korban bakaran, Engkau tidak menyukainya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But when the young man heard that saying, he went away sorrowful: for he had great possessions.
target: Ketika orang muda itu mendengar perkataan itu, pergilah ia dengan sedih, sebab banyak hartanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let your conversation be without covetousness; and be content with such things as ye have: for he hath said, I will never leave thee, nor forsake thee.
target: Janganlah kamu menjadi hamba uang dan cukupkanlah dirimu dengan apa yang ada padamu. Karena Allah telah berfirman: "Aku sekali-kali tidak akan membiarkan engkau dan Aku sekali-kali tidak akan meninggalkan engkau."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the people heard these evil tidings, they mourned: and no man did put on him his ornaments.
target: Ketika bangsa itu mendengar ancaman yang mengerikan ini, berkabunglah mereka dan seorang pun tidak ada yang memakai perhiasannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he spake three thousand proverbs: and his songs were a thousand and five.
target: Ia menggubah tiga ribu amsal, dan nyanyiannya ada seribu lima.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now at the end of the days that the king had said he should bring them in, then the prince of the eunuchs brought them in before Nebuchadnezzar.
target: Setelah lewat waktu yang ditetapkan raja, bahwa mereka sekalian harus dibawa menghadap, maka dibawalah mereka oleh pemimpin pegawai istana itu ke hadapan Nebukadnezar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And those that do pitch next unto him shall be the tribe of Issachar: and Nethaneel the son of Zuar shall be captain of the children of Issachar.
target: Yang berkemah di dekatnya ialah suku Isakhar. Pemimpin bani Isakhar ialah Netaneel bin Zuar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: One young bullock, one ram, one lamb of the first year, for a burnt offering:
target: seekor lembu jantan muda, seekor domba jantan dan seekor domba berumur setahun, untuk korban bakaran;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: One dieth in his full strength, being wholly at ease and quiet.
target: Yang seorang mati dengan masih penuh tenaga, dengan sangat tenang dan sentosa;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the day that thy walls are to be built, in that day shall the decree be far removed.
target: Akan datang suatu hari bahwa pagar tembokmu akan dibangun kembali; pada hari itulah perbatasanmu akan diperluas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD God of Israel delivered Sihon and all his people into the hand of Israel, and they smote them: so Israel possessed all the land of the Amorites, the inhabitants of that country.
target: Tetapi TUHAN, Allah Israel, menyerahkan Sihon dengan seluruh rakyatnya ke dalam tangan orang Israel, dan mereka dikalahkan, sehingga orang Israel menduduki seluruh negeri kepunyaan orang Amori, penduduk negeri itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thus saith the Lord GOD, My people went down aforetime into Egypt to sojourn there; and the Assyrian oppressed them without cause.
target: Sebab beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Dahulu umat-Ku berangkat ke Mesir untuk tinggal di situ sebagai orang asing, lalu Asyur memeras dia tanpa alasan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now;
target: Aku mengucap syukur kepada Allahku karena persekutuanmu dalam Berita Injil mulai dari hari pertama sampai sekarang ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And afterward the children of Judah went down to fight against the Canaanites, that dwelt in the mountain, and in the south, and in the valley.
target: Kemudian bani Yehuda maju berperang melawan orang Kanaan, yang diam di pegunungan, di Tanah Negeb dan di Daerah Bukit.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: With the pure thou wilt shew thyself pure; and with the froward thou wilt shew thyself unsavoury.
target: terhadap orang yang suci Engkau berlaku suci, tetapi terhadap orang yang bengkok Engkau berlaku belat-belit.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Verily thou art a God that hidest thyself, O God of Israel, the Saviour.
target: Sungguh, Engkau Allah yang menyembunyikan diri, Allah Israel, Juruselamat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore hear now this, thou that art given to pleasures, that dwellest carelessly, that sayest in thine heart, I am, and none else beside me; I shall not sit as a widow, neither shall I know the loss of children:
target: Oleh sebab itu, dengarlah ini, hai orang yang hidup bermanja-manja, yang duduk-duduk dengan tenang, yang berkata dalam hatimu: "Tiada yang lain di sampingku! Aku tidak akan jadi janda dan tidak akan menjadi punah!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Kenaz; Othniel, and Seraiah: and the sons of Othniel; Hathath.
target: Anak-anak Kenas ialah Otniel dan Seraya; dan anak-anak Otniel ialah Hatat dan Meonotai;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if a man borrow ought of his neighbour, and it be hurt, or die, the owner thereof being not with it, he shall surely make it good.
target: Apabila seseorang meminjam seekor binatang dari temannya, dan binatang itu patah kakinya atau mati, ketika pemiliknya tidak ada di situ, maka ia harus membayar ganti kerugian sepenuhnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he answered them, saying, Who is my mother, or my brethren?
target: Jawab Yesus kepada mereka: "Siapa ibu-Ku dan siapa saudara-saudara-Ku?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He shall be buried with the burial of an ass, drawn and cast forth beyond the gates of Jerusalem.
target: Ia akan dikubur secara penguburan keledai, diseret dan dilemparkan ke luar pintu-pintu gerbang Yerusalem."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if a man lie with a beast, he shall surely be put to death: and ye shall slay the beast.
target: Bila seorang laki-laki berkelamin dengan seekor binatang, pastilah ia dihukum mati, dan binatang itu pun harus kamu bunuh juga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And immediately, while he yet spake, cometh Judas, one of the twelve, and with him a great multitude with swords and staves, from the chief priests and the scribes and the elders.
target: Waktu Yesus masih berbicara, muncullah Yudas, salah seorang dari kedua belas murid itu, dan bersama-sama dia serombongan orang yang membawa pedang dan pentung, disuruh oleh imam-imam kepala, ahli-ahli Taurat dan tua-tua.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And blessed is he, whosoever shall not be offended in me.
target: Dan berbahagialah orang yang tidak menjadi kecewa dan menolak Aku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He sitteth alone and keepeth silence, because he hath borne it upon him.
target: Biarlah ia duduk sendirian dan berdiam diri kalau TUHAN membebankannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the wicked boasteth of his heart's desire, and blesseth the covetous, whom the LORD abhorreth.
target: Karena orang fasik memuji-muji keinginan hatinya, dan orang yang loba mengutuki dan menista TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Oil for the light, spices for anointing oil, and for sweet incense,
target: minyak untuk lampu, rempah-rempah untuk minyak urapan dan untuk ukupan dari wangi-wangian,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will deliver them into the hand of those that seek their lives, and into the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon, and into the hand of his servants: and afterward it shall be inhabited, as in the days of old, saith the LORD.
target: Aku akan menyerahkan mereka ke dalam tangan orang-orang yang berusaha mencabut nyawa mereka, yakni ke dalam tangan Nebukadnezar, raja Babel, dan para pegawainya. Tetapi sesudahnya negeri itu akan didiami seperti dalam zaman purbakala, demikianlah firman TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hearken unto this, O Job: stand still, and consider the wondrous works of God.
target: Berilah telinga kepada semuanya itu, hai Ayub, diamlah, dan perhatikanlah keajaiban-keajaiban Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The burden of Nineveh. The book of the vision of Nahum the Elkoshite.
target: Ucapan ilahi tentang Niniwe. Kitab penglihatan Nahum, orang Elkosh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure:
target: sehingga dalam jemaat-jemaat Allah kami sendiri bermegah tentang kamu karena ketabahanmu dan imanmu dalam segala penganiayaan dan penindasan yang kamu derita:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his firstborn son Abdon, then Zur, and Kish, and Baal, and Ner, and Nadab.
target: Anak sulungnya ialah Abdon, lalu Zur, Kish, Baal, Ner, Nadab,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Bethnimrah, and Bethharan, fenced cities: and folds for sheep.
target: Bet-Nimra, Bet-Haran, sebagai kota-kota yang berkubu dan sebagai tempat kandang-kandang kambing domba.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he came to the den, he cried with a lamentable voice unto Daniel: and the king spake and said to Daniel, O Daniel, servant of the living God, is thy God, whom thou servest continually, able to deliver thee from the lions?
target: Pagi-pagi sekali ketika fajar menyingsing, bangunlah raja dan pergi dengan buru-buru ke gua singa;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus answered and said unto him, Get thee behind me, Satan: for it is written, Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God, and him only shalt thou serve.
target: Tetapi Yesus berkata kepadanya: "Ada tertulis: Engkau harus menyembah Tuhan, Allahmu, dan hanya kepada Dia sajalah engkau berbakti!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who is as the wise man? and who knoweth the interpretation of a thing? a man's wisdom maketh his face to shine, and the boldness of his face shall be changed.
target: Siapakah seperti orang berhikmat? Dan siapakah yang mengetahui keterangan setiap perkara? Hikmat manusia menjadikan wajahnya bercahaya dan berubahlah kekerasan wajahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I pray thee, forgive the trespass of thine handmaid: for the LORD will certainly make my lord a sure house; because my lord fighteth the battles of the LORD, and evil hath not been found in thee all thy days.
target: Ampunilah kiranya kecerobohan hambamu ini, sebab pastilah TUHAN akan membangun bagi tuanku keturunan yang teguh, karena tuanku ini melakukan perang TUHAN dan tidak ada yang jahat terdapat padamu selama hidupmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they shall amerce him in an hundred shekels of silver, and give them unto the father of the damsel, because he hath brought up an evil name upon a virgin of Israel: and she shall be his wife; he may not put her away all his days.
target: mendenda dia seratus syikal perak dan memberikan perak itu kepada ayah si gadis — karena laki-laki itu telah membusukkan nama seorang perawan Israel. Perempuan itu haruslah tetap menjadi isterinya; selama hidupnya tidak boleh laki-laki itu menyuruh dia pergi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: God is not a man, that he should lie; neither the son of man, that he should repent: hath he said, and shall he not do it? or hath he spoken, and shall he not make it good?
target: Allah bukanlah manusia, sehingga Ia berdusta bukan anak manusia, sehingga Ia menyesal. Masakan Ia berfirman dan tidak melakukannya, atau berbicara dan tidak menepatinya?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I came down from heaven, not to do mine own will, but the will of him that sent me.
target: Sebab Aku telah turun dari sorga bukan untuk melakukan kehendak-Ku, tetapi untuk melakukan kehendak Dia yang telah mengutus Aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Notwithstanding the land shall be desolate because of them that dwell therein, for the fruit of their doings.
target: Tetapi bumi akan menjadi tandus oleh karena penduduknya, sebagai akibat perbuatan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That your generations may know that I made the children of Israel to dwell in booths, when I brought them out of the land of Egypt: I am the LORD your God.
target: supaya diketahui oleh keturunanmu, bahwa Aku telah menyuruh orang Israel tinggal di dalam pondok-pondok selama Aku menuntun mereka sesudah keluar dari tanah Mesir, Akulah TUHAN, Allahmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the elders of his house arose, and went to him, to raise him up from the earth: but he would not, neither did he eat bread with them.
target: Maka datanglah kepadanya para tua-tua yang di rumahnya untuk meminta ia bangun dari lantai, tetapi ia tidak mau; juga ia tidak makan bersama-sama dengan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And one sea, and twelve oxen under the sea;
target: "laut" yang satu itu dan kedua belas lembu yang di bawah "laut" itu;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They that sanctify themselves, and purify themselves in the gardens behind one tree in the midst, eating swine's flesh, and the abomination, and the mouse, shall be consumed together, saith the LORD.
target: Mereka yang menguduskan dan mentahirkan dirinya untuk taman-taman dewa, dengan mengikuti seseorang yang ada di tengah-tengahnya, yang memakan daging babi dan binatang-binatang jijik serta tikus, mereka semuanya akan lenyap sekaligus, demikianlah firman TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto him, Fear not: for the hand of Saul my father shall not find thee; and thou shalt be king over Israel, and I shall be next unto thee; and that also Saul my father knoweth.
target: dan berkata kepadanya: "Janganlah takut, sebab tangan ayahku Saul tidak akan menangkap engkau; engkau akan menjadi raja atas Israel, dan aku akan menjadi orang kedua di bawahmu. Juga ayahku Saul telah mengetahui yang demikian itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jesus saith unto her, Go, call thy husband, and come hither.
target: Kata Yesus kepadanya: "Pergilah, panggillah suamimu dan datang ke sini."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Mesha king of Moab was a sheepmaster, and rendered unto the king of Israel an hundred thousand lambs, and an hundred thousand rams, with the wool.
target: Mesa, raja Moab, adalah seorang peternak domba; sebagai upeti ia membayar kepada raja Israel seratus ribu anak domba dan bulu dari seratus ribu domba jantan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For he hath broken the gates of brass, and cut the bars of iron in sunder.
target: sebab dipecahkan-Nya pintu-pintu tembaga, dan dihancurkan-Nya palang-palang pintu besi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jair died, and was buried in Camon.
target: Lalu matilah Yair dan dikuburkan di Kamon.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When the even was come, there came a rich man of Arimathaea, named Joseph, who also himself was Jesus' disciple:
target: Menjelang malam datanglah seorang kaya, orang Arimatea, yang bernama Yusuf dan yang telah menjadi murid Yesus juga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the messengers turned back unto him, he said unto them, Why are ye now turned back?
target: Sesudah utusan-utusan itu kembali kepada raja, berkatalah ia kepada mereka: "Mengapa kamu kembali?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For since I came to Pharaoh to speak in thy name, he hath done evil to this people; neither hast thou delivered thy people at all.
target: Sebab sejak aku pergi menghadap Firaun untuk berbicara atas nama-Mu, dengan jahat diperlakukannya umat ini, dan Engkau tidak melepaskan umat-Mu sama sekali."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And every creeping thing that flieth is unclean unto you: they shall not be eaten.
target: Juga segala binatang mengeriap yang bersayap, itu pun haram bagimu, jangan dimakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now the God of peace be with you all. Amen.
target: Allah, sumber damai sejahtera, menyertai kamu sekalian! Amin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: How long shall the land mourn, and the herbs of every field wither, for the wickedness of them that dwell therein? the beasts are consumed, and the birds; because they said, He shall not see our last end.
target: Berapa lama lagi negeri ini menjadi kering, dan rumput di segenap padang menjadi layu? Karena kejahatan penduduknya binatang-binatang dan burung-burung habis lenyap, sebab mereka telah mengira: "Ia tidak akan melihat tingkah langkah kita!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the angel of the LORD said unto him, Wherefore hast thou smitten thine ass these three times? behold, I went out to withstand thee, because thy way is perverse before me:
target: Berfirmanlah Malaikat TUHAN kepadanya: "Apakah sebabnya engkau memukul keledaimu sampai tiga kali? Lihat, Aku keluar sebagai lawanmu, sebab jalan ini pada pemandangan-Ku menuju kepada kebinasaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she said to the king, It was a true report that I heard in mine own land of thy acts and of thy wisdom.
target: Dan ia berkata kepada raja: "Benar juga kabar yang kudengar di negeriku tentang engkau dan tentang hikmatmu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When thou sittest to eat with a ruler, consider diligently what is before thee:
target: Bila engkau duduk makan dengan seorang pembesar, perhatikanlah baik-baik apa yang ada di depanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He answered and said, I will not: but afterward he repented, and went.
target: Jawab anak itu: Baik, bapa. Tetapi ia tidak pergi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then came Isaiah the prophet unto king Hezekiah, and said unto him, What said these men? and from whence came they unto thee? And Hezekiah said, They are come from a far country unto me, even from Babylon.
target: Kemudian datanglah nabi Yesaya kepada raja Hizkia dan bertanya kepadanya: "Apakah yang telah dikatakan orang-orang ini? Dan dari manakah mereka datang?" Jawab Hizkia: "Mereka datang dari negeri yang jauh, dari Babel!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And shall say, Cast ye up, cast ye up, prepare the way, take up the stumblingblock out of the way of my people.
target: Ada yang berkata: "Bukalah, bukalah, persiapkanlah jalan, angkatlah batu sandungan dari jalan umat-Ku!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then your south quarter shall be from the wilderness of Zin along by the coast of Edom, and your south border shall be the outmost coast of the salt sea eastward:
target: Adapun sisi selatanmu ialah dari padang gurun Zin menyusur Edom, maka batas selatanmu mulai dari ujung Laut Asin di sebelah timur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This title then read many of the Jews: for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city: and it was written in Hebrew, and Greek, and Latin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The seven good kine are seven years; and the seven good ears are seven years: the dream is one.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

input: Great is my boldness of speech toward you, great is my glorying of you: I am filled with comfort, I am exceeding joyful in all our tribulation.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will harden Pharaoh's heart, and multiply my signs and my wonders in the land of Egypt.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Cease, my son, to hear the instruction that causeth to err from the words of knowledge.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I, even I, am he that blotteth out thy transgressions for mine own sake, and will not remember thy sins.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The earth is the LORD's, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.
