input: Behold, he shall come up and fly as the eagle, and spread his wings over Bozrah: and at that day shall the heart of the mighty men of Edom be as the heart of a woman in her pangs.
target: Sesungguhnya, ia naik terbang seperti burung rajawali, melayang dan mengembangkan sayapnya ke atas Bozra. Hati para pahlawan Edom pada waktu itu akan seperti hati perempuan yang sakit beranak."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall come to pass, when Pharaoh shall call you, and shall say, What is your occupation?
target: Apabila Firaun memanggil kamu dan bertanya: Apakah pekerjaanmu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They shall fall by the sword: they shall be a portion for foxes.
target: Tetapi orang-orang yang berikhtiar mencabut nyawaku, akan masuk ke bagian-bagian bumi yang paling bawah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.
target: Kenakanlah seluruh perlengkapan senjata Allah, supaya kamu dapat bertahan melawan tipu muslihat Iblis;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A wise son heareth his father's instruction: but a scorner heareth not rebuke.
target: Anak yang bijak mendengarkan didikan ayahnya, tetapi seorang pencemooh tidak mendengarkan hardikan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he is the propitiation for our sins: and not for ours only, but also for the sins of the whole world.
target: Dan Ia adalah pendamaian untuk segala dosa kita, dan bukan untuk dosa kita saja, tetapi juga untuk dosa seluruh dunia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And now, little children, abide in him; that, when he shall appear, we may have confidence, and not be ashamed before him at his coming.
target: Maka sekarang, anak-anakku, tinggallah di dalam Kristus, supaya apabila Ia menyatakan diri-Nya, kita beroleh keberanian percaya dan tidak usah malu terhadap Dia pada hari kedatangan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he took away the strange gods, and the idol out of the house of the LORD, and all the altars that he had built in the mount of the house of the LORD, and in Jerusalem, and cast them out of the city.
target: Ia menjauhkan allah-allah asing dan berhala dari rumah TUHAN, juga segala mezbah yang didirikannya di atas gunung rumah TUHAN dan di Yerusalem, dan membuangnya ke luar kota.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt write upon them all the words of this law, when thou art passed over, that thou mayest go in unto the land which the LORD thy God giveth thee, a land that floweth with milk and honey; as the LORD God of thy fathers hath promised thee.
target: lalu pada batu itu haruslah kautuliskan segala perkataan hukum Taurat ini, sesudah engkau menyeberang, supaya engkau masuk ke negeri yang diberikan kepadamu oleh TUHAN, Allahmu, suatu negeri yang berlimpah-limpah susu dan madunya, seperti yang dijanjikan kepadamu oleh TUHAN, Allah nenek moyangmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So that none of the remnant of Judah, which are gone into the land of Egypt to sojourn there, shall escape or remain, that they should return into the land of Judah, to the which they have a desire to return to dwell there: for none shall return but such as shall escape.
target: sehingga dari sisa Yehuda, yang telah pergi ke tanah Mesir untuk tinggal sebagai orang asing di sana, tidak ada seorang pun yang terluput atau terlepas untuk kembali ke tanah Yehuda, ke mana hati mereka sangat rindu untuk diam di sana lagi; sungguh, mereka tidak akan kembali, kecuali beberapa orang pengungsi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A false witness shall not be unpunished, and he that speaketh lies shall perish.
target: Saksi dusta tidak akan luput dari hukuman, orang yang menyembur-nyemburkan kebohongan akan binasa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the seventh month was come, and the children of Israel were in the cities, the people gathered themselves together as one man to Jerusalem.
target: Ketika tiba bulan yang ketujuh, setelah orang Israel menetap di kota-kotanya, maka serentak berkumpullah seluruh rakyat di Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Would ye tarry for them till they were grown? would ye stay for them from having husbands? nay, my daughters; for it grieveth me much for your sakes that the hand of the LORD is gone out against me.
target: masakan kamu menanti sampai mereka dewasa? Masakan karena itu kamu harus menahan diri dan tidak bersuami? Janganlah kiranya demikian, anak-anakku, bukankah jauh lebih pahit yang aku alami dari pada kamu, sebab tangan TUHAN teracung terhadap aku?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The old lion perisheth for lack of prey, and the stout lion's whelps are scattered abroad.
target: Singa binasa karena kekurangan mangsa, dan anak-anak singa betina bercerai-berai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he prayed unto the LORD, and said, I pray thee, O LORD, was not this my saying, when I was yet in my country? Therefore I fled before unto Tarshish: for I knew that thou art a gracious God, and merciful, slow to anger, and of great kindness, and repentest thee of the evil.
target: Dan berdoalah ia kepada TUHAN, katanya: "Ya TUHAN, bukankah telah kukatakan itu, ketika aku masih di negeriku? Itulah sebabnya, maka aku dahulu melarikan diri ke Tarsis, sebab aku tahu, bahwa Engkaulah Allah yang pengasih dan penyayang, yang panjang sabar dan berlimpah kasih setia serta yang menyesal karena malapetaka yang hendak didatangkan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Put yourselves in array against Babylon round about: all ye that bend the bow, shoot at her, spare no arrows: for she hath sinned against the LORD.
target: Aturlah barisanmu menyerang Babel dari segala pihak, hai semua orang pemanah! Panahlah kepadanya, janganlah merasa sayang akan anak panah, sebab kepada TUHANlah ia berdosa!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thy sons and thy daughters shall be given unto another people, and thine eyes shall look, and fail with longing for them all the day long; and there shall be no might in thine hand.
target: Anak-anakmu lelaki dan anak-anakmu perempuan akan diserahkan kepada bangsa lain, sedang engkau melihatnya dengan matamu sendiri, dan sehari-harian engkau rindu kepada mereka, dengan tidak dapat berbuat apa-apa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The ten sons of Haman the son of Hammedatha, the enemy of the Jews, slew they; but on the spoil laid they not their hand.
target: kesepuluh anak laki-laki Haman bin Hamedata, seteru orang Yahudi, dibunuh oleh mereka, tetapi kepada barang rampasan tidaklah mereka mengulurkan tangan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hear ye therefore the word of the LORD, all ye of the captivity, whom I have sent from Jerusalem to Babylon:
target: Tetapi dengarkanlah firman TUHAN, hai kamu semua orang buangan, yang telah Kukirim dari Yerusalem ke Babel!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wheresoever I have walked with all Israel, spake I a word to any of the judges of Israel, whom I commanded to feed my people, saying, Why have ye not built me an house of cedars?
target: Selama Aku mengembara bersama-sama seluruh orang Israel, pernahkah Aku mengucapkan firman kepada salah seorang hakim orang Israel, yang Kuperintahkan menggembalakan umat-Ku, demikian: Mengapa kamu tidak mendirikan bagi-Ku rumah dari kayu aras?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Balak offered oxen and sheep, and sent to Balaam, and to the princes that were with him.
target: Balak mengorbankan beberapa ekor lembu sapi dan kambing domba dan mengirimkan sebagian kepada Bileam dan kepada pemuka-pemuka yang bersama-sama dengan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God said unto him, Because thou hast asked this thing, and hast not asked for thyself long life; neither hast asked riches for thyself, nor hast asked the life of thine enemies; but hast asked for thyself understanding to discern judgment;
target: Jadi berfirmanlah Allah kepadanya: "Oleh karena engkau telah meminta hal yang demikian dan tidak meminta umur panjang atau kekayaan atau nyawa musuhmu, melainkan pengertian untuk memutuskan hukum,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And from the wicked their light is withholden, and the high arm shall be broken.
target: Orang-orang fasik dirampas terangnya, dan dipatahkan lengan yang diacungkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore the well was called Beerlahairoi; behold, it is between Kadesh and Bered.
target: Sebab itu sumur tadi disebutkan orang: sumur Lahai-Roi; letaknya antara Kadesh dan Bered.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall be, when thou art come in unto the land which the LORD thy God giveth thee for an inheritance, and possessest it, and dwellest therein;
target: "Apabila engkau telah masuk ke negeri yang diberikan TUHAN, Allahmu, kepadamu menjadi milik pusakamu, dan engkau telah mendudukinya dan diam di sana,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The lips of the righteous know what is acceptable: but the mouth of the wicked speaketh frowardness.
target: Bibir orang benar tahu akan hal yang menyenangkan, tetapi mulut orang fasik hanya tahu tipu muslihat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Be not deceived: evil communications corrupt good manners.
target: Janganlah kamu sesat: Pergaulan yang buruk merusakkan kebiasaan yang baik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also he built altars in the house of the LORD, whereof the LORD had said, In Jerusalem shall my name be for ever.
target: Ia mendirikan mezbah-mezbah di rumah TUHAN, walaupun sehubungan dengan rumah itu TUHAN telah berfirman: "Di Yerusalem nama-Ku akan tinggal untuk selama-lamanya!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I beheld the transgressors, and was grieved; because they kept not thy word.
target: Melihat pengkhianat-pengkhianat, aku merasa jemu, karena mereka tidak berpegang pada janji-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Micah the Morasthite prophesied in the days of Hezekiah king of Judah, and spake to all the people of Judah, saying, Thus saith the LORD of hosts; Zion shall be plowed like a field, and Jerusalem shall become heaps, and the mountain of the house as the high places of a forest.
target: "Mikha, orang Moresyet itu, telah bernubuat di zaman Hizkia, raja Yehuda. Dia telah berkata kepada segenap bangsa Yehuda: Beginilah firman TUHAN semesta alam: Sion akan dibajak seperti ladang dan Yerusalem akan menjadi timbunan puing dan gunung Bait Suci akan menjadi bukit yang berhutan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And many nations shall be joined to the LORD in that day, and shall be my people: and I will dwell in the midst of thee, and thou shalt know that the LORD of hosts hath sent me unto thee.
target: dan banyak bangsa akan menggabungkan diri kepada TUHAN pada waktu itu dan akan menjadi umat-Ku dan Aku akan diam di tengah-tengahmu." Maka engkau akan mengetahui, bahwa TUHAN semesta alam yang mengutus aku kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall be, if they refuse to take the cup at thine hand to drink, then shalt thou say unto them, Thus saith the LORD of hosts; Ye shall certainly drink.
target: Tetapi apabila mereka enggan menerima piala itu dari tanganmu untuk meminum isinya, maka haruslah kaukatakan kepada mereka: Beginilah firman TUHAN semesta alam: Kamu wajib meminumnya!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: How shall I curse, whom God hath not cursed? or how shall I defy, whom the LORD hath not defied?
target: Bagaimanakah aku menyerapah yang tidak diserapah Allah? Bagaimanakah aku mengutuk yang tidak dikutuk TUHAN?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the remnant of the meat offering shall be Aaron's and his sons': it is a thing most holy of the offerings of the LORD made by fire.
target: Korban sajian selebihnya adalah teruntuk bagi Harun dan anak-anaknya, yakni bagian maha kudus dari segala korban api-apian TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The candlestick also for the light, and his furniture, and his lamps, with the oil for the light,
target: kandil untuk penerangan dengan perkakasnya, lampunya dan minyak untuk penerangan;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Unto you therefore which believe he is precious: but unto them which be disobedient, the stone which the builders disallowed, the same is made the head of the corner,
target: Karena itu bagi kamu, yang percaya, ia mahal, tetapi bagi mereka yang tidak percaya: "Batu yang telah dibuang oleh tukang-tukang bangunan, telah menjadi batu penjuru, juga telah menjadi batu sentuhan dan suatu batu sandungan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And herein do I exercise myself, to have always a conscience void of offence toward God, and toward men.
target: Sebab itu aku senantiasa berusaha untuk hidup dengan hati nurani yang murni di hadapan Allah dan manusia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Did not I weep for him that was in trouble? was not my soul grieved for the poor?
target: Bukankah aku menangis karena orang yang mengalami hari kesukaran? Bukankah susah hatiku karena orang miskin?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Israel gave unto the Levites out of their inheritance, at the commandment of the LORD, these cities and their suburbs.
target: Lalu orang Israel memberikan dari milik pusaka mereka kota-kota yang berikut dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya kepada orang Lewi, seperti yang dititahkan TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as touching the matter which thou and I have spoken of, behold, the LORD be between thee and me for ever.
target: Tentang hal yang kita janjikan itu, antara aku dan engkau, sesungguhnya, TUHAN ada di antara aku dan engkau sampai selamanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For evildoers shall be cut off: but those that wait upon the LORD, they shall inherit the earth.
target: Sebab orang-orang yang berbuat jahat akan dilenyapkan, tetapi orang-orang yang menanti-nantikan TUHAN akan mewarisi negeri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore command thou that they hew me cedar trees out of Lebanon; and my servants shall be with thy servants: and unto thee will I give hire for thy servants according to all that thou shalt appoint: for thou knowest that there is not among us any that can skill to hew timber like unto the Sidonians.
target: Oleh sebab itu, perintahkanlah orang menebang bagiku pohon-pohon aras dari gunung Libanon, dan biarlah hamba-hambaku membantu hamba-hambamu, dan upah hamba-hambamu akan kubayar kepadamu seberapa juga kauminta, sebab engkau tahu, bahwa di antara kami tidak ada seorang pun yang pandai menebang pohon sama seperti orang Sidon."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he arose, and rebuked the wind, and said unto the sea, Peace, be still. And the wind ceased, and there was a great calm.
target: Ia pun bangun, menghardik angin itu dan berkata kepada danau itu: "Diam! Tenanglah!" Lalu angin itu reda dan danau itu menjadi teduh sekali.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he was come into the house, his disciples asked him privately, Why could not we cast him out?
target: Ketika Yesus sudah di rumah, dan murid-murid-Nya sendirian dengan Dia, bertanyalah mereka: "Mengapa kami tidak dapat mengusir roh itu?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the suburbs of the city shall be toward the north two hundred and fifty, and toward the south two hundred and fifty, and toward the east two hundred and fifty, and toward the west two hundred and fifty.
target: Sekeliling kota itu ada tanah lapang, di sebelah utara dan selatan dua ratus lima puluh hasta, serta di sebelah timur dan barat dua ratus lima puluh hasta juga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Unto whom I sware in my wrath that they should not enter into my rest.
target: Sebab itu Aku bersumpah dalam murka-Ku: "Mereka takkan masuk ke tempat perhentian-Ku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Through faith he kept the passover, and the sprinkling of blood, lest he that destroyed the firstborn should touch them.
target: Karena iman maka ia mengadakan Paskah dan pemercikan darah, supaya pembinasa anak-anak sulung jangan menyentuh mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Go ye up unto this feast: I go not up yet unto this feast: for my time is not yet full come.
target: Pergilah kamu ke pesta itu. Aku belum pergi ke situ, karena waktu-Ku belum genap."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which wise men have told from their fathers, and have not hid it:
target: yakni apa yang diberitakan oleh orang yang mempunyai hikmat, yang nenek moyang mereka tidak sembunyikan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A wrathful man stirreth up strife: but he that is slow to anger appeaseth strife.
target: Si pemarah membangkitkan pertengkaran, tetapi orang yang sabar memadamkan perbantahan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He giveth snow like wool: he scattereth the hoarfrost like ashes.
target: Ia menurunkan salju seperti bulu domba dan menghamburkan embun beku seperti abu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If I have lifted up my hand against the fatherless, when I saw my help in the gate:
target: jikalau aku mengangkat tanganku melawan anak yatim, karena di pintu gerbang aku melihat ada yang membantu aku,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in thy majesty ride prosperously because of truth and meekness and righteousness; and thy right hand shall teach thee terrible things.
target: Ikatlah pedangmu pada pinggang, hai pahlawan, dalam keagunganmu dan semarakmu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there were four leprous men at the entering in of the gate: and they said one to another, Why sit we here until we die?
target: Empat orang yang sakit kusta ada di depan pintu gerbang. Berkatalah yang seorang kepada yang lain: "Mengapakah kita duduk-duduk di sini sampai mati?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If so be that ye have heard him, and have been taught by him, as the truth is in Jesus:
target: Karena kamu telah mendengar tentang Dia dan menerima pengajaran di dalam Dia menurut kebenaran yang nyata dalam Yesus,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Until I make thy foes thy footstool.
target: Duduklah di sebelah kanan-Ku, sampai Kubuat musuh-musuh-Mu menjadi tumpuan kaki-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But they rebelled, and vexed his holy Spirit: therefore he was turned to be their enemy, and he fought against them.
target: Tetapi mereka memberontak dan mendukakan Roh Kudus-Nya; maka Ia berubah menjadi musuh mereka, dan Ia sendiri berperang melawan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they sent and called him. So Jeroboam and all Israel came and spake to Rehoboam, saying,
target: Orang menyuruh memanggil dia, lalu datanglah Yerobeam dengan seluruh orang Israel dan berkata kepada Rehabeam:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Judge me, O LORD; for I have walked in mine integrity: I have trusted also in the LORD; therefore I shall not slide.
target: Dari Daud. Berilah keadilan kepadaku, ya TUHAN, sebab aku telah hidup dalam ketulusan; kepada TUHAN aku percaya dengan tidak ragu-ragu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he spake this parable unto certain which trusted in themselves that they were righteous, and despised others:
target: Dan kepada beberapa orang yang menganggap dirinya benar dan memandang rendah semua orang lain, Yesus mengatakan perumpamaan ini:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Uzziel; Mishael, and Elzaphan, and Zithri.
target: Dan Harun mengambil Eliseba, anak perempuan Aminadab, saudara perempuan Nahason, menjadi isterinya, dan perempuan ini melahirkan baginya Nadab, Abihu, Eleazar dan Itamar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Lest he tear my soul like a lion, rending it in pieces, while there is none to deliver.
target: Ya TUHAN, Allahku, pada-Mu aku berlindung; selamatkanlah aku dari semua orang yang mengejar aku dan lepaskanlah aku,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also he strengthened himself, and built up all the wall that was broken, and raised it up to the towers, and another wall without, and repaired Millo in the city of David, and made darts and shields in abundance.
target: Dengan sekuat tenaga Hizkia membangun kembali seluruh tembok yang telah terbongkar, mendirikan menara-menara di atasnya dan tembok yang lain di luarnya. Ia memperkuat juga Milo di kota Daud dan membuat lembing dan perisai dalam jumlah yang besar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I was also upright before him, and I kept myself from mine iniquity.
target: Sebab segala hukum-Nya kuperhatikan, dan ketetapan-Nya tidaklah kujauhkan dari padaku;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And beside this, giving all diligence, add to your faith virtue; and to virtue knowledge;
target: Justru karena itu kamu harus dengan sungguh-sungguh berusaha untuk menambahkan kepada imanmu kebajikan, dan kepada kebajikan pengetahuan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They envied Moses also in the camp, and Aaron the saint of the LORD.
target: Mereka cemburu kepada Musa di perkemahan, dan kepada Harun, orang kudus TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: His name shall endure for ever: his name shall be continued as long as the sun: and men shall be blessed in him: all nations shall call him blessed.
target: Biarlah namanya tetap selama-lamanya, kiranya namanya semakin dikenal selama ada matahari. Kiranya segala bangsa saling memberkati dengan namanya, dan menyebut dia berbahagia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The fire consumed their young men; and their maidens were not given to marriage.
target: Anak-anak teruna mereka dimakan api, dan anak-anak dara mereka tidak lagi dipuja dengan nyanyian perkawinan;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in the end of years they shall join themselves together; for the king's daughter of the south shall come to the king of the north to make an agreement: but she shall not retain the power of the arm; neither shall he stand, nor his arm: but she shall be given up, and they that brought her, and he that begat her, and he that strengthened her in these times.
target: Beberapa tahun kemudian keduanya akan bersekutu: puteri raja negeri Selatan akan datang kepada raja negeri Utara untuk mengadakan persetujuan. Tetapi puteri itu tidak berhasil, juga keturunannya tidak dapat bertahan: puteri itu akan diserahkan, demikian pula orang-orang yang mengantarnya, anak yang dilahirkannya dan orang yang mengawininya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For her house inclineth unto death, and her paths unto the dead.
target: sesungguhnya rumahnya hilang tenggelam ke dalam maut, jalannya menuju ke arwah-arwah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And what one nation in the earth is like thy people Israel, whom God went to redeem to be his own people, to make thee a name of greatness and terribleness, by driving out nations from before thy people whom thou hast redeemed out of Egypt?
target: Dan bangsa manakah di bumi seperti umat-Mu Israel, yang Allahnya pergi membebaskannya menjadi umat-Nya, untuk mendapat nama bagi-Mu dengan perbuatan-perbuatan yang besar dan dahsyat, dan dengan menghalau bangsa-bangsa dari depan umat-Mu yang telah Kaubebaskan dari Mesir?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there came a man of God unto Eli, and said unto him, Thus saith the LORD, Did I plainly appear unto the house of thy father, when they were in Egypt in Pharaoh's house?
target: Seorang abdi Allah datang kepada Eli dan berkata kepadanya: "Beginilah firman TUHAN: Bukankah dengan nyata Aku menyatakan diri-Ku kepada nenek moyangmu, ketika mereka masih di Mesir dan takluk kepada keturunan Firaun?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that hath knowledge spareth his words: and a man of understanding is of an excellent spirit.
target: Orang yang berpengetahuan menahan perkataannya, orang yang berpengertian berkepala dingin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Ammon came out, and put the battle in array before the gate of the city: and the kings that were come were by themselves in the field.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Sebab mereka telah meninggalkan Aku, telah memberikan tempat ini kepada allah asing dan telah membakar korban di sini kepada allah lain yang tidak dikenal oleh mereka sendiri dan oleh nenek moyang mereka dan oleh raja-raja Yehuda. Mereka telah membuat tempat ini penuh dengan darah orang-orang yang tidak bersalah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For afore the harvest, when the bud is perfect, and the sour grape is ripening in the flower, he shall both cut off the sprigs with pruning hooks, and take away and cut down the branches.
target: Sebab sebelum musim buah, apabila waktu berbunga sudah berakhir, dan gugusan putik menjadi buah anggur yang hendak masak, maka TUHAN akan mengerat ranting-rantingnya dengan pisau pemangkas, dan menyisihkan carang-carangnya dengan memancungnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And now, behold, I go unto my people: come therefore, and I will advertise thee what this people shall do to thy people in the latter days.
target: Dan sekarang, aku ini sudah hendak pergi kepada bangsaku; marilah kuberitahukan kepadamu apa yang akan dilakukan bangsa itu kepada bangsamu di kemudian hari."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Man goeth forth unto his work and to his labour until the evening.
target: manusia pun keluarlah ke pekerjaannya, dan ke usahanya sampai petang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For David is not ascended into the heavens: but he saith himself, The Lord said unto my Lord, Sit thou on my right hand,
target: Sebab bukan Daud yang naik ke sorga, malahan Daud sendiri berkata: Tuhan telah berfirman kepada Tuanku:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!
target: Biarlah mereka bersyukur kepada TUHAN karena kasih setia-Nya, karena perbuatan-perbuatan-Nya yang ajaib terhadap anak-anak manusia,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They angered him also at the waters of strife, so that it went ill with Moses for their sakes:
target: Mereka menggusarkan Dia dekat air Meriba, sehingga Musa kena celaka karena mereka;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD also shall save the tents of Judah first, that the glory of the house of David and the glory of the inhabitants of Jerusalem do not magnify themselves against Judah.
target: TUHAN akan pertama-tama memberi kemenangan kepada kemah-kemah Yehuda, supaya keluarga Daud dan penduduk Yerusalem jangan terlalu bermegah-megah terhadap Yehuda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto me, This chamber, whose prospect is toward the south, is for the priests, the keepers of the charge of the house.
target: Ia berkata kepadaku: "Bilik ini, yang mukanya menghadap ke selatan, adalah bagi imam-imam yang bertugas di Bait Suci,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And though after my skin worms destroy this body, yet in my flesh shall I see God:
target: Juga sesudah kulit tubuhku sangat rusak, tanpa dagingku pun aku akan melihat Allah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When a wicked man dieth, his expectation shall perish: and the hope of unjust men perisheth.
target: Pengharapan orang fasik gagal pada kematiannya, dan harapan orang jahat menjadi sia-sia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So then, brethren, we are not children of the bondwoman, but of the free.
target: Karena itu, saudara-saudara, kita bukanlah anak-anak hamba perempuan, melainkan anak-anak perempuan merdeka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the men of might, even seven thousand, and craftsmen and smiths a thousand, all that were strong and apt for war, even them the king of Babylon brought captive to Babylon.
target: Semua orang yang gagah perkasa, tujuh ribu orang banyaknya, para tukang dan para pandai besi, seribu orang banyaknya, sekalian pahlawan yang sanggup berperang, dibawa oleh raja Babel sebagai orang buangan ke Babel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover he refused the tabernacle of Joseph, and chose not the tribe of Ephraim:
target: Ia menolak kemah Yusuf, dan suku Efraim tidak dipilih-Nya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And at the south side four thousand and five hundred measures: and three gates; one gate of Simeon, one gate of Issachar, one gate of Zebulun.
target: Di sisi sebelah selatan, yang ukurannya empat ribu lima ratus hasta, terdapat tiga pintu gerbang juga, yaitu pintu gerbang Simeon, pintu gerbang Isakhar dan pintu gerbang Zebulon.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, Woe unto you also, ye lawyers! for ye lade men with burdens grievous to be borne, and ye yourselves touch not the burdens with one of your fingers.
target: Tetapi Ia menjawab: "Celakalah kamu juga, hai ahli-ahli Taurat, sebab kamu meletakkan beban-beban yang tak terpikul pada orang, tetapi kamu sendiri tidak menyentuh beban itu dengan satu jari pun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Abraham drew near, and said, Wilt thou also destroy the righteous with the wicked?
target: Abraham datang mendekat dan berkata: "Apakah Engkau akan melenyapkan orang benar bersama-sama dengan orang fasik?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jehoash did that which was right in the sight of the LORD all his days wherein Jehoiada the priest instructed him.
target: Yoas melakukan apa yang benar di mata TUHAN seumur hidupnya, selama imam Yoyada mengajar dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the LORD: he departed not all his days from the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, who made Israel to sin.
target: Ia melakukan apa yang jahat di mata TUHAN. Sepanjang umurnya ia tidak menjauh dari dosa-dosa Yerobeam bin Nebat, yang mengakibatkan orang Israel berdosa pula.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the word of the LORD came unto me the second time, saying,
target: Sesudah itu datanglah firman TUHAN kepadaku untuk kedua kalinya, bunyinya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, the days come, saith the LORD, that I will make a new covenant with the house of Israel, and with the house of Judah:
target: Sesungguhnya, akan datang waktunya, demikianlah firman TUHAN, Aku akan mengadakan perjanjian baru dengan kaum Israel dan kaum Yehuda,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it was given unto him to make war with the saints, and to overcome them: and power was given him over all kindreds, and tongues, and nations.
target: Dan ia diperkenankan untuk berperang melawan orang-orang kudus dan untuk mengalahkan mereka; dan kepadanya diberikan kuasa atas setiap suku dan umat dan bahasa dan bangsa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Asher; Jimnah, and Ishuah, and Isui, and Beriah, and Serah their sister: and the sons of Beriah; Heber, and Malchiel.
target: Anak-anak Asyer ialah Yimna, Yiswa, Yiswi dan Beria; Serah ialah saudara perempuan mereka; dan anak-anak Beria ialah Heber dan Malkiel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: An horse is a vain thing for safety: neither shall he deliver any by his great strength.
target: Kuda adalah harapan sia-sia untuk mencapai kemenangan, yang sekalipun besar ketangkasannya tidak dapat memberi keluputan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Asa went out against him, and they set the battle in array in the valley of Zephathah at Mareshah.
target: Lalu Asa maju menghadapinya. Mereka mengatur barisan perangnya di lembah Zefata dekat Maresa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which was the son of Jacob, which was the son of Isaac, which was the son of Abraham, which was the son of Thara, which was the son of Nachor,
target: anak Yakub, anak Ishak, anak Abraham, anak Terah, anak Nahor,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But from the beginning of the creation God made them male and female.
target: Sebab pada awal dunia, Allah menjadikan mereka laki-laki dan perempuan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As the LORD commanded Moses, so Aaron laid it up before the Testimony, to be kept.
target: Seperti yang diperintahkan TUHAN kepada Musa, demikianlah buli-buli itu ditempatkan Harun di hadapan tabut hukum Allah untuk disimpan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all that sat in the council, looking stedfastly on him, saw his face as it had been the face of an angel.
target: Semua orang yang duduk dalam sidang Mahkamah Agama itu menatap Stefanus, lalu mereka melihat muka Stefanus sama seperti muka seorang malaikat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now these are the names of the tribes. From the north end to the coast of the way of Hethlon, as one goeth to Hamath, Hazarenan, the border of Damascus northward, to the coast of Hamath; for these are his sides east and west; a portion for Dan.
target: Inilah nama suku-suku itu: Yang paling utara: dari laut terus ke Hetlon, ke jalan masuk ke Hamat, Hazar-Enon, sehingga daerah kota Damsyik, yang berdekatan dengan Hamat, terletak di sebelah utaranya, dari perbatasan sebelah timur sampai perbatasan sebelah barat terdapat bagian Dan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses was not able to enter into the tent of the congregation, because the cloud abode thereon, and the glory of the LORD filled the tabernacle.
target: sehingga Musa tidak dapat memasuki Kemah Pertemuan, sebab awan itu hinggap di atas kemah itu, dan kemuliaan TUHAN memenuhi Kemah Suci.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his disciples came, and took up the body, and buried it, and went and told Jesus.
target: Kemudian datanglah murid-murid Yohanes Pembaptis mengambil mayatnya dan menguburkannya. Lalu pergilah mereka memberitahukannya kepada Yesus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ain, Remmon, and Ether, and Ashan; four cities and their villages:
target: En-Rimon, Eter, dan Asan: empat kota dengan desa-desanya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you, and for them at Laodicea, and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh;
target: Karena aku mau, supaya kamu tahu, betapa beratnya perjuangan yang kulakukan untuk kamu, dan untuk mereka yang di Laodikia dan untuk semuanya, yang belum mengenal aku pribadi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, LORD God, whereby shall I know that I shall inherit it?
target: Kata Abram: "Ya Tuhan ALLAH, dari manakah aku tahu, bahwa aku akan memilikinya?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD bless thee, and keep thee:
target: TUHAN memberkati engkau dan melindungi engkau;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou hast enlarged my steps under me; so that my feet did not slip.
target: Kauberikan tempat lapang untuk langkahku, dan mata kakiku tidak goyah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I have set my face against this city for evil, and not for good, saith the LORD: it shall be given into the hand of the king of Babylon, and he shall burn it with fire.
target: Sebab Aku telah menentang kota ini untuk mendatangkan kecelakaan dan bukan untuk mendatangkan keberuntungannya, demikianlah firman TUHAN. Kota ini akan diserahkan ke dalam tangan raja Babel yang akan membakarnya habis dengan api."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They that hate me without a cause are more than the hairs of mine head: they that would destroy me, being mine enemies wrongfully, are mighty: then I restored that which I took not away.
target: Lesu aku karena berseru-seru, kerongkonganku kering; mataku nyeri karena mengharapkan Allahku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual, but that which is natural; and afterward that which is spiritual.
target: Tetapi yang mula-mula datang bukanlah yang rohaniah, tetapi yang alamiah; kemudian barulah datang yang rohaniah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD God said, It is not good that the man should be alone; I will make him an help meet for him.
target: TUHAN Allah berfirman: "Tidak baik, kalau manusia itu seorang diri saja. Aku akan menjadikan penolong baginya, yang sepadan dengan dia."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All their wickedness is in Gilgal: for there I hated them: for the wickedness of their doings I will drive them out of mine house, I will love them no more: all their princes are revolters.
target: Segala kejahatan mereka terjadi di Gilgal, sungguh, di sana Aku mulai membenci mereka. Oleh karena jahatnya perbuatan-perbuatan mereka Aku akan menghalau mereka dari rumah-Ku. Aku tidak akan mengasihi mereka lagi, semua pemuka mereka adalah pemberontak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then cometh Simon Peter following him, and went into the sepulchre, and seeth the linen clothes lie,
target: Maka datanglah Simon Petrus juga menyusul dia dan masuk ke dalam kubur itu. Ia melihat kain kapan terletak di tanah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Delilah said unto Samson, Behold, thou hast mocked me, and told me lies: now tell me, I pray thee, wherewith thou mightest be bound.
target: Kemudian berkatalah Delila kepada Simson: "Sesungguhnya engkau telah mempermain-mainkan dan membohongi aku. Sekarang ceritakanlah kiranya kepadaku dengan apa engkau dapat diikat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Azmaveth the Baharumite, Eliahba the Shaalbonite,
target: Azmawet, orang Bahurim; Elyahba, orang Saalbon;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt also make a laver of brass, and his foot also of brass, to wash withal: and thou shalt put it between the tabernacle of the congregation and the altar, and thou shalt put water therein.
target: "Haruslah engkau membuat bejana dan juga alasnya dari tembaga, untuk pembasuhan, dan kautempatkanlah itu antara Kemah Pertemuan dan mezbah, dan kautaruhlah air ke dalamnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I sink in deep mire, where there is no standing: I am come into deep waters, where the floods overflow me.
target: Selamatkanlah aku, ya Allah, sebab air telah naik sampai ke leherku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But meat commendeth us not to God: for neither, if we eat, are we the better; neither, if we eat not, are we the worse.
target: "Makanan tidak membawa kita lebih dekat kepada Allah. Kita tidak rugi apa-apa, kalau tidak kita makan dan kita tidak untung apa-apa, kalau kita makan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Her priests have violated my law, and have profaned mine holy things: they have put no difference between the holy and profane, neither have they shewed difference between the unclean and the clean, and have hid their eyes from my sabbaths, and I am profaned among them.
target: Imam-imamnya memperkosa hukum Taurat-Ku dan menajiskan hal-hal yang kudus bagi-Ku, mereka tidak membedakan antara yang kudus dengan yang tidak kudus, tidak mengajarkan perbedaan yang najis dengan yang tahir, mereka menutup mata terhadap hari-hari Sabat-Ku. Demikianlah Aku dinajiskan di tengah-tengah mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye shall keep my sabbaths, and reverence my sanctuary: I am the LORD.
target: Kamu harus memelihara hari-hari sabat-Ku dan menghormati tempat kudus-Ku; Akulah TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the Pharisees went forth, and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him, how they might destroy him.
target: Lalu keluarlah orang-orang Farisi dan segera bersekongkol dengan orang-orang Herodian untuk membunuh Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And also for the innocent blood that he shed: for he filled Jerusalem with innocent blood; which the LORD would not pardon.
target: dan juga oleh karena darah orang yang tidak bersalah yang telah ditumpahkannya, sebab ia telah membuat Yerusalem penuh dengan darah orang yang tidak bersalah, dan TUHAN tidak mau mengampuninya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the kingdom is the LORD's: and he is the governor among the nations.
target: Segala ujung bumi akan mengingatnya dan berbalik kepada TUHAN; dan segala kaum dari bangsa-bangsa akan sujud menyembah di hadapan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For an angel went down at a certain season into the pool, and troubled the water: whosoever then first after the troubling of the water stepped in was made whole of whatsoever disease he had.
target: Sebab sewaktu-waktu turun malaikat Tuhan ke kolam itu dan menggoncangkan air itu; barangsiapa yang terdahulu masuk ke dalamnya sesudah goncangan air itu, menjadi sembuh, apa pun juga penyakitnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He hath given meat unto them that fear him: he will ever be mindful of his covenant.
target: Diberikan-Nya rezeki kepada orang-orang yang takut akan Dia. Ia ingat untuk selama-lamanya akan perjanjian-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And out of the tribe of Gad; Ramoth in Gilead with her suburbs, and Mahanaim with her suburbs,
target: dan dari suku Gad: Ramot di Gilead dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya, Mahanaim dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God, or that is worshipped; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God, shewing himself that he is God.
target: yaitu lawan yang meninggikan diri di atas segala yang disebut atau yang disembah sebagai Allah. Bahkan ia duduk di Bait Allah dan mau menyatakan diri sebagai Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt appoint Aaron and his sons, and they shall wait on their priest's office: and the stranger that cometh nigh shall be put to death.
target: Tetapi Harun dan anak-anaknya haruslah kautugaskan untuk memegang jabatannya sebagai imam, sedang orang awam yang mendekat harus dihukum mati."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They answered him, Jesus of Nazareth. Jesus saith unto them, I am he. And Judas also, which betrayed him, stood with them.
target: Jawab mereka: "Yesus dari Nazaret." Kata-Nya kepada mereka: "Akulah Dia." Yudas yang mengkhianati Dia berdiri juga di situ bersama-sama mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that wasteth his father, and chaseth away his mother, is a son that causeth shame, and bringeth reproach.
target: Anak yang menganiaya ayahnya atau mengusir ibunya, memburukkan dan memalukan diri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Saul increased the more in strength, and confounded the Jews which dwelt at Damascus, proving that this is very Christ.
target: Akan tetapi Saulus semakin besar pengaruhnya dan ia membingungkan orang-orang Yahudi yang tinggal di Damsyik, karena ia membuktikan, bahwa Yesus adalah Mesias.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And because I doubted of such manner of questions, I asked him whether he would go to Jerusalem, and there be judged of these matters.
target: Karena aku ragu-ragu bagaimana aku harus memeriksa perkara-perkara seperti itu, aku menanyakan apakah ia mau pergi ke Yerusalem, supaya perkaranya dihakimi di situ.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And goeth out from Bethel to Luz, and passeth along unto the borders of Archi to Ataroth,
target: keluar dari Betel menuju ke Lus, terus ke daerah orang Arki, ke Atarot,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But howsoever, said he, let me run. And he said unto him, Run. Then Ahimaaz ran by the way of the plain, and overran Cushi.
target: Jawabnya: "Apa pun yang terjadi, aku mau berlari pergi." Lalu berkatalah Yoab kepadanya: "Kalau demikian larilah." Maka berlarilah Ahimaas mengambil jalan dari Lembah Yordan, sehingga ia mendahului orang Etiopia itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they cried out all at once, saying, Away with this man, and release unto us Barabbas:
target: Tetapi mereka berteriak bersama-sama: "Enyahkanlah Dia, lepaskanlah Barabas bagi kami!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye shall buy meat of them for money, that ye may eat; and ye shall also buy water of them for money, that ye may drink.
target: Makanan haruslah kamu beli dari mereka dengan uang, supaya kamu dapat makan; juga air haruslah kamu beli dari mereka dengan uang, supaya kamu dapat minum.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O God, thou knowest my foolishness; and my sins are not hid from thee.
target: Orang-orang yang membenci aku tanpa alasan lebih banyak dari pada rambut di kepalaku; terlalu besar jumlah orang-orang yang hendak membinasakan aku, yang memusuhi aku tanpa sebab; aku dipaksa untuk mengembalikan apa yang tidak kurampas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And whosoever lieth carnally with a woman, that is a bondmaid, betrothed to an husband, and not at all redeemed, nor freedom given her; she shall be scourged; they shall not be put to death, because she was not free.
target: Apabila seorang laki-laki bersetubuh dengan seorang perempuan, yakni seorang budak perempuan yang ada di bawah kuasa laki-laki lain, tetapi yang tidak pernah ditebus dan tidak juga diberi surat tanda merdeka, maka perbuatan itu haruslah dihukum; tetapi janganlah keduanya dihukum mati, karena perempuan itu belum dimerdekakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Abraham ran unto the herd, and fetcht a calf tender and good, and gave it unto a young man; and he hasted to dress it.
target: Lalu berlarilah Abraham kepada lembu sapinya, ia mengambil seekor anak lembu yang empuk dan baik dagingnya dan memberikannya kepada seorang bujangnya, lalu orang ini segera mengolahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When God arose to judgment, to save all the meek of the earth. Selah.
target: Dari langit Engkau memperdengarkan keputusan-Mu; bumi takut dan tertegun,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then thou shalt take an aul, and thrust it through his ear unto the door, and he shall be thy servant for ever. And also unto thy maidservant thou shalt do likewise.
target: maka engkau harus mengambil sebuah penusuk dan menindik telinganya pada pintu, sehingga ia menjadi budakmu untuk selama-lamanya. Demikian juga kauperbuat kepada budakmu perempuan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they came, every one whose heart stirred him up, and every one whom his spirit made willing, and they brought the LORD's offering to the work of the tabernacle of the congregation, and for all his service, and for the holy garments.
target: Sesudah itu datanglah setiap orang yang tergerak hatinya, setiap orang yang terdorong jiwanya, membawa persembahan khusus kepada TUHAN untuk pekerjaan melengkapi Kemah Pertemuan dan untuk segala ibadah di dalamnya dan untuk pakaian kudus itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if he thus say, I have no delight in thee; behold, here am I, let him do to me as seemeth good unto him.
target: Tetapi jika Ia berfirman, begini: Aku tidak berkenan kepadamu, maka aku bersedia, biarlah dilakukan-Nya kepadaku apa yang baik di mata-Nya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Our fathers did eat manna in the desert; as it is written, He gave them bread from heaven to eat.
target: Nenek moyang kami telah makan manna di padang gurun, seperti ada tertulis: Mereka diberi-Nya makan roti dari sorga."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the wisdom of this world is foolishness with God. For it is written, He taketh the wise in their own craftiness.
target: Karena hikmat dunia ini adalah kebodohan bagi Allah. Sebab ada tertulis: "Ia yang menangkap orang berhikmat dalam kecerdikannya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then took Jeremiah another roll, and gave it to Baruch the scribe, the son of Neriah; who wrote therein from the mouth of Jeremiah all the words of the book which Jehoiakim king of Judah had burned in the fire: and there were added besides unto them many like words.
target: Maka Yeremia mengambil gulungan lain dan memberikannya kepada juru tulis Barukh bin Neria yang menuliskan di dalamnya langsung dari mulut Yeremia segala perkataan yang ada di dalam kitab yang telah dibakar Yoyakim, raja Yehuda dalam api itu. Lagipula masih ditambahi dengan banyak perkataan seperti itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there fell upon men a great hail out of heaven, every stone about the weight of a talent: and men blasphemed God because of the plague of the hail; for the plague thereof was exceeding great.
target: Dan hujan es besar, seberat seratus pon, jatuh dari langit menimpa manusia, dan manusia menghujat Allah karena malapetaka hujan es itu, sebab malapetaka itu sangat dahsyat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have declared, and have saved, and I have shewed, when there was no strange god among you: therefore ye are my witnesses, saith the LORD, that I am God.
target: Akulah yang memberitahukan, menyelamatkan dan mengabarkan, dan bukannya allah asing yang ada di antaramu. Kamulah saksi-saksi-Ku," demikianlah firman TUHAN, "dan Akulah Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore have we fasted, say they, and thou seest not? wherefore have we afflicted our soul, and thou takest no knowledge? Behold, in the day of your fast ye find pleasure, and exact all your labours.
target: "Mengapa kami berpuasa dan Engkau tidak memperhatikannya juga? Mengapa kami merendahkan diri dan Engkau tidak mengindahkannya juga?" Sesungguhnya, pada hari puasamu engkau masih tetap mengurus urusanmu, dan kamu mendesak-desak semua buruhmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said unto Moses in Midian, Go, return into Egypt: for all the men are dead which sought thy life.
target: Adapun TUHAN sudah berfirman kepada Musa di Midian: "Kembalilah ke Mesir, sebab semua orang yang ingin mencabut nyawamu telah mati."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,
target: anak orang ini ialah Amazia; anak orang ini ialah Azarya; anak orang ini ialah Yotam;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the men rose up from thence, and looked toward Sodom: and Abraham went with them to bring them on the way.
target: Lalu berangkatlah orang-orang itu dari situ dan memandang ke arah Sodom; dan Abraham berjalan bersama-sama dengan mereka untuk mengantarkan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Abraham called the name of his son that was born unto him, whom Sarah bare to him, Isaac.
target: Abraham menamai anaknya yang baru lahir itu Ishak, yang dilahirkan Sara baginya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that followeth after righteousness and mercy findeth life, righteousness, and honour.
target: Siapa mengejar kebenaran dan kasih akan memperoleh kehidupan, kebenaran dan kehormatan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if our unrighteousness commend the righteousness of God, what shall we say? Is God unrighteous who taketh vengeance? (I speak as a man)
target: Tetapi jika ketidakbenaran kita menunjukkan kebenaran Allah, apakah yang akan kita katakan? Tidak adilkah Allah — aku berkata sebagai manusia — jika Ia menampakkan murka-Nya?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The chief captain commanded him to be brought into the castle, and bade that he should be examined by scourging; that he might know wherefore they cried so against him.
target: Karena itu kepala pasukan memberi perintah untuk membawa Paulus ke markas dan menyuruh memeriksa dan menyesah dia, supaya dapat diketahui apa sebabnya orang banyak itu berteriak-teriak sedemikian terhadap dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the seventh lot came out for the tribe of the children of Dan according to their families.
target: Bagi suku bani Dan menurut kaum-kaum mereka keluarlah undian yang ketujuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: How amiable are thy tabernacles, O LORD of hosts!
target: Untuk pemimpin biduan. Menurut lagu: Gitit. Mazmur bani Korah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If a man say, I love God, and hateth his brother, he is a liar: for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen, how can he love God whom he hath not seen?
target: Jikalau seorang berkata: "Aku mengasihi Allah," dan ia membenci saudaranya, maka ia adalah pendusta, karena barangsiapa tidak mengasihi saudaranya yang dilihatnya, tidak mungkin mengasihi Allah, yang tidak dilihatnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I charge you, O daughters of Jerusalem, if ye find my beloved, that ye tell him, that I am sick of love.
target: Kusumpahi kamu, puteri-puteri Yerusalem: bila kamu menemukan kekasihku, apakah yang akan kamu katakan kepadanya? Katakanlah, bahwa sakit asmara aku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence, and the violent take it by force.
target: Sejak tampilnya Yohanes Pembaptis hingga sekarang, Kerajaan Sorga diserong dan orang yang menyerongnya mencoba menguasainya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If I be wicked, why then labour I in vain?
target: Aku dinyatakan bersalah, apa gunanya aku menyusahkan diri dengan sia-sia?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the people chode with Moses, and spake, saying, Would God that we had died when our brethren died before the LORD!
target: dan bertengkarlah bangsa itu dengan Musa, katanya: "Sekiranya kami mati binasa pada waktu saudara-saudara kami mati binasa di hadapan TUHAN!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David said in his heart, I shall now perish one day by the hand of Saul: there is nothing better for me than that I should speedily escape into the land of the Philistines; and Saul shall despair of me, to seek me any more in any coast of Israel: so shall I escape out of his hand.
target: Tetapi Daud berpikir dalam hatinya: "Bagaimanapun juga pada suatu hari aku akan binasa oleh tangan Saul. Jadi tidak ada yang lebih baik bagiku selain meluputkan diri dengan segera ke negeri orang Filistin; maka tidak ada harapan bagi Saul untuk mencari aku lagi di seluruh daerah Israel dan aku akan terluput dari tangannya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Abimelech said, I wot not who hath done this thing; neither didst thou tell me, neither yet heard I of it, but to day.
target: Jawab Abimelekh: "Aku tidak tahu, siapa yang melakukan hal itu; lagi tidak kauberitahukan kepadaku, dan sampai hari ini belum pula kudengar."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall come to pass in that day, saith the Lord GOD, that I will cause the sun to go down at noon, and I will darken the earth in the clear day:
target: "Pada hari itu akan terjadi," demikianlah firman Tuhan ALLAH, "Aku akan membuat matahari terbenam di siang hari dan membuat bumi gelap pada hari cerah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Woe is me for my hurt! my wound is grievous; but I said, Truly this is a grief, and I must bear it.
target: Celakalah aku karena penyakitku, lukaku tidak tersembuhkan! Aku berpikir: "Ah, inilah suatu kepedihan yang harus kutanggung!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yet will I leave a remnant, that ye may have some that shall escape the sword among the nations, when ye shall be scattered through the countries.
target: Tetapi sebagian, yaitu yang terluput dari pedang, akan Kutinggalkan hidup di antara bangsa-bangsa, bilamana kamu dihamburkan ke negeri-negeri itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And out of the tribe of Asher, Mishal with her suburbs, Abdon with her suburbs,
target: Dan dari suku Asyer: Misal dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya, Abdon dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And delivered him out of all his afflictions, and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house.
target: dan melepaskannya dari segala penindasan serta menganugerahkan kepadanya kasih karunia dan hikmat, ketika ia menghadap Firaun, raja Mesir. Firaun mengangkatnya menjadi kuasa atas tanah Mesir dan atas seluruh istananya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Israel did evil again in the sight of the LORD, and served Baalim, and Ashtaroth, and the gods of Syria, and the gods of Zidon, and the gods of Moab, and the gods of the children of Ammon, and the gods of the Philistines, and forsook the LORD, and served not him.
target: Orang Israel itu melakukan pula apa yang jahat di mata TUHAN; mereka beribadah kepada para Baal dan para Asytoret, kepada para allah orang Aram, para allah orang Sidon, para allah orang Moab, para allah bani Amon dan para allah orang Filistin, tetapi TUHAN ditinggalkan mereka dan kepada Dia mereka tidak beribadah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But thou hast fulfilled the judgment of the wicked: judgment and justice take hold on thee.
target: Tetapi engkau sudah mendapat hukuman orang fasik sepenuhnya, engkau dicengkeram hukuman dan keadilan;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which having no guide, overseer, or ruler,
target: biarpun tidak ada pemimpinnya, pengaturnya atau penguasanya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the Levites, of the children of the Kohathites, and of the children of the Korhites, stood up to praise the LORD God of Israel with a loud voice on high.
target: Kemudian orang Lewi dari bani Kehat dan bani Korah bangkit berdiri untuk menyanyikan puji-pujian bagi TUHAN, Allah Israel, dengan suara yang sangat nyaring.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They are upright as the palm tree, but speak not: they must needs be borne, because they cannot go. Be not afraid of them; for they cannot do evil, neither also is it in them to do good.
target: Berhala itu sama seperti orang-orangan di kebun mentimun, tidak dapat berbicara; orang harus mengangkatnya, sebab tidak dapat melangkah. Janganlah takut kepadanya, sebab berhala itu tidak dapat berbuat jahat, dan berbuat baik pun tidak dapat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the third day we cast out with our own hands the tackling of the ship.
target: Dan pada hari yang ketiga mereka membuang alat-alat kapal dengan tangan mereka sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The proud have had me greatly in derision: yet have I not declined from thy law.
target: Orang-orang yang kurang ajar sangat mencemoohkan aku, tetapi aku tidak menyimpang dari Taurat-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Write ye also for the Jews, as it liketh you, in the king's name, and seal it with the king's ring: for the writing which is written in the king's name, and sealed with the king's ring, may no man reverse.
target: Tuliskanlah atas nama raja apa yang kamu pandang baik tentang orang Yahudi dan meteraikanlah surat itu dengan cincin meterai raja, karena surat yang dituliskan atas nama raja dan dimeteraikan dengan cincin meterai raja tidak dapat ditarik kembali."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; As mine anger and my fury hath been poured forth upon the inhabitants of Jerusalem; so shall my fury be poured forth upon you, when ye shall enter into Egypt: and ye shall be an execration, and an astonishment, and a curse, and a reproach; and ye shall see this place no more.
target: Sungguh, beginilah firman TUHAN semesta alam, Allah Israel: Seperti tercurahnya murka-Ku dan kehangatan amarah-Ku ke atas penduduk Yerusalem, demikianlah akan tercurah kehangatan amarah-Ku ke atas kamu, apabila kamu pergi ke Mesir. Kamu akan menjadi kutuk, kengerian, kutukan dan aib; kamu tidak akan melihat tempat ini lagi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Lo, these are parts of his ways: but how little a portion is heard of him? but the thunder of his power who can understand?
target: Sesungguhnya, semuanya itu hanya ujung-ujung jalan-Nya; betapa lembutnya bisikan yang kita dengar dari pada-Nya! Siapa dapat memahami guntur kuasa-Nya?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hast thou not poured me out as milk, and curdled me like cheese?
target: Bukankah Engkau yang mencurahkan aku seperti air susu, dan mengentalkan aku seperti keju?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall be unto thee a restorer of thy life, and a nourisher of thine old age: for thy daughter in law, which loveth thee, which is better to thee than seven sons, hath born him.
target: Dan dialah yang akan menyegarkan jiwamu dan memelihara engkau pada waktu rambutmu telah putih; sebab menantumu yang mengasihi engkau telah melahirkannya, perempuan yang lebih berharga bagimu dari tujuh anak laki-laki."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And to them it was given that they should not kill them, but that they should be tormented five months: and their torment was as the torment of a scorpion, when he striketh a man.
target: Dan mereka diperkenankan bukan untuk membunuh manusia, melainkan hanya untuk menyiksa mereka lima bulan lamanya, dan siksaan itu seperti siksaan kalajengking, apabila ia menyengat manusia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings hast thou ordained strength because of thine enemies, that thou mightest still the enemy and the avenger.
target: Ya TUHAN, Tuhan kami, betapa mulianya nama-Mu di seluruh bumi! Keagungan-Mu yang mengatasi langit dinyanyikan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she wept before him the seven days, while their feast lasted: and it came to pass on the seventh day, that he told her, because she lay sore upon him: and she told the riddle to the children of her people.
target: Tetapi isterinya itu menangis di sampingnya selama ketujuh hari mereka mengadakan perjamuan itu. Pada hari yang ketujuh diberitahukannyalah kepadanya, karena ia merengek-rengek kepadanya, kemudian perempuan itu memberitahukan jawab teka-teki itu kepada orang-orang sebangsanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have trodden the winepress alone; and of the people there was none with me: for I will tread them in mine anger, and trample them in my fury; and their blood shall be sprinkled upon my garments, and I will stain all my raiment.
target: "Aku seorang dirilah yang melakukan pengirikan, dan dari antara umat-Ku tidak ada yang menemani Aku! Aku telah mengirik bangsa-bangsa dalam murka-Ku, dan Aku telah menginjak-injak mereka dalam kehangatan amarah-Ku; semburan darah mereka memercik kepada baju-Ku, dan seluruh pakaian-Ku telah cemar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the men are shepherds, for their trade hath been to feed cattle; and they have brought their flocks, and their herds, and all that they have.
target: orang-orang itu gembala kambing domba, sebab mereka itu pemelihara ternak, dan kambing dombanya, lembu sapinya dan segala miliknya telah dibawa mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he came up, and told his father and his mother, and said, I have seen a woman in Timnath of the daughters of the Philistines: now therefore get her for me to wife.
target: Ia pulang dan memberitahukan kepada ayahnya dan ibunya: "Di Timna aku melihat seorang gadis Filistin. Tolong, ambillah dia menjadi isteriku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again, even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him.
target: Karena jikalau kita percaya, bahwa Yesus telah mati dan telah bangkit, maka kita percaya juga bahwa mereka yang telah meninggal dalam Yesus akan dikumpulkan Allah bersama-sama dengan Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then was the king exceedingly glad for him, and commanded that they should take Daniel up out of the den. So Daniel was taken up out of the den, and no manner of hurt was found upon him, because he believed in his God.
target: Allahku telah mengutus malaikat-Nya untuk mengatupkan mulut singa-singa itu, sehingga mereka tidak mengapa-apakan aku, karena ternyata aku tak bersalah di hadapan-Nya; tetapi juga terhadap tuanku, ya raja, aku tidak melakukan kejahatan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Zelophehad, the son of Hepher, the son of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh, had no sons, but daughters: and these are the names of his daughters, Mahlah, and Noah, Hoglah, Milcah, and Tirzah.
target: Tetapi Zelafehad bin Hefer bin Gilead bin Makhir bin Manasye tidak mempunyai anak laki-laki, tetapi hanya anak perempuan. Inilah nama anak-anaknya itu: Mahla, Noa, Hogla, Milka dan Tirza.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Pharaohnechoh made Eliakim the son of Josiah king in the room of Josiah his father, and turned his name to Jehoiakim, and took Jehoahaz away: and he came to Egypt, and died there.
target: Firaun Nekho mengangkat Elyakim, anak Yosia, menjadi raja menggantikan Yosia, ayahnya, dan menukar namanya dengan Yoyakim. Tetapi Yoahas dibawanya; Yoahas tiba di Mesir dan mati di sana.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the army of the Chaldeans pursued after the king, and overtook Zedekiah in the plains of Jericho; and all his army was scattered from him.
target: Tetapi tentara Kasdim itu mengejar raja dari belakang dan mencapai Zedekia di dataran Yerikho; segala tentaranya telah berserak-serak meninggalkan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: (For my father fought for you, and adventured his life far, and delivered you out of the hand of Midian:
target: bukankah ayahku telah berperang membela kamu dan menyabung nyawanya, dan telah melepaskan kamu dari tangan orang Midian,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let it rest on the head of Joab, and on all his father's house; and let there not fail from the house of Joab one that hath an issue, or that is a leper, or that leaneth on a staff, or that falleth on the sword, or that lacketh bread.
target: Biarlah itu ditanggung oleh Yoab sendiri dan seluruh kaum keluarganya. Biarlah dalam keturunan Yoab tidak putus-putusnya ada orang yang mengeluarkan lelehan, yang sakit kusta, yang bertongkat, yang tewas oleh pedang atau yang kekurangan makanan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Say unto God, How terrible art thou in thy works! through the greatness of thy power shall thine enemies submit themselves unto thee.
target: Katakanlah kepada Allah: "Betapa dahsyatnya segala pekerjaan-Mu; oleh sebab kekuatan-Mu yang besar musuh-Mu tunduk menjilat kepada-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Your little ones, your wives, and thy stranger that is in thy camp, from the hewer of thy wood unto the drawer of thy water:
target: anak-anakmu, perempuan-perempuanmu dan orang-orang asing dalam perkemahanmu, bahkan tukang-tukang belah kayu dan tukang-tukang timba air di antaramu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the fish that was in the river died; and the river stank, and the Egyptians could not drink of the water of the river; and there was blood throughout all the land of Egypt.
target: matilah ikan di sungai Nil, sehingga sungai Nil itu berbau busuk dan orang Mesir tidak dapat meminum air dari sungai Nil; dan di seluruh tanah Mesir ada darah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For of old time I have broken thy yoke, and burst thy bands; and thou saidst, I will not transgress; when upon every high hill and under every green tree thou wanderest, playing the harlot.
target: Sebab dari dahulu kala engkau telah mematahkan kukmu, telah memutuskan tali pengikatmu, dan berkata: Aku tidak mau lagi diperbudak. Bahkan di atas setiap bukit yang menjulang dan di bawah setiap pohon yang rimbun engkau berbaring dan bersundal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now David had said, Surely in vain have I kept all that this fellow hath in the wilderness, so that nothing was missed of all that pertained unto him: and he hath requited me evil for good.
target: Daud tadinya telah berkata: "Sia-sialah aku melindungi segala kepunyaan orang ini di padang gurun, sehingga tidak ada sesuatu pun yang hilang dari segala kepunyaannya; ia membalas kebaikanku dengan kejahatan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He bowed the heavens also, and came down; and darkness was under his feet.
target: Ia menekukkan langit, lalu turun, kekelaman ada di bawah kaki-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Hezekiah saw that Sennacherib was come, and that he was purposed to fight against Jerusalem,
target: Ketika Hizkia mengetahui, bahwa Sanherib datang hendak memerangi Yerusalem,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I spake also to Zedekiah king of Judah according to all these words, saying, Bring your necks under the yoke of the king of Babylon, and serve him and his people, and live.
target: Kepada Zedekia, raja Yehuda, aku telah berbicara dengan cara yang sama, kataku: "Taruhlah tengkukmu ke bawah kuk raja negeri Babel, takluklah kepadanya dan kepada rakyatnya, maka kamu akan hidup.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: She girdeth her loins with strength, and strengtheneth her arms.
target: Ia mengikat pinggangnya dengan kekuatan, ia menguatkan lengannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Rise up, ye women that are at ease; hear my voice, ye careless daughters; give ear unto my speech.
target: Hai perempuan-perempuan yang hidup aman, bangunlah, dengarkanlah suaraku, hai anak-anak perempuan yang hidup tenteram, perhatikanlah perkataanku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Rejoice in the LORD, ye righteous; and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.
target: Bersukacitalah karena TUHAN, hai orang-orang benar, dan nyanyikanlah syukur bagi nama-Nya yang kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the book is delivered to him that is not learned, saying, Read this, I pray thee: and he saith, I am not learned.
target: dan apabila kitab itu diberikan kepada seorang yang tidak dapat membaca dengan mengatakan: "Baiklah baca ini," maka ia akan menjawab: "Aku tidak dapat membaca."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But with an overrunning flood he will make an utter end of the place thereof, and darkness shall pursue his enemies.
target: dan menyeberangkan mereka pada waktu banjir. Ia menghabisi sama sekali orang-orang yang bangkit melawan Dia, dan musuh-Nya dihalau-Nya ke dalam gelap.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Unto the upright there ariseth light in the darkness: he is gracious, and full of compassion, and righteous.
target: Di dalam gelap terbit terang bagi orang benar; pengasih dan penyayang orang yang adil.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye shall do as I have done: ye shall not cover your lips, nor eat the bread of men.
target: Kamu akan melakukan seperti yang kulakukan: Mukamu tidak akan kamu tutupi dan roti perkabungan tidak akan kamu makan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he blessed him, and said, Blessed be Abram of the most high God, possessor of heaven and earth:
target: Lalu ia memberkati Abram, katanya: "Diberkatilah kiranya Abram oleh Allah Yang Mahatinggi, Pencipta langit dan bumi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the horse of Pharaoh went in with his chariots and with his horsemen into the sea, and the LORD brought again the waters of the sea upon them; but the children of Israel went on dry land in the midst of the sea.
target: Ketika kuda Firaun dengan keretanya dan orangnya yang berkuda telah masuk ke laut, maka TUHAN membuat air laut berbalik meliputi mereka, tetapi orang Israel berjalan di tempat kering dari tengah-tengah laut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Esther was taken unto king Ahasuerus into his house royal in the tenth month, which is the month Tebeth, in the seventh year of his reign.
target: Demikianlah Ester dibawa masuk menghadap raja Ahasyweros ke dalam istananya pada bulan yang kesepuluh — yakni bulan Tebet — pada tahun yang ketujuh dalam pemerintahan baginda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yea, also I continued in the work of this wall, neither bought we any land: and all my servants were gathered thither unto the work.
target: Aku pun memulai pekerjaan tembok itu, walaupun aku tidak memperoleh ladang. Dan semua anak buahku dikumpulkan di sana khusus untuk pekerjaan itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the men of Israel said unto Gideon, Rule thou over us, both thou, and thy son, and thy son's son also: for thou hast delivered us from the hand of Midian.
