en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he closed the book, and he gave it again to the minister, and sat down. And the eyes of all them that were in the synagogue were fastened on him.
target: Kemudian Ia menutup kitab itu, memberikannya kembali kepada pejabat, lalu duduk; dan mata semua orang dalam rumah ibadat itu tertuju kepada-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: By the blast of God they perish, and by the breath of his nostrils are they consumed.
target: Mereka binasa oleh nafas Allah, dan lenyap oleh hembusan hidung-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O thou daughter dwelling in Egypt, furnish thyself to go into captivity: for Noph shall be waste and desolate without an inhabitant.
target: Siapkanlah bagimu barang-barang untuk perjalananmu ke pembuangan, hai puteri Mesir yang sudah lama menetap! Sebab Memfis akan menjadi sunyi sepi, dijadikan reruntuhan yang tidak berpenduduk lagi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Every place that the sole of your foot shall tread upon, that have I given unto you, as I said unto Moses.
target: Setiap tempat yang akan diinjak oleh telapak kakimu Kuberikan kepada kamu, seperti yang telah Kujanjikan kepada Musa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore now rise up early in the morning with thy master's servants that are come with thee: and as soon as ye be up early in the morning, and have light, depart.
target: Jadi, bangunlah pagi-pagi beserta orang-orang tuanmu ini yang datang bersama-sama dengan engkau; bangunlah kamu pagi-pagi, segera sesudah hari cukup terang bagimu, dan pergilah."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And on the third day eleven bullocks, two rams, fourteen lambs of the first year without blemish;
target: Pada hari yang ketiga: sebelas ekor lembu jantan, dua ekor domba jantan, empat belas ekor domba berumur setahun yang tidak bercela,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They shall not dwell in thy land, lest they make thee sin against me: for if thou serve their gods, it will surely be a snare unto thee.
target: Mereka tidak akan tetap diam di negerimu, supaya mereka jangan membuat engkau berdosa kepada-Ku, dengan beribadah kepada allah mereka, sebab tentulah hal itu menjadi jerat bagimu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In that time shall the present be brought unto the LORD of hosts of a people scattered and peeled, and from a people terrible from their beginning hitherto; a nation meted out and trodden under foot, whose land the rivers have spoiled, to the place of the name of the LORD of hosts, the mount Zion.
target: Pada waktu itu juga persembahan akan disampaikan kepada TUHAN semesta alam dari kaum yang jangkung dan berkulit mengkilap, dan dari kaum yang ditakuti dekat dan jauh, yakni bangsa yang berkekuatan ulet dan lalim, yang negerinya dilintasi sungai-sungai, ke tempat nama TUHAN semesta alam, yaitu gunung Sion.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
target: Inilah kasih itu: Bukan kita yang telah mengasihi Allah, tetapi Allah yang telah mengasihi kita dan yang telah mengutus Anak-Nya sebagai pendamaian bagi dosa-dosa kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But as the days of No´e were, so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.
target: "Sebab sebagaimana halnya pada zaman Nuh, demikian pula halnya kelak pada kedatangan Anak Manusia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the Lord GOD; I will also take of the highest branch of the high cedar, and will set it; I will crop off from the top of his young twigs a tender one, and will plant it upon an high mountain and eminent:
target: Beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Aku sendiri akan mengambil sebuah carang dari puncak pohon aras yang tinggi dan menanamnya; Aku mematahkannya dari pucuk yang paling ujung dan yang masih muda dan Aku sendiri akan menanamnya di atas sebuah gunung yang menjulang tinggi ke atas;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Where are now your prophets which prophesied unto you, saying, The king of Babylon shall not come against you, nor against this land?
target: Di manakah gerangan para nabimu yang telah bernubuat kepadamu, bahwa raja Babel tidak akan datang menyerang kamu dan negeri ini?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because the creature itself also shall be delivered from the bondage of corruption into the glorious liberty of the children of God.
target: tetapi dalam pengharapan, karena makhluk itu sendiri juga akan dimerdekakan dari perbudakan kebinasaan dan masuk ke dalam kemerdekaan kemuliaan anak-anak Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus hath the Lord GOD shewed unto me: and behold a basket of summer fruit.
target: Inilah yang diperlihatkan Tuhan ALLAH kepadaku: Tampak sebuah bakul berisi buah-buahan musim kemarau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I waited patiently for the LORD; and he inclined unto me, and heard my cry.
target: Untuk pemimpin biduan. Mazmur Daud.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them, This is that which the LORD hath said, To morrow is the rest of the holy sabbath unto the LORD: bake that which ye will bake to day, and seethe that ye will seethe; and that which remaineth over lay up for you to be kept until the morning.
target: Lalu berkatalah Musa kepada mereka: "Inilah yang dimaksudkan TUHAN: Besok adalah hari perhentian penuh, sabat yang kudus bagi TUHAN; maka roti yang perlu kamu bakar, bakarlah, dan apa yang perlu kamu masak, masaklah; dan segala kelebihannya biarkanlah di tempatnya untuk disimpan sampai pagi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But now I have written unto you not to keep company, if any man that is called a brother be a fornicator, or covetous, or an idolator, or a railer, or a drunkard, or an extortioner; with such an one no not to eat.
target: Tetapi yang kutuliskan kepada kamu ialah, supaya kamu jangan bergaul dengan orang, yang sekalipun menyebut dirinya saudara, adalah orang cabul, kikir, penyembah berhala, pemfitnah, pemabuk atau penipu; dengan orang yang demikian janganlah kamu sekali-kali makan bersama-sama.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now if any man build upon this foundation gold, silver, precious stones, wood, hay, stubble;
target: Entahkah orang membangun di atas dasar ini dengan emas, perak, batu permata, kayu, rumput kering atau jerami,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the serjeants told these words unto the magistrates: and they feared, when they heard that they were Romans.
target: Pejabat-pejabat itu menyampaikan perkataan itu kepada pembesar-pembesar kota. Ketika mereka mendengar, bahwa Paulus dan Silas adalah orang Rum, maka takutlah mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye that put far away the evil day, and cause the seat of violence to come near;
target: Hai kamu, yang menganggap jauh hari malapetaka, tetapi mendekatkan pemerintahan kekerasan;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Be merciful unto me, O Lord: for I cry unto thee daily.
target: Engkau adalah Allahku, kasihanilah aku, ya Tuhan, sebab kepada-Mulah aku berseru sepanjang hari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The Lord grant unto him that he may find mercy of the Lord in that day: and in how many things he ministered unto me at Ephesus, thou knowest very well.
target: Kiranya Tuhan menunjukkan rahmat-Nya kepadanya pada hari-Nya. Betapa banyaknya pelayanan yang ia lakukan di Efesus engkau lebih mengetahuinya dari padaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then spake Joshua to the LORD in the day when the LORD delivered up the Amorites before the children of Israel, and he said in the sight of Israel, Sun, stand thou still upon Gibeon; and thou, Moon, in the valley of Ajalon.
target: Lalu Yosua berbicara kepada TUHAN pada hari TUHAN menyerahkan orang Amori itu kepada orang Israel; ia berkata di hadapan orang Israel: "Matahari, berhentilah di atas Gibeon dan engkau, bulan, di atas lembah Ayalon!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore, what have I here, saith the LORD, that my people is taken away for nought? they that rule over them make them to howl, saith the LORD; and my name continually every day is blasphemed.
target: Tetapi sekarang, apakah lagi urusan-Ku di sini? demikianlah firman TUHAN. Umat-Ku sudah dirampas begitu saja. Mereka yang berkuasa atas dia memegahkan diri, demikianlah firman TUHAN, dan nama-Ku terus dihujat sepanjang hari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who is he that overcometh the world, but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God?
target: Siapakah yang mengalahkan dunia, selain dari pada dia yang percaya, bahwa Yesus adalah Anak Allah?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the flocks conceived before the rods, and brought forth cattle ringstraked, speckled, and spotted.
target: Jika kambing domba itu berkelamin dekat dahan-dahan itu, maka anaknya bercoreng-coreng, berbintik-bintik dan berbelang-belang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the waters covered their enemies: there was not one of them left.
target: air menutupi para lawan mereka, seorang pun dari pada mereka tiada tinggal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Joab came to the king, and said, What hast thou done? behold, Abner came unto thee; why is it that thou hast sent him away, and he is quite gone?
target: Kemudian pergilah Yoab kepada raja, katanya: "Apakah yang telah kauperbuat? Abner telah datang kepadamu; mengapa engkau membiarkannya begitu saja?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If I go forth into the field, then behold the slain with the sword! and if I enter into the city, then behold them that are sick with famine! yea, both the prophet and the priest go about into a land that they know not.
target: Apabila aku keluar ke padang, di sana ada orang-orang yang mati terbunuh oleh pedang! Apabila aku masuk ke dalam kota, di sana ada orang-orang sakit kelaparan! Bahkan, baik nabi maupun imam menjelajah negeri yang tidak dikenalnya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If he be able to fight with me, and to kill me, then will we be your servants: but if I prevail against him, and kill him, then shall ye be our servants, and serve us.
target: Jika ia dapat berperang melawan aku dan mengalahkan aku, maka kami akan menjadi hambamu; tetapi jika aku dapat mengungguli dia dan mengalahkannya, maka kamu akan menjadi hamba kami dan takluk kepada kami."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said Elkanah her husband to her, Hannah, why weepest thou? and why eatest thou not? and why is thy heart grieved? am not I better to thee than ten sons?
target: Lalu Elkana, suaminya, berkata kepadanya: "Hana, mengapa engkau menangis dan mengapa engkau tidak mau makan? Mengapa hatimu sedih? Bukankah aku lebih berharga bagimu dari pada sepuluh anak laki-laki?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he went out the second day, behold, two men of the Hebrews strove together: and he said to him that did the wrong, Wherefore smitest thou thy fellow?
target: Ketika keesokan harinya ia keluar lagi, didapatinya dua orang Ibrani tengah berkelahi. Ia bertanya kepada yang bersalah itu: "Mengapa engkau pukul temanmu?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And death shall be chosen rather than life by all the residue of them that remain of this evil family, which remain in all the places whither I have driven them, saith the LORD of hosts.
target: Tetapi semua orang yang masih tinggal dari kaum yang jahat ini akan lebih suka mati dari pada hidup di segala tempat ke mana Aku mencerai-beraikan mereka, demikianlah firman TUHAN semesta alam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They take the timbrel and harp, and rejoice at the sound of the organ.
target: Mereka bernyanyi-nyanyi dengan iringan rebana dan kecapi, dan bersukaria menurut lagu seruling.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thy words were found, and I did eat them; and thy word was unto me the joy and rejoicing of mine heart: for I am called by thy name, O LORD God of hosts.
target: Apabila aku bertemu dengan perkataan-perkataan-Mu, maka aku menikmatinya; firman-Mu itu menjadi kegirangan bagiku, dan menjadi kesukaan hatiku, sebab nama-Mu telah diserukan atasku, ya TUHAN, Allah semesta alam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Consider the ravens: for they neither sow nor reap; which neither have storehouse nor barn; and God feedeth them: how much more are ye better than the fowls?
target: Perhatikanlah burung-burung gagak yang tidak menabur dan tidak menuai dan tidak mempunyai gudang atau lumbung, namun demikian diberi makan oleh Allah. Betapa jauhnya kamu melebihi burung-burung itu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: After that he brought me toward the south, and behold a gate toward the south: and he measured the posts thereof and the arches thereof according to these measures.
target: Kemudian ia membawa aku menuju selatan, sungguh, ada sebuah pintu gerbang yang menghadap ke selatan; ia mengukur kamar-kamar jaganya, tiang-tiang temboknya dan balai gerbangnya, ukurannya sama saja dengan yang lain-lain.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the cities of those kings, and all the kings of them, did Joshua take, and smote them with the edge of the sword, and he utterly destroyed them, as Moses the servant of the LORD commanded.
target: Selanjutnya segala kota kepunyaan raja-raja itu dan semua rajanya dikalahkan Yosua dan dibunuhnya dengan mata pedang. Mereka ditumpasnya seperti yang diperintahkan Musa, hamba TUHAN itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when they came again to him, (for he tarried at Jericho,) he said unto them, Did I not say unto you, Go not?
target: Ketika mereka kembali kepada Elisa yang masih tinggal di kota Yerikho, berkatalah ia kepada mereka: "Bukankah telah kukatakan kepadamu: Jangan pergi?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Whose arrows are sharp, and all their bows bent, their horses' hoofs shall be counted like flint, and their wheels like a whirlwind:
target: anak panahnya ditajamkan, dan segala busurnya dilentur; kuku kudanya keras seperti batu api dan roda keretanya seperti puting beliung.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My soul followeth hard after thee: thy right hand upholdeth me.
target: sungguh Engkau telah menjadi pertolonganku, dan dalam naungan sayap-Mu aku bersorak-sorai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But who may abide the day of his coming? and who shall stand when he appeareth? for he is like a refiner's fire, and like fullers' soap:
target: Siapakah yang dapat tahan akan hari kedatangan-Nya? Dan siapakah yang dapat tetap berdiri, apabila Ia menampakkan diri? Sebab Ia seperti api tukang pemurni logam dan seperti sabun tukang penatu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yea, they shall not be planted; yea, they shall not be sown: yea, their stock shall not take root in the earth: and he shall also blow upon them, and they shall wither, and the whirlwind shall take them away as stubble.
target: Baru saja mereka ditanam, baru saja mereka ditaburkan, baru saja cangkok mereka berakar di dalam tanah, sudah juga Ia meniup kepada mereka, sehingga mereka kering dan diterbangkan oleh badai seperti jerami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which removeth the mountains, and they know not: which overturneth them in his anger.
target: Dialah yang memindahkan gunung-gunung dengan tidak diketahui orang, yang membongkar-bangkirkannya dalam murka-Nya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The high hills are a refuge for the wild goats; and the rocks for the conies.
target: gunung-gunung tinggi adalah bagi kambing-kambing hutan, bukit-bukit batu adalah tempat perlindungan bagi pelanduk.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Beware that there be not a thought in thy wicked heart, saying, The seventh year, the year of release, is at hand; and thine eye be evil against thy poor brother, and thou givest him nought; and he cry unto the LORD against thee, and it be sin unto thee.
target: Hati-hatilah, supaya jangan timbul di dalam hatimu pikiran dursila, demikian: Sudah dekat tahun ketujuh, tahun penghapusan hutang, dan engkau menjadi kesal terhadap saudaramu yang miskin itu dan engkau tidak memberikan apa-apa kepadanya, maka ia berseru kepada TUHAN tentang engkau, dan hal itu menjadi dosa bagimu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the second time the cock crew. And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him, Before the cock crow twice, thou shalt deny me thrice. And when he thought thereon, he wept.
target: Dan pada saat itu berkokoklah ayam untuk kedua kalinya. Maka teringatlah Petrus, bahwa Yesus telah berkata kepadanya: "Sebelum ayam berkokok dua kali, engkau telah menyangkal Aku tiga kali." Lalu menangislah ia tersedu-sedu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou say in thine heart, My power and the might of mine hand hath gotten me this wealth.
target: Maka janganlah kaukatakan dalam hatimu: Kekuasaanku dan kekuatan tangankulah yang membuat aku memperoleh kekayaan ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Bathsheba said, Well; I will speak for thee unto the king.
target: Jawab Batsyeba: "Baik, aku akan membicarakan hal itu untuk engkau dengan raja."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the remainder of the flesh of the sacrifice on the third day shall be burnt with fire.
target: Tetapi apa yang masih tinggal dari daging korban sembelihan itu sampai hari yang ketiga, haruslah dibakar habis dengan api.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he was cast out, Pharaoh's daughter took him up, and nourished him for her own son.
target: Lalu ia dibuang, tetapi puteri Firaun memungutnya dan menyuruh mengasuhnya seperti anaknya sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said she, I pray thee, let the king remember the LORD thy God, that thou wouldest not suffer the revengers of blood to destroy any more, lest they destroy my son. And he said, As the LORD liveth, there shall not one hair of thy son fall to the earth.
target: Kata perempuan itu: "Kiranya raja ingat kepada TUHAN, Allahmu, supaya si penuntut tebusan darah jangan terlalu banyak menimbulkan kemusnahan dan supaya mereka jangan memunahkan anakku itu." Lalu berkatalah raja: "Demi TUHAN yang hidup — sehelai rambut pun dari kepala anakmu itu takkan jatuh ke bumi!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: It is for the prince; the prince, he shall sit in it to eat bread before the LORD; he shall enter by the way of the porch of that gate, and shall go out by the way of the same.
target: Hanya raja itu, oleh karena ia raja boleh duduk di sana makan santapan di hadapan TUHAN. Raja itu akan masuk melalui balai gerbang dan akan keluar dari situ."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore, behold, the days come, saith the LORD, that I will cause an alarm of war to be heard in Rabbah of the Ammonites; and it shall be a desolate heap, and her daughters shall be burned with fire: then shall Israel be heir unto them that were his heirs, saith the LORD.
target: Sebab itu, sesungguhnya, waktunya akan datang, demikianlah firman TUHAN, bahwa Aku akan memperdengarkan tempik sorak peperangan terhadap Raba bani Amon. Kota itu akan menjadi anak bukit yang tandus, dan kota-kota jajahannya akan dibakar dengan api; maka Israel akan memiliki orang-orang yang dahulu memilikinya, firman TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thou hast taken a pledge from thy brother for nought, and stripped the naked of their clothing.
target: Karena dengan sewenang-wenang engkau menerima gadai dari saudara-saudaramu, dan merampas pakaian orang-orang yang melarat;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said the king to the servants, Bind him hand and foot, and take him away, and cast him into outer darkness, there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
target: Lalu kata raja itu kepada hamba-hambanya: Ikatlah kaki dan tangannya dan campakkanlah orang itu ke dalam kegelapan yang paling gelap, di sanalah akan terdapat ratap dan kertak gigi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover the king made a great throne of ivory, and overlaid it with the best gold.
target: Juga raja membuat takhta besar dari gading, yang disalutnya dengan emas tua.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let us choose to us judgment: let us know among ourselves what is good.
target: Biarlah kita memutuskan bagi kita sendiri apa yang adil, menentukan bersama-sama apa yang baik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I know that, whatsoever God doeth, it shall be for ever: nothing can be put to it, nor any thing taken from it: and God doeth it, that men should fear before him.
target: Aku tahu bahwa segala sesuatu yang dilakukan Allah akan tetap ada untuk selamanya; itu tak dapat ditambah dan tak dapat dikurangi; Allah berbuat demikian, supaya manusia takut akan Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when they saw him, they were amazed: and his mother said unto him, Son, why hast thou thus dealt with us? behold, thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing.
target: Dan ketika orang tua-Nya melihat Dia, tercenganglah mereka, lalu kata ibu-Nya kepada-Nya: "Nak, mengapakah Engkau berbuat demikian terhadap kami? Bapa-Mu dan aku dengan cemas mencari Engkau."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They sent therefore and gathered all the lords of the Philistines unto them, and said, What shall we do with the ark of the God of Israel? And they answered, Let the ark of the God of Israel be carried about unto Gath. And they carried the ark of the God of Israel about thither.
target: Sebab itu mereka memanggil berkumpul kepadanya semua raja kota orang Filistin dan berkata: "Apakah yang akan kita lakukan dengan tabut Allah Israel itu?" Lalu kata mereka: "Tabut Allah Israel harus dipindahkan ke Gat." Jadi mereka memindahkan tabut Allah Israel itu ke sana.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there was a great famine in Samaria: and, behold, they besieged it, until an ass's head was sold for fourscore pieces of silver, and the fourth part of a cab of dove's dung for five pieces of silver.
target: Maka terjadilah kelaparan hebat di Samaria selama mereka mengepungnya, sehingga sebuah kepala keledai berharga delapan puluh syikal perak dan seperempat kab tahi merpati berharga lima syikal perak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not take thee a wife, neither shalt thou have sons or daughters in this place.
target: "Janganlah mengambil isteri dan janganlah mempunyai anak-anak lelaki dan anak-anak perempuan di tempat ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.
target: orang Arwadi, orang Semari dan orang Hamati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Sanctify ye a fast, call a solemn assembly, gather the elders and all the inhabitants of the land into the house of the LORD your God, and cry unto the LORD,
target: Adakanlah puasa yang kudus, maklumkanlah perkumpulan raya; kumpulkanlah para tua-tua dan seluruh penduduk negeri ke rumah TUHAN, Allahmu, dan berteriaklah kepada TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, thou hast heard what the kings of Assyria have done to all lands, by destroying them utterly: and shalt thou be delivered?
target: Sesungguhnya, engkau ini telah mendengar tentang yang dilakukan raja-raja Asyur kepada segala negeri, yakni bahwa mereka telah menumpasnya; masakan engkau ini akan dilepaskan?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The Lord gave the word: great was the company of those that published it.
target: sehingga kawanan hewan-Mu menetap di sana; dalam kebaikan-Mu Engkau memenuhi kebutuhan orang yang tertindas, ya Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: At the end of three years thou shalt bring forth all the tithe of thine increase the same year, and shalt lay it up within thy gates:
target: Pada akhir tiga tahun engkau harus mengeluarkan segala persembahan persepuluhan dari hasil tanahmu dalam tahun itu dan menaruhnya di dalam kotamu;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when king Jeroboam heard the saying of the man of God, which had cried against the altar in Bethel, that he put forth his hand from the altar, saying, Lay hold on him. And his hand, which he put forth against him, dried up, so that he could not pull it in again to him.
target: Demi raja Yerobeam mendengar perkataan abdi Allah yang diserukannya terhadap mezbah di Betel itu, ia mengulurkan tangannya dari atas mezbah dan berkata: "Tangkaplah dia!" Tetapi tangan yang diulurkannya terhadap orang itu menjadi kejang, sehingga tidak dapat ditariknya kembali.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus said, For judgment I am come into this world, that they which see not might see; and that they which see might be made blind.
target: Kata Yesus: "Aku datang ke dalam dunia untuk menghakimi, supaya barangsiapa yang tidak melihat, dapat melihat, dan supaya barangsiapa yang dapat melihat, menjadi buta."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Judah is a lion's whelp: from the prey, my son, thou art gone up: he stooped down, he couched as a lion, and as an old lion; who shall rouse him up?
target: Yehuda adalah seperti anak singa: setelah menerkam, engkau naik ke suatu tempat yang tinggi, hai anakku; ia meniarap dan berbaring seperti singa jantan atau seperti singa betina; siapakah yang berani membangunkannya?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou oughtest therefore to have put my money to the exchangers, and then at my coming I should have received mine own with usury.
target: Karena itu sudahlah seharusnya uangku itu kauberikan kepada orang yang menjalankan uang, supaya sekembaliku aku menerimanya serta dengan bunganya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God said to Jonah, Doest thou well to be angry for the gourd? And he said, I do well to be angry, even unto death.
target: Tetapi berfirmanlah Allah kepada Yunus: "Layakkah engkau marah karena pohon jarak itu?" Jawabnya: "Selayaknyalah aku marah sampai mati."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If we this day be examined of the good deed done to the impotent man, by what means he is made whole;
target: jika kami sekarang harus diperiksa karena suatu kebajikan kepada seorang sakit dan harus menerangkan dengan kuasa manakah orang itu disembuhkan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt not go aside from any of the words which I command thee this day, to the right hand, or to the left, to go after other gods to serve them.
target: dan apabila engkau tidak menyimpang ke kanan atau ke kiri dari segala perintah yang kuberikan kepadamu pada hari ini, dengan mengikuti allah lain dan beribadah kepadanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And to every beast of the earth, and to every fowl of the air, and to every thing that creepeth upon the earth, wherein there is life, I have given every green herb for meat: and it was so.
target: Tetapi kepada segala binatang di bumi dan segala burung di udara dan segala yang merayap di bumi, yang bernyawa, Kuberikan segala tumbuh-tumbuhan hijau menjadi makanannya." Dan jadilah demikian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And this is thine; the heave offering of their gift, with all the wave offerings of the children of Israel: I have given them unto thee, and to thy sons and to thy daughters with thee, by a statute for ever: every one that is clean in thy house shall eat of it.
target: Dan ini pun adalah bagianmu: persembahan khusus dari pemberian mereka yang lain, termasuk segala persembahan unjukan orang Israel; semuanya itu Kuberikan kepadamu dan kepada anak-anakmu laki-laki dan perempuan bersama-sama dengan engkau; itulah suatu ketetapan untuk selama-lamanya. Setiap orang yang tahir dari seisi rumahmu boleh memakannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A naughty person, a wicked man, walketh with a froward mouth.
target: Tak bergunalah dan jahatlah orang yang hidup dengan mulut serong,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thy kingdom come, Thy will be done in earth, as it is in heaven.
target: datanglah Kerajaan-Mu, jadilah kehendak-Mu di bumi seperti di sorga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Isaac his father said unto him, Who art thou? And he said, I am thy son, thy firstborn Esau.
target: Tetapi kata Ishak, ayahnya, kepadanya: "Siapakah engkau ini?" Sahutnya: "Akulah anakmu, anak sulungmu, Esau."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All the sinners of my people shall die by the sword, which say, The evil shall not overtake nor prevent us.
target: Oleh pedang akan mati terbunuh semua orang berdosa di antara umat-Ku yang mengatakan: Malapetaka itu tidak akan menyusul dan tidak akan mencapai kami."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And we were in all in the ship two hundred threescore and sixteen souls.
target: Jumlah kami semua yang di kapal itu dua ratus tujuh puluh enam jiwa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he had thirty sons, and thirty daughters, whom he sent abroad, and took in thirty daughters from abroad for his sons. And he judged Israel seven years.
target: Ia mempunyai tiga puluh anak laki-laki. Tiga puluh anaknya perempuan dikawinkannya ke luar kaumnya dan tiga puluh anak perempuan diambilnya dari luar kaumnya untuk anak-anaknya lelaki itu. Ia memerintah atas orang Israel tujuh tahun lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Esther had not shewed her people nor her kindred: for Mordecai had charged her that she should not shew it.
target: Ester tidak memberitahukan kebangsaan dan asal usulnya, karena dilarang oleh Mordekhai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, ye trust in lying words, that cannot profit.
target: Tetapi sesungguhnya, kamu percaya kepada perkataan dusta yang tidak memberi faedah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As for me, I have not hastened from being a pastor to follow thee: neither have I desired the woeful day; thou knowest: that which came out of my lips was right before thee.
target: Namun tidak pernah aku mendesak kepada-Mu untuk mendatangkan malapetaka, aku tidak mengingini hari bencana! Engkaulah yang mengetahui apa yang keluar dari bibirku, semuanya terpampang di hadapan mata-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of the sons also of Adin; Ebed the son of Jonathan, and with him fifty males.
target: dan dari bani Adin: Ebed bin Yonatan, dan bersama-sama dia lima puluh orang laki-laki;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, the LORD maketh the earth empty, and maketh it waste, and turneth it upside down, and scattereth abroad the inhabitants thereof.
target: Sesungguhnya, TUHAN akan menanduskan bumi dan akan menghancurkannya, akan membalikkan permukaannya, dan akan menyerakkan penduduknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wilt thou believe him, that he will bring home thy seed, and gather it into thy barn?
target: Apakah lembu hutan mau takluk kepadamu, atau bermalam dekat palunganmu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the name of God is blasphemed among the Gentiles through you, as it is written.
target: Seperti ada tertulis: "Sebab oleh karena kamulah nama Allah dihujat di antara bangsa-bangsa lain."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So I took the chief of your tribes, wise men, and known, and made them heads over you, captains over thousands, and captains over hundreds, and captains over fifties, and captains over tens, and officers among your tribes.
target: Kemudian aku mengambil kepala-kepala sukumu, yakni orang-orang yang bijaksana dan berpengalaman, lalu aku mengangkat mereka menjadi pemimpin atas kamu, yakni sebagai kepala pasukan seribu, kepala pasukan seratus, kepala pasukan lima puluh dan kepala pasukan sepuluh dan sebagai pengatur pasukan bagi suku-sukumu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The two and twentieth to Giddalti, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
target: undian yang kedua puluh dua pada Gidalti, anak-anaknya dan saudara-saudaranya, dua belas orang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he slew it; and Moses took the blood, and put it upon the horns of the altar round about with his finger, and purified the altar, and poured the blood at the bottom of the altar, and sanctified it, to make reconciliation upon it.
target: Lembu itu disembelih, lalu Musa mengambil darahnya, kemudian dengan jarinya dibubuhnyalah darah itu pada tanduk-tanduk mezbah sekelilingnya, dan dengan demikian disucikannyalah mezbah itu dari dosa; darah selebihnya dituangkannya pada bagian bawah mezbah. Dengan demikian dikuduskannya mezbah itu dan diadakannya pendamaian baginya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if I send them away fasting to their own houses, they will faint by the way: for divers of them came from far.
target: Dan jika mereka Kusuruh pulang ke rumahnya dengan lapar, mereka akan rebah di jalan, sebab ada yang datang dari jauh."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As my hand hath found the kingdoms of the idols, and whose graven images did excel them of Jerusalem and of Samaria;
target: Seperti tanganku telah menyergap kerajaan-kerajaan para berhala, padahal patung-patung mereka melebihi yang di Yerusalem dan yang di Samaria,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that entereth not by the door into the sheepfold, but climbeth up some other way, the same is a thief and a robber.
target: "Aku berkata kepadamu: Sesungguhnya siapa yang masuk ke dalam kandang domba dengan tidak melalui pintu, tetapi dengan memanjat tembok, ia adalah seorang pencuri dan seorang perampok;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And their father Israel said unto them, If it must be so now, do this; take of the best fruits in the land in your vessels, and carry down the man a present, a little balm, and a little honey, spices, and myrrh, nuts, and almonds:
target: Lalu Israel, ayah mereka, berkata kepadanya: "Jika demikian, perbuatlah begini: Ambillah hasil yang terbaik dari negeri ini dalam tempat gandummu dan bawalah kepada orang itu sebagai persembahan: sedikit balsam dan sedikit madu, damar dan damar ladan, buah kemiri dan buah badam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I know, and am persuaded by the Lord Jesus, that there is nothing unclean of itself: but to him that esteemeth any thing to be unclean, to him it is unclean.
target: Aku tahu dan yakin dalam Tuhan Yesus, bahwa tidak ada sesuatu yang najis dari dirinya sendiri. Hanya bagi orang yang beranggapan, bahwa sesuatu adalah najis, bagi orang itulah sesuatu itu najis.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore fear ye not: I will nourish you, and your little ones. And he comforted them, and spake kindly unto them.
target: Jadi janganlah takut, aku akan menanggung makanmu dan makan anak-anakmu juga." Demikianlah ia menghiburkan mereka dan menenangkan hati mereka dengan perkataannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Not for any injustice in mine hands: also my prayer is pure.
target: sungguhpun tidak ada kelaliman pada tanganku, dan doaku bersih.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou didst blow with thy wind, the sea covered them: they sank as lead in the mighty waters.
target: Engkau meniup dengan taufan-Mu, laut pun menutupi mereka; sebagai timah mereka tenggelam dalam air yang hebat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Destroy thou them, O God; let them fall by their own counsels; cast them out in the multitude of their transgressions; for they have rebelled against thee.
target: Sebab perkataan mereka tidak ada yang jujur, batin mereka penuh kebusukan, kerongkongan mereka seperti kubur ternganga, lidah mereka merayu-rayu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God came unto Balaam, and said, What men are these with thee?
target: Kemudian datanglah Allah kepada Bileam serta berfirman: "Siapakah orang-orang yang bersama-sama dengan engkau itu?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All the brethren greet you. Greet ye one another with an holy kiss.
target: Salam kepadamu dari saudara-saudara semuanya. Sampaikanlah salam seorang kepada yang lain dengan cium kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For his sons carried him into the land of Canaan, and buried him in the cave of the field of Machpelah, which Abraham bought with the field for a possession of a buryingplace of Ephron the Hittite, before Mamre.
target: Anak-anaknya mengangkut dia ke tanah Kanaan, dan mereka menguburkan dia dalam gua di ladang Makhpela yang telah dibeli Abraham dari Efron, orang Het itu, untuk menjadi kuburan milik, yaitu ladang yang di sebelah timur Mamre.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there were narrow windows to the little chambers, and to their posts within the gate round about, and likewise to the arches: and windows were round about inward: and upon each post were palm trees.
target: Pada sekeliling pintu gerbang itu di bagian dalam ada jendela-jendela dengan bidai, yaitu di kamar-kamar jaga dan pada tiang-tiang tembok dan begitu juga pada balai gerbang. Dan pada tiang-tiang tembok itu terukir gambar pohon-pohon korma.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But while men slept, his enemy came and sowed tares among the wheat, and went his way.
target: Tetapi pada waktu semua orang tidur, datanglah musuhnya menaburkan benih lalang di antara gandum itu, lalu pergi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My soul thirsteth for God, for the living God: when shall I come and appear before God?
target: Seperti rusa yang merindukan sungai yang berair, demikianlah jiwaku merindukan Engkau, ya Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Esau said, Let me now leave with thee some of the folk that are with me. And he said, What needeth it? let me find grace in the sight of my lord.
target: Lalu kata Esau: "Kalau begitu, baiklah kutinggalkan padamu beberapa orang dari pengiringku." Tetapi Yakub berkata: "Tidak usah demikian! Biarlah aku mendapat kasih tuanku saja."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I took the two tables, and cast them out of my two hands, and brake them before your eyes.
target: Maka kupeganglah kuat-kuat kedua loh itu, kulemparkan dari kedua tanganku, kupecahkan di depan matamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Heaven and earth shall pass away, but my words shall not pass away.
target: Langit dan bumi akan berlalu, tetapi perkataan-Ku tidak akan berlalu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the weight of the golden earrings that he requested was a thousand and seven hundred shekels of gold; beside ornaments, and collars, and purple raiment that was on the kings of Midian, and beside the chains that were about their camels' necks.
target: Adapun berat anting-anting emas yang dimintanya itu ada seribu tujuh ratus syikal emas, belum terhitung bulan-bulanan, perhiasan telinga dan pakaian kain ungu muda yang dipakai oleh raja-raja Midian, dan belum terhitung kalung rantai yang ada pada leher unta mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Pharaoh charged all his people, saying, Every son that is born ye shall cast into the river, and every daughter ye shall save alive.
target: Lalu Firaun memberi perintah kepada seluruh rakyatnya: "Lemparkanlah segala anak laki-laki yang lahir bagi orang Ibrani ke dalam sungai Nil; tetapi segala anak perempuan biarkanlah hidup."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They answered and said unto him, Abraham is our father. Jesus saith unto them, If ye were Abraham's children, ye would do the works of Abraham.
target: Jawab mereka kepada-Nya: "Bapa kami ialah Abraham." Kata Yesus kepada mereka: "Jikalau sekiranya kamu anak-anak Abraham, tentulah kamu mengerjakan pekerjaan yang dikerjakan oleh Abraham.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thus saith the LORD, Behold, I will make thee a terror to thyself, and to all thy friends: and they shall fall by the sword of their enemies, and thine eyes shall behold it: and I will give all Judah into the hand of the king of Babylon, and he shall carry them captive into Babylon, and shall slay them with the sword.
target: Sebab beginilah firman TUHAN: Sesungguhnya, Aku akan membuat engkau menjadi kegentaran bagimu sendiri dan bagi semua sahabatmu; mereka akan rebah mati oleh pedang musuhnya di depan matamu sendiri. Dan seluruh Yehuda akan Kuserahkan ke dalam tangan raja Babel yang akan mengangkut mereka ke dalam pembuangan ke Babel dan memukul mati mereka dengan pedang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when we had taken our leave one of another, we took ship; and they returned home again.
target: Sesudah minta diri kami naik ke kapal, dan mereka pulang ke rumah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I am the LORD your God; walk in my statutes, and keep my judgments, and do them;
target: Akulah TUHAN, Allahmu: Hiduplah menurut ketetapan-ketetapan-Ku dan lakukanlah peraturan-peraturan-Ku dengan setia,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In these lay a great multitude of impotent folk, of blind, halt, withered, waiting for the moving of the water.
target: dan di serambi-serambi itu berbaring sejumlah besar orang sakit: orang-orang buta, orang-orang timpang dan orang-orang lumpuh, yang menantikan goncangan air kolam itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yet he restored the money unto his mother; and his mother took two hundred shekels of silver, and gave them to the founder, who made thereof a graven image and a molten image: and they were in the house of Micah.
target: Tetapi orang itu mengembalikan uang itu kepada ibunya, lalu perempuan itu mengambil dua ratus uang perak dan memberikannya kepada tukang perak, yang membuat patung pahatan dan patung tuangan dari pada uang itu; lalu patung itu ditaruh di rumah Mikha.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now when Athaliah heard the noise of the people running and praising the king, she came to the people into the house of the LORD:
target: Ketika Atalya mendengar pekik rakyat yang berlari-lari menyambut raja dan memuji-muji dia, pergilah ia mendapatkan rakyat itu ke dalam rumah TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all nations shall call you blessed: for ye shall be a delightsome land, saith the LORD of hosts.
target: Maka segala bangsa akan menyebut kamu berbahagia, sebab kamu ini akan menjadi negeri kesukaan, firman TUHAN semesta alam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Solomon said, Thou hast shewed unto thy servant David my father great mercy, according as he walked before thee in truth, and in righteousness, and in uprightness of heart with thee; and thou hast kept for him this great kindness, that thou hast given him a son to sit on his throne, as it is this day.
target: Lalu Salomo berkata: "Engkaulah yang telah menunjukkan kasih setia-Mu yang besar kepada hamba-Mu Daud, ayahku, sebab ia hidup di hadapan-Mu dengan setia, benar dan jujur terhadap Engkau; dan Engkau telah menjamin kepadanya kasih setia yang besar itu dengan memberikan kepadanya seorang anak yang duduk di takhtanya seperti pada hari ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The words of his mouth are iniquity and deceit: he hath left off to be wise, and to do good.
target: sebab ia membujuk dirinya, sampai orang mendapati kesalahannya dan membencinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And two boards made he for the corners of the tabernacle in the two sides.
target: Dua papan dibuat orang untuk sudut Kemah Suci, di sisi belakang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the waters of Nimrim shall be desolate: for the hay is withered away, the grass faileth, there is no green thing.
target: Sungguh, air di Nimrim menjadi kering dan tandus dan rumput sudah kering, rumput muda sudah habis, tidak ada lagi tumbuh-tumbuhan hijau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore it shall be when ye be gone over Jordan, that ye shall set up these stones, which I command you this day, in mount Ebal, and thou shalt plaister them with plaister.
target: Dan sesudah kamu menyeberangi sungai Yordan, maka haruslah batu-batu itu, yang telah kuperintahkan kepadamu pada hari ini, kamu tegakkan di gunung Ebal dan kaukapuri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Go up into Gilead, and take balm, O virgin, the daughter of Egypt: in vain shalt thou use many medicines; for thou shalt not be cured.
target: Pergilah ke Gilead mengambil balsam, hai anak dara, puteri Mesir! Sia-sia engkau memakai banyak obat, kesembuhan tidak akan kaudapat!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Simeon; Jemuel, and Jamin, and Ohad, and Jachin, and Zohar, and Shaul the son of a Canaanitish woman: these are the families of Simeon.
target: Inilah nama anak-anak Lewi menurut urutan kelahirannya: Gerson, Kehat dan Merari. Umur Lewi seratus tiga puluh tujuh tahun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt take thine inheritance in thyself in the sight of the heathen, and thou shalt know that I am the LORD.
target: Maka engkau akan dinajiskan di hadapan bangsa-bangsa karena kesalahanmu sendiri, dan engkau akan mengetahui bahwa Akulah TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
target: Karena itu tunduklah kepada Allah, dan lawanlah Iblis, maka ia akan lari dari padamu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jetur, Naphish, and Kedemah. These are the sons of Ishmael.
target: Yetur, Nafish dan Kedma; mereka itulah anak-anak Ismael.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These things understood not his disciples at the first: but when Jesus was glorified, then remembered they that these things were written of him, and that they had done these things unto him.
target: Mula-mula murid-murid Yesus tidak mengerti akan hal itu, tetapi sesudah Yesus dimuliakan, teringatlah mereka, bahwa nas itu mengenai Dia, dan bahwa mereka telah melakukannya juga untuk Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sluggard will not plow by reason of the cold; therefore shall he beg in harvest, and have nothing.
target: Pada musim dingin si pemalas tidak membajak; jikalau ia mencari pada musim menuai, maka tidak ada apa-apa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And after him repaired the priests, the men of the plain.
target: Di sampingnya para imam, orang-orang dari Lembah Yordan, mengadakan perbaikan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jesus saith unto her, I that speak unto thee am he.
target: Kata Yesus kepadanya: "Akulah Dia, yang sedang berkata-kata dengan engkau."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the saying pleased Absalom well, and all the elders of Israel.
target: Perkataan ini disetujui oleh Absalom dan oleh semua tua-tua Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Into thine hand I commit my spirit: thou hast redeemed me, O LORD God of truth.
target: Engkau akan mengeluarkan aku dari jaring yang dipasang orang terhadap aku, sebab Engkaulah tempat perlindunganku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He feedeth on ashes: a deceived heart hath turned him aside, that he cannot deliver his soul, nor say, Is there not a lie in my right hand?
target: Orang yang sibuk dengan abu belaka, disesatkan oleh hatinya yang tertipu; ia tidak dapat menyelamatkan jiwanya atau mengatakan: "Bukankah dusta yang menjadi peganganku?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: While Peter yet spake these words, the Holy Ghost fell on all them which heard the word.
target: Ketika Petrus sedang berkata demikian, turunlah Roh Kudus ke atas semua orang yang mendengarkan pemberitaan itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Samuel said unto Saul, I will not return with thee: for thou hast rejected the word of the LORD, and the LORD hath rejected thee from being king over Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they come to Jerusalem: and Jesus went into the temple, and began to cast out them that sold and bought in the temple, and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers, and the seats of them that sold doves;
target: Lalu tibalah Yesus dan murid-murid-Nya di Yerusalem. Sesudah Yesus masuk ke Bait Allah, mulailah Ia mengusir orang-orang yang berjual beli di halaman Bait Allah. Meja-meja penukar uang dan bangku-bangku pedagang merpati dibalikkan-Nya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, Amos, what seest thou? And I said, A basket of summer fruit. Then said the LORD unto me, The end is come upon my people of Israel; I will not again pass by them any more.
target: Lalu berfirmanlah Ia: "Apakah yang kaulihat, Amos?" Jawabku: "Sebuah bakul berisi buah-buahan musim kemarau." Berfirmanlah TUHAN kepadaku: "Kesudahan telah datang bagi umat-Ku Israel. Aku tidak akan memaafkannya lagi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Surely men of low degree are vanity, and men of high degree are a lie: to be laid in the balance, they are altogether lighter than vanity.
target: Percayalah kepada-Nya setiap waktu, hai umat, curahkanlah isi hatimu di hadapan-Nya; Allah ialah tempat perlindungan kita. S e l a

input: Woe to the land shadowing with wings, which is beyond the rivers of Ethiopia:
target: Wahai! Negeri dengingan sayap di seberang sungai-sungai Etiopia,

target: Namun ia ditanam di ladang yang baik, dekat air yang berlimpah-limpah, supaya ia bercabang-cabang dan berbuah dan supaya menjadi pohon anggur yang bagus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they reasoned with themselves, saying, If we shall say, From heaven; he will say, Why then did ye not believe him?
target: Mereka memperbincangkannya di antara mereka, dan berkata: "Jikalau kita katakan: Dari sorga, Ia akan berkata: Kalau begitu, mengapakah kamu tidak percaya kepadanya?

input: Thou liftest me up to the wind; thou causest me to ride upon it, and dissolvest my substance.
target: Engkau mengangkat aku ke atas angin, melayangkan aku dan menghancurkan aku di dalam angin ribut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: "Alangkah baiknya bantuanmu kepada yang tidak kuat, dan pertolonganmu kepada lengan yang tidak berdaya!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Judah; Er, and Onan, and Shelah, and Pharez, and Zarah: but Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan. And the sons of Pharez were Hezron and Hamul.
target: Anak-anak Yehuda ialah Er, Onan, Syela, Peres dan Zerah; tetapi Er dan Onan mati di tanah Kanaan; dan anak-anak Peres ialah Hezron dan Hamul.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let darkness and the shadow of death stain it; let a cloud dwell upon it; let the blackness of the day terrify it.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Sebab seperti banyaknya kotamu demikian banyaknya para allahmu, hai Yehuda, dan seperti banyaknya jalan di Yerusalem demikian banyaknya mezbah yang kamu dirikan untuk membakar korban kepada Baal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So they read in the book in the law of God distinctly, and gave the sense, and caused them to understand the reading.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they smote the Philistines that day from Michmash to Aijalon: and the people were very faint.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Tetapi jika rumah tangga itu terlalu kecil jumlahnya untuk mengambil seekor anak domba, maka ia bersama-sama dengan tetangganya yang terdekat ke rumahnya haruslah mengambil seekor, menurut jumlah jiwa; tentang anak domba itu, kamu buatlah perkiraan menurut keperluan tiap-tiap orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But be ye doers of the word, and not hearers only, deceiving your own selves.
target: Tetapi hendaklah kamu menjadi pelaku firman dan bukan hanya pendengar saja; sebab jika tidak demikian kamu menipu diri sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall come to pass, if ye diligently hearken unto me, saith the LORD, to bring in no burden through the gates of this city on the sabbath day, but hallow the sabbath day, to do no work therein;
target: Apabila kamu sungguh sungguh mendengarkan Aku, demikianlah firman TUHAN, dan tidak membawa masuk barang-barang melalui pintu-pintu gerbang kota ini pada hari Sabat, tetapi menguduskan hari Sabat dan tidak melakukan sesuatu pekerjaan pada hari itu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore the princes were wroth with Jeremiah, and smote him, and put him in prison in the house of Jonathan the scribe: for they had made that the prison.
target: Para pemuka ini menjadi marah kepada Yeremia; mereka memukul dia dan memasukkannya ke dalam rumah tahanan, rumah panitera Yonatan itu; adapun rumah itu telah dibuat mereka menjadi penjara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he began to teach them, that the Son of man must suffer many things, and be rejected of the elders, and of the chief priests, and scribes, and be killed, and after three days rise again.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If I were hungry, I would not tell thee: for the world is mine, and the fulness thereof.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts, saying, What manner of child shall this be! And the hand of the Lord was with him.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

input: Thus saith the LORD, Stand ye in the ways, and see, and ask for the old paths, where is the good way, and walk therein, and ye shall find rest for your souls. But they said, We will not walk therein.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou hast taken away all thy wrath: thou hast turned thyself from the fierceness of thine anger.

target: Lalu diberitahukanlah kepada Salomo: "Ternyata Adonia takut kepada raja Salomo, dan ia telah memegang tanduk-tanduk mezbah, serta berkata: Biarlah raja Salomo lebih dahulu bersumpah mengenai aku, bahwa ia takkan membunuh hambanya ini dengan pedang."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he brought the family of Judah; and he took the family of the Zarhites: and he brought the family of the Zarhites man by man; and Zabdi was taken:
target: Ketika disuruhnya tampil ke muka kaum-kaum Yehuda, maka didapatinya kaum Zerah. Ketika disuruhnya tampil ke muka kaum Zerah, seorang demi seorang, maka didapatilah Zabdi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But wisdom is justified of all her children.
target: Tetapi hikmat dibenarkan oleh semua orang yang menerimanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

input: And she fastened it with the pin, and said unto him, The Philistines be upon thee, Samson. And he awaked out of his sleep, and went away with the pin of the beam, and with the web.
target: Kemudian perempuan itu mengokohkan lagi tenunan itu dengan patok, lalu berserulah ia kepadanya: "Orang-orang Filistin menyergap engkau, Simson." Tetapi ketika ia terjaga dari tidurnya, disentaknya lepas patok tenunan dan lungsin itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For every high priest taken from among men is ordained for men in things pertaining to God, that he may offer both gifts and sacrifices for sins:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the fear of you and the dread of you shall be upon every beast of the earth, and upon every fowl of the air, upon all that moveth upon the earth, and upon all the fishes of the sea; into your hand are they delivered.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the Spirit of the LORD fell upon me, and said unto me, Speak; Thus saith the LORD; Thus have ye said, O house of Israel: for I know the things that come into your mind, every one of them.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said, He hath Beelzebub, and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils.
target: Dan ahli-ahli Taurat yang datang dari Yerusalem berkata: "Ia kerasukan Beelzebul," dan: "Dengan penghulu setan Ia mengusir setan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all Israel heard of the judgment which the king had judged; and they feared the king: for they saw that the wisdom of God was in him, to do judgment.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sons, I say, of Reuben the firstborn of Israel were, Hanoch, and Pallu, Hezron, and Carmi.
target: Anak-anak Ruben, anak sulung Israel, ialah Henokh, Palu, Hezron dan Karmi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When he shall be judged, let him be condemned: and let his prayer become sin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My son, if thou wilt receive my words, and hide my commandments with thee;
target: Hai anakku, jikalau engkau menerima perkataanku dan menyimpan perintahku di dalam hatimu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hast thou not procured this unto thyself, in that thou hast forsaken the LORD thy God, when he led thee by the way?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they told what things were done in the way, and how he was known of them in breaking of bread.

input: And leaving Nazareth, he came and dwelt in Capernaum, which is upon the sea coast, in the borders of Zabulon and Nephthalim:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: dan mereka harus memberi pernyataan dengan mengatakan: Tangan kami tidak mencurahkan darah ini dan mata kami tidak melihatnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Reuben; Hanoch, and Phallu, and Hezron, and Carmi.
target: Anak-anak Ruben ialah Henokh, Palu, Hezron dan Karmi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the rest of the people, the priests, the Levites, the porters, the singers, the Nethinims, and all they that had separated themselves from the people of the lands unto the law of God, their wives, their sons, and their daughters, every one having knowledge, and having understanding;
target: Dan orang-orang yang lain, yakni: para imam dan orang-orang Lewi, para penunggu pintu gerbang, para penyanyi, para budak di bait Allah dan segala orang yang memisahkan diri dari penduduk negeri untuk patuh kepada hukum Allah, serta isteri mereka, anak-anak lelaki dan anak-anak perempuan mereka, begitu juga semua orang yang cukup dewasa untuk mengerti,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now the name of the Israelite that was slain, even that was slain with the Midianitish woman, was Zimri, the son of Salu, a prince of a chief house among the Simeonites.
target: Nama orang Israel yang mati terbunuh bersama-sama dengan perempuan Midian itu ialah Zimri bin Salu, pemimpin salah satu puak orang Simeon,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the Egyptians will I give over into the hand of a cruel lord; and a fierce king shall rule over them, saith the Lord, the LORD of hosts.
target: Aku akan menyerahkan orang Mesir ke dalam tangan seorang tuan yang kejam, dan seorang raja yang bengis akan memerintah mereka; demikianlah firman Tuhan, TUHAN semesta alam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the stork, the heron after her kind, and the lapwing, and the bat.
target: burung ranggung, bangau menurut jenisnya, meragai dan kelelawar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So the priests, and the Levites, and some of the people, and the singers, and the porters, and the Nethinims, dwelt in their cities, and all Israel in their cities.
target: Adapun para imam dan orang-orang Lewi, dan juga sebagian dari rakyat, serta para penyanyi, para penunggu pintu gerbang dan para budak di bait Allah menetap di kota-kota mereka, demikian juga semua orang Israel yang lain, masing-masing di kota-kotanya sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For it shall be, that, as a wandering bird cast out of the nest, so the daughters of Moab shall be at the fords of Arnon.
target: Seperti burung yang lari terbang, dan isi sarang yang diusir, demikianlah anak-anak perempuan Moab di tempat-tempat penyeberangan sungai Arnon.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if it be a question of words and names, and of your law, look ye to it; for I will be no judge of such matters.
target: tetapi kalau hal itu adalah perselisihan tentang perkataan atau nama atau hukum yang berlaku di antara kamu, maka hendaklah kamu sendiri mengurusnya; aku tidak rela menjadi hakim atas perkara yang demikian."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Out of the mouth of the most High proceedeth not evil and good?
target: Bukankah dari mulut Yang Mahatinggi keluar apa yang buruk dan apa yang baik?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I saw another angel ascending from the east, having the seal of the living God: and he cried with a loud voice to the four angels, to whom it was given to hurt the earth and the sea,
target: Dan aku melihat seorang malaikat lain muncul dari tempat matahari terbit. Ia membawa meterai Allah yang hidup; dan ia berseru dengan suara nyaring kepada keempat malaikat yang ditugaskan untuk merusakkan bumi dan laut,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There were also women looking on afar off: among whom was Mary Magdalene, and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses, and Salome;
target: Ada juga beberapa perempuan yang melihat dari jauh, di antaranya Maria Magdalena, Maria ibu Yakobus Muda dan Yoses, serta Salome.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he spake also unto the men of Penuel, saying, When I come again in peace, I will break down this tower.
target: Lalu berkatalah ia juga kepada orang-orang Pnuel: "Apabila aku kembali dengan selamat, maka aku akan merobohkan menara ini."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To be a memorial unto the children of Israel, that no stranger, which is not of the seed of Aaron, come near to offer incense before the LORD; that he be not as Korah, and as his company: as the LORD said to him by the hand of Moses.
target: Itu menjadi suatu peringatan bagi orang Israel, supaya jangan tampil orang awam yang bukan dari keturunan Harun untuk membakar ukupan di hadapan TUHAN, dan jangan ia menjadi seperti Korah dan kumpulannya — seperti yang difirmankan TUHAN kepadanya dengan perantaraan Musa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover all these curses shall come upon thee, and shall pursue thee, and overtake thee, till thou be destroyed; because thou hearkenedst not unto the voice of the LORD thy God, to keep his commandments and his statutes which he commanded thee:
target: Segala kutuk itu akan datang ke atasmu, memburu engkau dan mencapai engkau, sampai engkau punah, karena engkau tidak mendengarkan suara TUHAN, Allahmu dan tidak berpegang pada perintah dan ketetapan yang diperintahkan-Nya kepadamu;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
target: TUHAN berfirman kepada Musa:

input: And there came a man of God, and spake unto the king of Israel, and said, Thus saith the LORD, Because the Syrians have said, The LORD is God of the hills, but he is not God of the valleys, therefore will I deliver all this great multitude into thine hand, and ye shall know that I am the LORD.
target: Maka tampillah abdi Allah dan berkata kepada raja Israel: "Beginilah firman TUHAN: Oleh karena orang Aram itu telah berkata: TUHAN ialah allah gunung dan bukan allah dataran, maka Aku akan menyerahkan seluruh tentara yang besar itu ke dalam tanganmu, supaya kamu tahu, bahwa Akulah TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men;
target: Apa pun juga yang kamu perbuat, perbuatlah dengan segenap hatimu seperti untuk Tuhan dan bukan untuk manusia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now about that time Herod the king stretched forth his hands to vex certain of the church.
target: Kira-kira pada waktu itu raja Herodes mulai bertindak dengan keras terhadap beberapa orang dari jemaat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For by fire and by his sword will the LORD plead with all flesh: and the slain of the LORD shall be many.
target: Sebab TUHAN akan menghukum segala yang hidup dengan api dan dengan pedang-Nya, dan orang-orang yang mati terbunuh oleh TUHAN akan banyak jumlahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king said unto Hazael, Take a present in thine hand, and go, meet the man of God, and enquire of the LORD by him, saying, Shall I recover of this disease?
target: berkatalah ia kepada Hazael: "Ambillah persembahan, pergilah menyongsong abdi Allah itu dan mintalah petunjuk TUHAN dengan perantaraannya: Sembuhkah aku dari penyakit ini?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will visit upon her the days of Baalim, wherein she burned incense to them, and she decked herself with her earrings and her jewels, and she went after her lovers, and forgat me, saith the LORD.
target: "Sebab itu, sesungguhnya, Aku ini akan membujuk dia, dan membawa dia ke padang gurun, dan berbicara menenangkan hatinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD; For three transgressions of Damascus, and for four, I will not turn away the punishment thereof; because they have threshed Gilead with threshing instruments of iron:
target: Beginilah firman TUHAN: "Karena tiga perbuatan jahat Damsyik, bahkan empat, Aku tidak akan menarik kembali keputusan-Ku: Oleh karena mereka telah mengirik Gilead dengan eretan pengirik dari besi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the priest shall pour of the oil into the palm of his own left hand:
target: Dan imam harus menuang sedikit dari minyak itu ke telapak tangan kirinya sendiri,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The children of Rezin, the children of Nekoda, the children of Gazzam,
target: bani Rezin, bani Nekoda, bani Gazam;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses called unto all Israel, and said unto them, Ye have seen all that the LORD did before your eyes in the land of Egypt unto Pharaoh, and unto all his servants, and unto all his land;
target: Musa memanggil seluruh orang Israel berkumpul, lalu berkata kepada mereka: "Sudah kamu lihat segala yang dilakukan TUHAN di tanah Mesir di depan matamu terhadap Firaun dan terhadap semua pegawainya dan terhadap seluruh negerinya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jehoshaphat said, Is there not here a prophet of the LORD besides, that we might enquire of him?
target: Tetapi Yosafat bertanya: "Tidak adakah lagi di sini seorang nabi TUHAN, supaya dengan perantaraannya kita dapat meminta petunjuk?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they shall take a cloth of blue, and cover the candlestick of the light, and his lamps, and his tongs, and his snuffdishes, and all the oil vessels thereof, wherewith they minister unto it:
target: Lalu mereka harus mengambil sehelai kain ungu tua dan menudungkannya kepada kandil untuk penerangan dengan lampu-lampunya, sepit-sepit dan penadah-penadahnya, dan segala perkakas minyaknya yang dipakai untuk mengurus kandil itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he lifted up his eyes, and saw the women and the children; and said, Who are those with thee? And he said, The children which God hath graciously given thy servant.
target: Kemudian Esau melayangkan pandangnya, dilihatnyalah perempuan-perempuan dan anak-anak itu, lalu ia bertanya: "Siapakah orang-orang yang beserta engkau itu?" Jawab Yakub: "Anak-anak yang telah dikaruniakan Allah kepada hambamu ini."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So that the LORD could no longer bear, because of the evil of your doings, and because of the abominations which ye have committed; therefore is your land a desolation, and an astonishment, and a curse, without an inhabitant, as at this day.
target: TUHAN tidak tahan lagi melihat perbuatan-perbuatanmu yang jahat dan kejijikan yang kamu lakukan; oleh karena itu negerimu pun telah menjadi reruntuhan, kengerian dan kutuk tanpa penduduk, seperti yang ternyata sekarang ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: From the cry of Heshbon even unto Elealeh, and even unto Jahaz, have they uttered their voice, from Zoar even unto Horonaim, as an heifer of three years old: for the waters also of Nimrim shall be desolate.
target: Hesybon dan Eleale meraung-raung; orang memperdengarkan suaranya sampai ke Yahas, dari Zoar sampai Horonaim dan Eglat-Selisia; sebab air sungai Nimrim juga menjadi ketandusan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ephraim also is like a silly dove without heart: they call to Egypt, they go to Assyria.
target: Efraim telah menjadi merpati tolol, tidak berakal, dengan memanggil kepada Mesir, dengan pergi kepada Asyur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the serpent cast out of his mouth water as a flood after the woman, that he might cause her to be carried away of the flood.
