en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover they that were nigh them, even unto Issachar and Zebulun and Naphtali, brought bread on asses, and on camels, and on mules, and on oxen, and meat, meal, cakes of figs, and bunches of raisins, and wine, and oil, and oxen, and sheep abundantly: for there was joy in Israel.
target: Juga orang-orang yang tinggal dekat mereka, bahkan dari Isakhar, Zebulon dan Naftali, membawa makanan dengan memakai keledai, unta, bagal dan lembu, yakni bahan makanan tepung, kue ara dan kue kismis, anggur dan minyak, lembu sapi dan kambing domba, dalam jumlah besar, sebab ada sukacita di Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In vain have I smitten your children; they received no correction: your own sword hath devoured your prophets, like a destroying lion.
target: Sia-sia Aku telah memukuli anak-anakmu, hajaran tidaklah mereka terima; pedangmu sendiri telah memakan habis para nabimu seperti singa muda yang memusnahkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let us therefore follow after the things which make for peace, and things wherewith one may edify another.
target: Sebab itu marilah kita mengejar apa yang mendatangkan damai sejahtera dan yang berguna untuk saling membangun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt, he sent out our fathers first.
target: Tetapi ketika Yakub mendengar, bahwa di tanah Mesir ada gandum, ia menyuruh nenek moyang kita ke sana. Itulah kunjungan mereka yang pertama;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Marvellous things did he in the sight of their fathers, in the land of Egypt, in the field of Zoan.
target: Di hadapan nenek moyang mereka dilakukan-Nya keajaiban-keajaiban, di tanah Mesir, di padang Zoan;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In those days they shall say no more, The fathers have eaten a sour grape, and the children's teeth are set on edge.
target: Pada waktu itu orang tidak akan berkata lagi: Ayah-ayah makan buah mentah, dan gigi anak-anaknya menjadi ngilu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For he is our God; and we are the people of his pasture, and the sheep of his hand. To day if ye will hear his voice,
target: Sebab Dialah Allah kita, dan kitalah umat gembalaan-Nya dan kawanan domba tuntunan tangan-Nya. Pada hari ini, sekiranya kamu mendengar suara-Nya!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And now send men to Joppa, and call for one Simon, whose surname is Peter:
target: Dan sekarang, suruhlah beberapa orang ke Yope untuk menjemput seorang yang bernama Simon dan yang disebut Petrus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Blessed above women shall Jael the wife of Heber the Kenite be, blessed shall she be above women in the tent.
target: Diberkatilah Yael, isteri Heber, orang Keni itu, melebihi perempuan-perempuan lain, diberkatilah ia, melebihi perempuan-perempuan yang di dalam kemah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joseph bought all the land of Egypt for Pharaoh; for the Egyptians sold every man his field, because the famine prevailed over them: so the land became Pharaoh's.
target: Lalu Yusuf membeli segala tanah orang Mesir untuk Firaun, sebab orang Mesir itu masing-masing menjual ladangnya, karena berat kelaparan itu menimpa mereka. Demikianlah negeri itu menjadi milik Firaun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Every beast, every creeping thing, and every fowl, and whatsoever creepeth upon the earth, after their kinds, went forth out of the ark.
target: Segala binatang liar, segala binatang melata dan segala burung, semuanya yang bergerak di bumi, masing-masing menurut jenisnya, keluarlah juga dari bahtera itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The carpenter stretcheth out his rule; he marketh it out with a line; he fitteth it with planes, and he marketh it out with the compass, and maketh it after the figure of a man, according to the beauty of a man; that it may remain in the house.
target: Tukang kayu merentangkan tali pengukur dan membuat bagan sebuah patung dengan kapur merah; ia mengerjakannya dengan pahat dan menggarisinya dengan jangka, lalu ia memberi bentuk seorang laki-laki kepadanya, seperti seorang manusia yang tampan, dan selanjutnya ditempatkan dalam kuil.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For we commend not ourselves again unto you, but give you occasion to glory on our behalf, that ye may have somewhat to answer them which glory in appearance, and not in heart.
target: Dengan ini kami tidak berusaha memuji-muji diri kami sekali lagi kepada kamu, tetapi kami mau memberi kesempatan kepada kamu untuk memegahkan kami, supaya kamu dapat menghadapi orang-orang yang bermegah karena hal-hal lahiriah dan bukan batiniah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Jesus said unto them, They need not depart; give ye them to eat.
target: Tetapi Yesus berkata kepada mereka: "Tidak perlu mereka pergi, kamu harus memberi mereka makan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sons also of Mushi; Mahli, and Eder, and Jerimoth. These were the sons of the Levites after the house of their fathers.
target: Anak-anak Musi ialah Mahli, Eder dan Yerimot. Itulah bani Lewi menurut puak mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There shall no evil happen to the just: but the wicked shall be filled with mischief.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And again he denied with an oath, I do not know the man.
target: Dan ia menyangkalnya pula dengan bersumpah: "Aku tidak kenal orang itu."

input: And Moses spake unto the heads of the tribes concerning the children of Israel, saying, This is the thing which the LORD hath commanded.

input: And when I saw him, I fell at his feet as dead. And he laid his right hand upon me, saying unto me, Fear not; I am the first and the last:
target: Ketika aku melihat Dia, tersungkurlah aku di depan kaki-Nya sama seperti orang yang mati; tetapi Ia meletakkan tangan kanan-Nya di atasku, lalu berkata: "Jangan takut! Aku adalah Yang Awal dan Yang Akhir,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Gaius mine host, and of the whole church, saluteth you. Erastus the chamberlain of the city saluteth you, and Quartus a brother.
target: Salam kepada kamu dari Gayus, yang memberi tumpangan kepadaku, dan kepada seluruh jemaat. Salam kepada kamu dari Erastus, bendahara negeri, dan dari Kwartus, saudara kita. [

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And, behold, as Barak pursued Sisera, Jael came out to meet him, and said unto him, Come, and I will shew thee the man whom thou seekest. And when he came into her tent, behold, Sisera lay dead, and the nail was in his temples.
target: Pada waktu itu muncullah Barak yang mengejar Sisera. Keluarlah Yael mendapatkan dia dan berkata kepadanya: "Mari, aku akan menunjukkan kepadamu orang yang kaucari itu." Lalu masuklah Barak ke dalam dan tampaklah Sisera mati tergeletak dengan patok dalam pelipisnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD; Behold, waters rise up out of the north, and shall be an overflowing flood, and shall overflow the land, and all that is therein; the city, and them that dwell therein: then the men shall cry, and all the inhabitants of the land shall howl.
target: "Beginilah firman TUHAN: Lihat, air yang meluas mengamuk dari utara menjadi sungai yang membanjir, membanjiri negeri serta isinya, kota serta penduduknya. Manusia akan berteriak, dan seluruh penduduk negeri akan meratap,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he removed from thence, and digged another well; and for that they strove not: and he called the name of it Rehoboth; and he said, For now the LORD hath made room for us, and we shall be fruitful in the land.
target: Ia pindah dari situ dan menggali sumur yang lain lagi, tetapi tentang sumur ini mereka tidak bertengkar. Sumur ini dinamainya Rehobot, dan ia berkata: "Sekarang TUHAN telah memberikan kelonggaran kepada kita, sehingga kita dapat beranak cucu di negeri ini."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the posts thereof were toward the utter court; and palm trees were upon the posts thereof, on this side, and on that side: and the going up to it had eight steps.
target: Balai gerbangnya adalah sebelah pelataran luar, dan pada tiang-tiang temboknya terukir gambar pohon-pohon korma, sebelah sini dan sebelah sana, dan tangganya ke atas ada delapan tingkat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They also that dwell in the uttermost parts are afraid at thy tokens: thou makest the outgoings of the morning and evening to rejoice.
target: Engkau, yang meredakan deru lautan, deru gelombang-gelombangnya dan kegemparan bangsa-bangsa!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That which groweth of its own accord of thy harvest thou shalt not reap, neither gather the grapes of thy vine undressed: for it is a year of rest unto the land.
target: Dan apa yang tumbuh sendiri dari penuaianmu itu, janganlah kautuai dan buah anggur dari pokok anggurmu yang tidak dirantingi, janganlah kaupetik. Tahun itu harus menjadi tahun perhentian penuh bagi tanah itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Likewise also the good works of some are manifest beforehand; and they that are otherwise cannot be hid.
target: Demikian pun perbuatan baik itu segera nyata dan kalau tidak demikian, ia tidak dapat terus tinggal tersembunyi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore if the uncircumcision keep the righteousness of the law, shall not his uncircumcision be counted for circumcision?
target: Jadi jika orang yang tak bersunat memperhatikan tuntutan-tuntutan hukum Taurat, tidakkah ia dianggap sama dengan orang yang telah disunat?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And we said unto him, We are true men; we are no spies:
target: Tetapi kata kami kepadanya: Kami orang jujur, kami bukan pengintai.

input: And Isaac said unto Jacob, Come near, I pray thee, that I may feel thee, my son, whether thou be my very son Esau or not.
target: Lalu kata Ishak kepada Yakub: "Datanglah mendekat, anakku, supaya aku meraba engkau, apakah engkau ini anakku Esau atau bukan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The rest of all the acts of Asa, and all his might, and all that he did, and the cities which he built, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Judah? Nevertheless in the time of his old age he was diseased in his feet.
target: Selebihnya dari seluruh riwayat Asa dan segala kepahlawanannya dan segala yang dilakukannya dan kota-kota yang diperkuatnya, bukankah semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Yehuda? Tetapi pada masa tuanya ia menderita sakit pada kedua kakinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore thou shalt devour men no more, neither bereave thy nations any more, saith the Lord GOD.
target: oleh karena itu engkau tidak akan makan orang lagi dan tidak akan memunahkan bangsamu lagi, demikianlah firman Tuhan ALLAH.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now concerning Moses the man of God, his sons were named of the tribe of Levi.
target: Anak-anak Musa, abdi Allah itu, digolongkan kepada suku Lewi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Salt is good: but if the salt have lost his savour, wherewith shall it be seasoned?
target: Garam memang baik, tetapi jika garam juga menjadi tawar, dengan apakah ia diasinkan?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he heard the words of Laban's sons, saying, Jacob hath taken away all that was our father's; and of that which was our father's hath he gotten all this glory.
target: Kedengaranlah kepada Yakub anak-anak Laban berkata demikian: "Yakub telah mengambil segala harta milik ayah kita dan dari harta itulah ia membangun segala kekayaannya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Though I speak with the tongues of men and of angels, and have not charity, I am become as sounding brass, or a tinkling cymbal.
target: Sekalipun aku dapat berkata-kata dengan semua bahasa manusia dan bahasa malaikat, tetapi jika aku tidak mempunyai kasih, aku sama dengan gong yang berkumandang dan canang yang gemerincing.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there were narrow windows and palm trees on the one side and on the other side, on the sides of the porch, and upon the side chambers of the house, and thick planks.
target: Pada kedua dinding samping dari balai itu ada jendela-jendela yang berbidai dan ukiran pohon-pohon korma.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who, when they had examined me, would have let me go, because there was no cause of death in me.
target: Setelah aku diperiksa, mereka bermaksud melepaskan aku, karena tidak terdapat suatu kesalahan pun padaku yang setimpal dengan hukuman mati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Shema begat Raham, the father of Jorkoam: and Rekem begat Shammai.
target: Sema memperanakkan Raham, bapa Yorkeam, dan Rekem memperanakkan Samai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David was afraid of God that day, saying, How shall I bring the ark of God home to me?
target: Pada waktu itu Daud menjadi takut kepada Allah, lalu katanya: "Bagaimanakah aku dapat membawa tabut Allah itu ke tempatku?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now in the eighteenth year of king Jeroboam the son of Nebat reigned Abijam over Judah.
target: Dalam tahun kedelapan belas zaman raja Yerobeam bin Nebat menjadi rajalah Abiam atas Yehuda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For, behold, I will shake mine hand upon them, and they shall be a spoil to their servants: and ye shall know that the LORD of hosts hath sent me.
target: "Sesungguhnya Aku akan menggerakkan tangan-Ku terhadap mereka, dan mereka akan menjadi jarahan bagi orang-orang yang tadinya takluk kepada mereka. Maka kamu akan mengetahui bahwa TUHAN semesta alam yang mengutus aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will rejoice in Jerusalem, and joy in my people: and the voice of weeping shall be no more heard in her, nor the voice of crying.

Sementara itu engkau hendaknya menyediakan makanan bagi seisi istanaku seberapa yang kukehendaki."

target: Sesungguhnya, dalam hal itu engkau tidak benar, demikian sanggahanku kepadamu, karena Allah itu lebih dari pada manusia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And fire is gone out of a rod of her branches, which hath devoured her fruit, so that she hath no strong rod to be a sceptre to rule. This is a lamentation, and shall be for a lamentation.
target: Maka keluarlah api dari cabangnya yang memakan habis ranting dan buahnya, sehingga tiada lagi padanya cabang yang kuat dan tiada tongkat kerajaan." Ini adalah ratapan dan sudah menjadi ratapan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The pure candlestick, with the lamps thereof, even with the lamps to be set in order, and all the vessels thereof, and the oil for light,
target: kandil dari emas murni, lampu-lampunya — lampu yang harus teratur di atasnya — dan segala perkakasnya, minyak untuk penerangan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: We are all one man's sons; we are true men, thy servants are no spies.
target: Kami ini sekalian anak dari satu ayah; kami ini orang jujur; hamba-hambamu ini bukanlah pengintai."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He riseth from supper, and laid aside his garments; and took a towel, and girded himself.
target: Lalu bangunlah Yesus dan menanggalkan jubah-Nya. Ia mengambil sehelai kain lenan dan mengikatkannya pada pinggang-Nya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For even that which was made glorious had no glory in this respect, by reason of the glory that excelleth.
target: Sebenarnya apa yang dahulu dianggap mulia, jika dibandingkan dengan kemuliaan yang mengatasi segala sesuatu ini, sama sekali tidak mempunyai arti.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Persecuted, but not forsaken; cast down, but not destroyed;
target: kami dianiaya, namun tidak ditinggalkan sendirian, kami dihempaskan, namun tidak binasa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it was so on the morrow, that Saul put the people in three companies; and they came into the midst of the host in the morning watch, and slew the Ammonites until the heat of the day: and it came to pass, that they which remained were scattered, so that two of them were not left together.
target: Keesokan harinya Saul membagi rakyat itu menjadi tiga pasukan. Mereka itu masuk ke tengah-tengah perkemahan musuh pada waktu kawal pagi dan memukul kalah orang-orang Amon sebelum hari panas; dan terserak-seraklah orang-orang yang lolos itu, sehingga di antara mereka tidak ada tinggal dua orang bersama-sama.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then will I teach transgressors thy ways; and sinners shall be converted unto thee.
target: Janganlah membuang aku dari hadapan-Mu, dan janganlah mengambil roh-Mu yang kudus dari padaku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Son of man, they that inhabit those wastes of the land of Israel speak, saying, Abraham was one, and he inherited the land: but we are many; the land is given us for inheritance.
target: "Hai anak manusia, orang-orang yang tinggal pada reruntuhan-reruntuhan ini, yaitu yang di tanah Israel, berkata begini: Abraham adalah seorang diri, tatkala ia mendapat tanah ini menjadi miliknya, tetapi kita banyak, tentu tanah ini diberikan kepada kita menjadi milik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let us not be desirous of vain glory, provoking one another, envying one another.
target: dan janganlah kita gila hormat, janganlah kita saling menantang dan saling mendengki.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore, behold, I send unto you prophets, and wise men, and scribes: and some of them ye shall kill and crucify; and some of them shall ye scourge in your synagogues, and persecute them from city to city:
target: Sebab itu, lihatlah, Aku mengutus kepadamu nabi-nabi, orang-orang bijaksana dan ahli-ahli Taurat: separuh di antara mereka akan kamu bunuh dan kamu salibkan, yang lain akan kamu sesah di rumah-rumah ibadatmu dan kamu aniaya dari kota ke kota,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For behold this selfsame thing, that ye sorrowed after a godly sort, what carefulness it wrought in you, yea, what clearing of yourselves, yea, what indignation, yea, what fear, yea, what vehement desire, yea, what zeal, yea, what revenge! In all things ye have approved yourselves to be clear in this matter.
target: Sebab perhatikanlah betapa justru dukacita yang menurut kehendak Allah itu mengerjakan pada kamu kesungguhan yang besar, bahkan pembelaan diri, kejengkelan, ketakutan, kerinduan, kegiatan, penghukuman! Di dalam semuanya itu kamu telah membuktikan, bahwa kamu tidak bersalah di dalam perkara itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he will take the tenth of your seed, and of your vineyards, and give to his officers, and to his servants.
target: dari gandummu dan hasil kebun anggurmu akan diambilnya sepersepuluh dan akan diberikannya kepada pegawai-pegawai istananya dan kepada pegawai-pegawainya yang lain.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither shall men tear themselves for them in mourning, to comfort them for the dead; neither shall men give them the cup of consolation to drink for their father or for their mother.
target: Tidak ada orang yang akan memecah-mecahkan roti bagi orang yang berkabung untuk menghiburkan dia karena kematian itu. Bahkan tidak ada orang yang akan memberi dia minum dari piala penghiburan oleh karena kematian ayah atau ibunya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For there is verily a disannulling of the commandment going before for the weakness and unprofitableness thereof.
target: Memang suatu hukum yang dikeluarkan dahulu dibatalkan, kalau hukum itu tidak mempunyai kekuatan dan karena itu tidak berguna,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But now the LORD hath spoken, saying, Within three years, as the years of an hireling, and the glory of Moab shall be contemned, with all that great multitude; and the remnant shall be very small and feeble.
target: Maka sekarang TUHAN berfirman: "Dalam tiga tahun, menurut masa kerja prajurit upahan, maka kemuliaan Moab, serta dengan keramaiannya yang besar, akan menjadi kehinaan, dan orang yang tertinggal akan sangat sedikit dan tiada berkuasa."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: With trumpets and sound of cornet make a joyful noise before the LORD, the King.
target: dengan nafiri dan sangkakala yang nyaring bersorak-soraklah di hadapan Raja, yakni TUHAN!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Even those that were numbered of them, throughout their families, by the house of their fathers, were two thousand and six hundred and thirty.
target: jadi mereka yang dicatat menurut kaum-kaum yang ada dalam puak mereka, berjumlah dua ribu enam ratus tiga puluh orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when this cometh to pass, (lo, it will come,) then shall they know that a prophet hath been among them.
target: Kalau hal itu datang — dan sungguh akan datang! — mereka akan mengetahui bahwa seorang nabi ada di tengah-tengah mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But when Moses went in before the LORD to speak with him, he took the vail off, until he came out. And he came out, and spake unto the children of Israel that which he was commanded.
target: Tetapi apabila Musa masuk menghadap TUHAN untuk berbicara dengan Dia, ditanggalkannyalah selubung itu sampai ia keluar; dan apabila ia keluar dikatakannyalah kepada orang Israel apa yang diperintahkan kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he did that which was right in the sight of the LORD, according to all that David his father did.
target: Ia melakukan apa yang benar di mata TUHAN, tepat seperti yang dilakukan Daud, bapa leluhurnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now unto the King eternal, immortal, invisible, the only wise God, be honour and glory for ever and ever. Amen.
target: Hormat dan kemuliaan sampai selama-lamanya bagi Raja segala zaman, Allah yang kekal, yang tak nampak, yang esa! Amin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will prepare destroyers against thee, every one with his weapons: and they shall cut down thy choice cedars, and cast them into the fire.
target: Aku akan menetapkan pemusnah-pemusnah terhadap engkau, masing-masing dengan senjatanya; mereka akan menebang pohon aras pilihanmu dan mencampakkannya ke dalam api.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David behaved himself wisely in all his ways; and the LORD was with him.
target: Daud berhasil di segala perjalanannya, sebab TUHAN menyertai dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now as soon as it was day, there was no small stir among the soldiers, what was become of Peter.
target: Pada keesokan harinya gemparlah prajurit-prajurit itu. Mereka bertanya-tanya apakah yang telah terjadi dengan Petrus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And now, I pray you, beseech God that he will be gracious unto us: this hath been by your means: will he regard your persons? saith the LORD of hosts.
target: Maka sekarang: "Cobalah melunakkan hati Allah, supaya Ia mengasihani kita!" Oleh tangan kamulah terjadi hal itu, masakan Ia akan menyambut salah seorang dari padamu dengan baik? firman TUHAN semesta alam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of Issachar; Nethaneel the son of Zuar.
target: dari suku Isakhar: Netaneel bin Zuar;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they that dwell in the cities of Israel shall go forth, and shall set on fire and burn the weapons, both the shields and the bucklers, the bows and the arrows, and the handstaves, and the spears, and they shall burn them with fire seven years:
target: Dan yang diam di kota-kota Israel akan keluar dan menyalakan api serta membakar semua perlengkapan senjata Gog, yaitu perisai kecil dan besar, busur dan panah, tongkat pemukul dan tombak, dan mereka membakarnya selama tujuh tahun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I brake the jaws of the wicked, and plucked the spoil out of his teeth.
target: Geraham orang curang kuremuk, dan merebut mangsanya dari giginya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The righteous shall be glad in the LORD, and shall trust in him; and all the upright in heart shall glory.
target: Maka semua orang takut dan memberitakan perbuatan Allah, dan mengakui pekerjaan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And again he went away, and prayed, and spake the same words.
target: Lalu Ia pergi lagi dan mengucapkan doa yang itu juga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Every tree that bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down, and cast into the fire.
target: Dan setiap pohon yang tidak menghasilkan buah yang baik, pasti ditebang dan dibuang ke dalam api.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To take a spoil, and to take a prey; to turn thine hand upon the desolate places that are now inhabited, and upon the people that are gathered out of the nations, which have gotten cattle and goods, that dwell in the midst of the land.
target: Engkau bermaksud untuk merampas dan menjarah dan mengacungkan tanganmu terhadap reruntuhan-reruntuhan yang sudah didiami kembali dan menyerang umat-Ku yang dikumpulkan dari tengah bangsa-bangsa. Mereka sudah mempunyai ternak dan harta benda dan mereka diam di pusat bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When Saul and all Israel heard those words of the Philistine, they were dismayed, and greatly afraid.
target: Ketika Saul dan segenap orang Israel mendengar perkataan orang Filistin itu, maka cemaslah hati mereka dan sangat ketakutan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And so Pilate, willing to content the people, released Barabbas unto them, and delivered Jesus, when he had scourged him, to be crucified.
target: Dan oleh karena Pilatus ingin memuaskan hati orang banyak itu, ia membebaskan Barabas bagi mereka. Tetapi Yesus disesahnya lalu diserahkannya untuk disalibkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall kill the lamb of the trespass offering, and the priest shall take some of the blood of the trespass offering, and put it upon the tip of the right ear of him that is to be cleansed, and upon the thumb of his right hand, and upon the great toe of his right foot:
target: Ia harus menyembelih domba tebusan salah dan imam harus mengambil sedikit dari darah tebusan salah itu dan membubuhnya pada cuping telinga kanan orang itu dan pada ibu jari tangan kanan dan ibu jari kaki kanannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God: and the dead in Christ shall rise first:
target: Sebab pada waktu tanda diberi, yaitu pada waktu penghulu malaikat berseru dan sangkakala Allah berbunyi, maka Tuhan sendiri akan turun dari sorga dan mereka yang mati dalam Kristus akan lebih dahulu bangkit;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the men of Shechem gathered together, and all the house of Millo, and went, and made Abimelech king, by the plain of the pillar that was in Shechem.
target: Kemudian berkumpullah seluruh warga kota Sikhem dan seluruh Bet-Milo; mereka pergi menobatkan Abimelekh menjadi raja dekat pohon tarbantin di tugu peringatan yang di Sikhem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And having an high priest over the house of God;
target: dan kita mempunyai seorang Imam Besar sebagai kepala Rumah Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said all the trees unto the bramble, Come thou, and reign over us.
target: Lalu kata segala pohon itu kepada semak duri: Marilah, jadilah raja atas kami!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will also cause all her mirth to cease, her feast days, her new moons, and her sabbaths, and all her solemn feasts.
target: Aku akan memusnahkan pohon anggurnya dan pohon aranya, yang tentangnya dikatakannya: Ini semuanya pemberian kepadaku, yang dihadiahkan kepadaku oleh para kekasihku! Aku akan membuatnya menjadi hutan, dan binatang-binatang di padang akan memakannya habis.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Lotan were Hori and Hemam; and Lotan's sister was Timna.
target: Anak-anak Lotan ialah Hori dan Heman, dan saudara perempuan Lotan ialah Timna.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But as touching the resurrection of the dead, have ye not read that which was spoken unto you by God, saying,
target: Tetapi tentang kebangkitan orang-orang mati tidakkah kamu baca apa yang difirmankan Allah, ketika Ia bersabda:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The Babylonians, and all the Chaldeans, Pekod, and Shoa, and Koa, and all the Assyrians with them: all of them desirable young men, captains and rulers, great lords and renowned, all of them riding upon horses.
target: orang Babel dan semua orang Kasdim, orang Pekod, orang Soa dan orang Koa, dan semua orang Asyur bersama mereka, pemuda yang ganteng, bupati-bupati dan para penguasa semuanya, perwira-perwira dan pahlawan-pahlawan perang, pasukan kuda semuanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Trust not in oppression, and become not vain in robbery: if riches increase, set not your heart upon them.
target: Hanya angin saja orang-orang yang hina, suatu dusta saja orang-orang yang mulia. Pada neraca mereka naik ke atas, mereka sekalian lebih ringan dari pada angin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.
target: Sekalipun aku berjalan dalam lembah kekelaman, aku tidak takut bahaya, sebab Engkau besertaku; gada-Mu dan tongkat-Mu, itulah yang menghibur aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the Syrians fled before Israel; and David slew the men of seven hundred chariots of the Syrians, and forty thousand horsemen, and smote Shobach the captain of their host, who died there.
target: tetapi orang Aram itu lari dari hadapan orang Israel, dan Daud membunuh dari orang Aram itu tujuh ratus ekor kuda kereta dan empat puluh ribu orang pasukan berkuda. Sobakh, panglima tentara mereka, dilukainya sedemikian, hingga ia mati di sana.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because all those men which have seen my glory, and my miracles, which I did in Egypt and in the wilderness, and have tempted me now these ten times, and have not hearkened to my voice;
target: Semua orang yang telah melihat kemuliaan-Ku dan tanda-tanda mujizat yang Kuperbuat di Mesir dan di padang gurun, namun telah sepuluh kali mencobai Aku dan tidak mau mendengarkan suara-Ku,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Come, and let us return unto the LORD: for he hath torn, and he will heal us; he hath smitten, and he will bind us up.
target: "Mari, kita akan berbalik kepada TUHAN, sebab Dialah yang telah menerkam dan yang akan menyembuhkan kita, yang telah memukul dan yang akan membalut kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The thing that hath been, it is that which shall be; and that which is done is that which shall be done: and there is no new thing under the sun.
target: Apa yang pernah ada akan ada lagi, dan apa yang pernah dibuat akan dibuat lagi; tak ada sesuatu yang baru di bawah matahari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For it increaseth. Thou huntest me as a fierce lion: and again thou shewest thyself marvellous upon me.
target: Kalau aku mengangkat kepalaku, maka seperti singa Engkau akan memburu aku, dan menunjukkan kembali kuasa-Mu yang ajaib kepadaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan, and great affliction: and our fathers found no sustenance.
target: Maka datanglah bahaya kelaparan menimpa seluruh tanah Mesir dan tanah Kanaan serta penderitaan yang besar, sehingga nenek moyang kita tidak mendapat makanan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When John had first preached before his coming the baptism of repentance to all the people of Israel.
target: Menjelang kedatangan-Nya Yohanes telah menyerukan kepada seluruh bangsa Israel supaya mereka bertobat dan memberi diri dibaptis.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And yet for all that, when they be in the land of their enemies, I will not cast them away, neither will I abhor them, to destroy them utterly, and to break my covenant with them: for I am the LORD their God.
target: Namun demikian, apabila mereka ada di negeri musuh mereka, Aku tidak akan menolak mereka dan tidak akan muak melihat mereka, sehingga Aku membinasakan mereka dan membatalkan perjanjian-Ku dengan mereka, sebab Akulah TUHAN, Allah mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When they therefore were come together, they asked of him, saying, Lord, wilt thou at this time restore again the kingdom to Israel?
target: Maka bertanyalah mereka yang berkumpul di situ: "Tuhan, maukah Engkau pada masa ini memulihkan kerajaan bagi Israel?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Blessed be the LORD God, the God of Israel, who only doeth wondrous things.
target: Terpujilah TUHAN, Allah Israel, yang melakukan perbuatan yang ajaib seorang diri!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will tread down the people in mine anger, and make them drunk in my fury, and I will bring down their strength to the earth.
target: Aku memijak-mijak bangsa-bangsa dalam murka-Ku, menghancurkan mereka dalam kehangatan amarah-Ku dan membuat semburan darah mereka mengalir ke tanah."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if I also ask you, ye will not answer me, nor let me go.
target: dan sekalipun Aku bertanya sesuatu kepada kamu, namun kamu tidak akan menjawab.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye shall chase your enemies, and they shall fall before you by the sword.
target: Kamu akan mengejar musuhmu, dan mereka akan tewas di hadapanmu oleh pedang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou hast not brought me the small cattle of thy burnt offerings; neither hast thou honoured me with thy sacrifices. I have not caused thee to serve with an offering, nor wearied thee with incense.
target: Engkau tidak membawa domba korban bakaranmu bagi-Ku, dan tidak memuliakan Aku dengan korban sembelihanmu. Aku tidak memberati engkau dengan menuntut korban sajian atau menyusahi engkau dengan menuntut kemenyan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But God led the people about, through the way of the wilderness of the Red sea: and the children of Israel went up harnessed out of the land of Egypt.
target: Tetapi Allah menuntun bangsa itu berputar melalui jalan di padang gurun menuju ke Laut Teberau. Dengan siap sedia berperang berjalanlah orang Israel dari tanah Mesir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As silver is melted in the midst of the furnace, so shall ye be melted in the midst thereof; and ye shall know that I the LORD have poured out my fury upon you.
target: Seperti perak dilebur dalam peleburan, begitulah kamu dilebur di dalamnya. Dan kamu akan mengetahui, bahwa Aku, TUHAN, yang mencurahkan amarah-Ku atasmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: His watchmen are blind: they are all ignorant, they are all dumb dogs, they cannot bark; sleeping, lying down, loving to slumber.
target: Sebab pengawal-pengawal umat-Ku adalah orang-orang buta, mereka semua tidak tahu apa-apa; mereka semua adalah anjing-anjing bisu, tidak tahu menyalak; mereka berbaring melamun dan suka tidur saja;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he went from thence to mount Carmel, and from thence he returned to Samaria.
target: Dari sana pergilah ia ke gunung Karmel dan dari sana pula kembalilah ia ke Samaria.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they made bells of pure gold, and put the bells between the pomegranates upon the hem of the robe, round about between the pomegranates;
target: Dibuat merekalah giring-giring dari emas murni dan ditaruhlah giring-giring itu di antara buah delima, pada ujung gamis itu, berselang-seling di antara buah delima itu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Elkanah; Amasai, and Ahimoth.
target: Anak-anak Elkana ialah Amasai dan Ahimot,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither must the children of Israel henceforth come nigh the tabernacle of the congregation, lest they bear sin, and die.
target: Maka janganlah lagi orang Israel mendekat kepada Kemah Pertemuan, sehingga mereka mendatangkan dosa kepada dirinya, lalu mati;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let a little water, I pray you, be fetched, and wash your feet, and rest yourselves under the tree:
target: Biarlah diambil air sedikit, basuhlah kakimu dan duduklah beristirahat di bawah pohon ini;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then they hasted, and took every man his garment, and put it under him on the top of the stairs, and blew with trumpets, saying, Jehu is king.
target: Segeralah mereka masing-masing mengambil pakaiannya dan membentangkannya di hadapan kakinya begitu saja di atas tangga, kemudian mereka meniup sangkakala serta berseru: "Yehu raja!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the Father himself loveth you, because ye have loved me, and have believed that I came out from God.
target: sebab Bapa sendiri mengasihi kamu, karena kamu telah mengasihi Aku dan percaya, bahwa Aku datang dari Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If then God so clothe the grass, which is to day in the field, and to morrow is cast into the oven; how much more will he clothe you, O ye of little faith?
target: Jadi, jika rumput di ladang, yang hari ini ada dan besok dibuang ke dalam api demikian didandani Allah, terlebih lagi kamu, hai orang yang kurang percaya!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour;
target: supaya kamu masing-masing mengambil seorang perempuan menjadi isterimu sendiri dan hidup di dalam pengudusan dan penghormatan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And these shall go away into everlasting punishment: but the righteous into life eternal.
target: Dan mereka ini akan masuk ke tempat siksaan yang kekal, tetapi orang benar ke dalam hidup yang kekal."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: While we look not at the things which are seen, but at the things which are not seen: for the things which are seen are temporal; but the things which are not seen are eternal.
target: Sebab kami tidak memperhatikan yang kelihatan, melainkan yang tak kelihatan, karena yang kelihatan adalah sementara, sedangkan yang tak kelihatan adalah kekal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I saw, when for all the causes whereby backsliding Israel committed adultery I had put her away, and given her a bill of divorce; yet her treacherous sister Judah feared not, but went and played the harlot also.
target: Dilihatnya, bahwa oleh karena zinahnya Aku telah menceraikan Israel, perempuan murtad itu, dan memberikan kepadanya surat cerai; namun Yehuda, saudaranya perempuan yang tidak setia itu tidak takut, melainkan ia juga pun pergi bersundal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he had called all the people unto him, he said unto them, Hearken unto me every one of you, and understand:
target: Lalu Yesus memanggil lagi orang banyak dan berkata kepada mereka: "Kamu semua, dengarlah kepada-Ku dan camkanlah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Zedekiah the son of Chenaanah made him horns of iron: and he said, Thus saith the LORD, With these shalt thou push the Syrians, until thou have consumed them.
target: maka Zedekia bin Kenaana membuat tanduk-tanduk besi, lalu berkata: "Beginilah firman TUHAN: Dengan ini engkau akan menanduk Aram sampai engkau menghabiskan mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Assemble yourselves, and come, all ye heathen, and gather yourselves together round about: thither cause thy mighty ones to come down, O LORD.
target: Bergeraklah dan datanglah, hai segala bangsa dari segenap penjuru, dan berkumpullah ke sana! Bawalah turun, ya TUHAN, pahlawan-pahlawan-Mu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And make ye marriages with us, and give your daughters unto us, and take our daughters unto you.
target: dan biarlah kita ambil-mengambil: berikanlah gadis-gadis kamu kepada kami dan ambillah gadis-gadis kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if ye bite and devour one another, take heed that ye be not consumed one of another.
target: Tetapi jikalau kamu saling menggigit dan saling menelan, awaslah, supaya jangan kamu saling membinasakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then cometh Jesus from Galilee to Jordan unto John, to be baptized of him.
target: Maka datanglah Yesus dari Galilea ke Yordan kepada Yohanes untuk dibaptis olehnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The heaven shall reveal his iniquity; and the earth shall rise up against him.
target: Langit menyingkapkan kesalahannya, dan bumi bangkit melawan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Lift up thine eyes round about, and behold: all these gather themselves together, and come to thee. As I live, saith the LORD, thou shalt surely clothe thee with them all, as with an ornament, and bind them on thee, as a bride doeth.
target: Angkatlah mukamu dan lihatlah ke sekeliling, mereka semua berhimpun datang kepadamu. Demi Aku yang hidup, demikianlah firman TUHAN, sungguh, mereka semua akan kaupakai sebagai perhiasan, dan mereka akan kaulilitkan, seperti yang dilakukan pengantin perempuan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David said unto him, From whence comest thou? And he said unto him, Out of the camp of Israel am I escaped.
target: Bertanyalah Daud kepadanya: "Dari manakah engkau?" Jawabnya kepadanya: "Aku lolos dari tentara Israel."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if any man be ignorant, let him be ignorant.
target: Tetapi jika ia tidak mengindahkannya, janganlah kamu mengindahkan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I am Alpha and Omega, the beginning and the end, the first and the last.
target: Aku adalah Alfa dan Omega, Yang Pertama dan Yang Terkemudian, Yang Awal dan Yang Akhir."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And, behold, Saul came after the herd out of the field; and Saul said, What aileth the people that they weep? And they told him the tidings of the men of Jabesh.
target: Saul baru saja datang dari padang dengan berjalan di belakang lembunya, dan ia bertanya: "Ada apa dengan orang-orang itu, sehingga mereka menangis?" Mereka menceritakan kepadanya kabar orang-orang Yabesh itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So the king of the north shall come, and cast up a mount, and take the most fenced cities: and the arms of the south shall not withstand, neither his chosen people, neither shall there be any strength to withstand.
target: Maka raja negeri Utara itu akan datang, mendirikan kubu pengepungan dan merebut kota yang berbenteng; dan tentara negeri Selatan tidak akan dapat bertahan, juga pasukan-pasukan pilihannya sekalipun, ya, tidak ada kekuatan apa pun yang dapat bertahan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Samuel turned again after Saul; and Saul worshipped the LORD.
target: Sesudah itu kembalilah Samuel mengikuti Saul. Dan Saul sujud menyembah kepada TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them, Have ye never read what David did, when he had need, and was an hungred, he, and they that were with him?
target: Jawab-Nya kepada mereka: "Belum pernahkah kamu baca apa yang dilakukan Daud, ketika ia dan mereka yang mengikutinya kekurangan dan kelaparan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town, but was in that place where Martha met him.
target: Tetapi waktu itu Yesus belum sampai ke dalam kampung itu. Ia masih berada di tempat Marta menjumpai Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When he was removed out of the highway, all the people went on after Joab, to pursue after Sheba the son of Bichri.
target: Setelah dijauhkannya mayat itu dari jalan raya, maka semua orang itu berjalan terus mengikuti Yoab untuk mengejar Seba bin Bikri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Before the mountains were settled, before the hills was I brought forth:
target: Sebelum gunung-gunung tertanam dan lebih dahulu dari pada bukit-bukit aku telah lahir;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That the house of Israel may go no more astray from me, neither be polluted any more with all their transgressions; but that they may be my people, and I may be their God, saith the Lord GOD.
target: supaya kaum Israel jangan lagi sesat dari pada-Ku dan jangan lagi menajiskan dirinya dengan segala pelanggaran mereka; dengan demikian mereka akan menjadi umat-Ku dan Aku akan menjadi Allah mereka, demikianlah firman Tuhan ALLAH."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Will I eat the flesh of bulls, or drink the blood of goats?
target: Daging lembu jantankah Aku makan, atau darah kambing jantankah Aku minum?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joshua smote them from Kadeshbarnea even unto Gaza, and all the country of Goshen, even unto Gibeon.
target: Yosua menewaskan mereka dari Kadesh-Barnea sampai Gaza, juga seluruh tanah Gosyen sampai Gibeon.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Whosoever shall fall upon that stone shall be broken; but on whomsoever it shall fall, it will grind him to powder.
target: Barangsiapa jatuh ke atas batu itu, ia akan hancur, dan barangsiapa ditimpa batu itu, ia akan remuk."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Not rendering evil for evil, or railing for railing: but contrariwise blessing; knowing that ye are thereunto called, that ye should inherit a blessing.
target: dan janganlah membalas kejahatan dengan kejahatan, atau caci maki dengan caci maki, tetapi sebaliknya, hendaklah kamu memberkati, karena untuk itulah kamu dipanggil, yaitu untuk memperoleh berkat. Sebab:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he conferred with Joab the son of Zeruiah, and with Abiathar the priest: and they following Adonijah helped him.
target: Maka berundinglah ia dengan Yoab, anak Zeruya dan dengan imam Abyatar dan mereka menjadi pengikut dan pembantu Adonia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when thou prayest, thou shalt not be as the hypocrites are: for they love to pray standing in the synagogues and in the corners of the streets, that they may be seen of men. Verily I say unto you, They have their reward.
target: "Dan apabila kamu berdoa, janganlah berdoa seperti orang munafik. Mereka suka mengucapkan doanya dengan berdiri dalam rumah-rumah ibadat dan pada tikungan-tikungan jalan raya, supaya mereka dilihat orang. Aku berkata kepadamu: Sesungguhnya mereka sudah mendapat upahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Rejoice, O ye nations, with his people: for he will avenge the blood of his servants, and will render vengeance to his adversaries, and will be merciful unto his land, and to his people.
target: Bersorak-sorailah, hai bangsa-bangsa karena umat-Nya, sebab Ia membalaskan darah hamba-hamba-Nya, Ia membalas dendam kepada lawan-Nya, dan mengadakan pendamaian bagi tanah umat-Nya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Isaac digged again the wells of water, which they had digged in the days of Abraham his father; for the Philistines had stopped them after the death of Abraham: and he called their names after the names by which his father had called them.
target: Kemudian Ishak menggali kembali sumur-sumur yang digali dalam zaman Abraham, ayahnya, dan yang telah ditutup oleh orang Filistin sesudah Abraham mati; disebutkannyalah nama sumur-sumur itu menurut nama-nama yang telah diberikan oleh ayahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And commanded Judah to seek the LORD God of their fathers, and to do the law and the commandment.
target: Ia memerintahkan orang Yehuda supaya mereka mencari TUHAN, Allah nenek moyang mereka, dan mematuhi hukum dan perintah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,
target: anak orang ini ialah Ahas; anak orang ini ialah Hizkia; anak orang ini ialah Manasye;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Make thee bald, and poll thee for thy delicate children; enlarge thy baldness as the eagle; for they are gone into captivity from thee.
target: Cukurlah dan gundulkanlah kepalamu, karena anak-anak kesayanganmu! Jadikanlah kepalamu gundul seperti gundulnya burung bangkai, sebab dari padamu mereka akan masuk pembuangan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Until the day in which he was taken up, after that he through the Holy Ghost had given commandments unto the apostles whom he had chosen:
target: sampai pada hari Ia terangkat. Sebelum itu Ia telah memberi perintah-Nya oleh Roh Kudus kepada rasul-rasul yang dipilih-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who have received the law by the disposition of angels, and have not kept it.
target: Kamu telah menerima hukum Taurat yang disampaikan oleh malaikat-malaikat, akan tetapi kamu tidak menurutinya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I am a man under authority, having soldiers under me: and I say to this man, Go, and he goeth; and to another, Come, and he cometh; and to my servant, Do this, and he doeth it.
target: Sebab aku sendiri seorang bawahan, dan di bawahku ada pula prajurit. Jika aku berkata kepada salah seorang prajurit itu: Pergi!, maka ia pergi, dan kepada seorang lagi: Datang!, maka ia datang, ataupun kepada hambaku: Kerjakanlah ini!, maka ia mengerjakannya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The roaring of the lion, and the voice of the fierce lion, and the teeth of the young lions, are broken.
target: Singa mengaum, singa meraung — patahlah gigi singa-singa muda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover he said unto me, Son of man, eat that thou findest; eat this roll, and go speak unto the house of Israel.
target: Firman-Nya kepadaku: "Hai anak manusia, makanlah apa yang engkau lihat di sini; makanlah gulungan kitab ini dan pergilah, berbicaralah kepada kaum Israel."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Joseph said unto the people, Behold, I have bought you this day and your land for Pharaoh: lo, here is seed for you, and ye shall sow the land.
target: Berkatalah Yusuf kepada rakyat itu: "Pada hari ini aku telah membeli kamu dan tanahmu untuk Firaun; inilah benih bagimu, supaya kamu dapat menabur di tanah itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore thou shalt have none that shall cast a cord by lot in the congregation of the LORD.
target: Sebab itu tidak akan ada bagimu orang yang melontarkan tali dengan undian di dalam jemaah TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he beat down the tower of Penuel, and slew the men of the city.
target: Juga menara Pnuel dirobohkannya dan dibunuhnya orang-orang kota itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The three and twentieth to Delaiah, the four and twentieth to Maaziah.
target: yang kedua puluh tiga pada Delaya; yang kedua puluh empat pada Maazya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Notwithstanding in this rejoice not, that the spirits are subject unto you; but rather rejoice, because your names are written in heaven.
target: Namun demikian janganlah bersukacita karena roh-roh itu takluk kepadamu, tetapi bersukacitalah karena namamu ada terdaftar di sorga."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he gave heed unto them, expecting to receive something of them.
target: Lalu orang itu menatap mereka dengan harapan akan mendapat sesuatu dari mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Job answered and said,
target: Lalu Ayub menjawab:

input: Withal praying also for us, that God would open unto us a door of utterance, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in bonds:
target: Berdoa jugalah untuk kami, supaya Allah membuka pintu untuk pemberitaan kami, sehingga kami dapat berbicara tentang rahasia Kristus, yang karenanya aku dipenjarakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.
target: Orang-orang yang menabur dengan mencucurkan air mata, akan menuai dengan bersorak-sorai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Those that were numbered of them, even of the tribe of Issachar, were fifty and four thousand and four hundred.
target: Jumlah yang dicatat dari suku Isakhar ada lima puluh empat ribu empat ratus orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For out of much affliction and anguish of heart I wrote unto you with many tears; not that ye should be grieved, but that ye might know the love which I have more abundantly unto you.
target: Aku menulis kepada kamu dengan hati yang sangat cemas dan sesak dan dengan mencucurkan banyak air mata, bukan supaya kamu bersedih hati, tetapi supaya kamu tahu betapa besarnya kasihku kepada kamu semua.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus answered and said, while he taught in the temple, How say the scribes that Christ is the son of David?
target: Pada suatu kali ketika Yesus mengajar di Bait Allah, Ia berkata: "Bagaimana ahli-ahli Taurat dapat mengatakan, bahwa Mesias adalah anak Daud?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if a kingdom be divided against itself, that kingdom cannot stand.
target: Kalau suatu kerajaan terpecah-pecah, kerajaan itu tidak dapat bertahan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Laban answered and said unto Jacob, These daughters are my daughters, and these children are my children, and these cattle are my cattle, and all that thou seest is mine: and what can I do this day unto these my daughters, or unto their children which they have born?
target: Lalu Laban menjawab Yakub: "Perempuan-perempuan ini anakku dan anak-anak lelaki ini cucuku dan ternak ini ternakku, bahkan segala yang kaulihat di sini adalah milikku; jadi apakah yang dapat kuperbuat sekarang kepada anak-anakku ini atau kepada anak-anak yang dilahirkan mereka?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said David, Ye shall not do so, my brethren, with that which the LORD hath given us, who hath preserved us, and delivered the company that came against us into our hand.
target: Tetapi Daud berkata: "Janganlah kamu, saudara-saudaraku, berbuat demikian, dengan apa yang diberikan TUHAN kepada kita; sebab Ia telah melindungi kita, dan menyerahkan ke dalam tangan kita gerombolan yang menyerang kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the nation and kingdom that will not serve thee shall perish; yea, those nations shall be utterly wasted.
target: Sungguh, bangsa dan kerajaan yang tidak mau mengabdi kepadamu akan lenyap; bangsa-bangsa itu akan dirusakbinasakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And sent Timotheus, our brother, and minister of God, and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ, to establish you, and to comfort you concerning your faith:
target: Lalu kami mengirim Timotius, saudara yang bekerja dengan kami untuk Allah dalam pemberitaan Injil Kristus, untuk menguatkan hatimu dan menasihatkan kamu tentang imanmu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The smith with the tongs both worketh in the coals, and fashioneth it with hammers, and worketh it with the strength of his arms: yea, he is hungry, and his strength faileth: he drinketh no water, and is faint.
target: Tukang besi membuatnya dalam bara api dan menempanya dengan palu, ia mengerjakannya dengan segala tenaga yang ada di tangannya. Bahkan ia menahan lapar sehingga habislah tenaganya, dan ia tidak minum air sehingga ia letih lesu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And these things write we unto you, that your joy may be full.
target: Dan semuanya ini kami tuliskan kepada kamu, supaya sukacita kami menjadi sempurna.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt observe the feast of weeks, of the firstfruits of wheat harvest, and the feast of ingathering at the year's end.
target: Hari raya Tujuh Minggu, yakni hari raya buah bungaran dari penuaian gandum, haruslah kaurayakan, juga hari raya pengumpulan hasil pada pergantian tahun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Peter went down to the men which were sent unto him from Cornelius; and said, Behold, I am he whom ye seek: what is the cause wherefore ye are come?
target: Lalu turunlah Petrus ke bawah dan berkata kepada orang-orang itu: "Akulah yang kamu cari; apakah maksud kedatangan kamu?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada answered the king, and said, Amen: the LORD God of my lord the king say so too.
target: Lalu Benaya bin Yoyada menjawab raja: "Amin! Demikianlah kiranya firman TUHAN, Allah tuanku raja!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when it was determined that we should sail into Italy, they delivered Paul and certain other prisoners unto one named Julius, a centurion of Augustus' band.
target: Setelah diputuskan, bahwa kami akan berlayar ke Italia, maka Paulus dan beberapa orang tahanan lain diserahkan kepada seorang perwira yang bernama Yulius dari pasukan Kaisar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he brought out the grove from the house of the LORD, without Jerusalem, unto the brook Kidron, and burned it at the brook Kidron, and stamped it small to powder, and cast the powder thereof upon the graves of the children of the people.
target: Dibawanyalah tiang-tiang berhala dari rumah TUHAN ke luar kota Yerusalem, ke sungai Kidron, lalu dibakarnya di situ dan ditumbuknya halus-halus menjadi abu, kemudian dicampakkannyalah abunya ke atas kuburan rakyat jelata.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the glory of the LORD departed from off the threshold of the house, and stood over the cherubims.
target: Lalu kemuliaan TUHAN pergi dari ambang pintu Bait Suci dan hinggap di atas kerub-kerub.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Rebuke not an elder, but intreat him as a father; and the younger men as brethren;
target: Janganlah engkau keras terhadap orang yang tua, melainkan tegorlah dia sebagai bapa. Tegorlah orang-orang muda sebagai saudaramu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore he hath poured upon him the fury of his anger, and the strength of battle: and it hath set him on fire round about, yet he knew not; and it burned him, yet he laid it not to heart.
target: Maka Ia telah menumpahkan kepadanya kepanasan amarah-Nya dan peperangan yang hebat, yang menghanguskan dia dari sekeliling, tetapi ia tidak menginsafinya, dan yang membakar dia, tetapi ia tidak memperhatikannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Haman told Zeresh his wife and all his friends every thing that had befallen him. Then said his wise men and Zeresh his wife unto him, If Mordecai be of the seed of the Jews, before whom thou hast begun to fall, thou shalt not prevail against him, but shalt surely fall before him.
target: Dan Haman menceritakan kepada Zeresh, isterinya, dan kepada semua sahabatnya apa yang dialaminya. Maka kata para orang arif bijaksana dan Zeresh, isterinya, kepadanya: "Jikalau Mordekhai, yang di depannya engkau sudah mulai jatuh, adalah keturunan Yahudi, maka engkau tidak akan sanggup melawan dia, malahan engkau akan jatuh benar-benar di depannya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which will not hearken to the voice of charmers, charming never so wisely.
target: Bisa mereka serupa bisa ular, mereka seperti ular tedung tuli yang menutup telinganya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Those that were numbered of them, even of the tribe of Simeon, were fifty and nine thousand and three hundred.
target: Jumlah yang dicatat dari suku Simeon ada lima puluh sembilan ribu tiga ratus orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ezra the priest stood up, and said unto them, Ye have transgressed, and have taken strange wives, to increase the trespass of Israel.
target: Maka bangkitlah imam Ezra, lalu berkata kepada mereka: "Kamu telah melakukan perbuatan tidak setia, karena kamu memperisteri perempuan asing dan dengan demikian menambah kesalahan orang Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans, and dwelt in Charran: and from thence, when his father was dead, he removed him into this land, wherein ye now dwell.
target: Maka keluarlah ia dari negeri orang Kasdim, lalu menetap di Haran. Dan setelah ayahnya meninggal, Allah menyuruh dia pindah dari situ ke tanah ini, tempat kamu diam sekarang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He gave of gold by weight for things of gold, for all instruments of all manner of service; silver also for all instruments of silver by weight, for all instruments of every kind of service:
target: Juga ia memberikan emas seberat yang diperlukan untuk segala perkakas pada tiap-tiap ibadah; dan diberikannya perak seberat yang diperlukan untuk segala perkakas perak pada tiap-tiap ibadah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So the wall was finished in the twenty and fifth day of the month Elul, in fifty and two days.
target: Maka selesailah tembok itu pada tanggal dua puluh lima bulan Elul, dalam waktu lima puluh dua hari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither will I cause men to hear in thee the shame of the heathen any more, neither shalt thou bear the reproach of the people any more, neither shalt thou cause thy nations to fall any more, saith the Lord GOD.
target: Aku tidak lagi membiarkan orang membicarakan noda yang ditimbulkan bangsa-bangsa terhadap engkau dan engkau tidak lagi menanggung pencelaan bangsa-bangsa dan tidak lagi memunahkan bangsamu, demikianlah firman Tuhan ALLAH."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let me pass through thy land: I will go along by the high way, I will neither turn unto the right hand nor to the left.
target: Izinkanlah aku berjalan melalui negerimu. Aku akan tetap berjalan mengikuti jalan raya, dengan tidak menyimpang ke kanan atau ke kiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Salute Asyncritus, Phlegon, Hermas, Patrobas, Hermes, and the brethren which are with them.
target: Salam kepada Asinkritus, Flegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas dan saudara-saudara yang bersama-sama dengan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That I may perform the oath which I have sworn unto your fathers, to give them a land flowing with milk and honey, as it is this day. Then answered I, and said, So be it, O LORD.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she put the skins of the kids of the goats upon his hands, and upon the smooth of his neck:
target: Dan kulit anak kambing itu dipalutkannya pada kedua tangan Yakub dan pada lehernya yang licin itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he would not be persuaded, we ceased, saying, The will of the Lord be done.
target: Karena ia tidak mau menerima nasihat kami, kami menyerah dan berkata: "Jadilah kehendak Tuhan!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness; and hold such in reputation:
target: Jadi sambutlah dia dalam Tuhan dengan segala sukacita dan hormatilah orang-orang seperti dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ahab the son of Omri did evil in the sight of the LORD above all that were before him.
target: Ahab bin Omri melakukan apa yang jahat di mata TUHAN lebih dari pada semua orang yang mendahuluinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, the money, which we found in our sacks' mouths, we brought again unto thee out of the land of Canaan: how then should we steal out of thy lord's house silver or gold?
target: Bukankah uang yang kami dapati di dalam mulut karung kami telah kami bawa kembali kepadamu dari tanah Kanaan? Masakan kami mencuri emas atau perak dari rumah tuanmu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now Eli was ninety and eight years old; and his eyes were dim, that he could not see.
target: Eli sudah sembilan puluh delapan tahun umurnya dan matanya sudah bular, sehingga ia tidak dapat melihat lagi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Saul and the people spared Agag, and the best of the sheep, and of the oxen, and of the fatlings, and the lambs, and all that was good, and would not utterly destroy them: but every thing that was vile and refuse, that they destroyed utterly.
target: Tetapi Saul dan rakyat itu menyelamatkan Agag dan kambing domba dan lembu-lembu yang terbaik dan tambun, pula anak domba dan segala yang berharga: tidak mau mereka menumpas semuanya itu. Tetapi segala hewan yang tidak berharga dan yang buruk, itulah yang ditumpas mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The little chambers thereof, the posts thereof, and the arches thereof, and the windows to it round about: the length was fifty cubits, and the breadth five and twenty cubits.
target: Kamar-kamar jaganya, tiang-tiang temboknya dan balai gerbangnya, ukurannya sama saja dengan yang lain-lain, dan sekelilingnya ada jendela-jendela; panjang pintu gerbang itu lima puluh hasta dan lebarnya dua puluh lima hasta.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My son, attend unto my wisdom, and bow thine ear to my understanding:
target: Hai anakku, perhatikanlah hikmatku, arahkanlah telingamu kepada kepandaian yang kuajarkan,

input: Who is he that condemneth? It is Christ that died, yea rather, that is risen again, who is even at the right hand of God, who also maketh intercession for us.
target: Kristus Yesus, yang telah mati? Bahkan lebih lagi: yang telah bangkit, yang juga duduk di sebelah kanan Allah, yang malah menjadi Pembela bagi kita?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he was come into Jerusalem, all the city was moved, saying, Who is this?
target: Dan ketika Ia masuk ke Yerusalem, gemparlah seluruh kota itu dan orang berkata: "Siapakah orang ini?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So they shall bring out all thy wives and thy children to the Chaldeans: and thou shalt not escape out of their hand, but shalt be taken by the hand of the king of Babylon: and thou shalt cause this city to be burned with fire.
target: Semua isterimu dan anak-anakmu akan digiring ke luar ke hadapan orang-orang Kasdim itu. Dan engkau sendiri tidak akan terluput dari tangan mereka, tetapi engkau akan tertangkap oleh raja Babel. Dan kota ini akan dihanguskan dengan api."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then certain philosophers of the Epicureans, and of the Stoicks, encountered him. And some said, What will this babbler say? other some, He seemeth to be a setter forth of strange gods: because he preached unto them Jesus, and the resurrection.
target: Dan juga beberapa ahli pikir dari golongan Epikuros dan Stoa bersoal jawab dengan dia dan ada yang berkata: "Apakah yang hendak dikatakan si peleter ini?" Tetapi yang lain berkata: "Rupa-rupanya ia adalah pemberita ajaran dewa-dewa asing." Sebab ia memberitakan Injil tentang Yesus dan tentang kebangkitan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jehoash the king of Israel sent to Amaziah king of Judah, saying, The thistle that was in Lebanon sent to the cedar that was in Lebanon, saying, Give thy daughter to my son to wife: and there passed by a wild beast that was in Lebanon, and trode down the thistle.
target: Tetapi Yoas, raja Israel, menyuruh orang kepada Amazia, raja Yehuda, mengatakan: "Rumput duri yang di gunung Libanon mengirim pesan kepada pohon aras yang di gunung Libanon, bunyinya: Berikanlah anakmu perempuan kepada anakku laki-laki menjadi isterinya. Tetapi binatang-binatang hutan yang ada di gunung Libanon itu berjalan lewat dari sana, lalu menginjak rumput duri itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore shall his calamity come suddenly; suddenly shall he be broken without remedy.
target: Itulah sebabnya ia ditimpa kebinasaan dengan tiba-tiba, sesaat saja ia diremukkan tanpa dapat dipulihkan lagi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There shall be no more praise of Moab: in Heshbon they have devised evil against it; come, and let us cut it off from being a nation. Also thou shalt be cut down, O Madmen; the sword shall pursue thee.
target: lenyaplah sudah kemegahan Moab! Di Hesybon orang merencanakan malapetaka terhadapnya: Marilah kita melenyapkannya sebagai bangsa! Juga engkau, hai Madmen, akan dibungkamkan, engkau akan dikejar-kejar pedang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The seventeenth to Joshbekashah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
target: undian yang ketujuh belas pada Yosbekasa, anak-anaknya dan saudara-saudaranya, dua belas orang;

input: But in this will we consent unto you: If ye will be as we be, that every male of you be circumcised;
target: Hanyalah dengan syarat ini kami dapat menyetujui permintaanmu: kamu harus sama seperti kami, yaitu setiap laki-laki di antara kamu harus disunat,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The Levites in the days of Eliashib, Joiada, and Johanan, and Jaddua, were recorded chief of the fathers: also the priests, to the reign of Darius the Persian.
target: Tentang orang-orang Lewi, para kepala kaum keluarga mereka tercatat pada zaman Elyasib, Yoyada, Yohanan dan Yadua, sedang para imam tercatat sampai pemerintahan Darius, orang Persia itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore shall the land mourn, and every one that dwelleth therein shall languish, with the beasts of the field, and with the fowls of heaven; yea, the fishes of the sea also shall be taken away.
target: Sebab itu negeri ini akan berkabung, dan seluruh penduduknya akan merana; juga binatang-binatang di padang dan burung-burung di udara, bahkan ikan-ikan di laut akan mati lenyap.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they mourned, and wept, and fasted until even, for Saul, and for Jonathan his son, and for the people of the LORD, and for the house of Israel; because they were fallen by the sword.
target: Dan mereka meratap, menangis dan berpuasa sampai matahari terbenam karena Saul, karena Yonatan, anaknya, karena umat TUHAN dan karena kaum Israel, sebab mereka telah gugur oleh pedang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the wilderness, Betharabah, Middin, and Secacah,
target: Di padang gurun: Bet-Araba, Midin, Sekhakha,

input: Is there no balm in Gilead; is there no physician there? why then is not the health of the daughter of my people recovered?
target: Tidak adakah balsam di Gilead? Tidak adakah tabib di sana? Mengapakah belum datang juga kesembuhan luka puteri bangsaku?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, I send you forth as sheep in the midst of wolves: be ye therefore wise as serpents, and harmless as doves.
target: "Lihat, Aku mengutus kamu seperti domba ke tengah-tengah serigala, sebab itu hendaklah kamu cerdik seperti ular dan tulus seperti merpati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All nations before him are as nothing; and they are counted to him less than nothing, and vanity.
target: Segala bangsa seperti tidak ada di hadapan-Nya mereka dianggap-Nya hampa dan sia-sia saja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD, Keep ye judgment, and do justice: for my salvation is near to come, and my righteousness to be revealed.
target: Beginilah firman TUHAN: Taatilah hukum dan tegakkanlah keadilan, sebab sebentar lagi akan datang keselamatan yang dari pada-Ku, dan keadilan-Ku akan dinyatakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Seraiah the son of Hilkiah, the son of Meshullam, the son of Zadok, the son of Meraioth, the son of Ahitub, was the ruler of the house of God.
target: Seraya bin Hilkia bin Mesulam bin Zadok bin Merayot bin Ahitub, pemuka rumah Allah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He gave also their increase unto the caterpiller, and their labour unto the locust.
target: Ia memberikan hasil tanah mereka kepada ulat, dan hasil jerih payah mereka kepada belalang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Fear, and the pit, and the snare, shall be upon thee, O inhabitant of Moab, saith the LORD.
target: Kejut dan pelubang dan jerat bagimu, hai penduduk Moab! demikianlah firman TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus answered and said unto them, I will also ask of you one question, and answer me, and I will tell you by what authority I do these things.
target: Jawab Yesus kepada mereka: "Aku akan mengajukan satu pertanyaan kepadamu. Berikanlah Aku jawabnya, maka Aku akan mengatakan kepadamu dengan kuasa manakah Aku melakukan hal-hal itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: God hath spoken in his holiness; I will rejoice, I will divide Shechem, and mete out the valley of Succoth.
target: Kepada mereka yang takut kepada-Mu telah Kauberikan panji-panji, tanda untuk berlindung terhadap panah. S e l a

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For as the woman is of the man, even so is the man also by the woman; but all things of God.
target: Sebab sama seperti perempuan berasal dari laki-laki, demikian pula laki-laki dilahirkan oleh perempuan; dan segala sesuatu berasal dari Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Was the LORD displeased against the rivers? was thine anger against the rivers? was thy wrath against the sea, that thou didst ride upon thine horses and thy chariots of salvation?
target: Terhadap sungai-sungaikah, ya TUHAN, terhadap sungai-sungaikah murka-Mu bangkit? Atau terhadap lautkah amarah-Mu sehingga Engkau mengendarai kuda dan kereta kemenangan-Mu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He bowed the heavens also, and came down: and darkness was under his feet.
