en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hear; for I will speak of excellent things; and the opening of my lips shall be right things.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For this commandment which I command thee this day, it is not hidden from thee, neither is it far off.

input: And when they had lifted up their eyes, they saw no man, save Jesus only.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the days will come, when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them, and then shall they fast in those days.
target: Tetapi akan datang waktunya, apabila mempelai itu diambil dari mereka, pada waktu itulah mereka akan berpuasa."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Open rebuke is better than secret love.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When thou hast eaten and art full, then thou shalt bless the LORD thy God for the good land which he hath given thee.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So they smote him, and his sons, and all his people, until there was none left him alive: and they possessed his land.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore the anger of the LORD was kindled against Amaziah, and he sent unto him a prophet, which said unto him, Why hast thou sought after the gods of the people, which could not deliver their own people out of thine hand?
target: Maka bangkitlah murka TUHAN terhadap Amazia; Ia menyuruh seorang nabi kepadanya yang berkata: "Mengapa engkau mencari allah sesuatu bangsa yang tidak dapat melepaskan bangsanya sendiri dari tanganmu?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then shall the land enjoy her sabbaths, as long as it lieth desolate, and ye be in your enemies' land; even then shall the land rest, and enjoy her sabbaths.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To deliver thee from the way of the evil man, from the man that speaketh froward things;
target: supaya engkau terlepas dari jalan yang jahat, dari orang yang mengucapkan tipu muslihat,

target: Salomo mendirikan istananya sampai tiga belas tahun lamanya, barulah selesai seluruh istananya itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt make a plate of pure gold, and grave upon it, like the engravings of a signet, HOLINESS TO THE LORD.
target: Juga haruslah engkau membuat patam dari emas murni dan pada patam itu kauukirkanlah, diukirkan seperti meterai: Kudus bagi TUHAN.

input: Save thyself, and come down from the cross.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The rich man's wealth is his strong city, and as an high wall in his own conceit.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if any of the flesh of the sacrifice of his peace offerings be eaten at all on the third day, it shall not be accepted, neither shall it be imputed unto him that offereth it: it shall be an abomination, and the soul that eateth of it shall bear his iniquity.
target: Karena jikalau pada hari yang ketiga masih dimakan dari daging korban keselamatan itu, maka TUHAN tidak berkenan akan orang yang mempersembahkannya dan korban itu dianggap batal baginya, bahkan menjadi sesuatu yang jijik, dan orang yang memakannya harus menanggung kesalahannya sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the officers of the children of Israel came and cried unto Pharaoh, saying, Wherefore dealest thou thus with thy servants?

input: And they put away the strange gods from among them, and served the LORD: and his soul was grieved for the misery of Israel.
target: Dan mereka menjauhkan para allah asing dari tengah-tengah mereka, lalu mereka beribadah kepada TUHAN. Maka TUHAN tidak dapat lagi menahan hati-Nya melihat kesukaran mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou hast put gladness in my heart, more than in the time that their corn and their wine increased.
target: Banyak orang berkata: "Siapa yang akan memperlihatkan yang baik kepada kita?" Biarlah cahaya wajah-Mu menyinari kami, ya TUHAN!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The nakedness of thy sister, the daughter of thy father, or daughter of thy mother, whether she be born at home, or born abroad, even their nakedness thou shalt not uncover.
target: Mengenai aurat saudaramu perempuan, anak ayahmu atau anak ibumu, baik yang lahir di rumah ayahmu maupun yang lahir di luar, janganlah kausingkapkan auratnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the number of the army of the horsemen were two hundred thousand thousand: and I heard the number of them.
target: Dan jumlah tentara itu ialah dua puluh ribu laksa pasukan berkuda; aku mendengar jumlah mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So I prophesied as I was commanded: and as I prophesied, there was a noise, and behold a shaking, and the bones came together, bone to his bone.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The thoughts of the wicked are an abomination to the LORD: but the words of the pure are pleasant words.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And some cried one thing, some another, among the multitude: and when he could not know the certainty for the tumult, he commanded him to be carried into the castle.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Pray without ceasing.
target: Tetaplah berdoa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Peter, an apostle of Jesus Christ, to the strangers scattered throughout Pontus, Galatia, Cappadocia, Asia, and Bithynia,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Draw me not away with the wicked, and with the workers of iniquity, which speak peace to their neighbours, but mischief is in their hearts.
target: Janganlah menyeret aku bersama-sama dengan orang fasik ataupun dengan orang yang melakukan kejahatan, yang ramah dengan teman-temannya, tetapi yang hatinya penuh kejahatan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses sent them to the war, a thousand of every tribe, them and Phinehas the son of Eleazar the priest, to the war, with the holy instruments, and the trumpets to blow in his hand.
target: Lalu Musa menyuruh mereka untuk berperang, seribu orang dari tiap-tiap suku, bersama-sama dengan Pinehas, anak imam Eleazar, untuk berperang, dengan membawa perkakas tempat kudus dan nafiri-nafiri pemberi tanda semboyan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They answered again and said, Let the king tell his servants the dream, and we will shew the interpretation of it.
target: Mereka menjawab pula: "Silakan tuanku raja menceriterakan mimpi itu kepada hamba-hambanya ini, maka kami akan memberitahukan maknanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the people were come into the wood, behold, the honey dropped; but no man put his hand to his mouth: for the people feared the oath.
target: Ketika rakyat sampai ke hutan itu, tampaklah ada di sana madu meleleh, tetapi tidak ada seorang pun yang mencedoknya ke mulutnya dengan tangan, sebab rakyat takut kepada sumpah itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Dan sent of their family five men from their coasts, men of valour, from Zorah, and from Eshtaol, to spy out the land, and to search it; and they said unto them, Go, search the land: who when they came to mount Ephraim, to the house of Micah, they lodged there.
target: Sebab itu bani Dan menyuruh dari kaumnya lima orang dari seluruh jumlah mereka, semuanya orang-orang yang gagah perkasa, yang berasal dari Zora dan Esytaol, untuk mengintai negeri itu dan menyelidikinya, serta berkata kepada mereka: "Pergilah menyelidiki negeri itu." input: But they that have gathered it shall eat it, and praise the LORD; and they that have brought it together shall drink it in the courts of my holiness.
target: tetapi orang yang menuainya akan memakannya juga dan akan memuji-muji TUHAN, dan orang yang mengumpulkannya akan meminumnya juga di pelataran-pelataran tempat kudus-Ku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Why dost thou strive against him? for he giveth not account of any of his matters.
target: Mengapa engkau berbantah dengan Dia, bahwa Dia tidak menjawab segala perkataanmu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So king Solomon was king over all Israel.
target: Maka Salomo menjadi raja atas seluruh Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said they unto him, Where is thy Father? Jesus answered, Ye neither know me, nor my Father: if ye had known me, ye should have known my Father also.
target: Maka kata mereka kepada-Nya: "Di manakah Bapa-Mu?" Jawab Yesus: "Baik Aku, maupun Bapa-Ku tidak kamu kenal. Jikalau sekiranya kamu mengenal Aku, kamu mengenal juga Bapa-Ku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These are the families of the Zebulunites according to those that were numbered of them, threescore thousand and five hundred.
target: Itulah kaum-kaum orang Zebulon, dan orang-orang yang dicatat dari mereka berjumlah enam puluh ribu lima ratus orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But beware of men: for they will deliver you up to the councils, and they will scourge you in their synagogues;
target: Tetapi waspadalah terhadap semua orang; karena ada yang akan menyerahkan kamu kepada majelis agama dan mereka akan menyesah kamu di rumah ibadatnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the booty, being the rest of the prey which the men of war had caught, was six hundred thousand and seventy thousand and five thousand sheep,
target: Adapun rampasan, yakni yang masih tinggal dari apa yang telah dijarah laskar itu berjumlah: enam ratus tujuh puluh lima ribu ekor kambing domba

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall come to pass, that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved.
target: Dan barangsiapa yang berseru kepada nama Tuhan akan diselamatkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Praise the LORD with harp: sing unto him with the psaltery and an instrument of ten strings.
target: Bersyukurlah kepada TUHAN dengan kecapi, bermazmurlah bagi-Nya dengan gambus sepuluh tali!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They build up Zion with blood, and Jerusalem with iniquity.
target: hai kamu yang mendirikan Sion dengan darah dan Yerusalem dengan kelaliman!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they that had eaten were about four thousand: and he sent them away.
target: Mereka itu ada kira-kira empat ribu orang. Lalu Yesus menyuruh mereka pulang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he sent messengers throughout all Manasseh; who also was gathered after him: and he sent messengers unto Asher, and unto Zebulun, and unto Naphtali; and they came up to meet them.
target: Juga dikirimnya pesan kepada seluruh suku Manasye dan orang-orang ini pun dikerahkan untuk mengikuti dia. Dikirimnya pula pesan kepada suku Asyer, Zebulon dan Naftali, dan orang-orang ini pun maju untuk menggabungkan diri dengan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The troubles of my heart are enlarged: O bring thou me out of my distresses.
target: Lapangkanlah hatiku yang sesak dan keluarkanlah aku dari kesulitanku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses and Aaron did all these wonders before Pharaoh: and the LORD hardened Pharaoh's heart, so that he would not let the children of Israel go out of his land.
target: Musa dan Harun telah melakukan segala mujizat ini di depan Firaun. Tetapi TUHAN mengeraskan hati Firaun, sehingga tidak membiarkan orang Israel pergi dari negerinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt anoint them, as thou didst anoint their father, that they may minister unto me in the priest's office: for their anointing shall surely be an everlasting priesthood throughout their generations.
target: Urapilah mereka, seperti engkau mengurapi ayah mereka, supaya mereka memegang jabatan imam bagi-Ku; dan ini terjadi, supaya berdasarkan pengurapan itu mereka memegang jabatan imam untuk selama-lamanya turun-temurun."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For if the firstfruit be holy, the lump is also holy: and if the root be holy, so are the branches.
target: Jikalau roti sulung adalah kudus, maka seluruh adonan juga kudus, dan jikalau akar adalah kudus, maka cabang-cabang juga kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The woman saith unto him, Sir, thou hast nothing to draw with, and the well is deep: from whence then hast thou that living water?
target: Kata perempuan itu kepada-Nya: "Tuhan, Engkau tidak punya timba dan sumur ini amat dalam; dari manakah Engkau memperoleh air hidup itu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this, To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction, and to keep himself unspotted from the world.
target: Ibadah yang murni dan yang tak bercacat di hadapan Allah, Bapa kita, ialah mengunjungi yatim piatu dan janda-janda dalam kesusahan mereka, dan menjaga supaya dirinya sendiri tidak dicemarkan oleh dunia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as soon as the commandment came abroad, the children of Israel brought in abundance the firstfruits of corn, wine, and oil, and honey, and of all the increase of the field; and the tithe of all things brought they in abundantly.
target: Segera setelah perintah ini tersiar, orang Israel membawa dalam jumlah yang besar hasil pertama dari pada gandum, anggur, minyak, madu dan segala macam hasil bumi. Mereka membawa juga persembahan persepuluhan dari segala sesuatu dalam jumlah yang besar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then may also my covenant be broken with David my servant, that he should not have a son to reign upon his throne; and with the Levites the priests, my ministers.
target: maka juga perjanjian-Ku dengan hamba-Ku Daud dapat diingkari, sehingga ia tidak mempunyai anak lagi yang memerintah di atas takhtanya; begitu juga perjanjian-Ku dengan orang-orang Lewi, yakni imam-imam yang menjadi pelayan-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover Uzziah had an host of fighting men, that went out to war by bands, according to the number of their account by the hand of Jeiel the scribe and Maaseiah the ruler, under the hand of Hananiah, one of the king's captains.
target: Selain itu Uzia mempunyai tentara yang sanggup berperang, yang maju berperang dalam laskar-laskar menurut jumlah anak buah yang dicatat oleh panitera Yeiel dan penata usaha Maaseya, di bawah pimpinan Hananya, salah seorang panglima raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Azariah the chief priest, and all the priests, looked upon him, and, behold, he was leprous in his forehead, and they thrust him out from thence; yea, himself hasted also to go out, because the LORD had smitten him.
target: Imam kepala Azarya dan semua imam lainnya memandang kepadanya, dan sesungguhnya, ia sakit kusta pada dahinya. Cepat-cepat mereka mengusirnya dari sana, dan ia sendiri tergesa-gesa keluar, karena TUHAN telah menimpakan tulah kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you, as a father doth his children,
target: Kamu tahu, betapa kami, seperti bapa terhadap anak-anaknya, telah menasihati kamu dan menguatkan hatimu seorang demi seorang,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: David therefore did as God commanded him: and they smote the host of the Philistines from Gibeon even to Gazer.
target: Dan Daud berbuat seperti yang diperintahkan Allah kepadanya, maka mereka memukul kalah tentara orang Filistin, mulai dari Gibeon sampai Gezer.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Reuben spake unto his father, saying, Slay my two sons, if I bring him not to thee: deliver him into my hand, and I will bring him to thee again.
target: Lalu berkatalah Ruben kepada ayahnya: "Kedua anakku laki-laki boleh engkau bunuh, jika ia tidak kubawa kepadamu; serahkanlah dia ke dalam tanganku, maka dia akan kubawa kembali kepadamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The stranger that is within thee shall get up above thee very high; and thou shalt come down very low.
target: Orang asing yang ada di tengah-tengahmu akan menjadi makin tinggi mengatasi engkau, tetapi engkau menjadi makin rendah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Their land also is full of idols; they worship the work of their own hands, that which their own fingers have made:
target: Negerinya penuh berhala-berhala; mereka sujud menyembah kepada buatan tangannya sendiri dan kepada yang dikerjakan oleh tangannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then he said, What title is that that I see? And the men of the city told him, It is the sepulchre of the man of God, which came from Judah, and proclaimed these things that thou hast done against the altar of Bethel.
target: Ia berkata: "Apakah tanda keramat yang kulihat ini?" Lalu orang-orang di kota itu menjawab dia: "Itulah kuburan abdi Allah yang sudah datang dari Yehuda dan yang telah menyerukan segala hal yang telah kaulakukan terhadap mezbah Betel ini!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And some of them believed, and consorted with Paul and Silas; and of the devout Greeks a great multitude, and of the chief women not a few.
target: Beberapa orang dari mereka menjadi yakin dan menggabungkan diri dengan Paulus dan Silas dan juga sejumlah besar orang Yunani yang takut kepada Allah, dan tidak sedikit perempuan-perempuan terkemuka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he that overcometh, and keepeth my works unto the end, to him will I give power over the nations:
target: Dan barangsiapa menang dan melakukan pekerjaan-Ku sampai kesudahannya, kepadanya akan Kukaruniakan kuasa atas bangsa-bangsa;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore the LORD will cut off from Israel head and tail, branch and rush, in one day.
target: Tua-tua dan orang yang terpandang, itulah kepala, dan nabi yang mengajarkan dusta, itulah ekor.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He answered and said unto them, Give ye them to eat. And they say unto him, Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread, and give them to eat?
target: Tetapi jawab-Nya: "Kamu harus memberi mereka makan!" Kata mereka kepada-Nya: "Jadi haruskah kami membeli roti seharga dua ratus dinar untuk memberi mereka makan?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Remember them, O my God, because they have defiled the priesthood, and the covenant of the priesthood, and of the Levites.
target: Ya Allahku, ingatlah bagaimana mereka mencemarkan jabatan imam serta perjanjian mengenai para imam dan orang-orang Lewi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And come and stand before me in this house, which is called by my name, and say, We are delivered to do all these abominations?
target: kemudian kamu datang berdiri di hadapan-Ku di rumah yang atasnya nama-Ku diserukan, sambil berkata: Kita selamat, supaya dapat pula melakukan segala perbuatan yang keji ini!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I am counted with them that go down into the pit: I am as a man that hath no strength:
target: sebab jiwaku kenyang dengan malapetaka, dan hidupku sudah dekat dunia orang mati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When thou gatherest the grapes of thy vineyard, thou shalt not glean it afterward: it shall be for the stranger, for the fatherless, and for the widow.
target: Apabila engkau mengumpulkan hasil kebun anggurmu, janganlah engkau mengadakan pemetikan sekali lagi; itulah bagian orang asing, anak yatim dan janda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let not the swift flee away, nor the mighty man escape; they shall stumble, and fall toward the north by the river Euphrates.
target: Orang yang tangkas tidak dapat melarikan diri, pahlawan tidak dapat meluputkan diri; di utara, di tepi sungai Efratlah mereka tersandung dan rebah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And again he saith, Rejoice, ye Gentiles, with his people.
target: Dan selanjutnya: "Bersukacitalah, hai bangsa-bangsa, dengan umat-Nya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So these nations feared the LORD, and served their graven images, both their children, and their children's children: as did their fathers, so do they unto this day.
target: Demikianlah bangsa-bangsa ini berbakti kepada TUHAN, tetapi dalam pada itu mereka beribadah juga kepada patung-patung mereka; baik anak-anak mereka maupun cucu cicit mereka melakukan seperti yang telah dilakukan nenek moyang mereka, sampai hari ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass at the end of three days after they had made a league with them, that they heard that they were their neighbours, and that they dwelt among them.
target: Tetapi setelah lewat tiga hari, sesudah orang Israel mengikat perjanjian dengan orang-orang itu, terdengarlah oleh mereka, bahwa orang-orang itu tinggal dekat mereka, bahkan diam di tengah-tengah mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that speaketh flattery to his friends, even the eyes of his children shall fail.
target: Barangsiapa mengadukan sahabatnya untuk mencari keuntungan, mata anak-anaknya akan menjadi rabun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; I have lifted up mine hand, Surely the heathen that are about you, they shall bear their shame.
target: Oleh sebab itu beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Aku bersumpah bahwa bangsa-bangsa yang di sekitarmu sendiri pasti akan menanggung noda mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And by weight he gave gold for the tables of shewbread, for every table; and likewise silver for the tables of silver:
target: Kemudian diberikannya sejumlah emas untuk meja-meja roti sajian, meja demi meja, dan perak untuk meja-meja dari perak;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thy prophets have seen vain and foolish things for thee: and they have not discovered thine iniquity, to turn away thy captivity; but have seen for thee false burdens and causes of banishment.
target: Nabi-nabimu melihat bagimu penglihatan yang dusta dan hampa. Mereka tidak menyatakan kesalahanmu, guna memulihkan engkau kembali. Mereka mengeluarkan bagimu ramalan-ramalan yang dusta dan menyesatkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses and to Aaron, saying,
target: TUHAN berfirman kepada Musa dan Harun:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This is the service of the families of the sons of Merari, according to all their service, in the tabernacle of the congregation, under the hand of Ithamar the son of Aaron the priest.
target: Itulah tugas kaum-kaum bani Merari, yakni seluruh pekerjaan jabatan mereka di Kemah Pertemuan, yang harus dilakukan di bawah pimpinan Itamar, anak imam Harun."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD sent an angel, which cut off all the mighty men of valour, and the leaders and captains in the camp of the king of Assyria. So he returned with shame of face to his own land. And when he was come into the house of his god, they that came forth of his own bowels slew him there with the sword.
target: Lalu TUHAN mengirim malaikat yang melenyapkan semua pahlawan yang gagah perkasa, pemuka dan panglima yang ada di perkemahan raja Asyur, sehingga ia kemalu-maluan kembali ke negerinya. Kemudian ia ditewaskan dengan pedang oleh anak-anak kandungnya sendiri ketika ia memasuki rumah allahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Turn from him, that he may rest, till he shall accomplish, as an hireling, his day.
target: hendaklah Kaualihkan pandangan-Mu dari padanya, agar ia beristirahat, sehingga ia seperti orang upahan dapat menikmati harinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the idols he shall utterly abolish.
target: Sedang berhala-berhala akan hilang sama sekali.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He suffered no man to do them wrong: yea, he reproved kings for their sakes,
target: Ia tidak membiarkan siapa pun memeras mereka; dihukum-Nya raja-raja oleh karena mereka:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses said unto the LORD, Then the Egyptians shall hear it, (for thou broughtest up this people in thy might from among them;)
target: Lalu berkatalah Musa kepada TUHAN: "Jikalau hal itu kedengaran kepada orang Mesir, padahal Engkau telah menuntun bangsa ini dengan kekuatan-Mu dari tengah-tengah mereka,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O LORD our God, all this store that we have prepared to build thee an house for thine holy name cometh of thine hand, and is all thine own.
target: Ya TUHAN, Allah kami, segala kelimpahan bahan-bahan yang kami sediakan ini untuk mendirikan bagi-Mu rumah bagi nama-Mu yang kudus adalah dari tangan-Mu sendiri dan punya-Mulah segala-galanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the cities of store that Solomon had, and cities for his chariots, and cities for his horsemen, and that which Solomon desired to build in Jerusalem, and in Lebanon, and in all the land of his dominion.
target: dan di segala kota perbekalan kepunyaan Salomo, di kota-kota tempat kereta, di kota-kota tempat orang berkuda dan di mana saja Salomo menginginkan mendirikan sesuatu di Yerusalem atau di gunung Libanon, atau di segenap negeri kekuasaannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So likewise ye, when ye see these things come to pass, know ye that the kingdom of God is nigh at hand.
target: Demikian juga, jika kamu melihat hal-hal itu terjadi, ketahuilah, bahwa Kerajaan Allah sudah dekat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He taketh away the heart of the chief of the people of the earth, and causeth them to wander in a wilderness where there is no way.
target: Dia menyebabkan para pemimpin dunia kehilangan akal, dan membuat mereka tersesat di padang belantara yang tidak ada jalannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the angel said unto me, Wherefore didst thou marvel? I will tell thee the mystery of the woman, and of the beast that carrieth her, which hath the seven heads and ten horns.
target: Lalu kata malaikat itu kepadaku: "Mengapa engkau heran? Aku akan mengatakan kepadamu rahasia perempuan itu dan rahasia binatang yang memikulnya, binatang yang berkepala tujuh dan bertanduk sepuluh itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, I am according to thy wish in God's stead: I also am formed out of the clay.
target: Sesungguhnya, bagi Allah aku sama dengan engkau, aku pun dibentuk dari tanah liat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: By this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God, and keep his commandments.
target: Inilah tandanya, bahwa kita mengasihi anak-anak Allah, yaitu apabila kita mengasihi Allah serta melakukan perintah-perintah-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the rough goat is the king of Grecia: and the great horn that is between his eyes is the first king.
target: Dan kambing jantan yang berbulu kesat itu ialah raja negeri Yunani, dan tanduk besar yang di antara kedua matanya itu ialah raja yang pertama.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Urijah the priest built an altar according to all that king Ahaz had sent from Damascus: so Urijah the priest made it against king Ahaz came from Damascus.
target: Lalu imam Uria mendirikan mezbah; tepat seperti keterangan yang dikirimkan raja Ahas dari Damsyik, demikianlah dibuat imam Uria menjelang datangnya raja Ahas dari Damsyik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: How do ye say, We are wise, and the law of the LORD is with us? Lo, certainly in vain made he it; the pen of the scribes is in vain.
target: Bagaimanakah kamu berani berkata: Kami bijaksana, dan kami mempunyai Taurat TUHAN? Sesungguhnya, pena palsu penyurat sudah membuatnya menjadi bohong.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if ye be Christ's, then are ye Abraham's seed, and heirs according to the promise.
target: Dan jikalau kamu adalah milik Kristus, maka kamu juga adalah keturunan Abraham dan berhak menerima janji Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Shimei the son of Elah, in Benjamin:
target: dan Simei bin Ela di Benyamin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When Jesus heard it, he marvelled, and said to them that followed, Verily I say unto you, I have not found so great faith, no, not in Israel.
target: Setelah Yesus mendengar hal itu, heranlah Ia dan berkata kepada mereka yang mengikuti-Nya: "Aku berkata kepadamu, sesungguhnya iman sebesar ini tidak pernah Aku jumpai pada seorang pun di antara orang Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, the son of a valiant man, of Kabzeel, who had done many acts, he slew two lionlike men of Moab: he went down also and slew a lion in the midst of a pit in time of snow:
target: Selanjutnya Benaya bin Yoyada, anak seorang yang gagah perkasa, yang besar jasanya, yang berasal dari Kabzeel; ia menewaskan kedua pahlawan besar dari Moab. Juga pernah ia turun ke dalam lobang dan membunuh seekor singa pada suatu hari bersalju.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in the house his disciples asked him again of the same matter.
target: Ketika mereka sudah di rumah, murid-murid itu bertanya pula kepada Yesus tentang hal itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them, Go ye into all the world, and preach the gospel to every creature.
target: Lalu Ia berkata kepada mereka: "Pergilah ke seluruh dunia, beritakanlah Injil kepada segala makhluk.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, For these seven ewe lambs shalt thou take of my hand, that they may be a witness unto me, that I have digged this well.
target: Jawabnya: "Ketujuh anak domba ini harus kauterima dari tanganku untuk menjadi tanda bukti bagiku, bahwa akulah yang menggali sumur ini."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For who in the heaven can be compared unto the LORD? who among the sons of the mighty can be likened unto the LORD?
target: Sebab itu langit bersyukur karena keajaiban-keajaiban-Mu, ya TUHAN, bahkan karena kesetiaan-Mu di antara jemaah orang-orang kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because it entereth not into his heart, but into the belly, and goeth out into the draught, purging all meats?
target: karena bukan masuk ke dalam hati tetapi ke dalam perutnya, lalu dibuang di jamban?" Dengan demikian Ia menyatakan semua makanan halal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That I might make thee know the certainty of the words of truth; that thou mightest answer the words of truth to them that send unto thee?
target: untuk mengajarkan kepadamu apa yang benar dan sungguh, supaya engkau dapat memberikan jawaban yang tepat kepada yang menyuruh engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore the heaven over you is stayed from dew, and the earth is stayed from her fruit.
target: Itulah sebabnya langit menahan embunnya dan bumi menahan hasilnya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Zedekiah was one and twenty years old when he began to reign, and reigned eleven years in Jerusalem.
target: Zedekia berumur dua puluh satu tahun pada waktu ia menjadi raja dan sebelas tahun lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Be still, ye inhabitants of the isle; thou whom the merchants of Zidon, that pass over the sea, have replenished.
target: Berdiam dirilah, hai penduduk tanah pesisir, hai saudagar Sidon, suruhan-suruhanmu mengarungi laut, dan berlayar di samudera besar;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then sought they for Jesus, and spake among themselves, as they stood in the temple, What think ye, that he will not come to the feast?
target: Mereka mencari Yesus dan sambil berdiri di dalam Bait Allah, mereka berkata seorang kepada yang lain: "Bagaimana pendapatmu? Akan datang jugakah Ia ke pesta?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But what think ye? A certain man had two sons; and he came to the first, and said, Son, go work to day in my vineyard.
target: "Tetapi apakah pendapatmu tentang ini: Seorang mempunyai dua anak laki-laki. Ia pergi kepada anak yang sulung dan berkata: Anakku, pergi dan bekerjalah hari ini dalam kebun anggur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thrice in the year shall all your menchildren appear before the LORD God, the God of Israel.
target: Tiga kali setahun segala orangmu yang laki-laki harus menghadap ke hadirat Tuhanmu TUHAN, Allah Israel,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My son, forget not my law; but let thine heart keep my commandments:
target: Hai anakku, janganlah engkau melupakan ajaranku, dan biarlah hatimu memelihara perintahku,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Give to every man that asketh of thee; and of him that taketh away thy goods ask them not again.
target: Berilah kepada setiap orang yang meminta kepadamu; dan janganlah meminta kembali kepada orang yang mengambil kepunyaanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let the children of Israel also keep the passover at his appointed season.
target: "Orang Israel harus merayakan Paskah pada waktunya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore hear now this, thou afflicted, and drunken, but not with wine:
target: Sebab itu, dengarlah ini, hai engkau yang tertindas, hai engkau yang mabuk, tetapi bukan karena anggur!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But whatsoever hath a blemish, that shall ye not offer: for it shall not be acceptable for you.
target: Segala yang bercacat badannya janganlah kamu persembahkan, karena dengan itu TUHAN tidak berkenan akan kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the men of Israel saw that Abimelech was dead, they departed every man unto his place.
target: Setelah dilihat oleh orang Israel, bahwa Abimelekh telah mati, pergilah mereka, masing-masing ke tempat kediamannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So they gat up from the tabernacle of Korah, Dathan, and Abiram, on every side: and Dathan and Abiram came out, and stood in the door of their tents, and their wives, and their sons, and their little children.
target: Maka pergilah mereka dari sekeliling tempat kediaman Korah, Datan dan Abiram. Keluarlah Datan dan Abiram, lalu berdiri di depan pintu kemah mereka bersama-sama dengan isterinya, para anaknya dan anak-anak yang kecil.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt couple five curtains by themselves, and six curtains by themselves, and shalt double the sixth curtain in the forefront of the tabernacle.
target: Lima dari tenda itu haruslah kausambung dengan tersendiri, dan enam dari tenda itu dengan tersendiri, dan tenda yang keenam haruslah kaulipat dua, di sebelah depan kemah itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thus saith the LORD of hosts; As I thought to punish you, when your fathers provoked me to wrath, saith the LORD of hosts, and I repented not:
target: Sebab beginilah firman TUHAN semesta alam: "Kalau dahulu Aku telah bermaksud mendatangkan malapetaka kepada kamu, ketika nenek moyangmu membuat Aku murka, dan Aku tidak menyesal, firman TUHAN semesta alam,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Azubah was dead, Caleb took unto him Ephrath, which bare him Hur.
target: Sesudah Azuba mati, Kaleb mengawini Efrat yang melahirkan Hur baginya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Boaz answered and said unto her, It hath fully been shewed me, all that thou hast done unto thy mother in law since the death of thine husband: and how thou hast left thy father and thy mother, and the land of thy nativity, and art come unto a people which thou knewest not heretofore.
target: Boas menjawab: "Telah dikabarkan orang kepadaku dengan lengkap segala sesuatu yang engkau lakukan kepada mertuamu sesudah suamimu mati, dan bagaimana engkau meninggalkan ibu bapamu dan tanah kelahiranmu serta pergi kepada suatu bangsa yang dahulu tidak engkau kenal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Jesus answering said unto them, Go your way, and tell John what things ye have seen and heard; how that the blind see, the lame walk, the lepers are cleansed, the deaf hear, the dead are raised, to the poor the gospel is preached.
target: Dan Yesus menjawab mereka: "Pergilah, dan katakanlah kepada Yohanes apa yang kamu lihat dan kamu dengar: Orang buta melihat, orang lumpuh berjalan, orang kusta menjadi tahir, orang tuli mendengar, orang mati dibangkitkan dan kepada orang miskin diberitakan kabar baik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees: therefore every tree which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down, and cast into the fire.
target: Kapak sudah tersedia pada akar pohon dan setiap pohon yang tidak menghasilkan buah yang baik, pasti ditebang dan dibuang ke dalam api.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will stretch out my hand, and smite Egypt with all my wonders which I will do in the midst thereof: and after that he will let you go.
target: Tetapi Aku akan mengacungkan tangan-Ku dan memukul Mesir dengan segala perbuatan yang ajaib, yang akan Kulakukan di tengah-tengahnya; sesudah itu ia akan membiarkan kamu pergi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when they were gone out of the city, and not yet far off, Joseph said unto his steward, Up, follow after the men; and when thou dost overtake them, say unto them, Wherefore have ye rewarded evil for good?
target: Tetapi baru saja mereka keluar dari kota itu, belum lagi jauh jaraknya, berkatalah Yusuf kepada kepala rumahnya: "Bersiaplah, kejarlah orang-orang itu, dan apabila engkau sampai kepada mereka, katakanlah kepada mereka: Mengapa kamu membalas yang baik dengan yang jahat?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David said, Is there yet any that is left of the house of Saul, that I may shew him kindness for Jonathan's sake?
target: Berkatalah Daud: "Masih adakah orang yang tinggal dari keluarga Saul? Maka aku akan menunjukkan kasihku kepadanya oleh karena Yonatan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, this is the joy of his way, and out of the earth shall others grow.
target: Demikianlah kesukaan hidupnya, dan tumbuh-tumbuhan lain timbul dari tanah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The priests said not, Where is the LORD? and they that handle the law knew me not: the pastors also transgressed against me, and the prophets prophesied by Baal, and walked after things that do not profit.
target: Para imam tidak lagi bertanya: Di manakah TUHAN? Orang-orang yang melaksanakan hukum tidak mengenal Aku lagi, dan para gembala mendurhaka terhadap Aku. Para nabi bernubuat demi Baal, mereka mengikuti apa yang tidak berguna.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass on the second sabbath after the first, that he went through the corn fields; and his disciples plucked the ears of corn, and did eat, rubbing them in their hands.
target: Pada suatu hari Sabat, ketika Yesus berjalan di ladang gandum, murid-murid-Nya memetik bulir gandum dan memakannya, sementara mereka menggisarnya dengan tangannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And that which the rest of the people gave was twenty thousand drams of gold, and two thousand pound of silver, and threescore and seven priests' garments.
target: Dan yang disumbangkan oleh orang-orang lain adalah: dua puluh ribu dirham emas, dua ribu mina perak dan enam puluh tujuh helai kemeja imam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore I hated life; because the work that is wrought under the sun is grievous unto me: for all is vanity and vexation of spirit.
target: Oleh sebab itu aku membenci hidup, karena aku menganggap menyusahkan apa yang dilakukan di bawah matahari, sebab segala sesuatu adalah kesia-siaan dan usaha menjaring angin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when the king sat in his house, and the LORD had given him rest round about from all his enemies;
target: Ketika raja telah menetap di rumahnya dan TUHAN telah mengaruniakan keamanan kepadanya terhadap semua musuhnya di sekeliling,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.
target: Kamu berasal dari Allah, anak-anakku, dan kamu telah mengalahkan nabi-nabi palsu itu; sebab Roh yang ada di dalam kamu, lebih besar dari pada roh yang ada di dalam dunia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For our conversation is in heaven; from whence also we look for the Saviour, the Lord Jesus Christ:
target: Karena kewargaan kita adalah di dalam sorga, dan dari situ juga kita menantikan Tuhan Yesus Kristus sebagai Juruselamat,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Uzzi begat Zerahiah, and Zerahiah begat Meraioth,
target: Uzi memperanakkan Zerahya; Zerahya memperanakkan Merayot;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the seven angels came out of the temple, having the seven plagues, clothed in pure and white linen, and having their breasts girded with golden girdles.
target: Dan ketujuh malaikat dengan ketujuh malapetaka itu, keluar dari Bait Suci, berpakaian lenan yang putih bersih dan berkilau-kilauan dan dadanya berlilitkan ikat pinggang dari emas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that saith unto the wicked, Thou are righteous; him shall the people curse, nations shall abhor him:
target: Siapa berkata kepada orang fasik: "Engkau tidak bersalah", akan dikutuki bangsa-bangsa, dilaknatkan suku-suku bangsa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And saying, Alas, alas that great city, that was clothed in fine linen, and purple, and scarlet, and decked with gold, and precious stones, and pearls!
target: mereka berkata: "Celaka, celaka, kota besar, yang berpakaian lenan halus, dan kain ungu dan kain kirmizi, dan yang dihiasi dengan emas, dan permata dan mutiara, sebab dalam satu jam saja kekayaan sebanyak itu sudah binasa."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the men of Israel went out to battle against Benjamin; and the men of Israel put themselves in array to fight against them at Gibeah.
target: Kemudian majulah orang-orang Israel berperang melawan suku Benyamin; orang-orang Israel mengatur barisan perangnya melawan mereka dekat Gibea.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If ye then, being evil, know how to give good gifts unto your children: how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him?
target: Jadi jika kamu yang jahat tahu memberi pemberian yang baik kepada anak-anakmu, apalagi Bapamu yang di sorga! Ia akan memberikan Roh Kudus kepada mereka yang meminta kepada-Nya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now Joshua was clothed with filthy garments, and stood before the angel.
target: Adapun Yosua mengenakan pakaian yang kotor, waktu dia berdiri di hadapan Malaikat itu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And those that were numbered of the sons of Gershon, throughout their families, and by the house of their fathers,
target: Bani Gerson yang dicatat menurut kaum-kaum yang ada dalam puak mereka,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then David enquired of the LORD yet again. And the LORD answered him and said, Arise, go down to Keilah; for I will deliver the Philistines into thine hand.
target: Lalu bertanya pulalah Daud kepada TUHAN, maka TUHAN menjawab dia, firman-Nya: "Bersiaplah, pergilah ke Kehila, sebab Aku akan menyerahkan orang Filistin itu ke dalam tanganmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Joab was come out from David, he sent messengers after Abner, which brought him again from the well of Sirah: but David knew it not.
target: Sesudah itu keluarlah Yoab meninggalkan Daud dan menyuruh orang menyusul Abner, lalu mereka membawanya kembali dari perigi Sira tanpa diketahui Daud.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So the people were scattered abroad throughout all the land of Egypt to gather stubble instead of straw.
target: Lalu berseraklah bangsa itu ke seluruh tanah Mesir untuk mengumpulkan tunggul gandum sebagai pengganti jerami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Be ye therefore merciful, as your Father also is merciful.
target: Hendaklah kamu murah hati, sama seperti Bapamu adalah murah hati."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: From the wicked that oppress me, from my deadly enemies, who compass me about.
target: terhadap orang-orang fasik yang menggagahi aku, terhadap musuh nyawaku yang mengepung aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jerusalem is builded as a city that is compact together:
target: Hai Yerusalem, yang telah didirikan sebagai kota yang bersambung rapat,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then they that feared the LORD spake often one to another: and the LORD hearkened, and heard it, and a book of remembrance was written before him for them that feared the LORD, and that thought upon his name.
target: Beginilah berbicara satu sama lain orang-orang yang takut akan TUHAN: "TUHAN memperhatikan dan mendengarnya; sebuah kitab peringatan ditulis di hadapan-Nya bagi orang-orang yang takut akan TUHAN dan bagi orang-orang yang menghormati nama-Nya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And deliver them who through fear of death were all their lifetime subject to bondage.
target: dan supaya dengan jalan demikian Ia membebaskan mereka yang seumur hidupnya berada dalam perhambaan oleh karena takutnya kepada maut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the men of the garrison answered Jonathan and his armourbearer, and said, Come up to us, and we will shew you a thing. And Jonathan said unto his armourbearer, Come up after me: for the LORD hath delivered them into the hand of Israel.
target: Orang-orang dari pasukan pengawal itu berseru kepada Yonatan dan pembawa senjatanya, katanya: "Naiklah ke mari, maka kami akan menghajar kamu." Lalu kata Yonatan kepada pembawa senjatanya: "Naiklah mengikuti aku, sebab TUHAN telah menyerahkan mereka ke dalam tangan orang Israel."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And now we call the proud happy; yea, they that work wickedness are set up; yea, they that tempt God are even delivered.
target: Oleh sebab itu kita ini menyebut berbahagia orang-orang yang gegabah: bukan saja mujur orang-orang yang berbuat fasik itu, tetapi dengan mencobai Allah pun, mereka luput juga."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And for the entering of the oracle he made doors of olive tree: the lintel and side posts were a fifth part of the wall.
target: Sebagai pintu masuk ke ruang belakang dibuatnyalah pintu dari kayu minyak; ambang dan tiangnya merupakan segi lima.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass at the time that the cattle conceived, that I lifted up mine eyes, and saw in a dream, and, behold, the rams which leaped upon the cattle were ringstraked, speckled, and grisled.
target: Pada suatu kali pada masa kambing domba itu suka berkelamin, maka aku bermimpi dan melihat, bahwa jantan-jantan yang menjantani kambing domba itu bercoreng-coreng, berbintik-bintik dan berbelang-belang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will yet be more vile than thus, and will be base in mine own sight: and of the maidservants which thou hast spoken of, of them shall I be had in honour.
target: bahkan aku akan menghinakan diriku lebih dari pada itu; engkau akan memandang aku rendah, tetapi bersama-sama budak-budak perempuan yang kaukatakan itu, bersama-sama merekalah aku mau dihormati."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I made treasurers over the treasuries, Shelemiah the priest, and Zadok the scribe, and of the Levites, Pedaiah: and next to them was Hanan the son of Zaccur, the son of Mattaniah: for they were counted faithful, and their office was to distribute unto their brethren.
target: Sebagai pengawas-pengawas perbendaharaan kuangkat imam Selemya dan Zadok, seorang ahli kitab, dan Pedaya, seorang Lewi, sedang Hanan bin Zakur bin Matanya diperbantukan kepada mereka, karena orang-orang itu dianggap setia. Mereka diserahi tugas untuk mengurus pembagian kepada saudara-saudara mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the cities which ye shall give shall be of the possession of the children of Israel: from them that have many ye shall give many; but from them that have few ye shall give few: every one shall give of his cities unto the Levites according to his inheritance which he inheriteth.
target: Mengenai kota-kota yang akan kamu berikan dari tanah milik orang Israel, dari suku yang banyak jumlahnya haruslah kamu ambil banyak, dan dari suku yang sedikit jumlahnya haruslah kamu ambil sedikit. Setiap suku harus memberikan dari kota-kotanya kepada orang Lewi sekadar milik pusaka yang dibagikan kepadanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He saith unto them, But whom say ye that I am?
target: Lalu Yesus bertanya kepada mereka: "Tetapi apa katamu, siapakah Aku ini?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A prudent man foreseeth the evil, and hideth himself: but the simple pass on, and are punished.
target: Kalau orang bijak melihat malapetaka, bersembunyilah ia, tetapi orang yang tak berpengalaman berjalan terus, lalu kena celaka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will set my face against them; they shall go out from one fire, and another fire shall devour them; and ye shall know that I am the LORD, when I set my face against them.
target: Aku sendiri akan menentang mereka. Walaupun mereka luput dari api, tetapi api akan memakan mereka. Dan kamu akan mengetahui bahwa Akulah TUHAN, pada saat Aku menentang mereka

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also pure gold for the fleshhooks, and the bowls, and the cups: and for the golden basons he gave gold by weight for every bason; and likewise silver by weight for every bason of silver:
target: selanjutnya emas murni untuk garpu-garpu, dan bokor-bokor penyiraman dan kendi-kendi, juga untuk piala-piala dari emas seberat yang diperlukan untuk tiap-tiap piala, dan perak untuk piala dari perak seberat yang diperlukan untuk tiap-tiap piala;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the angel of God said unto him, Take the flesh and the unleavened cakes, and lay them upon this rock, and pour out the broth. And he did so.
target: Berfirmanlah Malaikat Allah kepadanya: "Ambillah daging dan roti yang tidak beragi itu, letakkanlah ke atas batu ini, dan curahkan kuahnya." Maka diperbuatnya demikian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The words of the wicked are to lie in wait for blood: but the mouth of the upright shall deliver them.
target: Perkataan orang fasik menghadang darah, tetapi mulut orang jujur menyelamatkan orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Defend the poor and fatherless: do justice to the afflicted and needy.
target: Berilah keadilan kepada orang yang lemah dan kepada anak yatim, belalah hak orang sengsara dan orang yang kekurangan!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now when she saw that she had waited, and her hope was lost, then she took another of her whelps, and made him a young lion.
target: Sesudah induk singa menyadari bahwa usahanya gagal dan pengharapannya hilang lenyap, ia mengambil anaknya yang lain dan membesarkannya menjadi singa muda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he brought me thither, and, behold, there was a man, whose appearance was like the appearance of brass, with a line of flax in his hand, and a measuring reed; and he stood in the gate.
target: Ke sanalah aku dibawa-Nya. Dan lihat, ada seorang yang kelihatan seperti tembaga dan di tangannya ada tali lenan beserta tongkat pengukur; dan ia berdiri di pintu gerbang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he slew an Egyptian, a man of great stature, five cubits high; and in the Egyptian's hand was a spear like a weaver's beam; and he went down to him with a staff, and plucked the spear out of the Egyptian's hand, and slew him with his own spear.
target: Pula ia membunuh seorang Mesir, seorang yang tinggi perawakannya lima hasta tingginya; di tangan orang Mesir itu ada tombak seperti pesa tukang tenun, tetapi ia mendatanginya dengan tongkat, merampas tombak itu dari tangan orang Mesir itu, lalu membunuh orang itu dengan tombaknya sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither shalt thou bring an abomination into thine house, lest thou be a cursed thing like it: but thou shalt utterly detest it, and thou shalt utterly abhor it; for it is a cursed thing.
target: Dan janganlah engkau membawa sesuatu kekejian masuk ke dalam rumahmu, sehingga engkau pun ditumpas seperti itu; haruslah engkau benar-benar merasa jijik dan keji terhadap hal itu, sebab semuanya itu dikhususkan untuk dimusnahkan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also the children of those that had been carried away, which were come out of the captivity, offered burnt offerings unto the God of Israel, twelve bullocks for all Israel, ninety and six rams, seventy and seven lambs, twelve he goats for a sin offering: all this was a burnt offering unto the LORD.
target: Pada waktu itu juga orang-orang yang telah kembali dari penawanan, yakni mereka yang pulang dari pembuangan, mempersembahkan sebagai korban bakaran kepada Allah Israel: lembu jantan dua belas ekor untuk seluruh Israel, domba jantan sembilan puluh enam ekor, anak domba tujuh puluh tujuh ekor, kambing jantan sebagai korban penghapus dosa dua belas ekor, semuanya itu sebagai korban bakaran bagi TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But thou shalt have a perfect and just weight, a perfect and just measure shalt thou have: that thy days may be lengthened in the land which the LORD thy God giveth thee.
target: Haruslah ada padamu batu timbangan yang utuh dan tepat; haruslah ada padamu efa yang utuh dan tepat — supaya lanjut umurmu di tanah yang diberikan kepadamu oleh TUHAN, Allahmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the LORD hardened Pharaoh's heart, so that he would not let the children of Israel go.
target: Tetapi TUHAN mengeraskan hati Firaun, sehingga tidak mau membiarkan orang Israel pergi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Take heed that no man deceive you.
target: Jawab Yesus kepada mereka: "Waspadalah supaya jangan ada orang yang menyesatkan kamu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore the people did chide with Moses, and said, Give us water that we may drink. And Moses said unto them, Why chide ye with me? wherefore do ye tempt the LORD?
target: Jadi mulailah mereka itu bertengkar dengan Musa, kata mereka: "Berikanlah air kepada kami, supaya kami dapat minum." Tetapi Musa berkata kepada mereka: "Mengapakah kamu bertengkar dengan aku? Mengapakah kamu mencobai TUHAN?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When there were no depths, I was brought forth; when there were no fountains abounding with water.
target: Sebelum air samudera raya ada, aku telah lahir, sebelum ada sumber-sumber yang sarat dengan air.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the twelve gates were twelve pearls: every several gate was of one pearl: and the street of the city was pure gold, as it were transparent glass.
target: Dan kedua belas pintu gerbang itu adalah dua belas mutiara: setiap pintu gerbang terdiri dari satu mutiara dan jalan-jalan kota itu dari emas murni bagaikan kaca bening.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God, even our Father, at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints.
target: Kiranya Dia menguatkan hatimu, supaya tak bercacat dan kudus, di hadapan Allah dan Bapa kita pada waktu kedatangan Yesus, Tuhan kita, dengan semua orang kudus-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hanan the son of Maachah, and Joshaphat the Mithnite,
target: Hanan bin Maakha; Yosafat, orang Mitni;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And at the side without, as one goeth up to the entry of the north gate, were two tables; and on the other side, which was at the porch of the gate, were two tables.
target: Di samping kiri balai gerbang, di sebelah luar, ada dua meja, dan di samping kanan balai gerbang itu juga dua meja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But when the first came, they supposed that they should have received more; and they likewise received every man a penny.
target: Kemudian datanglah mereka yang masuk terdahulu, sangkanya akan mendapat lebih banyak, tetapi mereka pun menerima masing-masing satu dinar juga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Go up to the mountain, and bring wood, and build the house; and I will take pleasure in it, and I will be glorified, saith the LORD.
target: Jadi naiklah ke gunung, bawalah kayu dan bangunlah Rumah itu; maka Aku akan berkenan kepadanya dan akan menyatakan kemuliaan-Ku di situ, firman TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither will I hide my face any more from them: for I have poured out my spirit upon the house of Israel, saith the Lord GOD.
target: Aku tidak lagi menyembunyikan wajah-Ku terhadap mereka, kalau Aku mencurahkan Roh-Ku ke atas kaum Israel, demikianlah firman Tuhan ALLAH."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Have any of the rulers or of the Pharisees believed on him?
target: Adakah seorang di antara pemimpin-pemimpin yang percaya kepada-Nya, atau seorang di antara orang-orang Farisi?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If by any means I may provoke to emulation them which are my flesh, and might save some of them.
target: yaitu kalau-kalau aku dapat membangkitkan cemburu di dalam hati kaum sebangsaku menurut daging dan dapat menyelamatkan beberapa orang dari mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I behaved myself as though he had been my friend or brother: I bowed down heavily, as one that mourneth for his mother.
target: seolah-olah temanku atau saudarakulah yang sakit, demikianlah aku berlaku; seperti orang yang berkeluh kesah karena kematian ibu, demikianlah aku tunduk dengan pakaian kabung.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will declare thy righteousness, and thy works; for they shall not profit thee.
target: Aku akan menyebutkan kesalehanmu dan segala perbuatanmu, tetapi semuanya itu tidak akan berguna bagimu:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: On the left hand, where he doth work, but I cannot behold him: he hideth himself on the right hand, that I cannot see him:
target: di utara kucari Dia, Ia tidak tampak, aku berpaling ke selatan, aku tidak melihat Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Do ye imagine to reprove words, and the speeches of one that is desperate, which are as wind?
target: Apakah kamu bermaksud mencela perkataan? Apakah perkataan orang yang putus asa dianggap angin?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses said, Thou hast spoken well, I will see thy face again no more.
target: Kemudian Musa berkata: "Tepat seperti ucapanmu itu! Aku takkan melihat mukamu lagi!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And these were they which went up also from Telmelah, Telharesha, Cherub, Addon, and Immer: but they could not shew their father's house, nor their seed, whether they were of Israel.
target: Inilah orang-orang yang berangkat pulang dari Tel-Melah, Tel-Harsa, Kerub, Adon dan Imer, tetapi mereka tidak dapat menyatakan apakah kaum keluarga dan asal usul mereka termasuk bangsa Israel:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A good tree cannot bring forth evil fruit, neither can a corrupt tree bring forth good fruit.
target: Tidak mungkin pohon yang baik itu menghasilkan buah yang tidak baik, ataupun pohon yang tidak baik itu menghasilkan buah yang baik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of the increase of his government and peace there shall be no end, upon the throne of David, and upon his kingdom, to order it, and to establish it with judgment and with justice from henceforth even for ever. The zeal of the LORD of hosts will perform this.
target: Tuhan telah melontarkan firman kepada Yakub, dan firman-Nya itu menimpa Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, thou hast heard what the kings of Assyria have done to all lands by destroying them utterly; and shalt thou be delivered?
target: Sesungguhnya, engkau ini telah mendengar tentang yang dilakukan raja-raja Asyur kepada segala negeri, yakni bahwa mereka telah menumpasnya; masakan engkau ini akan dilepaskan?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ahaz slept with his fathers, and they buried him in the city, even in Jerusalem: but they brought him not into the sepulchres of the kings of Israel: and Hezekiah his son reigned in his stead.
target: Kemudian Ahas mendapat perhentian bersama-sama dengan nenek moyangnya, dan dikuburkan di dalam kota, di Yerusalem; tetapi ia tidak dibawa ke pekuburan raja-raja Israel. Maka Hizkia, anaknya, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Nicodemus saith unto him, How can a man be born when he is old? can he enter the second time into his mother's womb, and be born?
target: Kata Nikodemus kepada-Nya: "Bagaimanakah mungkin seorang dilahirkan, kalau ia sudah tua? Dapatkah ia masuk kembali ke dalam rahim ibunya dan dilahirkan lagi?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore if I know not the meaning of the voice, I shall be unto him that speaketh a barbarian, and he that speaketh shall be a barbarian unto me.
target: Tetapi jika aku tidak mengetahui arti bahasa itu, aku menjadi orang asing bagi dia yang mempergunakannya dan dia orang asing bagiku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Speak, and say, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I am against thee, Pharaoh king of Egypt, the great dragon that lieth in the midst of his rivers, which hath said, My river is mine own, and I have made it for myself.
target: Berbicaralah dan katakan: Beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Lihat, Aku menjadi lawanmu, hai Firaun, raja Mesir, buaya yang besar, yang berbaring di tengah anak-anak sungaimu, yaitu Nil, dan yang berkata: Sungai Nil aku punya, aku yang membuatnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the name of Amram's wife was Jochebed, the daughter of Levi, whom her mother bare to Levi in Egypt: and she bare unto Amram Aaron and Moses, and Miriam their sister.
target: Dan nama isteri Amram ialah Yokhebed, anak perempuan Lewi, yang dilahirkan bagi Lewi di Mesir; dan bagi Amram perempuan itu melahirkan Harun dan Musa dan Miryam, saudara mereka yang perempuan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When Pharaoh shall speak unto you, saying, Shew a miracle for you: then thou shalt say unto Aaron, Take thy rod, and cast it before Pharaoh, and it shall become a serpent.
target: "Apabila Firaun berkata kepada kamu: Tunjukkanlah suatu mujizat, maka haruslah kaukatakan kepada Harun: Ambillah tongkatmu dan lemparkanlah itu di depan Firaun. Maka tongkat itu akan menjadi ular."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Unto the rest of the children of Merari were given out of the tribe of Zebulun, Rimmon with her suburbs, Tabor with her suburbs:
target: Keturunan Merari yang selebihnya mendapat dari suku Zebulon: Rimono dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya dan Tabor dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He coveteth greedily all the day long: but the righteous giveth and spareth not.
target: Keinginan bernafsu sepanjang hari, tetapi orang benar memberi tanpa batas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thy estimation shall be of the male from twenty years old even unto sixty years old, even thy estimation shall be fifty shekels of silver, after the shekel of the sanctuary.
target: maka tentang nilai bagi orang laki-laki dari yang berumur dua puluh tahun sampai yang berumur enam puluh tahun, nilai itu harus lima puluh syikal perak, ditimbang menurut syikal kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: We have transgressed and have rebelled: thou hast not pardoned.
target: Kami telah mendurhaka dan memberontak, Engkau tidak mengampuni.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And hast made us unto our God kings and priests: and we shall reign on the earth.
target: Dan Engkau telah membuat mereka menjadi suatu kerajaan, dan menjadi imam-imam bagi Allah kita, dan mereka akan memerintah sebagai raja di bumi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The forefront of the one was situate northward over against Michmash, and the other southward over against Gibeah.
target: Ujung yang satu berdiri di sebelah utara di tentangan Mikhmas, yang lain di sebelah selatan di tentangan Geba.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Arabia, and all the princes of Kedar, they occupied with thee in lambs, and rams, and goats: in these were they thy merchants.
target: Arab dan semua pemuka Kedar berdagang dengan engkau dalam anak domba, domba jantan dan kambing jantan; dalam hal-hal itulah mereka berdagang dengan engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt make the robe of the ephod all of blue.
target: Haruslah kaubuat gamis baju efod dari kain ungu tua seluruhnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These were all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.
target: Semuanya itu anak-anak Daud, belum terhitung anak-anak dari gundik-gundik. Tamar ialah saudara perempuan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel, Amend your ways and your doings, and I will cause you to dwell in this place.
target: Beginilah firman TUHAN semesta alam, Allah Israel: Perbaikilah tingkah langkahmu dan perbuatanmu, maka Aku mau diam bersama-sama kamu di tempat ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As thou didst rejoice at the inheritance of the house of Israel, because it was desolate, so will I do unto thee: thou shalt be desolate, O mount Seir, and all Idumea, even all of it: and they shall know that I am the LORD.
target: Seperti engkau bersukacita mengenai milik pusaka kaum Israel, yang sudah menjadi sunyi sepi, demikianlah akan Kulakukan terhadap engkau. Engkau akan menjadi sunyi sepi, hai pegunungan Seir dan engkau, segenap Edom dalam keseluruhanmu. Dan mereka akan mengetahui bahwa Akulah TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the angel of the LORD appeared unto the woman, and said unto her, Behold now, thou art barren, and bearest not: but thou shalt conceive, and bear a son.
target: Dan Malaikat TUHAN menampakkan diri kepada perempuan itu dan berfirman kepadanya, demikian: "Memang engkau mandul, tidak beranak, tetapi engkau akan mengandung dan melahirkan seorang anak laki-laki.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The bands of the wicked have robbed me: but I have not forgotten thy law.
target: Tali-tali orang-orang fasik membelit aku, tetapi Taurat-Mu tidak kulupakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Will ye accept his person? will ye contend for God?
target: Apakah kamu mau memihak Allah, berbantah untuk membela Dia?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart, and of a good conscience, and of faith unfeigned:
target: Tujuan nasihat itu ialah kasih yang timbul dari hati yang suci, dari hati nurani yang murni dan dari iman yang tulus ikhlas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But now they desire a better country, that is, an heavenly: wherefore God is not ashamed to be called their God: for he hath prepared for them a city.
target: Tetapi sekarang mereka merindukan tanah air yang lebih baik yaitu satu tanah air sorgawi. Sebab itu Allah tidak malu disebut Allah mereka, karena Ia telah mempersiapkan sebuah kota bagi mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thine hand shall be lifted up upon thine adversaries, and all thine enemies shall be cut off.
target: Maka akan terjadi pada waktu itu, demikianlah firman TUHAN, Aku akan melenyapkan kudamu dari tengah-tengahmu dan akan membinasakan keretamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The eyes of the LORD are upon the righteous, and his ears are open unto their cry.
target: jauhilah yang jahat dan lakukanlah yang baik, carilah perdamaian dan berusahalah mendapatkannya!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Pilate said unto them, Why, what evil hath he done? And they cried out the more exceedingly, Crucify him.
target: Lalu Pilatus berkata kepada mereka: "Tetapi kejahatan apakah yang telah dilakukan-Nya?" Namun mereka makin keras berteriak: "Salibkanlah Dia!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I went up by revelation, and communicated unto them that gospel which I preach among the Gentiles, but privately to them which were of reputation, lest by any means I should run, or had run, in vain.
target: Aku pergi berdasarkan suatu penyataan. Dan kepada mereka kubentangkan Injil yang kuberitakan di antara bangsa-bangsa bukan Yahudi — dalam percakapan tersendiri kepada mereka yang terpandang —, supaya jangan dengan percuma aku berusaha atau telah berusaha.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto her, Give me, I pray thee, a little water to drink; for I am thirsty. And she opened a bottle of milk, and gave him drink, and covered him.
target: Kemudian berkatalah ia kepada perempuan itu: "Berilah kiranya aku minum air sedikit, aku haus." Lalu perempuan itu membuka kirbat susu, diberinyalah dia minum dan diselimutinya pula.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he arose, and took the young child and his mother, and came into the land of Israel.
target: Lalu Yusuf pun bangunlah, diambilnya Anak itu serta ibu-Nya dan pergi ke tanah Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: (For the LORD thy God is a merciful God;) he will not forsake thee, neither destroy thee, nor forget the covenant of thy fathers which he sware unto them.
target: Sebab TUHAN, Allahmu, adalah Allah Penyayang, Ia tidak akan meninggalkan atau memusnahkan engkau dan Ia tidak akan melupakan perjanjian yang diikrarkan-Nya dengan sumpah kepada nenek moyangmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And give occasions of speech against her, and bring up an evil name upon her, and say, I took this woman, and when I came to her, I found her not a maid:
target: menuduhkan kepadanya perbuatan yang kurang senonoh dan membusukkan namanya dengan berkata: Perempuan ini kuambil menjadi isteriku, tetapi ketika ia kuhampiri, tidak ada kudapati padanya tanda-tanda keperawanan —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thou hast had five husbands; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband: in that saidst thou truly.
target: sebab engkau sudah mempunyai lima suami dan yang ada sekarang padamu, bukanlah suamimu. Dalam hal ini engkau berkata benar."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And that ye put on the new man, which after God is created in righteousness and true holiness.
target: dan mengenakan manusia baru, yang telah diciptakan menurut kehendak Allah di dalam kebenaran dan kekudusan yang sesungguhnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The horn of Moab is cut off, and his arm is broken, saith the LORD.
target: Telah patah tanduk kekuatan Moab, dan lengan kekuasaannya telah pecah! demikianlah firman TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the poor shall never cease out of the land: therefore I command thee, saying, Thou shalt open thine hand wide unto thy brother, to thy poor, and to thy needy, in thy land.
target: Sebab orang-orang miskin tidak hentinya akan ada di dalam negeri itu; itulah sebabnya aku memberi perintah kepadamu, demikian: Haruslah engkau membuka tangan lebar-lebar bagi saudaramu, yang tertindas dan yang miskin di negerimu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: No foot of man shall pass through it, nor foot of beast shall pass through it, neither shall it be inhabited forty years.
target: Tidak seorang manusia pun akan melintasinya, bahkan seekor binatang pun tidak dan tanah itu tidak akan didiami selama empat puluh tahun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So the LORD blessed the latter end of Job more than his beginning: for he had fourteen thousand sheep, and six thousand camels, and a thousand yoke of oxen, and a thousand she asses.
target: TUHAN memberkati Ayub dalam hidupnya yang selanjutnya lebih dari pada dalam hidupnya yang dahulu; ia mendapat empat belas ribu ekor kambing domba, dan enam ribu unta, seribu pasang lembu, dan seribu ekor keledai betina.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have spread out my hands all the day unto a rebellious people, which walketh in a way that was not good, after their own thoughts;
target: Sepanjang hari Aku telah mengulurkan tangan-Ku kepada suku bangsa yang memberontak, yang menempuh jalan yang tidak baik dan mengikuti rancangannya sendiri;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Do this now, my son, and deliver thyself, when thou art come into the hand of thy friend; go, humble thyself, and make sure thy friend.
target: buatlah begini, hai anakku, dan lepaskanlah dirimu, karena engkau telah jatuh ke dalam genggaman sesamamu: pergilah, berlututlah, dan desaklah sesamamu itu;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not oppress an hired servant that is poor and needy, whether he be of thy brethren, or of thy strangers that are in thy land within thy gates:
target: Janganlah engkau memeras pekerja harian yang miskin dan menderita, baik ia saudaramu maupun seorang asing yang ada di negerimu, di dalam tempatmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
