input: Upright men shall be astonied at this, and the innocent shall stir up himself against the hypocrite.
target: Orang-orang yang jujur tercengang karena hal itu, dan orang yang tidak bersalah naik pitam terhadap orang fasik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Return, I pray you, let it not be iniquity; yea, return again, my righteousness is in it.
target: Berbaliklah, janganlah terjadi kecurangan, berbaliklah, aku pasti benar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This is a faithful saying, and worthy of all acceptation, that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners; of whom I am chief.
target: Perkataan ini benar dan patut diterima sepenuhnya: "Kristus Yesus datang ke dunia untuk menyelamatkan orang berdosa," dan di antara mereka akulah yang paling berdosa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thy right hand, O LORD, is become glorious in power: thy right hand, O LORD, hath dashed in pieces the enemy.
target: Tangan kanan-Mu, TUHAN, mulia karena kekuasaan-Mu, tangan kanan-Mu, TUHAN, menghancurkan musuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The thoughts of the diligent tend only to plenteousness; but of every one that is hasty only to want.
target: Rancangan orang rajin semata-mata mendatangkan kelimpahan, tetapi setiap orang yang tergesa-gesa hanya akan mengalami kekurangan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he would have put him to death, he feared the multitude, because they counted him as a prophet.
target: Herodes ingin membunuhnya, tetapi ia takut akan orang banyak yang memandang Yohanes sebagai nabi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To devise cunning works, to work in gold, and in silver, and in brass,
target: untuk membuat berbagai rancangan supaya dikerjakan dari emas, perak dan tembaga;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Giving thanks unto the Father, which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light:
target: dan mengucap syukur dengan sukacita kepada Bapa, yang melayakkan kamu untuk mendapat bagian dalam apa yang ditentukan untuk orang-orang kudus di dalam kerajaan terang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king said unto me, (the queen also sitting by him,) For how long shall thy journey be? and when wilt thou return? So it pleased the king to send me; and I set him a time.
target: Lalu bertanyalah raja kepadaku, sedang permaisuri duduk di sampingnya: "Berapa lama engkau dalam perjalanan, dan bilakah engkau kembali?" Dan raja berkenan mengutus aku, sesudah aku menyebut suatu jangka waktu kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.
target: Apabila aku ingat kepada-Mu di tempat tidurku, merenungkan Engkau sepanjang kawal malam, —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: On these two commandments hang all the law and the prophets.
target: Pada kedua hukum inilah tergantung seluruh hukum Taurat dan kitab para nabi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The foolish shall not stand in thy sight: thou hatest all workers of iniquity.
target: Sebab Engkau bukanlah Allah yang berkenan kepada kefasikan; orang jahat takkan menumpang pada-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Joshua passed from Makkedah, and all Israel with him, unto Libnah, and fought against Libnah:
target: Kemudian Yosua dengan seluruh Israel berjalan terus dari Makeda ke Libna, lalu memerangi Libna.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Pilate answered, Am I a Jew? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me: what hast thou done?
target: Kata Pilatus: "Apakah aku seorang Yahudi? Bangsa-Mu sendiri dan imam-imam kepala yang telah menyerahkan Engkau kepadaku; apakah yang telah Engkau perbuat?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they brought their offering before the LORD, six covered wagons, and twelve oxen; a wagon for two of the princes, and for each one an ox: and they brought them before the tabernacle.
target: Sebagai persembahan dibawa mereka ke hadapan TUHAN: enam kereta beratap dengan dua belas ekor lembu; satu kereta untuk dua orang pemimpin dan satu ekor lembu untuk satu orang pemimpin, lalu mereka membawa semuanya itu ke depan Kemah Suci.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Mishmannah the fourth, Jeremiah the fifth,
target: Mismana, orang keempat; Yeremia, orang kelima;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they were glad, and covenanted to give him money.
target: Mereka sangat gembira dan bermupakat untuk memberikan sejumlah uang kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he killed it; and Moses sprinkled the blood upon the altar round about.
target: Domba itu disembelih, lalu Musa menyiramkan darahnya pada mezbah sekelilingnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: John did baptize in the wilderness, and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins.
target: demikianlah Yohanes Pembaptis tampil di padang gurun dan menyerukan: "Bertobatlah dan berilah dirimu dibaptis dan Allah akan mengampuni dosamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Even unto the morrow after the seventh sabbath shall ye number fifty days; and ye shall offer a new meat offering unto the LORD.
target: sampai pada hari sesudah sabat yang ketujuh kamu harus hitung lima puluh hari; lalu kamu harus mempersembahkan korban sajian yang baru kepada TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said Jeremiah, It is false; I fall not away to the Chaldeans. But he hearkened not to him: so Irijah took Jeremiah, and brought him to the princes.
target: Dan sekalipun Yeremia menjawab: "Itu bohong, aku tidak hendak menyeberang kepada orang Kasdim!", tetapi Yeria tidak mendengarkan, lalu ia menangkap Yeremia dan membawanya menghadap para pemuka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he took it down, and wrapped it in linen, and laid it in a sepulchre that was hewn in stone, wherein never man before was laid.
target: Dan sesudah ia menurunkan mayat itu, ia mengapaninya dengan kain lenan, lalu membaringkannya di dalam kubur yang digali di dalam bukit batu, di mana belum pernah dibaringkan mayat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when we cried unto the LORD, he heard our voice, and sent an angel, and hath brought us forth out of Egypt: and, behold, we are in Kadesh, a city in the uttermost of thy border:
target: bahwa kami berteriak kepada TUHAN, dan Ia mendengarkan suara kami, mengutus seorang malaikat dan menuntun kami keluar dari Mesir. Sekarang ini kami ada di Kadesh, sebuah kota di tepi perbatasanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And let the priests also, which come near to the LORD, sanctify themselves, lest the LORD break forth upon them.
target: Juga para imam yang datang mendekat kepada TUHAN haruslah menguduskan dirinya, supaya TUHAN jangan melanda mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Adoram was over the tribute: and Jehoshaphat the son of Ahilud was recorder:
target: Adoram menjadi kepala orang rodi dan Yosafat bin Ahilud menjadi bendahara negara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in princes.
target: Lebih baik berlindung pada TUHAN dari pada percaya kepada para bangsawan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If ye were of the world, the world would love his own: but because ye are not of the world, but I have chosen you out of the world, therefore the world hateth you.
target: Sekiranya kamu dari dunia, tentulah dunia mengasihi kamu sebagai miliknya. Tetapi karena kamu bukan dari dunia, melainkan Aku telah memilih kamu dari dunia, sebab itulah dunia membenci kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The wife hath not power of her own body, but the husband: and likewise also the husband hath not power of his own body, but the wife.
target: Isteri tidak berkuasa atas tubuhnya sendiri, tetapi suaminya, demikian pula suami tidak berkuasa atas tubuhnya sendiri, tetapi isterinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thy lovingkindness is before mine eyes: and I have walked in thy truth.
target: Sebab mataku tertuju pada kasih setia-Mu, dan aku hidup dalam kebenaran-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I am feeble and sore broken: I have roared by reason of the disquietness of my heart.
target: Sebab pinggangku penuh radang, tidak ada yang sehat pada dagingku;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then I brought up the princes of Judah upon the wall, and appointed two great companies of them that gave thanks, whereof one went on the right hand upon the wall toward the dung gate:
target: Lalu aku mempersilakan para pemimpin orang Yehuda naik ke atas tembok dan kubentuk dua paduan suara yang besar. Yang satu berarak ke kanan di atas tembok ke jurusan pintu gerbang Sampah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Like as a lion that is greedy of his prey, and as it were a young lion lurking in secret places.
target: Rupa mereka seperti singa, yang bernafsu untuk menerkam, seperti singa muda, yang mengendap di tempat yang tersembunyi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it was told Saul that David was come to Keilah. And Saul said, God hath delivered him into mine hand; for he is shut in, by entering into a town that hath gates and bars.
target: Kepada Saul diberitahukan, bahwa Daud telah masuk Kehila. Lalu berkatalah Saul: "Allah telah menyerahkan dia ke dalam tanganku, sebab dengan masuk ke dalam kota yang berpintu dan berpalang ia telah mengurung dirinya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace, and in all other places;
target: sehingga telah jelas bagi seluruh istana dan semua orang lain, bahwa aku dipenjarakan karena Kristus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: His substance also was seven thousand sheep, and three thousand camels, and five hundred yoke of oxen, and five hundred she asses, and a very great household; so that this man was the greatest of all the men of the east.
target: Ia memiliki tujuh ribu ekor kambing domba, tiga ribu ekor unta, lima ratus pasang lembu, lima ratus keledai betina dan budak-budak dalam jumlah yang sangat besar, sehingga orang itu adalah yang terkaya dari semua orang di sebelah timur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the altar of burnt offering with all his furniture, and the laver and his foot,
target: mezbah korban bakaran dengan segala perkakasnya, bejana pembasuhan dengan alasnya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Saul said to David, Blessed be thou, my son David: thou shalt both do great things, and also shalt still prevail. So David went on his way, and Saul returned to his place.
target: Lalu berkatalah Saul kepada Daud: "Diberkatilah kiranya engkau, anakku Daud. Apa jua pun yang kauperbuat, pastilah engkau sanggup melakukannya." Lalu pergilah Daud meneruskan perjalanannya dan pulanglah Saul ke tempatnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And by their prayer for you, which long after you for the exceeding grace of God in you.
target: sedangkan di dalam doa mereka, mereka juga merindukan kamu oleh karena kasih karunia Allah yang melimpah di atas kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Aaron and his sons have made an end of covering the sanctuary, and all the vessels of the sanctuary, as the camp is to set forward; after that, the sons of Kohath shall come to bear it: but they shall not touch any holy thing, lest they die. These things are the burden of the sons of Kohath in the tabernacle of the congregation.
target: Setelah Harun dan anak-anaknya selesai menudungi barang-barang kudus dan segala perkakas tempat kudus, pada waktu perkemahan akan berangkat, barulah orang Kehat boleh masuk ke dalam untuk mengangkat barang-barang itu; tetapi janganlah mereka kena kepada barang-barang kudus itu, nanti mereka mati. Jadi itulah barang-barang di Kemah Pertemuan yang harus diangkat bani Kehat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And their meat offering shall be of flour mingled with oil, three tenth deals for a bullock, and two tenth deals for a ram,
target: juga sebagai korban sajiannya: tepung yang terbaik, diolah dengan minyak, yakni tiga persepuluh efa untuk lembu jantan itu, dua persepuluh efa untuk domba jantan itu

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As for thee also, by the blood of thy covenant I have sent forth thy prisoners out of the pit wherein is no water.
target: Mengenai engkau, oleh karena darah perjanjian-Ku dengan engkau, Aku akan melepaskan orang-orang tahananmu dari lobang yang tidak berair.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The entrance of thy words giveth light; it giveth understanding unto the simple.
target: Bila tersingkap, firman-firman-Mu memberi terang, memberi pengertian kepada orang-orang bodoh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thy carcase shall be meat unto all fowls of the air, and unto the beasts of the earth, and no man shall fray them away.
target: Mayatmu akan menjadi makanan segala burung di udara serta binatang-binatang di bumi, dengan tidak ada yang mengganggunya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ananias hearing these words fell down, and gave up the ghost: and great fear came on all them that heard these things.
target: Ketika mendengar perkataan itu rebahlah Ananias dan putuslah nyawanya. Maka sangatlah ketakutan semua orang yang mendengar hal itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: It may be the LORD thy God will hear the words of Rabshakeh, whom the king of Assyria his master hath sent to reproach the living God, and will reprove the words which the LORD thy God hath heard: wherefore lift up thy prayer for the remnant that is left.
target: Mungkin TUHAN, Allahmu, sudah mendengar perkataan juru minuman agung yang telah diutus oleh raja Asyur, tuannya, untuk mencela Allah yang hidup, sehingga TUHAN, Allahmu, mau memberi hukuman karena perkataan-perkataan yang telah didengar-Nya. Maka baiklah engkau menaikkan doa untuk sisa yang masih tinggal ini!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If his master have given him a wife, and she have born him sons or daughters; the wife and her children shall be her master's, and he shall go out by himself.
target: Jika tuannya memberikan kepadanya seorang isteri dan perempuan itu melahirkan anak-anak lelaki atau perempuan, maka perempuan itu dengan anak-anaknya tetap menjadi kepunyaan tuannya, dan budak laki-laki itu harus keluar seorang diri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then spake Elisha unto the woman, whose son he had restored to life, saying, Arise, and go thou and thine household, and sojourn wheresoever thou canst sojourn: for the LORD hath called for a famine; and it shall also come upon the land seven years.
target: Elisa telah berbicara kepada perempuan yang anaknya dihidupkannya kembali, katanya: "Berkemaslah dan pergilah bersama-sama dengan keluargamu, dan tinggallah di mana saja engkau dapat menetap sebagai pendatang, sebab TUHAN telah mendatangkan kelaparan, yang pasti menimpa negeri ini tujuh tahun lamanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Seven years old was Jehoash when he began to reign.
target: Yoas berumur tujuh tahun pada waktu ia menjadi raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But rather seek ye the kingdom of God; and all these things shall be added unto you.
target: Tetapi carilah Kerajaan-Nya, maka semuanya itu akan ditambahkan juga kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass a long time after that the LORD had given rest unto Israel from all their enemies round about, that Joshua waxed old and stricken in age.
target: Lama setelah TUHAN mengaruniakan keamanan kepada orang Israel ke segala penjuru terhadap semua musuhnya, dan ketika Yosua telah tua dan lanjut umur,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will give this people favour in the sight of the Egyptians: and it shall come to pass, that, when ye go, ye shall not go empty.
target: Dan Aku akan membuat orang Mesir bermurah hati terhadap bangsa ini, sehingga, apabila kamu pergi, kamu tidak pergi dengan tangan hampa,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But when it pleased God, who separated me from my mother's womb, and called me by his grace,
target: Tetapi waktu Ia, yang telah memilih aku sejak kandungan ibuku dan memanggil aku oleh kasih karunia-Nya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The measure thereof is longer than the earth, and broader than the sea.
target: Lebih panjang dari pada bumi ukurannya, dan lebih luas dari pada samudera.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David went up at the saying of Gad, which he spake in the name of the LORD.
target: Lalu pergilah Daud, sesuai dengan perkataan Gad yang diucapkannya demi nama TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover they that work in fine flax, and they that weave networks, shall be confounded.
target: Orang-orang yang mengolah lenan akan mendapat malu, demikian juga tukang-tukang tenun kain putih.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he made the incense altar of shittim wood: the length of it was a cubit, and the breadth of it a cubit; it was foursquare; and two cubits was the height of it; the horns thereof were of the same.
target: Dibuatnyalah mezbah pembakaran ukupan itu dari kayu penaga, sehasta panjangnya dan sehasta lebarnya, empat persegi, tetapi dua hasta tingginya; tanduk-tanduknya seiras dengan mezbah itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: After they were come to Mysia, they assayed to go into Bithynia: but the Spirit suffered them not.
target: Dan setibanya di Misia mereka mencoba masuk ke daerah Bitinia, tetapi Roh Yesus tidak mengizinkan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Not that any man hath seen the Father, save he which is of God, he hath seen the Father.
target: Hal itu tidak berarti, bahwa ada orang yang telah melihat Bapa. Hanya Dia yang datang dari Allah, Dialah yang telah melihat Bapa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He spake unto them in the cloudy pillar: they kept his testimonies, and the ordinance that he gave them.
target: Dalam tiang awan Ia berbicara kepada mereka; mereka telah berpegang pada peringatan-peringatan-Nya dan ketetapan yang diberikan-Nya kepada mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I charge thee therefore before God, and the Lord Jesus Christ, who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and his kingdom;
target: Di hadapan Allah dan Kristus Yesus yang akan menghakimi orang yang hidup dan yang mati, aku berpesan dengan sungguh-sungguh kepadamu demi penyataan-Nya dan demi Kerajaan-Nya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hodijah, Bani, Beninu.
target: Hodia, Bani dan Beninu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when they had fasted and prayed, and laid their hands on them, they sent them away.
target: Maka berpuasa dan berdoalah mereka, dan setelah meletakkan tangan ke atas kedua orang itu, mereka membiarkan keduanya pergi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Incline my heart unto thy testimonies, and not to covetousness.
target: Condongkanlah hatiku kepada peringatan-peringatan-Mu, dan jangan kepada laba.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As touching our brother Apollos, I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren: but his will was not at all to come at this time; but he will come when he shall have convenient time.
target: Tentang saudara Apolos: telah berulang-ulang aku mendesaknya untuk bersama-sama dengan saudara-saudara lain mengunjungi kamu, tetapi ia sama sekali tidak mau datang sekarang. Kalau ada kesempatan baik nanti, ia akan datang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Man did eat angels' food: he sent them meat to the full.
target: setiap orang telah makan roti malaikat, Ia mengirimkan perbekalan kepada mereka berlimpah-limpah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore then gavest not thou my money into the bank, that at my coming I might have required mine own with usury?
target: Jika demikian, mengapa uangku itu tidak kauberikan kepada orang yang menjalankan uang? Maka sekembaliku aku dapat mengambilnya serta dengan bunganya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Day unto day uttereth speech, and night unto night sheweth knowledge.
target: Langit menceritakan kemuliaan Allah, dan cakrawala memberitakan pekerjaan tangan-Nya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ought not Christ to have suffered these things, and to enter into his glory?
target: Bukankah Mesias harus menderita semuanya itu untuk masuk ke dalam kemuliaan-Nya?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore the LORD brought upon them the captains of the host of the king of Assyria, which took Manasseh among the thorns, and bound him with fetters, and carried him to Babylon.
target: Oleh sebab itu TUHAN mendatangkan kepada mereka panglima-panglima tentara raja Asyur yang menangkap Manasye dengan kaitan, membelenggunya dengan rantai tembaga dan membawanya ke Babel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now on the fourth day was the silver and the gold and the vessels weighed in the house of our God by the hand of Meremoth the son of Uriah the priest; and with him was Eleazar the son of Phinehas; and with them was Jozabad the son of Jeshua, and Noadiah the son of Binnui, Levites;
target: maka pada hari yang keempat ditimbanglah perak dan emas dan perlengkapan-perlengkapan itu di dalam rumah Allah kami di bawah pengawasan imam Meremot bin Uria, yang didampingi oleh Eleazar bin Pinehas, dan mereka dibantu oleh Yozabad bin Yesua dan Noaja bin Binui, orang-orang Lewi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O give thanks unto the God of gods: for his mercy endureth for ever.
target: Bersyukurlah kepada Allah segala allah! Bahwasanya untuk selama-lamanya kasih setia-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the ass saw the angel of the LORD, she fell down under Balaam: and Balaam's anger was kindled, and he smote the ass with a staff.
target: Melihat Malaikat TUHAN meniaraplah keledai itu dengan Bileam masih di atasnya. Maka bangkitlah amarah Bileam, lalu dipukulnyalah keledai itu dengan tongkat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if this come to the governor's ears, we will persuade him, and secure you.
target: Dan apabila hal ini kedengaran oleh wali negeri, kami akan berbicara dengan dia, sehingga kamu tidak beroleh kesulitan apa-apa."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in all the land of your possession ye shall grant a redemption for the land.
target: Di seluruh tanah milikmu haruslah kamu memberi hak menebus tanah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Remember, Lord, the reproach of thy servants; how I do bear in my bosom the reproach of all the mighty people;
target: Di manakah kasih setia-Mu yang mula-mula, ya Tuhan, yang telah Kaujanjikan dengan sumpah kepada Daud demi kesetiaan-Mu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD'S anger was kindled against Israel, and he made them wander in the wilderness forty years, until all the generation, that had done evil in the sight of the LORD, was consumed.
target: Sebab itu bangkitlah murka TUHAN kepada orang Israel, sehingga Ia membuat mereka mengembara di padang gurun empat puluh tahun lamanya, sampai habis mati segenap angkatan yang telah berbuat jahat di mata TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God appeared unto Jacob again, when he came out of Padanaram, and blessed him.
target: Setelah Yakub datang dari Padan-Aram, maka Allah menampakkan diri pula kepadanya dan memberkati dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For we know that the law is spiritual: but I am carnal, sold under sin.
target: Sebab kita tahu, bahwa hukum Taurat adalah rohani, tetapi aku bersifat daging, terjual di bawah kuasa dosa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Lot went out at the door unto them, and shut the door after him,
target: Lalu keluarlah Lot menemui mereka, ke depan pintu, tetapi pintu ditutupnya di belakangnya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore hear the counsel of the LORD, that he hath taken against Edom; and his purposes, that he hath purposed against the inhabitants of Teman: Surely the least of the flock shall draw them out: surely he shall make their habitations desolate with them.
target: Sebab itu dengarlah putusan yang telah diambil TUHAN terhadap Edom dan rancangan-rancangan yang telah dibuat-Nya terhadap penduduk T'eman: Bahwa sesungguhnya, yang paling lemah pun di antara kawanan domba akan diseret. Bahwa sesungguhnya, padang rumput mereka sendiri akan merasa ngeri terhadap mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For, behold, the days are coming, in the which they shall say, Blessed are the barren, and the wombs that never bare, and the paps which never gave suck.
target: Sebab lihat, akan tiba masanya orang berkata: Berbahagialah perempuan mandul dan yang rahimnya tidak pernah melahirkan, dan yang susunya tidak pernah menyusui.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the high priest stood up in the midst, and asked Jesus, saying, Answerest thou nothing? what is it which these witness against thee?
target: Maka Imam Besar bangkit berdiri di tengah-tengah sidang dan bertanya kepada Yesus, katanya: "Tidakkah Engkau memberi jawab atas tuduhan-tuduhan saksi-saksi ini terhadap Engkau?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the LORD is a great God, and a great King above all gods.
target: Sebab TUHAN adalah Allah yang besar, dan Raja yang besar mengatasi segala allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: It is good for me that I have been afflicted; that I might learn thy statutes.
target: Bahwa aku tertindas itu baik bagiku, supaya aku belajar ketetapan-ketetapan-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For before the child shall know to refuse the evil, and choose the good, the land that thou abhorrest shall be forsaken of both her kings.
target: sebab sebelum anak itu tahu menolak yang jahat dan memilih yang baik, maka negeri yang kedua rajanya engkau takuti akan ditinggalkan kosong.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said unto Moses, When thou goest to return into Egypt, see that thou do all those wonders before Pharaoh, which I have put in thine hand: but I will harden his heart, that he shall not let the people go.
target: Firman TUHAN kepada Musa: "Pada waktu engkau hendak kembali ini ke Mesir, ingatlah, supaya segala mujizat yang telah Kuserahkan ke dalam tanganmu, kauperbuat di depan Firaun. Tetapi Aku akan mengeraskan hatinya, sehingga ia tidak membiarkan bangsa itu pergi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For neither at any time used we flattering words, as ye know, nor a cloke of covetousness; God is witness:
target: Karena kami tidak pernah bermulut manis — hal itu kamu ketahui — dan tidak pernah mempunyai maksud loba yang tersembunyi — Allah adalah saksi —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then came the children of Israel, even the whole congregation, into the desert of Zin in the first month: and the people abode in Kadesh; and Miriam died there, and was buried there.
target: Kemudian sampailah orang Israel, yakni segenap umat itu, ke padang gurun Zin, dalam bulan pertama, lalu tinggallah bangsa itu di Kadesh. Matilah Miryam di situ dan dikuburkan di situ.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They are vanity, and the work of errors: in the time of their visitation they shall perish.
target: semuanya adalah kesia-siaan, pekerjaan yang menjadi buah ejekan, dan yang akan binasa pada waktu dihukum.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the rest of the oil that is in the priest's hand he shall put upon the head of him that is to be cleansed, to make an atonement for him before the LORD.
target: Dan minyak selebihnya haruslah dibubuhnya pada kepala orang yang akan ditahirkan, supaya diadakan pendamaian bagi orang itu di hadapan TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This day will the LORD deliver thee into mine hand; and I will smite thee, and take thine head from thee; and I will give the carcases of the host of the Philistines this day unto the fowls of the air, and to the wild beasts of the earth; that all the earth may know that there is a God in Israel.
target: Hari ini juga TUHAN akan menyerahkan engkau ke dalam tanganku dan aku akan mengalahkan engkau dan memenggal kepalamu dari tubuhmu; hari ini juga aku akan memberikan mayatmu dan mayat tentara orang Filistin kepada burung-burung di udara dan kepada binatang-binatang liar, supaya seluruh bumi tahu, bahwa Israel mempunyai Allah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Judge not, and ye shall not be judged: condemn not, and ye shall not be condemned: forgive, and ye shall be forgiven:
target: "Janganlah kamu menghakimi, maka kamu pun tidak akan dihakimi. Dan janganlah kamu menghukum, maka kamu pun tidak akan dihukum; ampunilah dan kamu akan diampuni.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall come to pass in that day, that the Lord shall set his hand again the second time to recover the remnant of his people, which shall be left, from Assyria, and from Egypt, and from Pathros, and from Cush, and from Elam, and from Shinar, and from Hamath, and from the islands of the sea.
target: Pada waktu itu Tuhan akan mengangkat pula tangan-Nya untuk menebus sisa-sisa umat-Nya yang tertinggal di Asyur dan di Mesir, di Patros, di Etiopia dan di Elam, di Sinear, di Hamat dan di pulau-pulau di laut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For if I be an offender, or have committed any thing worthy of death, I refuse not to die: but if there be none of these things whereof these accuse me, no man may deliver me unto them. I appeal unto Caesar.
target: Jadi, jika aku benar-benar bersalah dan berbuat sesuatu kejahatan yang setimpal dengan hukuman mati, aku rela mati, tetapi, jika apa yang mereka tuduhkan itu terhadap aku ternyata tidak benar, tidak ada seorang pun yang berhak menyerahkan aku sebagai suatu anugerah kepada mereka. Aku naik banding kepada Kaisar!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when the captains of the chariots saw Jehoshaphat, that they said, It is the king of Israel. Therefore they compassed about him to fight: but Jehoshaphat cried out, and the LORD helped him; and God moved them to depart from him.
target: Segera sesudah para panglima pasukan kereta itu melihat Yosafat, mereka berkata: "Itu raja Israel!" Lalu mereka mengepung dia, untuk menyerang dia, tetapi Yosafat berteriak dan TUHAN menolongnya. Allah membujuk mereka pergi dari padanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he wrote in the king Ahasuerus' name, and sealed it with the king's ring, and sent letters by posts on horseback, and riders on mules, camels, and young dromedaries:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also, O Judah, he hath set an harvest for thee, when I returned the captivity of my people.

target: Lalu Yakobus dan Yohanes, anak-anak Zebedeus, mendekati Yesus dan berkata kepada-Nya: "Guru, kami harap supaya Engkau kiranya mengabulkan suatu permintaan kami!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise, as some men count slackness; but is longsuffering to us-ward, not willing that any should perish, but that all should come to repentance.
target: Tuhan tidak lalai menepati janji-Nya, sekalipun ada orang yang menganggapnya sebagai kelalaian, tetapi Ia sabar terhadap kamu, karena Ia menghendaki supaya jangan ada yang binasa, melainkan supaya semua orang berbalik dan bertobat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Jerusalem which is above is free, which is the mother of us all.
target: Tetapi Yerusalem sorgawi adalah perempuan yang merdeka, dan ialah ibu kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the women that were wise hearted did spin with their hands, and brought that which they had spun, both of blue, and of purple, and of scarlet, and of fine linen.
target: Setiap perempuan yang ahli, memintal dengan tangannya sendiri dan membawa yang dipintalnya itu, yakni kain ungu tua, kain ungu muda, kain kirmizi dan lenan halus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But cleave unto the LORD your God, as ye have done unto this day.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Pharaoh sent, and, behold, there was not one of the cattle of the Israelites dead. And the heart of Pharaoh was hardened, and he did not let the people go.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar, Pontius Pilate being governor of Judaea, and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee, and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituraea and of the region of Trachonitis, and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene,
target: Dalam tahun kelima belas dari pemerintahan Kaisar Tiberius, ketika Pontius Pilatus menjadi wali negeri Yudea, dan Herodes raja wilayah Galilea, Filipus, saudaranya, raja wilayah Iturea dan Trakhonitis, dan Lisanias raja wilayah Abilene,

input: Moreover he said, I am the God of thy father, the God of Abraham, the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob. And Moses hid his face; for he was afraid to look upon God.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For if they do these things in a green tree, what shall be done in the dry?

target: Abigail melahirkan Amasa dan ayah Amasa ialah Yeter, orang Ismael itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Lalu mereka menjawab Yesus: "Kami tidak tahu." Maka kata Yesus kepada mereka: "Jika demikian, Aku juga tidak mengatakan kepadamu dengan kuasa manakah Aku melakukan hal-hal itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore the king hearkened not unto the people; for the cause was from the LORD, that he might perform his saying, which the LORD spake by Ahijah the Shilonite unto Jeroboam the son of Nebat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Saying with a loud voice, Worthy is the Lamb that was slain to receive power, and riches, and wisdom, and strength, and honour, and glory, and blessing.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And two boards shalt thou make for the corners of the tabernacle in the two sides.

target: Perak mereka akan dicampakkan ke luar dan emas mereka akan dianggap cemar. Emas dan peraknya tidak akan dapat menyelamatkan mereka pada hari kemurkaan TUHAN. Mereka tidak akan kenyang karenanya dan perut mereka tidak akan terisi dengannya. Sebab hal itu menjadi batu sandungan, yang menjatuhkan mereka ke dalam kesalahan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he took the damsel by the hand, and said unto her, Talitha cumi; which is, being interpreted, Damsel, I say unto thee, arise.
target: Lalu dipegang-Nya tangan anak itu, kata-Nya: "Talita kum," yang berarti: "Hai anak, Aku berkata kepadamu, bangunlah!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, When ye do the office of a midwife to the Hebrew women, and see them upon the stools; if it be a son, then ye shall kill him: but if it be a daughter, then she shall live.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They have hands, but they handle not: feet have they, but they walk not: neither speak they through their throat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he restored the chief butler unto his butlership again; and he gave the cup into Pharaoh's hand:

input: And he drank of the wine, and was drunken; and he was uncovered within his tent.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he had spent all, there arose a mighty famine in that land; and he began to be in want.

input: For the LORD will not forsake his people for his great name's sake: because it hath pleased the LORD to make you his people.

input: Beside the chief of Solomon's officers which were over the work, three thousand and three hundred, which ruled over the people that wrought in the work.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then did the cherubims lift up their wings, and the wheels beside them; and the glory of the God of Israel was over them above.

input: And after this, Abraham buried Sarah his wife in the cave of the field of Machpelah before Mamre: the same is Hebron in the land of Canaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There is that speaketh like the piercings of a sword: but the tongue of the wise is health.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But when the children of Israel cried unto the LORD, the LORD raised them up a deliverer, Ehud the son of Gera, a Benjamite, a man lefthanded: and by him the children of Israel sent a present unto Eglon the king of Moab.
target: Lalu orang Israel berseru kepada TUHAN, maka TUHAN membangkitkan bagi mereka seorang penyelamat yakni Ehud, anak Gera, orang Benyamin, seorang yang kidal. Dengan perantaraannya orang Israel biasa mengirimkan upeti kepada Eglon, raja Moab.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith Sennacherib king of Assyria, Whereon do ye trust, that ye abide in the siege in Jerusalem?
target: "Beginilah titah Sanherib, raja Asyur: Apakah yang kamu harapkan, maka kamu tinggal saja di Yerusalem yang terkepung ini?

input: And Jehu slept with his fathers: and they buried him in Samaria. And Jehoahaz his son reigned in his stead.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as they were eating, Jesus took bread, and blessed it, and brake it, and gave it to the disciples, and said, Take, eat; this is my body.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The works of his hands are verity and judgment; all his commandments are sure.

input: And he reared up the pillars before the temple, one on the right hand, and the other on the left; and called the name of that on the right hand Jachin, and the name of that on the left Boaz.
target: Tiang-tiang itu didirikannya di depan Bait Suci, yang satu di sebelah kanan dan yang lain di sebelah kiri; tiang kanan dinamainya Yakhin, dan tiang kiri Boas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I call heaven and earth to record this day against you, that I have set before you life and death, blessing and cursing: therefore choose life, that both thou and thy seed may live:
target: Aku memanggil langit dan bumi menjadi saksi terhadap kamu pada hari ini: kepadamu kuperhadapkan kehidupan dan kematian, berkat dan kutuk. Pilihlah kehidupan, supaya engkau hidup, baik engkau maupun keturunanmu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses said unto the judges of Israel, Slay ye every one his men that were joined unto Baalpeor.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To such as keep his covenant, and to those that remember his commandments to do them.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thou, O LORD of hosts, God of Israel, hast revealed to thy servant, saying, I will build thee an house: therefore hath thy servant found in his heart to pray this prayer unto thee.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The men of Nineve shall rise up in the judgment with this generation, and shall condemn it: for they repented at the preaching of Jonas; and, behold, a greater than Jonas is here.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sons of Judah; Pharez, Hezron, and Carmi, and Hur, and Shobal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they gave Hebron unto Caleb, as Moses said: and he expelled thence the three sons of Anak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the meek shall inherit the earth; and shall delight themselves in the abundance of peace.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces that were in the fields, came to Gedaliah to Mizpah,
target: Pada suatu kali Yohanan bin Kareah dan semua panglima tentara yang masih berada di luar kota datang kepada Gedalya di Mizpa,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The Spirit itself beareth witness with our spirit, that we are the children of God:
target: Roh itu bersaksi bersama-sama dengan roh kita, bahwa kita adalah anak-anak Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Joab arose and went to Geshur, and brought Absalom to Jerusalem.
target: Lalu bangunlah Yoab, ia pergi ke Gesur dan membawa Absalom ke Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He taught me also, and said unto me, Let thine heart retain my words: keep my commandments, and live.
target: aku diajari ayahku, katanya kepadaku: "Biarlah hatimu memegang perkataanku; berpeganglah pada petunjuk-petunjukku, maka engkau akan hidup.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Again, if two lie together, then they have heat: but how can one be warm alone?
target: Juga kalau orang tidur berdua, mereka menjadi panas, tetapi bagaimana seorang saja dapat menjadi panas?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he went into the synagogue, and spake boldly for the space of three months, disputing and persuading the things concerning the kingdom of God.
target: Selama tiga bulan Paulus mengunjungi rumah ibadat di situ dan mengajar dengan berani. Oleh pemberitaannya ia berusaha meyakinkan mereka tentang Kerajaan Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: How then wilt thou turn away the face of one captain of the least of my master's servants, and put thy trust on Egypt for chariots and for horsemen?
target: Bagaimanakah mungkin engkau memukul mundur satu orang perwira tuanku yang paling kecil? Padahal engkau berharap kepada Mesir dalam hal kereta dan orang-orang berkuda!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I have filled him with the spirit of God, in wisdom, and in understanding, and in knowledge, and in all manner of workmanship,
target: dan telah Kupenuhi dia dengan Roh Allah, dengan keahlian dan pengertian dan pengetahuan, dalam segala macam pekerjaan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he took a yoke of oxen, and hewed them in pieces, and sent them throughout all the coasts of Israel by the hands of messengers, saying, Whosoever cometh not forth after Saul and after Samuel, so shall it be done unto his oxen. And the fear of the LORD fell on the people, and they came out with one consent.
target: Diambilnyalah sepasang lembu, dipotong-potongnya, lalu potongan-potongan itu dikirimkannya ke seluruh daerah Israel dengan perantaraan utusan, pesannya: "Siapa yang tidak maju mengikuti Saul dan mengikuti Samuel, lembu-lembunya akan diperlakukan juga demikian." Lalu TUHAN mendatangkan ketakutan kepada bangsa itu, sehingga majulah mereka serentak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they did not receive him, because his face was as though he would go to Jerusalem.
target: Tetapi orang-orang Samaria itu tidak mau menerima Dia, karena perjalanan-Nya menuju Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I was dumb, I opened not my mouth; because thou didst it.
target: Lepaskanlah aku dari segala pelanggaranku, jangan jadikan aku celaan orang bebal!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Go, I pray you, prepare yet, and know and see his place where his haunt is, and who hath seen him there: for it is told me that he dealeth very subtilly.
target: Baiklah pergi, carilah kepastian lagi, berusahalah mengetahui di mana ia berada dan siapa yang telah melihat dia di sana; sebab telah dikatakan orang kepadaku, bahwa ia sangat cerdik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he put the mitre upon his head; also upon the mitre, even upon his forefront, did he put the golden plate, the holy crown; as the LORD commanded Moses.
target: Kemudian ditaruhnyalah serban di kepalanya, dan di atas serban itu di sebelah depan ditaruhnyalah patam emas, yakni jamang yang kudus, seperti yang diperintahkan TUHAN kepada Musa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the days of Shamgar the son of Anath, in the days of Jael, the highways were unoccupied, and the travellers walked through byways.
target: Dalam zaman Samgar bin Anat, dalam zaman Yael, kafilah tidak ada lagi dan orang-orang yang dalam perjalanan terpaksa menempuh jalan yang berbelit-belit.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There they buried Abraham and Sarah his wife; there they buried Isaac and Rebekah his wife; and there I buried Leah.
target: Di situlah dikuburkan Abraham beserta Sara, isterinya; di situlah dikuburkan Ishak beserta Ribka, isterinya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My son, give me thine heart, and let thine eyes observe my ways.
target: Hai anakku, berikanlah hatimu kepadaku, biarlah matamu senang dengan jalan-jalanku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The words of the LORD are pure words: as silver tried in a furnace of earth, purified seven times.
target: Oleh karena penindasan terhadap orang-orang yang lemah, oleh karena keluhan orang-orang miskin, sekarang juga Aku bangkit, firman TUHAN; Aku memberi keselamatan kepada orang yang menghauskannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they were all amazed at the mighty power of God. But while they wondered every one at all things which Jesus did, he said unto his disciples,
target: Maka takjublah semua orang itu karena kebesaran Allah. Ketika semua orang itu masih heran karena segala yang diperbuat-Nya itu, Yesus berkata kepada murid-murid-Nya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as for the people, he removed them to cities from one end of the borders of Egypt even to the other end thereof.
target: Dan tentang rakyat itu, diperhambakannyalah mereka di daerah Mesir dari ujung yang satu sampai ujung yang lain.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joshua spake unto the priests, saying, Take up the ark of the covenant, and pass over before the people. And they took up the ark of the covenant, and went before the people.
target: Dan kepada para imam itu Yosua berkata, demikian: "Angkatlah tabut perjanjian dan menyeberanglah di depan bangsa itu." Maka mereka mengangkat tabut perjanjian dan berjalan di depan bangsa itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Woe unto him that buildeth his house by unrighteousness, and his chambers by wrong; that useth his neighbour's service without wages, and giveth him not for his work;
target: Celakalah dia yang membangun istananya berdasarkan ketidakadilan dan anjungnya berdasarkan kelaliman, yang mempekerjakan sesamanya dengan cuma-cuma dan tidak memberikan upahnya kepadanya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now the name of his firstborn was Joel; and the name of his second, Abiah: they were judges in Beersheba.
target: Nama anaknya yang sulung ialah Yoël, dan nama anaknya yang kedua ialah Abia; keduanya menjadi hakim di Bersyeba.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yet ye have forsaken me, and served other gods: wherefore I will deliver you no more.
target: Tetapi kamu telah meninggalkan Aku dan beribadah kepada allah lain; sebab itu Aku tidak akan menyelamatkan kamu lagi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Them that sin rebuke before all, that others also may fear.
target: Mereka yang berbuat dosa hendaklah kautegor di depan semua orang agar yang lain itu pun takut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: With whom the LORD had made a covenant, and charged them, saying, Ye shall not fear other gods, nor bow yourselves to them, nor serve them, nor sacrifice to them:
target: TUHAN telah mengadakan perjanjian dengan mereka dan memberi perintah kepada mereka: "Janganlah berbakti kepada allah lain, janganlah sujud menyembah kepadanya, janganlah beribadah kepadanya dan janganlah mempersembahkan korban kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hear diligently my speech, and let this be your consolations.
target: "Dengarkanlah baik-baik perkataanku dan biarlah itu menjadi penghiburanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All that were numbered in the camp of Judah were an hundred thousand and fourscore thousand and six thousand and four hundred, throughout their armies. These shall first set forth.
target: Jumlah orang yang dicatat dalam laskar Yehuda menurut pasukan-pasukan mereka ada seratus delapan puluh enam ribu empat ratus orang. Merekalah yang terdahulu berangkat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As the Father hath loved me, so have I loved you: continue ye in my love.
target: "Seperti Bapa telah mengasihi Aku, demikianlah juga Aku telah mengasihi kamu; tinggallah di dalam kasih-Ku itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Bless the LORD, O house of Levi: ye that fear the LORD, bless the LORD.
target: Hai kaum Lewi, pujilah TUHAN! Hai orang-orang yang takut akan TUHAN, pujilah TUHAN!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Take heed, regard not iniquity: for this hast thou chosen rather than affliction.
target: Jagalah dirimu, janganlah berpaling kepada kejahatan, karena itulah sebabnya engkau dicobai oleh sengsara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I must die in this land, I must not go over Jordan: but ye shall go over, and possess that good land.
target: Sebab aku akan mati di negeri ini dan tidak akan menyeberangi sungai Yordan, tetapi kamu akan menyeberanginya dan menduduki negeri yang baik itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, Take them alive. And they took them alive, and slew them at the pit of the shearing house, even two and forty men; neither left he any of them.
target: Berkatalah Yehu: "Tangkaplah mereka hidup-hidup!" Lalu ditangkaplah mereka hidup-hidup dan disembelih dekat perigi Bet-Eked, empat puluh dua orang, dan tidak ada seorang pun ditinggalkannya hidup dari pada mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If my step hath turned out of the way, and mine heart walked after mine eyes, and if any blot hath cleaved to mine hands;
target: Jikalau langkahku menyimpang dari jalan, dan hatiku menuruti pandangan mataku, dan noda melekat pada tanganku,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they shall take up a lamentation for thee, and say to thee, How art thou destroyed, that wast inhabited of seafaring men, the renowned city, which wast strong in the sea, she and her inhabitants, which cause their terror to be on all that haunt it!
target: Dan mereka akan mengucapkan suatu ratapan mengenai engkau dan akan mengatakan kepadamu: Bagaimana engkau, hai kota yang terpuja, hilang dari lautan, kota yang berkuasa di laut, engkau dengan pendudukmu, yang menimbulkan ketakutan pada penduduk di daratan?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And so it was, when the cloud abode from even unto the morning, and that the cloud was taken up in the morning, then they journeyed: whether it was by day or by night that the cloud was taken up, they journeyed.
target: Ada kalanya awan itu tinggal dari petang sampai pagi; ketika awan itu naik pada waktu pagi, mereka pun berangkatlah; baik pada waktu siang baik pada waktu malam, apabila awan itu naik, mereka pun berangkatlah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Send thou men, that they may search the land of Canaan, which I give unto the children of Israel: of every tribe of their fathers shall ye send a man, every one a ruler among them.
target: "Suruhlah beberapa orang mengintai tanah Kanaan, yang akan Kuberikan kepada orang Israel; dari setiap suku nenek moyang mereka haruslah kausuruh seorang, semuanya pemimpin-pemimpin di antara mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: How then wilt thou turn away the face of one captain of the least of my master's servants, and put thy trust on Egypt for chariots and for horsemen?
target: Bagaimanakah mungkin engkau memukul mundur satu orang perwira tuanku yang paling kecil? Padahal engkau berharap kepada Mesir dalam hal kereta dan orang-orang berkuda!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These things did Benaiah the son of Jehoiada, and had the name among the three mighties.
target: Itulah yang diperbuat Benaya bin Yoyada; ia mendapat nama di antara ketiga puluh pahlawan itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This is he, that was in the church in the wilderness with the angel which spake to him in the mount Sina, and with our fathers: who received the lively oracles to give unto us:
target: Musa inilah yang menjadi pengantara dalam sidang jemaah di padang gurun di antara malaikat yang berfirman kepadanya di gunung Sinai dan nenek moyang kita; dan dialah yang menerima firman-firman yang hidup untuk menyampaikannya kepada kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ezekias begat Manasses; and Manasses begat Amon; and Amon begat Josias;
target: Hizkia memperanakkan Manasye, Manasye memperanakkan Amon, Amon memperanakkan Yosia,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the multitude of people is the king's honour: but in the want of people is the destruction of the prince.
target: Dalam besarnya jumlah rakyat terletak kemegahan raja, tetapi tanpa rakyat runtuhlah pemerintah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I tell you, this man went down to his house justified rather than the other: for every one that exalteth himself shall be abased; and he that humbleth himself shall be exalted.
target: Aku berkata kepadamu: Orang ini pulang ke rumahnya sebagai orang yang dibenarkan Allah dan orang lain itu tidak. Sebab barangsiapa meninggikan diri, ia akan direndahkan dan barangsiapa merendahkan diri, ia akan ditinggikan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will take you to me for a people, and I will be to you a God: and ye shall know that I am the LORD your God, which bringeth you out from under the burdens of the Egyptians.
target: Dan Aku akan membawa kamu ke negeri yang dengan sumpah telah Kujanjikan memberikannya kepada Abraham, Ishak dan Yakub, dan Aku akan memberikannya kepadamu untuk menjadi milikmu; Akulah TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house, as a servant, for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after;
target: Dan Musa memang setia dalam segenap rumah Allah sebagai pelayan untuk memberi kesaksian tentang apa yang akan diberitakan kemudian,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Balaam said unto God, Balak the son of Zippor, king of Moab, hath sent unto me, saying,
target: Dan berkatalah Bileam kepada Allah: "Balak bin Zipor, raja Moab, mengutus orang kepadaku dengan pesan:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That ye may eat the flesh of kings, and the flesh of captains, and the flesh of mighty men, and the flesh of horses, and of them that sit on them, and the flesh of all men, both free and bond, both small and great.
target: supaya kamu makan daging semua raja dan daging semua panglima dan daging semua pahlawan dan daging semua kuda dan daging semua penunggangnya dan daging semua orang, baik yang merdeka maupun hamba, baik yang kecil maupun yang besar."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: How he met thee by the way, and smote the hindmost of thee, even all that were feeble behind thee, when thou wast faint and weary; and he feared not God.
target: bahwa engkau didatangi mereka di jalan dan semua orang lemah pada barisan belakangmu dihantam mereka, sedang engkau lelah dan lesu. Mereka tidak takut akan Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when the people removed from their tents, to pass over Jordan, and the priests bearing the ark of the covenant before the people;
target: Ketika bangsa itu berangkat dari tempat perkemahan mereka untuk menyeberangi sungai Yordan, para imam pengangkat tabut perjanjian itu berjalan di depan bangsa itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then hear thou from heaven, and do, and judge thy servants, by requiting the wicked, by recompensing his way upon his own head; and by justifying the righteous, by giving him according to his righteousness.
target: maka Engkau pun hendaklah mendengar dari sorga dan bertindak serta mengadili hamba-hamba-Mu, yakni membalas perbuatan orang bersalah dengan menanggungkannya kepada orang itu sendiri, tetapi membenarkan orang yang benar dengan membalaskan kepadanya sesuai dengan kebenarannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou crownest the year with thy goodness; and thy paths drop fatness.
target: Engkau mengairi alur bajaknya, Engkau membasahi gumpalan-gumpalan tanahnya, dengan dirus hujan Engkau menggemburkannya; Engkau memberkati tumbuh-tumbuhannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now rise up, said I, and get you over the brook Zered. And we went over the brook Zered.
target: Jadi sekarang bersiaplah kamu dan seberangilah sungai Zered. Lalu kita menyeberangi sungai Zered.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Say not ye, There are yet four months, and then cometh harvest? behold, I say unto you, Lift up your eyes, and look on the fields; for they are white already to harvest.
target: Bukankah kamu mengatakan: Empat bulan lagi tibalah musim menuai? Tetapi Aku berkata kepadamu: Lihatlah sekelilingmu dan pandanglah ladang-ladang yang sudah menguning dan matang untuk dituai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping, and the Jews also weeping which came with her, he groaned in the spirit, and was troubled.
target: Ketika Yesus melihat Maria menangis dan juga orang-orang Yahudi yang datang bersama-sama dia, maka masygullah hati-Nya. Ia sangat terharu dan berkata:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And not as it was by one that sinned, so is the gift: for the judgment was by one to condemnation, but the free gift is of many offences unto justification.
target: Dan kasih karunia tidak berimbangan dengan dosa satu orang. Sebab penghakiman atas satu pelanggaran itu telah mengakibatkan penghukuman, tetapi penganugerahan karunia atas banyak pelanggaran itu mengakibatkan pembenaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he went out from thence, and came into his own country; and his disciples follow him.
target: Kemudian Yesus berangkat dari situ dan tiba di tempat asal-Nya, sedang murid-murid-Nya mengikuti Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the two and fiftieth year of Azariah king of Judah Pekah the son of Remaliah began to reign over Israel in Samaria, and reigned twenty years.
target: Dalam tahun kelima puluh dua zaman Azarya, raja Yehuda, Pekah bin Remalya menjadi raja atas orang Israel di Samaria. Ia memerintah dua puluh tahun lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Because thou hast lifted up thyself in height, and he hath shot up his top among the thick boughs, and his heart is lifted up in his height;
target: Oleh sebab itu beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Oleh karena ia tumbuh tinggi dan puncaknya menjulang sampai ke langit dan ia menjadi sombong karena ketinggiannya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Notwithstanding it pleased Silas to abide there still.
target: Tetapi Silas memutuskan untuk tinggal di situ.]

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Beware lest Hezekiah persuade you, saying, the LORD will deliver us. Hath any of the gods of the nations delivered his land out of the hand of the king of Assyria?
target: Jangan sampai Hizkia membujuk kamu dengan mengatakan: TUHAN akan melepaskan kita! Apakah pernah para allah bangsa-bangsa melepaskan negerinya masing-masing dari tangan raja Asyur?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In his humiliation his judgment was taken away: and who shall declare his generation? for his life is taken from the earth.
target: Dalam kehinaan-Nya berlangsunglah hukuman-Nya; siapakah yang akan menceriterakan asal usul-Nya? Sebab nyawa-Nya diambil dari bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then came the word of the LORD unto me, saying,
target: Lalu datanglah firman TUHAN kepadaku:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they all with one consent began to make excuse. The first said unto him, I have bought a piece of ground, and I must needs go and see it: I pray thee have me excused.
target: Tetapi mereka bersama-sama meminta maaf. Yang pertama berkata kepadanya: Aku telah membeli ladang dan aku harus pergi melihatnya; aku minta dimaafkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If the ox shall push a manservant or a maidservant; he shall give unto their master thirty shekels of silver, and the ox shall be stoned.
target: Tetapi jika lembu itu menanduk seorang budak laki-laki atau perempuan, maka pemiliknya harus membayar tiga puluh syikal perak kepada tuan budak itu, dan lembu itu harus dilempari mati dengan batu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David built there an altar unto the LORD, and offered burnt offerings and peace offerings. So the LORD was intreated for the land, and the plague was stayed from Israel.
target: Lalu Daud mendirikan di sana mezbah bagi TUHAN dan mempersembahkan korban bakaran dan korban keselamatan. Maka TUHAN mengabulkan doa untuk negeri itu, dan tulah itu berhenti menimpa orang Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For such an high priest became us, who is holy, harmless, undefiled, separate from sinners, and made higher than the heavens;
target: Sebab Imam Besar yang demikianlah yang kita perlukan: yaitu yang saleh, tanpa salah, tanpa noda, yang terpisah dari orang-orang berdosa dan lebih tinggi dari pada tingkat-tingkat sorga,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will give them an heart to know me, that I am the LORD: and they shall be my people, and I will be their God: for they shall return unto me with their whole heart.
target: Aku akan memberi mereka suatu hati untuk mengenal Aku, yaitu bahwa Akulah TUHAN. Mereka akan menjadi umat-Ku dan Aku ini akan menjadi Allah mereka, sebab mereka akan bertobat kepada-Ku dengan segenap hatinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joshua returned, and all Israel with him, to Debir; and fought against it:
target: Kemudian Yosua dengan seluruh Israel kembali ke Debir, lalu berperang melawannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let all those that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee: let such as love thy salvation say continually, The LORD be magnified.
target: Biarlah terdiam karena malu mereka yang mengatai aku: "Syukur, syukur!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And at the fountain gate, which was over against them, they went up by the stairs of the city of David, at the going up of the wall, above the house of David, even unto the water gate eastward.
target: Lalu pada pintu gerbang Mata Air mereka langsung naik tangga-tangga kota Daud, pada jalan pendakian tembok, lewat istana Daud, dan berjalan sampai pintu gerbang Air, di sebelah Timur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Abner the son of Ner, captain of Saul's host, took Ishbosheth the son of Saul, and brought him over to Mahanaim;
target: Abner bin Ner, panglima Saul, telah mengambil Isyboset, anak Saul, dan membawanya ke Mahanaim

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Give instruction to a wise man, and he will be yet wiser: teach a just man, and he will increase in learning.
target: berilah orang bijak nasihat, maka ia akan menjadi lebih bijak, ajarilah orang benar, maka pengetahuannya akan bertambah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when she saw Peter warming himself, she looked upon him, and said, And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth.
target: dan ketika perempuan itu melihat Petrus sedang berdiang, ia menatap mukanya dan berkata: "Engkau juga selalu bersama-sama dengan Yesus, orang Nazaret itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I am thine, save me: for I have sought thy precepts.
target: Aku kepunyaan-Mu, selamatkanlah aku, sebab aku mencari titah-titah-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the priest shall burn them upon the altar for an offering made by fire unto the LORD: it is a trespass offering.
target: Haruslah imam membakar semuanya itu di atas mezbah sebagai korban api-apian bagi TUHAN; itulah korban penebus salah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said, Like as my servant Isaiah hath walked naked and barefoot three years for a sign and wonder upon Egypt and upon Ethiopia;
target: Berfirmanlah TUHAN: "Seperti hamba-Ku Yesaya berjalan telanjang dan tidak berkasut tiga tahun lamanya sebagai tanda dan alamat terhadap Mesir dan terhadap Etiopia,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Moses and Aaron fell on their faces before all the assembly of the congregation of the children of Israel.
target: Lalu sujudlah Musa dan Harun di depan mata seluruh jemaah Israel yang berkumpul di situ.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The trees went forth on a time to anoint a king over them; and they said unto the olive tree, Reign thou over us.
target: Sekali peristiwa pohon-pohon pergi mengurapi yang akan menjadi raja atas mereka. Kata mereka kepada pohon zaitun: Jadilah raja atas kami!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the merchants of the earth shall weep and mourn over her; for no man buyeth their merchandise any more:
target: Dan pedagang-pedagang di bumi menangis dan berkabung karena dia, sebab tidak ada orang lagi yang membeli barang-barang mereka,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He directeth it under the whole heaven, and his lightning unto the ends of the earth.
target: Ia melepaskannya ke seluruh kolong langit, dan juga kilat petir-Nya ke ujung-ujung bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Is not this the carpenter's son? is not his mother called Mary? and his brethren, James, and Joses, and Simon, and Judas?
target: Bukankah Ia ini anak tukang kayu? Bukankah ibu-Nya bernama Maria dan saudara-saudara-Nya: Yakobus, Yusuf, Simon dan Yudas?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, all they that were incensed against thee shall be ashamed and confounded: they shall be as nothing; and they that strive with thee shall perish.
target: Sesungguhnya, semua orang yang bangkit amarahnya terhadap engkau akan mendapat malu dan kena noda; orang-orang yang membantah engkau akan seperti tidak ada dan akan binasa;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Only thy holy things which thou hast, and thy vows, thou shalt take, and go unto the place which the LORD shall choose:
target: Tetapi persembahan kudusmu yang ada padamu dan korban nazarmu haruslah kaubawa ke tempat yang akan dipilih TUHAN;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Rabshakeh said unto them, Speak ye now to Hezekiah, Thus saith the great king, the king of Assyria, What confidence is this wherein thou trustest?
target: Lalu berkatalah juru minuman agung kepada mereka: "Baiklah katakan kepada Hizkia: Beginilah kata raja agung, raja Asyur: Kepercayaan macam apakah yang kaupegang ini?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As the dew of Hermon, and as the dew that descended upon the mountains of Zion: for there the LORD commanded the blessing, even life for evermore.
target: Seperti embun gunung Hermon yang turun ke atas gunung-gunung Sion. Sebab ke sanalah TUHAN memerintahkan berkat, kehidupan untuk selama-lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The children of Israel brought a willing offering unto the LORD, every man and woman, whose heart made them willing to bring for all manner of work, which the LORD had commanded to be made by the hand of Moses.
target: Semua laki-laki dan perempuan, yang terdorong hatinya akan membawa sesuatu untuk segala pekerjaan yang diperintahkan TUHAN dengan perantaraan Musa untuk dilakukan — mereka itu, yakni orang Israel, membawanya sebagai pemberian sukarela bagi TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they went in to the king into the court, but they laid up the roll in the chamber of Elishama the scribe, and told all the words in the ears of the king.
target: Kemudian pergilah mereka menghadap raja di pelataran, sesudah mereka menyimpan gulungan itu di kamar panitera Elisama. Mereka memberitahukan segala perkataan ini kepada raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said unto Moses, Stretch out thine hand over the land of Egypt for the locusts, that they may come up upon the land of Egypt, and eat every herb of the land, even all that the hail hath left.
target: Berfirmanlah TUHAN kepada Musa: "Ulurkanlah tanganmu ke atas tanah Mesir mendatangkan belalang dan belalang akan datang meliputi tanah Mesir dan memakan habis segala tumbuh-tumbuhan di tanah, semuanya yang ditinggalkan oleh hujan es itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the multitude of my thoughts within me thy comforts delight my soul.
target: Apabila bertambah banyak pikiran dalam batinku, penghiburan-Mu menyenangkan jiwaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But it came to pass, when Ahab was dead, that the king of Moab rebelled against the king of Israel.
target: Tetapi segera sesudah Ahab mati, memberontaklah raja Moab terhadap raja Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And their father gave them great gifts of silver, and of gold, and of precious things, with fenced cities in Judah: but the kingdom gave he to Jehoram; because he was the firstborn.
target: Ayahnya memberikan kepada mereka banyak pemberian, berupa emas dan perak dan barang-barang berharga, juga kota-kota berkubu di Yehuda. Tetapi kedudukan raja diberikannya kepada Yoram, karena dialah anak sulungnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus entered into Jerusalem, and into the temple: and when he had looked round about upon all things, and now the eventide was come, he went out unto Bethany with the twelve.
target: Sesampainya di Yerusalem Ia masuk ke Bait Allah. Di sana Ia meninjau semuanya, tetapi sebab hari sudah hampir malam Ia keluar ke Betania bersama dengan kedua belas murid-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the scripture hath concluded all under sin, that the promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that believe.
target: Tetapi Kitab Suci telah mengurung segala sesuatu di bawah kekuasaan dosa, supaya oleh karena iman dalam Yesus Kristus janji itu diberikan kepada mereka yang percaya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall lay his hand upon the head of his offering, and kill it before the tabernacle of the congregation: and Aaron's sons shall sprinkle the blood thereof round about upon the altar.
target: Lalu ia harus meletakkan tangannya ke atas kepala persembahannya itu dan menyembelihnya di depan Kemah Pertemuan, lalu anak-anak Harun harus menyiramkan darahnya pada mezbah sekelilingnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the angel of God, which went before the camp of Israel, removed and went behind them; and the pillar of the cloud went from before their face, and stood behind them:
target: Kemudian bergeraklah Malaikat Allah, yang tadinya berjalan di depan tentara Israel, lalu berjalan di belakang mereka; dan tiang awan itu bergerak dari depan mereka, lalu berdiri di belakang mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But put forth thine hand now, and touch all that he hath, and he will curse thee to thy face.
target: Tetapi ulurkanlah tangan-Mu dan jamahlah segala yang dipunyainya, ia pasti mengutuki Engkau di hadapan-Mu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And among these nations shalt thou find no ease, neither shall the sole of thy foot have rest: but the LORD shall give thee there a trembling heart, and failing of eyes, and sorrow of mind:
target: Engkau tidak akan mendapat ketenteraman di antara bangsa-bangsa itu dan tidak akan ada tempat berjejak bagi telapak kakimu; TUHAN akan memberikan di sana kepadamu hati yang gelisah, mata yang penuh rindu dan jiwa yang merana.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Through desire a man, having separated himself, seeketh and intermeddleth with all wisdom.
target: Orang yang menyendiri, mencari keinginannya, amarahnya meledak terhadap setiap pertimbangan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And king Rehoboam made in their stead brasen shields, and committed them unto the hands of the chief of the guard, which kept the door of the king's house.
target: Sebagai gantinya raja Rehabeam membuat perisai-perisai tembaga, yang dipercayakannya kepada pemimpin-pemimpin bentara yang menjaga pintu istana raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And say unto them, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I will take the children of Israel from among the heathen, whither they be gone, and will gather them on every side, and bring them into their own land:
target: katakanlah kepadanya: Beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Sungguh, Aku menjemput orang Israel dari tengah bangsa-bangsa, ke mana mereka pergi; Aku akan mengumpulkan mereka dari segala penjuru dan akan membawa mereka ke tanah mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me; for I am desolate and afflicted.
target: Berpalinglah kepadaku dan kasihanilah aku, sebab aku sebatang kara dan tertindas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Awake, why sleepest thou, O Lord? arise, cast us not off for ever.
target: Oleh karena Engkau kami ada dalam bahaya maut sepanjang hari, kami dianggap sebagai domba-domba sembelihan.
