en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Caleb the son of Hezron begat children of Azubah his wife, and of Jerioth: her sons are these; Jesher, and Shobab, and Ardon.
target: Kaleb bin Hezron memperanakkan Yeriot dari Azuba, isterinya; dan inilah anak-anak perempuan itu: Yesyer, Sobab dan Ardon.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye will not come to me, that ye might have life.
target: namun kamu tidak mau datang kepada-Ku untuk memperoleh hidup itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I think that God hath set forth us the apostles last, as it were appointed to death: for we are made a spectacle unto the world, and to angels, and to men.
target: Sebab, menurut pendapatku, Allah memberikan kepada kami, para rasul, tempat yang paling rendah, sama seperti orang-orang yang telah dijatuhi hukuman mati, sebab kami telah menjadi tontonan bagi dunia, bagi malaikat-malaikat dan bagi manusia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And said unto them, What will ye give me, and I will deliver him unto you? And they covenanted with him for thirty pieces of silver.
target: Ia berkata: "Apa yang hendak kamu berikan kepadaku, supaya aku menyerahkan Dia kepada kamu?" Mereka membayar tiga puluh uang perak kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now to him that worketh is the reward not reckoned of grace, but of debt.
target: Kalau ada orang yang bekerja, upahnya tidak diperhitungkan sebagai hadiah, tetapi sebagai haknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let them therefore, said he, which among you are able, go down with me, and accuse this man, if there be any wickedness in him.
target: Katanya: "Karena itu baiklah orang-orang yang berwewenang di antara kamu turut ke sana bersama-sama dengan aku dan mengajukan dakwaan terhadap dia, jika ada kesalahannya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I bowed down my head, and worshipped the LORD, and blessed the LORD God of my master Abraham, which had led me in the right way to take my master's brother's daughter unto his son.
target: Kemudian berlututlah aku dan sujud menyembah TUHAN, serta memuji TUHAN, Allah tuanku Abraham, yang telah menuntun aku di jalan yang benar untuk mengambil anak perempuan saudara tuanku ini bagi anaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Proclaim ye this among the Gentiles; Prepare war, wake up the mighty men, let all the men of war draw near; let them come up:
target: Maklumkanlah hal ini di antara bangsa-bangsa: bersiaplah untuk peperangan, gerakkanlah para pahlawan; suruhlah semua prajurit tampil dan maju!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God went up from him in the place where he talked with him.
target: Lalu naiklah Allah meninggalkan Yakub dari tempat Ia berfirman kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Lord, thou hast been favourable unto thy land: thou hast brought back the captivity of Jacob.
target: Untuk pemimpin biduan. Mazmur bani Korah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Nay, my sons; for it is no good report that I hear: ye make the LORD's people to transgress.
target: Janganlah begitu, anak-anakku. Bukan kabar baik yang kudengar itu bahwa kamu menyebabkan umat TUHAN melakukan pelanggaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hear, O our God; for we are despised: and turn their reproach upon their own head, and give them for a prey in the land of captivity:
target: Ya, Allah kami, dengarlah bagaimana kami dihina. Balikkanlah cercaan mereka menimpa kepala mereka sendiri dan serahkanlah mereka menjadi jarahan di tanah tempat tawanan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Hiram made the lavers, and the shovels, and the basons. So Hiram made an end of doing all the work that he made king Solomon for the house of the LORD:
target: Dan Hiram membuat juga kuali-kuali, penyodok-penyodok dan bokor-bokor penyiraman. Demikianlah Hiram menyelesaikan segala pekerjaan yang harus dilakukannya bagi raja Salomo di rumah TUHAN,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he coupled the five curtains one unto another: and the other five curtains he coupled one unto another.
target: Lima dari tenda itu dirangkap menjadi satu, dan yang lima lagi juga dirangkap menjadi satu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Shallum, Amariah, and Joseph.
target: Salum, Amarya dan Yusuf.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then when Jesus came, he found that he had lain in the grave four days already.
target: Maka ketika Yesus tiba, didapati-Nya Lazarus telah empat hari berbaring di dalam kubur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his concubine that was in Shechem, she also bare him a son, whose name he called Abimelech.
target: juga gundiknya yang tinggal di Sikhem melahirkan seorang anak laki-laki baginya, lalu ia memberikan nama Abimelekh kepada anak itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then will I make their waters deep, and cause their rivers to run like oil, saith the Lord GOD.
target: Maka airnya akan Kujernihkan, sungai-sungainya akan Kubuat mengalir seperti minyak, demikianlah firman Tuhan ALLAH.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For before the child shall have knowledge to cry, My father, and my mother, the riches of Damascus and the spoil of Samaria shall be taken away before the king of Assyria.
target: sebab sebelum anak itu tahu memanggil: Bapa! Ibu! maka kekayaan Damsyik dan jarahan Samaria akan diangkut di depan raja Asyur."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Nevertheless the LORD raised up judges, which delivered them out of the hand of those that spoiled them.
target: Maka TUHAN membangkitkan hakim-hakim, yang menyelamatkan mereka dari tangan perampok itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He lodgeth with one Simon a tanner, whose house is by the sea side: he shall tell thee what thou oughtest to do.
target: Ia menumpang di rumah seorang penyamak kulit yang bernama Simon, yang tinggal di tepi laut."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To crush under his feet all the prisoners of the earth.
target: Kalau dipijak-pijak dengan kaki tawanan-tawanan di dunia,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the Levites: both Jeshua the son of Azaniah, Binnui of the sons of Henadad, Kadmiel;
target: Sedang dari orang-orang Lewi: Yesua bin Azanya, Binui, seorang dari antara anak-anak Henadad, Kadmiel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Lest thou give thine honour unto others, and thy years unto the cruel:
target: supaya engkau jangan menyerahkan keremajaanmu kepada orang lain, dan tahun-tahun umurmu kepada orang kejam;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And a certain woman named Lydia, a seller of purple, of the city of Thyatira, which worshipped God, heard us: whose heart the Lord opened, that she attended unto the things which were spoken of Paul.
target: Seorang dari perempuan-perempuan itu yang bernama Lidia turut mendengarkan. Ia seorang penjual kain ungu dari kota Tiatira, yang beribadah kepada Allah. Tuhan membuka hatinya, sehingga ia memperhatikan apa yang dikatakan oleh Paulus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The word which came unto Jeremiah from the LORD, when king Zedekiah sent unto him Pashur the son of Melchiah, and Zephaniah the son of Maaseiah the priest, saying,
target: Firman yang datang dari TUHAN kepada Yeremia, ketika raja Zedekia mengutus Pasyhur bin Malkia dan imam Zefanya bin Maaseya kepadanya dengan pesan:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For he hath delivered me out of all trouble: and mine eye hath seen his desire upon mine enemies.
target: Biarlah kejahatan itu berbalik kepada seteru-seteruku; binasakanlah mereka karena kesetiaan-Mu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moses therefore gave unto you circumcision; (not because it is of Moses, but of the fathers;) and ye on the sabbath day circumcise a man.
target: Jadi: Musa menetapkan supaya kamu bersunat — sebenarnya sunat itu tidak berasal dari Musa, tetapi dari nenek moyang kita — dan kamu menyunat orang pada hari Sabat!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have forsaken mine house, I have left mine heritage; I have given the dearly beloved of my soul into the hand of her enemies.
target: Aku telah meninggalkan kediaman-Ku, telah membuangkan negeri milik-Ku; Aku telah menyerahkan buah hati-Ku ke dalam tangan musuhnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will praise the LORD according to his righteousness: and will sing praise to the name of the LORD most high.
target: Kelaliman yang dilakukannya kembali menimpa kepalanya, dan kekerasannya turun menimpa batu kepalanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the waters decreased continually until the tenth month: in the tenth month, on the first day of the month, were the tops of the mountains seen.
target: Sampai bulan yang kesepuluh makin berkuranglah air itu; dalam bulan yang kesepuluh, pada tanggal satu bulan itu, tampaklah puncak-puncak gunung.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I saw also the height of the house round about: the foundations of the side chambers were a full reed of six great cubits.
target: Aku melihat bahwa alas Bait Suci itu lebih tinggi dari sekelilingnya. Dasar kamar-kamar tambahan itu berukuran satu tongkat penuh, yaitu tingginya enam hasta.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now the sons of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel were, Mesha his firstborn, which was the father of Ziph; and the sons of Mareshah the father of Hebron.
target: Keturunan Kaleb, adik Yerahmeel, ialah Mesa, anak sulungnya, bapa Zif, dan anak-anak Maresa, bapa Hebron.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull, which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha:
target: Sambil memikul salib-Nya Ia pergi ke luar ke tempat yang bernama Tempat Tengkorak, dalam bahasa Ibrani: Golgota.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All that were numbered of the Levites, which Moses and Aaron numbered at the commandment of the LORD, throughout their families, all the males from a month old and upward, were twenty and two thousand.
target: Jumlah orang Lewi yang sesuai dengan titah TUHAN dicatat oleh Musa dan Harun, menurut kaum-kaum mereka, yakni semua laki-laki yang berumur satu bulan ke atas, ada dua puluh dua ribu orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Dan said unto him, Let not thy voice be heard among us, lest angry fellows run upon thee, and thou lose thy life, with the lives of thy household.
target: Berkatalah bani Dan kepadanya: "Janganlah suaramu kedengaran lagi kepada kami, nanti ada orang yang menyerang engkau karena sakit hati dan dengan demikian engkau serta seisi rumahmu kehilangan nyawa."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wise men lay up knowledge: but the mouth of the foolish is near destruction.
target: Orang bijak menyimpan pengetahuan, tetapi mulut orang bodoh adalah kebinasaan yang mengancam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Likewise shalt thou do with thine oxen, and with thy sheep: seven days it shall be with his dam; on the eighth day thou shalt give it me.
target: Demikian juga harus kauperbuat dengan lembu sapimu dan dengan kambing dombamu: tujuh hari lamanya anak-anak binatang itu harus tinggal pada induknya, tetapi pada hari yang kedelapan haruslah kaupersembahkan binatang-binatang itu kepada-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the elders of Gilead said unto Jephthah, Therefore we turn again to thee now, that thou mayest go with us, and fight against the children of Ammon, and be our head over all the inhabitants of Gilead.
target: Kemudian berkatalah para tua-tua Gilead kepada Yefta: "Memang, kami datang kembali sekarang kepadamu, ikutilah kami dan berperanglah melawan bani Amon, maka engkau akan menjadi kepala atas kami, atas seluruh penduduk Gilead."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, the hope of him is in vain: shall not one be cast down even at the sight of him?
target: Bersinnya menyinarkan cahaya, matanya laksana merekahnya fajar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And some of the sons of the priests made the ointment of the spices.
target: sedangkan beberapa orang imam menyediakan campuran rempah-rempah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For, lo, I will raise up a shepherd in the land, which shall not visit those that be cut off, neither shall seek the young one, nor heal that that is broken, nor feed that that standeth still: but he shall eat the flesh of the fat, and tear their claws in pieces.
target: Sebab sesungguhnya, Aku akan membangkitkan di negeri ini seorang gembala yang tidak mengindahkan yang lenyap, yang tidak mencari yang hilang, yang tidak menyembuhkan yang luka, yang tidak memelihara yang sehat, melainkan memakan daging dari yang gemuk dan mencabut kuku mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And while he yet spake, lo, Judas, one of the twelve, came, and with him a great multitude with swords and staves, from the chief priests and elders of the people.
target: Waktu Yesus masih berbicara datanglah Yudas, salah seorang dari kedua belas murid itu, dan bersama-sama dia serombongan besar orang yang membawa pedang dan pentung, disuruh oleh imam-imam kepala dan tua-tua bangsa Yahudi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the residue in length over against the oblation of the holy portion shall be ten thousand eastward, and ten thousand westward: and it shall be over against the oblation of the holy portion; and the increase thereof shall be for food unto them that serve the city.
target: Yang tertinggal dari panjangnya, yang sejajar dengan persembahan khusus yang kudus itu, adalah sepuluh ribu hasta di sebelah timur dan sepuluh ribu hasta di sebelah barat dan hasilnya ialah menjadi makanan untuk pekerja-pekerja di kota itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That all the people of the earth may know that the LORD is God, and that there is none else.
target: supaya segala bangsa di bumi tahu, bahwa TUHANlah Allah, dan tidak ada yang lain,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he had restored the eleven hundred shekels of silver to his mother, his mother said, I had wholly dedicated the silver unto the LORD from my hand for my son, to make a graven image and a molten image: now therefore I will restore it unto thee.
target: Sesudah itu dikembalikannyalah uang perak yang seribu seratus itu kepada ibunya. Tetapi ibunya berkata: "Aku mau menguduskan uang itu bagi TUHAN, aku menyerahkannya untuk anakku, supaya dibuat patung pahatan dan patung tuangan dari pada uang itu. Maka sekarang, uang itu kukembalikan kepadamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou hast shewed this day how that thou hast dealt well with me: forasmuch as when the LORD had delivered me into thine hand, thou killedst me not.
target: Katanya kepada Daud: "Engkau lebih benar dari pada aku, sebab engkau telah melakukan yang baik kepadaku, padahal aku melakukan yang jahat kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They made shoulderpieces for it, to couple it together: by the two edges was it coupled together.
target: Dibuat merekalah tutup bahu pada baju efod itu, yang disambung kepadanya, dikedua ujungnyalah baju efod itu disambung.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the Jews also assented, saying that these things were so.
target: Dan juga orang-orang Yahudi menyokong dakwaan itu dengan mengatakan, bahwa perkara itu sungguh demikian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That they may know from the rising of the sun, and from the west, that there is none beside me. I am the LORD, and there is none else.
target: supaya orang tahu dari terbitnya matahari sampai terbenamnya, bahwa tidak ada yang lain di luar Aku. Akulah TUHAN dan tidak ada yang lain,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Jehoram went forth with his princes, and all his chariots with him: and he rose up by night, and smote the Edomites which compassed him in, and the captains of the chariots.
target: Maka majulah Yoram dengan panglima-panglimanya serta seluruh keretanya; pada waktu malam bangunlah ia, lalu bersama-sama dengan para panglima pasukan kereta ia menerobos barisan orang Edom yang mengepung dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye shall not tempt the LORD your God, as ye tempted him in Massah.
target: Janganlah kamu mencobai TUHAN, Allahmu, seperti kamu mencobai Dia di Masa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But there is a God in heaven that revealeth secrets, and maketh known to the king Nebuchadnezzar what shall be in the latter days. Thy dream, and the visions of thy head upon thy bed, are these;
target: Tetapi di sorga ada Allah yang menyingkapkan rahasia-rahasia; Ia telah memberitahukan kepada tuanku raja Nebukadnezar apa yang akan terjadi pada hari-hari yang akan datang. Mimpi dan penglihatan-penglihatan yang tuanku lihat di tempat tidur ialah ini:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they first took their journey according to the commandment of the LORD by the hand of Moses.
target: Itulah pertama kali mereka berangkat menurut titah TUHAN dengan perantaraan Musa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Enos lived after he begat Cainan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begat sons and daughters:
target: Dan Enos masih hidup delapan ratus lima belas tahun, setelah ia memperanakkan Kenan, dan ia memperanakkan anak-anak lelaki dan perempuan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he made the robe of the ephod of woven work, all of blue.
target: Dibuatnyalah gamis baju efod, buatan tukang tenun, dari kain ungu tua seluruhnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they sought to lay hold on him, but feared the people: for they knew that he had spoken the parable against them: and they left him, and went their way.
target: Lalu mereka berusaha untuk menangkap Yesus, karena mereka tahu, bahwa merekalah yang dimaksudkan-Nya dengan perumpamaan itu. Tetapi mereka takut kepada orang banyak, jadi mereka pergi dan membiarkan Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And now thou sayest, Go, tell thy lord, Behold, Elijah is here: and he shall slay me.
target: Dan sekarang, mengapa engkau ini berkata: Pergilah, katakan kepada tuanmu: Elia ada! Ia pasti akan membunuh aku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Awake, ye drunkards, and weep; and howl, all ye drinkers of wine, because of the new wine; for it is cut off from your mouth.
target: Bangunlah, hai pemabuk, dan menangislah! Merataplah, hai semua peminum anggur karena anggur baru, sebab sudah dirampas dari mulutmu anggur itu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But in mine adversity they rejoiced, and gathered themselves together: yea, the abjects gathered themselves together against me, and I knew it not; they did tear me, and ceased not:
target: Tetapi ketika aku tersandung jatuh, bersukacitalah mereka dan berkerumun, berkerumun melawan aku; orang-orang asing yang tidak kukenal menista aku dengan tidak henti-hentinya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour.
target: dan hatiku bergembira karena Allah, Juruselamatku,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Eli called Samuel, and said, Samuel, my son. And he answered, Here am I.
target: Tetapi Eli memanggil Samuel, katanya: "Samuel, anakku." Jawab Samuel: "Ya, bapa."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he lodged there that same night; and took of that which came to his hand a present for Esau his brother;
target: Lalu bermalamlah ia di sana pada malam itu. Kemudian diambilnyalah dari apa yang ada padanya suatu persembahan untuk Esau, kakaknya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there appeared unto them Elias with Moses: and they were talking with Jesus.
target: Maka nampaklah kepada mereka Elia bersama dengan Musa, keduanya sedang berbicara dengan Yesus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let another man praise thee, and not thine own mouth; a stranger, and not thine own lips.
target: Biarlah orang lain memuji engkau dan bukan mulutmu, orang yang tidak kaukenal dan bukan bibirmu sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he put five bases on the right side of the house, and five on the left side of the house: and he set the sea on the right side of the house eastward over against the south.
target: Lima kereta penopang ditaruhnya pada sisi kanan rumah itu dan lima pada sisi kirinya; tetapi "laut" itu ditaruhnya pada sisi kanan rumah itu, arah tenggara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O righteous Father, the world hath not known thee: but I have known thee, and these have known that thou hast sent me.
target: Ya Bapa yang adil, memang dunia tidak mengenal Engkau, tetapi Aku mengenal Engkau, dan mereka ini tahu, bahwa Engkaulah yang telah mengutus Aku;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And could not find what they might do: for all the people were very attentive to hear him.
target: tetapi mereka tidak tahu, bagaimana harus melakukannya, sebab seluruh rakyat terpikat kepada-Nya dan ingin mendengarkan Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jonathan said unto David, Come, and let us go out into the field. And they went out both of them into the field.
target: Kata Yonatan kepada Daud: "Marilah kita keluar ke padang." Maka keluarlah keduanya ke padang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That I may know him, and the power of his resurrection, and the fellowship of his sufferings, being made conformable unto his death;
target: Yang kukehendaki ialah mengenal Dia dan kuasa kebangkitan-Nya dan persekutuan dalam penderitaan-Nya, di mana aku menjadi serupa dengan Dia dalam kematian-Nya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Come ye, say they, I will fetch wine, and we will fill ourselves with strong drink; and to morrow shall be as this day, and much more abundant.
target: "Datanglah," kata mereka, "aku akan mengambil anggur, baiklah kita minum arak banyak-banyak; besok akan sama seperti hari ini, dan lebih hebat lagi!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But they were terrified and affrighted, and supposed that they had seen a spirit.
target: Mereka terkejut dan takut dan menyangka bahwa mereka melihat hantu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said the Jews, Will he kill himself? because he saith, Whither I go, ye cannot come.
target: Maka kata orang-orang Yahudi itu: "Apakah Ia mau bunuh diri dan karena itu dikatakan-Nya: Ke tempat Aku pergi, tidak mungkin kamu datang?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore night shall be unto you, that ye shall not have a vision; and it shall be dark unto you, that ye shall not divine; and the sun shall go down over the prophets, and the day shall be dark over them.
target: Sebab itu hari akan menjadi malam bagimu tanpa penglihatan, dan menjadi gelap bagimu tanpa tenungan. Matahari akan terbenam bagi para nabi itu, dan hari menjadi hitam suram bagi mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he was buried in his sepulchre in the garden of Uzza: and Josiah his son reigned in his stead.
target: Kemudian ia dikuburkan dalam kuburnya di taman Uza. Maka Yosia, anaknya, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in the same house remain, eating and drinking such things as they give: for the labourer is worthy of his hire. Go not from house to house.
target: Tinggallah dalam rumah itu, makan dan minumlah apa yang diberikan orang kepadamu, sebab seorang pekerja patut mendapat upahnya. Janganlah berpindah-pindah rumah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass on the morrow, that Pashur brought forth Jeremiah out of the stocks. Then said Jeremiah unto him, The LORD hath not called thy name Pashur, but Magormissabib.
target: Tetapi ketika Pasyhur keesokan harinya mengeluarkan Yeremia dari pasungan itu, berkatalah Yeremia kepadanya: "TUHAN akan menyebut namamu bukan Pasyhur, melainkan Kegentaran-dari-segala-jurusan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sinners in Zion are afraid; fearfulness hath surprised the hypocrites. Who among us shall dwell with the devouring fire? who among us shall dwell with everlasting burnings?
target: Orang-orang yang berdosa terkejut di Sion orang-orang murtad diliputi kegentaran. Mereka berkata: "Siapakah di antara kita yang dapat tinggal dalam api yang menghabiskan ini? Siapakah di antara kita yang dapat tinggal di perapian yang abadi ini?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Hezekiah prayed unto the LORD, saying,
target: Hizkia berdoa di hadapan TUHAN, katanya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself, and God, even our Father, which hath loved us, and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace,
target: Dan Ia, Tuhan kita Yesus Kristus, dan Allah, Bapa kita, yang dalam kasih karunia-Nya telah mengasihi kita dan yang telah menganugerahkan penghiburan abadi dan pengharapan baik kepada kita,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He shall cover thee with his feathers, and under his wings shalt thou trust: his truth shall be thy shield and buckler.
target: Dengan kepak-Nya Ia akan menudungi engkau, di bawah sayap-Nya engkau akan berlindung, kesetiaan-Nya ialah perisai dan pagar tembok.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joab returned from following Abner: and when he had gathered all the people together, there lacked of David's servants nineteen men and Asahel.
target: Ketika Yoab berhenti memburu Abner dan menghimpunkan seluruh rakyat, ternyata sembilan belas orang dari anak buah Daud hilang termasuk Asael.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He hath also prepared for him the instruments of death; he ordaineth his arrows against the persecutors.
target: Sungguh, kembali ia mengasah pedangnya, melentur busurnya dan membidik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David built there an altar unto the LORD, and offered burnt offerings and peace offerings, and called upon the LORD; and he answered him from heaven by fire upon the altar of burnt offering.
target: Lalu Daud mendirikan di sana mezbah bagi TUHAN, mempersembahkan korban bakaran dan korban keselamatan dan memanggil TUHAN. Maka TUHAN menjawab dia dengan menurunkan api dari langit ke atas mezbah korban bakaran itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My voice shalt thou hear in the morning, O LORD; in the morning will I direct my prayer unto thee, and will look up.
target: Perhatikanlah teriakku minta tolong, ya Rajaku dan Allahku, sebab kepada-Mulah aku berdoa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If the wicked restore the pledge, give again that he had robbed, walk in the statutes of life, without committing iniquity; he shall surely live, he shall not die.
target: orang jahat itu mengembalikan gadaian orang, ia membayar ganti rampasannya, menuruti peraturan-peraturan yang memberi hidup, sehingga tidak berbuat curang lagi, ia pasti hidup, ia tidak akan mati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Woe to them that are at ease in Zion, and trust in the mountain of Samaria, which are named chief of the nations, to whom the house of Israel came!
target: "Celaka atas orang-orang yang merasa aman di Sion, atas orang-orang yang merasa tenteram di gunung Samaria, atas orang-orang terkemuka dari bangsa yang utama, orang-orang yang kepada mereka kaum Israel biasa datang!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the priest that is anointed shall take of the bullock's blood, and bring it to the tabernacle of the congregation:
target: Imam yang diurapi itu harus mengambil sebagian dari darah lembu itu, lalu membawanya ke dalam Kemah Pertemuan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the rest of the dead lived not again until the thousand years were finished. This is the first resurrection.
target: Tetapi orang-orang mati yang lain tidak bangkit sebelum berakhir masa yang seribu tahun itu. Inilah kebangkitan pertama.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jesus saith unto her, Touch me not; for I am not yet ascended to my Father: but go to my brethren, and say unto them, I ascend unto my Father, and your Father; and to my God, and your God.
target: Kata Yesus kepadanya: "Janganlah engkau memegang Aku, sebab Aku belum pergi kepada Bapa, tetapi pergilah kepada saudara-saudara-Ku dan katakanlah kepada mereka, bahwa sekarang Aku akan pergi kepada Bapa-Ku dan Bapamu, kepada Allah-Ku dan Allahmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The land also shall be left of them, and shall enjoy her sabbaths, while she lieth desolate without them: and they shall accept of the punishment of their iniquity: because, even because they despised my judgments, and because their soul abhorred my statutes.
target: Jadi tanah itu akan ditinggalkan mereka dan akan pulih dari akibat tahun-tahun sabat yang dilalaikan selama tanah itu tandus, oleh karena ditinggalkan mereka, dan mereka akan membayar pulih kesalahan mereka, tak lain dan tak bukan karena mereka menolak peraturan-Ku dan hati mereka muak mendengarkan ketetapan-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he saw that rest was good, and the land that it was pleasant; and bowed his shoulder to bear, and became a servant unto tribute.
target: ketika dilihatnya, bahwa perhentian itu baik dan negeri itu permai, maka disendengkannyalah bahunya untuk memikul, lalu menjadi budak rodi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the mourning was past, David sent and fetched her to his house, and she became his wife, and bare him a son. But the thing that David had done displeased the LORD.
target: Setelah lewat waktu berkabung, maka Daud menyuruh membawa perempuan itu ke rumahnya. Perempuan itu menjadi isterinya dan melahirkan seorang anak laki-laki baginya. Tetapi hal yang telah dilakukan Daud itu adalah jahat di mata TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And some of the Hebrews went over Jordan to the land of Gad and Gilead. As for Saul, he was yet in Gilgal, and all the people followed him trembling.
target: malah ada orang Ibrani yang menyeberangi arungan sungai Yordan menuju tanah Gad dan Gilead, sedang Saul masih di Gilgal dan seluruh rakyat mengikutinya dengan gemetar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moses therefore wrote this song the same day, and taught it the children of Israel.
target: Maka Musa menuliskan nyanyian ini dan mengajarkannya kepada orang Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As is the earthy, such are they also that are earthy: and as is the heavenly, such are they also that are heavenly.
target: Makhluk-makhluk alamiah sama dengan dia yang berasal dari debu tanah dan makhluk-makhluk sorgawi sama dengan Dia yang berasal dari sorga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As an adamant harder than flint have I made thy forehead: fear them not, neither be dismayed at their looks, though they be a rebellious house.
target: Seperti batu intan, yang lebih keras dari pada batu Kuteguhkan hatimu; janganlah takut kepada mereka dan janganlah gentar melihat mukanya, sebab mereka adalah kaum pemberontak."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Elisha the prophet called one of the children of the prophets, and said unto him, Gird up thy loins, and take this box of oil in thine hand, and go to Ramothgilead:
target: Kemudian nabi Elisa memanggil salah seorang dari rombongan nabi dan berkata kepadanya: "Ikatlah pinggangmu, bawalah buli-buli berisi minyak ini dan pergilah ke Ramot-Gilead.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Every place whereon the soles of your feet shall tread shall be yours: from the wilderness and Lebanon, from the river, the river Euphrates, even unto the uttermost sea shall your coast be.
target: Setiap tempat yang diinjak oleh telapak kakimu, kamulah yang akan memilikinya: mulai dari padang gurun sampai gunung Libanon, dan dari sungai itu, yakni sungai Efrat, sampai laut sebelah barat, akan menjadi daerahmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And because I tell you the truth, ye believe me not.
target: Tetapi karena Aku mengatakan kebenaran kepadamu, kamu tidak percaya kepada-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sons of Moses were, Gershom, and Eliezer.
target: Anak-anak Musa ialah Gersom dan Eliezer.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Glory and honour are in his presence; strength and gladness are in his place.
target: Keagungan dan semarak ada di hadapan-Nya, kekuatan dan sukacita ada di tempat-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that hateth me hateth my Father also.
target: Barangsiapa membenci Aku, ia membenci juga Bapa-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I have said, I will bring you up out of the affliction of Egypt unto the land of the Canaanites, and the Hittites, and the Amorites, and the Perizzites, and the Hivites, and the Jebusites, unto a land flowing with milk and honey.
target: Jadi Aku telah berfirman: Aku akan menuntun kamu keluar dari kesengsaraan di Mesir menuju ke negeri orang Kanaan, orang Het, orang Amori, orang Feris, orang Hewi dan orang Yebus, ke suatu negeri yang berlimpah-limpah susu dan madunya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Benaiah the Pirathonite, Hiddai of the brooks of Gaash,
target: Benaya, orang Piraton; Hidai dari lembah-lembah Gaas;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But camest back, and hast eaten bread and drunk water in the place, of the which the Lord did say to thee, Eat no bread, and drink no water; thy carcase shall not come unto the sepulchre of thy fathers.
target: tetapi kembali dan makan roti dan minum air di tempat ini walaupun Ia telah berfirman kepadamu: Jangan makan roti atau minum air, — maka mayatmu tidak akan masuk ke dalam kubur nenek moyangmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Nevertheless there are good things found in thee, in that thou hast taken away the groves out of the land, and hast prepared thine heart to seek God.
target: Namun masih terdapat hal-hal yang baik padamu, karena engkau menghapuskan tiang-tiang berhala dari negeri ini dan mencari Allah dengan tekun."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And afterward he read all the words of the law, the blessings and cursings, according to all that is written in the book of the law.
target: Sesudah itu dibacakannyalah segala perkataan hukum Taurat, berkatnya dan kutuknya, sesuai dengan segala apa yang tertulis dalam kitab hukum.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And four wagons and eight oxen he gave unto the sons of Merari, according unto their service, under the hand of Ithamar the son of Aaron the priest.
target: dan empat kereta dengan delapan ekor lembu diberikannya kepada bani Merari, sesuai dengan keperluan pekerjaan mereka di bawah pimpinan Itamar, anak imam Harun itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye now therefore have sorrow: but I will see you again, and your heart shall rejoice, and your joy no man taketh from you.
target: Demikian juga kamu sekarang diliputi dukacita, tetapi Aku akan melihat kamu lagi dan hatimu akan bergembira dan tidak ada seorang pun yang dapat merampas kegembiraanmu itu dari padamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there went out a champion out of the camp of the Philistines, named Goliath, of Gath, whose height was six cubits and a span.
target: Lalu tampillah keluar seorang pendekar dari tentara orang Filistin. Namanya Goliat, dari Gat. Tingginya enam hasta sejengkal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king sent and called for Shimei, and said unto him, Did I not make thee to swear by the LORD, and protested unto thee, saying, Know for a certain, on the day thou goest out, and walkest abroad any whither, that thou shalt surely die? and thou saidst unto me, The word that I have heard is good.
target: maka raja menyuruh memanggil Simei dan berkata kepadanya: "Bukankah aku telah menyuruh engkau bersumpah demi TUHAN dan telah memperingatkan engkau, begini: Ketahuilah sungguh-sungguh, bahwa pada waktu engkau keluar dan pergi ke mana-mana pun, pastilah engkau mati dibunuh! Dan engkau telah menjawab: Baiklah demikian, aku akan mentaatinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And, behold, there are last which shall be first, and there are first which shall be last.
target: Dan sesungguhnya ada orang yang terakhir yang akan menjadi orang yang terdahulu dan ada orang yang terdahulu yang akan menjadi orang yang terakhir."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the kings of Tyrus, and all the kings of Zidon, and the kings of the isles which are beyond the sea,
target: kepada semua raja Tirus, semua raja Sidon dan kepada raja-raja tanah pesisir di seberang laut;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Praise him, ye heavens of heavens, and ye waters that be above the heavens.
target: Pujilah Dia, hai langit yang mengatasi segala langit, hai air yang di atas langit!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But we will certainly do whatsoever thing goeth forth out of our own mouth, to burn incense unto the queen of heaven, and to pour out drink offerings unto her, as we have done, we, and our fathers, our kings, and our princes, in the cities of Judah, and in the streets of Jerusalem: for then had we plenty of victuals, and were well, and saw no evil.
target: tetapi kami akan terus melakukan segala apa yang kami ucapkan, yakni membakar korban kepada ratu sorga dan mempersembahkan korban curahan kepadanya seperti telah kami lakukan, kami sendiri dan nenek moyang kami dan raja-raja kami dan pemuka-pemuka kami di kota-kota Yehuda dan di jalan-jalan Yerusalem. Pada waktu itu kami mempunyai cukup makanan; kami merasa bahagia dan tidak mengalami penderitaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye shall offer no strange incense thereon, nor burnt sacrifice, nor meat offering; neither shall ye pour drink offering thereon.
target: Di atas mezbah itu janganlah kamu persembahkan ukupan yang lain ataupun korban bakaran ataupun korban sajian, juga korban curahan janganlah kamu curahkan di atasnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Doth the plowman plow all day to sow? doth he open and break the clods of his ground?
target: Setiap harikah orang membajak, mencangkul dan menyisir tanahnya untuk menabur?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Mordecai walked every day before the court of the women's house, to know how Esther did, and what should become of her.
target: Tiap-tiap hari berjalan-jalanlah Mordekhai di depan pelataran balai perempuan itu untuk mengetahui bagaimana keadaan Ester dan apa yang akan berlaku atasnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also he gave him the copy of the writing of the decree that was given at Shushan to destroy them, to shew it unto Esther, and to declare it unto her, and to charge her that she should go in unto the king, to make supplication unto him, and to make request before him for her people.
target: Juga salinan surat undang-undang, yang dikeluarkan di Susan untuk memunahkan mereka itu, diserahkannya kepada Hatah, supaya diperlihatkan dan diberitahukan kepada Ester. Lagipula Hatah disuruh menyampaikan pesan kepada Ester, supaya pergi menghadap raja untuk memohon karunianya dan untuk membela bangsanya di hadapan baginda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they drew out the staves of the ark, that the ends of the staves were seen from the ark before the oracle; but they were not seen without. And there it is unto this day.
target: Kayu-kayu pengusung itu demikian panjangnya, sehingga ujungnya kelihatan dari tempat kudus, yang di depan ruang belakang itu, tetapi tidak kelihatan dari luar; dan di situlah tempatnya sampai hari ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David came to the two hundred men, which were so faint that they could not follow David, whom they had made also to abide at the brook Besor: and they went forth to meet David, and to meet the people that were with him: and when David came near to the people, he saluted them.
target: Ketika Daud sampai kepada kedua ratus orang yang telah terlalu lelah untuk mengikuti Daud, yang telah dibiarkannya tinggal di dekat sungai Besor, maka keluarlah orang-orang ini menyongsong Daud dan menyongsong rakyat yang bersama-sama dengan dia. Daud mendekati orang-orang itu dan memberi salam kepada mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: We have thought of thy lovingkindness, O God, in the midst of thy temple.
target: Seperti yang telah kita dengar, demikianlah juga kita lihat, di kota TUHAN semesta alam, di kota Allah kita; Allah menegakkannya untuk selama-lamanya. S e l a

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jotham was twenty and five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned sixteen years in Jerusalem. His mother's name also was Jerushah, the daughter of Zadok.
target: Yotam berumur dua puluh lima tahun pada waktu ia menjadi raja dan enam belas tahun lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem. Nama ibunya ialah Yerusa, anak Zadok.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he ran unto Eli, and said, Here am I; for thou calledst me. And he said, I called not; lie down again. And he went and lay down.
target: Lalu berlarilah ia kepada Eli, serta katanya: "Ya, bapa, bukankah bapa memanggil aku?" Tetapi Eli berkata: "Aku tidak memanggil; tidurlah kembali." Lalu pergilah ia tidur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Say not unto thy neighbour, Go, and come again, and to morrow I will give; when thou hast it by thee.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, as he was alone praying, his disciples were with him: and he asked them, saying, Whom say the people that I am?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall become small dust in all the land of Egypt, and shall be a boil breaking forth with blains upon man, and upon beast, throughout all the land of Egypt.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He sheweth his word unto Jacob, his statutes and his judgments unto Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Jephthah passed over unto the children of Ammon to fight against them; and the LORD delivered them into his hands.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For by means of a whorish woman a man is brought to a piece of bread: and the adultress will hunt for the precious life.
target: Karena bagi seorang sundal sepotong rotilah yang penting, tetapi isteri orang lain memburu nyawa yang berharga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said unto Moses, Go on before the people, and take with thee of the elders of Israel; and thy rod, wherewith thou smotest the river, take in thine hand, and go.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not see thy brother's ass or his ox fall down by the way, and hide thyself from them: thou shalt surely help him to lift them up again.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Lalu berkatalah Abisai kepada Daud: "Pada hari ini Allah telah menyerahkan musuhmu ke dalam tanganmu, oleh sebab itu izinkanlah kiranya aku menancapkan dia ke tanah dengan tombak ini, dengan satu tikaman saja, tidak usah dia kutancapkan dua kali."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the dew that lay was gone up, behold, upon the face of the wilderness there lay a small round thing, as small as the hoar frost on the ground.
target: Ketika embun itu telah menguap, tampaklah pada permukaan padang gurun sesuatu yang halus, sesuatu yang seperti sisik, halus seperti embun beku di bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
target: TUHAN berfirman kepada Musa:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the lord said unto the servant, Go out into the highways and hedges, and compel them to come in, that my house may be filled.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he reigned over all the kings from the river even unto the land of the Philistines, and to the border of Egypt.

target: ada orang-orang datang membawa kepada-Nya seorang lumpuh, digotong oleh empat orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Kemudian TUHAN menaruh perkataan ke dalam mulut Bileam dan berfirman: "Kembalilah kepada Balak dan katakanlah demikian."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For ye shall be as an oak whose leaf fadeth, and as a garden that hath no water.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then they told Saul, saying, Behold, the people sin against the LORD, in that they eat with the blood. And he said, Ye have transgressed: roll a great stone unto me this day.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore hearken unto me, O ye children: for blessed are they that keep my ways.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there came a certain poor widow, and she threw in two mites, which make a farthing.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

input: And Joseph said unto them the third day, This do, and live; for I fear God:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou art wearied in the multitude of thy counsels. Let now the astrologers, the stargazers, the monthly prognosticators, stand up, and save thee from these things that shall come upon thee.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But to the saints that are in the earth, and to the excellent, in whom is all my delight.

input: And the land which I gave Abraham and Isaac, to thee I will give it, and to thy seed after thee will I give the land.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God was with the lad; and he grew, and dwelt in the wilderness, and became an archer.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That it might cause fury to come up to take vengeance; I have set her blood upon the top of a rock, that it should not be covered.

input: And ye have respect to him that weareth the gay clothing, and say unto him, Sit thou here in a good place; and say to the poor, Stand thou there, or sit here under my footstool:

input: (Now the Amalekites and the Canaanites dwelt in the valley.) Tomorrow turn you, and get you into the wilderness by the way of the Red sea.

target: Tetapi aku menasihatkan kamu, saudara-saudara, demi nama Tuhan kita Yesus Kristus, supaya kamu seia sekata dan jangan ada perpecahan di antara kamu, tetapi sebaliknya supaya kamu erat bersatu dan sehati sepikir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

input: Then Baruch answered them, He pronounced all these words unto me with his mouth, and I wrote them with ink in the book.
target: Jawab Barukh kepada mereka: "Segala perkataan ini langsung dari mulut Yeremia kepadaku, dan aku menuliskannya dengan tinta dalam kitab."

input: Now it came to pass after the death of Saul, when David was returned from the slaughter of the Amalekites, and David had abode two days in Ziklag;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And of the Gadites there separated themselves unto David into the hold to the wilderness men of might, and men of war fit for the battle, that could handle shield and buckler, whose faces were like the faces of lions, and were as swift as the roes upon the mountains;
target: Juga dari orang Gad ada yang memisahkan diri dan pergi kepada Daud ke kubu di padang gurun, yakni pahlawan-pahlawan yang gagah perkasa, orang-orang yang sanggup berperang, yang pandai menggunakan perisai dan tombak, dan rupa mereka seperti singa dan cepatnya seperti kijang di atas pegunungan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Seeing that Abraham shall surely become a great and mighty nation, and all the nations of the earth shall be blessed in him?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For when Moses had spoken every precept to all the people according to the law, he took the blood of calves and of goats, with water, and scarlet wool, and hyssop, and sprinkled both the book, and all the people,
target: Sebab sesudah Musa memberitahukan semua perintah hukum Taurat kepada seluruh umat, ia mengambil darah anak lembu dan darah domba jantan serta air, dan bulu merah dan hisop, lalu memerciki kitab itu sendiri dan seluruh umat,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Abijah stood up upon mount Zemaraim, which is in mount Ephraim, and said, Hear me, thou Jeroboam, and all Israel;
target: Lalu Abia berdiri di atas gunung Zemaraim, yang termasuk pegunungan Efraim, dan berkata: "Dengarlah kepadaku, Yerobeam dan seluruh Israel!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Lot went out, and spake unto his sons in law, which married his daughters, and said, Up, get you out of this place; for the LORD will destroy this city. But he seemed as one that mocked unto his sons in law.
target: Keluarlah Lot, lalu berbicara dengan kedua bakal menantunya, yang akan kawin dengan kedua anaknya perempuan, katanya: "Bangunlah, keluarlah dari tempat ini, sebab TUHAN akan memusnahkan kota ini." Tetapi ia dipandang oleh kedua bakal menantunya itu sebagai orang yang berolok-olok saja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thy teeth are like a flock of sheep that are even shorn, which came up from the washing; whereof every one bear twins, and none is barren among them.
target: Gigimu bagaikan kawanan domba yang baru saja dicukur, yang keluar dari tempat pembasuhan, yang beranak kembar semuanya, yang tak beranak tak ada.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Arise therefore, and get thee down, and go with them, doubting nothing: for I have sent them.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover Hezekiah the king and the princes commanded the Levites to sing praise unto the LORD with the words of David, and of Asaph the seer. And they sang praises with gladness, and they bowed their heads and worshipped.
target: Lalu raja Hizkia dan para pemimpin memerintahkan orang-orang Lewi menyanyikan puji-pujian untuk TUHAN dengan kata-kata Daud dan Asaf, pelihat itu. Maka mereka menyanyikan puji-pujian dengan sukaria, lalu berlutut dan sujud menyembah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Which I have reserved against the time of trouble, against the day of battle and war?
target: yang Kusimpan untuk masa kesesakan, untuk waktu pertempuran dan peperangan?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there shall ye remember your ways, and all your doings, wherein ye have been defiled; and ye shall lothe yourselves in your own sight for all your evils that ye have committed.
target: Di sana kamu akan teringat-ingat kepada segala tingkah lakumu, dengan mana kamu menajiskan dirimu, dan kamu akan merasa mual melihat dirimu sendiri karena segala kejahatan-kejahatan yang kamu lakukan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O Lord GOD, thou hast begun to shew thy servant thy greatness, and thy mighty hand: for what God is there in heaven or in earth, that can do according to thy works, and according to thy might?
target: Ya, Tuhan ALLAH, Engkau telah mulai memperlihatkan kepada hamba-Mu ini kebesaran-Mu dan tangan-Mu yang kuat; sebab allah manakah di langit dan di bumi, yang dapat melakukan perbuatan perkasa seperti Engkau?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the five lords of the Philistines had seen it, they returned to Ekron the same day.
target: Ketika kelima raja kota orang Filistin melihat hal itu, pulanglah mereka ke Ekron pada hari itu juga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The righteous also shall hold on his way, and he that hath clean hands shall be stronger and stronger.
target: Meskipun begitu orang yang benar tetap pada jalannya, dan orang yang bersih tangannya bertambah-tambah kuat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Before destruction the heart of man is haughty, and before honour is humility.
target: Tinggi hati mendahului kehancuran, tetapi kerendahan hati mendahului kehormatan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The woman answered and said, I have no husband. Jesus said unto her, Thou hast well said, I have no husband:
target: Kata perempuan itu: "Aku tidak mempunyai suami." Kata Yesus kepadanya: "Tepat katamu, bahwa engkau tidak mempunyai suami,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the scribes and Pharisees brought unto him a woman taken in adultery; and when they had set her in the midst,
target: Maka ahli-ahli Taurat dan orang-orang Farisi membawa kepada-Nya seorang perempuan yang kedapatan berbuat zinah. Mereka menempatkan perempuan itu di tengah-tengah

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then came the same Sheshbazzar, and laid the foundation of the house of God which is in Jerusalem: and since that time even until now hath it been in building, and yet it is not finished.
target: Kemudian datanglah Sesbazar, meletakkan dasar rumah Allah yang ada di Yerusalem, dan sejak waktu itu sampai sekarang dikerjakanlah pembangunannya, hanya belum selesai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And this continued by the space of two years; so that all they which dwelt in Asia heard the word of the Lord Jesus, both Jews and Greeks.
target: Hal ini dilakukannya dua tahun lamanya, sehingga semua penduduk Asia mendengar firman Tuhan, baik orang Yahudi maupun orang Yunani.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My glory was fresh in me, and my bow was renewed in my hand.
target: Kemuliaanku selalu baru padaku, dan busurku kuat kembali di tanganku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But he denied before them all, saying, I know not what thou sayest.
target: Tetapi ia menyangkalnya di depan semua orang, katanya: "Aku tidak tahu, apa yang engkau maksud."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And herein is that saying true, One soweth, and another reapeth.
target: Sebab dalam hal ini benarlah peribahasa: Yang seorang menabur dan yang lain menuai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in the synagogue there was a man, which had a spirit of an unclean devil, and cried out with a loud voice,
target: Di dalam rumah ibadat itu ada seorang yang kerasukan setan dan ia berteriak dengan suara keras:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt sell me meat for money, that I may eat; and give me water for money, that I may drink: only I will pass through on my feet;
target: Juallah makanan kepadaku dengan bayaran uang, supaya aku dapat makan, dan berikanlah air kepadaku ganti uang, supaya aku dapat minum; hanya izinkanlah aku lewat dengan berjalan kaki —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass in the fourth year of king Darius, that the word of the LORD came unto Zechariah in the fourth day of the ninth month, even in Chisleu;
target: Pada tahun yang keempat zaman raja Darius datanglah firman TUHAN kepada Zakharia, pada tanggal empat bulan kesembilan, yakni bulan Kislew.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Joseph had taken the body, he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth,
target: Dan Yusuf pun mengambil mayat itu, mengapaninya dengan kain lenan yang putih bersih,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When I therefore was thus minded, did I use lightness? or the things that I purpose, do I purpose according to the flesh, that with me there should be yea yea, and nay nay?
target: Jadi, adakah aku bertindak serampangan dalam merencanakan hal ini? Atau adakah aku membuat rencanaku itu menurut keinginanku sendiri, sehingga padaku serentak terdapat "ya" dan "tidak"?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Why should it be thought a thing incredible with you, that God should raise the dead?
target: Mengapa kamu menganggap mustahil, bahwa Allah membangkitkan orang mati?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Israel repented them for Benjamin their brother, and said, There is one tribe cut off from Israel this day.
target: Orang-orang Israel merasa kasihan terhadap suku Benyamin, saudaranya itu, maka kata mereka: "Hari ini ada satu suku terputus dari orang Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And entering into the sepulchre, they saw a young man sitting on the right side, clothed in a long white garment; and they were affrighted.
target: Lalu mereka masuk ke dalam kubur dan mereka melihat seorang muda yang memakai jubah putih duduk di sebelah kanan. Mereka pun sangat terkejut,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My God, think thou upon Tobiah and Sanballat according to these their works, and on the prophetess Noadiah, and the rest of the prophets, that would have put me in fear.
target: Ya Allahku, ingatlah bagaimana Tobia dan Sanbalat masing-masing telah bertindak! Pun tindakan nabiah Noaja dan nabi-nabi yang lain yang mau menakut-nakutkan aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Will ye steal, murder, and commit adultery, and swear falsely, and burn incense unto Baal, and walk after other gods whom ye know not;
target: Masakan kamu mencuri, membunuh, berzinah dan bersumpah palsu, membakar korban kepada Baal dan mengikuti allah lain yang tidak kamu kenal,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then he turned his face to the wall, and prayed unto the LORD, saying,
target: Lalu Hizkia memalingkan mukanya ke arah dinding dan ia berdoa kepada TUHAN:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Art thou better than populous No, that was situate among the rivers, that had the waters round about it, whose rampart was the sea, and her wall was from the sea?
target: Adakah engkau lebih baik dari Tebe, kota dewa Amon, yang letaknya di sungai Nil, dengan air sekelilingnya, yang tembok kotanya adalah laut, dan bentengnya adalah air?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass through the lightness of her whoredom, that she defiled the land, and committed adultery with stones and with stocks.
target: Dengan sundalnya yang sembrono itu maka ia mencemarkan negeri dan berzinah dengan menyembah batu dan kayu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Judah also shall fight at Jerusalem; and the wealth of all the heathen round about shall be gathered together, gold, and silver, and apparel, in great abundance.
target: Juga Yehuda akan berperang melawan Yerusalem itu; dan dikumpulkanlah harta benda segala bangsa di sekeliling, yaitu emas, perak dan pakaian dalam jumlah yang sangat besar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Zadok therefore and Abiathar carried the ark of God again to Jerusalem: and they tarried there.
target: Lalu Zadok dan Abyatar membawa tabut Allah itu kembali ke Yerusalem dan tinggallah mereka di sana.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He brought streams also out of the rock, and caused waters to run down like rivers.
target: dibuat-Nya aliran air keluar dari bukit batu, dan dibuat-Nya air turun seperti sungai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when they had found him on the other side of the sea, they said unto him, Rabbi, when camest thou hither?
target: Ketika orang banyak menemukan Yesus di seberang laut itu, mereka berkata kepada-Nya: "Rabi, bilamana Engkau tiba di sini?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the whole congregation of the children of Israel assembled together at Shiloh, and set up the tabernacle of the congregation there. And the land was subdued before them.
target: Maka berkumpullah segenap umat Israel di Silo, lalu mereka menempatkan Kemah Pertemuan di sana, karena negeri itu telah takluk kepada mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The Lord then answered him, and said, Thou hypocrite, doth not each one of you on the sabbath loose his ox or his ass from the stall, and lead him away to watering?
target: Tetapi Tuhan menjawab dia, kata-Nya: "Hai orang-orang munafik, bukankah setiap orang di antaramu melepaskan lembunya atau keledainya pada hari Sabat dari kandangnya dan membawanya ke tempat minuman?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Is this thing done by my lord the king, and thou hast not shewed it unto thy servant, who should sit on the throne of my lord the king after him?
target: Jika hal ini terjadi dari pihak tuanku raja, maka engkau tidak memberitahu hamba-hambamu ini, siapa yang akan duduk di atas takhta tuanku raja sesudah tuanku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye shall keep my statutes, and do them: I am the LORD which sanctify you.
target: Demikianlah kamu harus berpegang pada ketetapan-Ku dan melakukannya; Akulah TUHAN yang menguduskan kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Again, the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man, seeking goodly pearls:
target: Demikian pula hal Kerajaan Sorga itu seumpama seorang pedagang yang mencari mutiara yang indah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand.
target: Dengan tanganku sendiri aku menulis ini: Salam dari Paulus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They that did feed delicately are desolate in the streets: they that were brought up in scarlet embrace dunghills.
target: Yang biasa makan yang sedap-sedap mati bulur di jalan-jalan; yang biasa duduk di atas bantal kirmizi terbaring di timbunan sampah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt have goats' milk enough for thy food, for the food of thy household, and for the maintenance for thy maidens.
target: pula cukup susu kambing untuk makananmu dan makanan keluargamu, dan untuk penghidupan pelayan-pelayanmu perempuan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
target: TUHAN berfirman kepada Musa:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they were helped against them, and the Hagarites were delivered into their hand, and all that were with them: for they cried to God in the battle, and he was intreated of them; because they put their trust in him.
target: Mereka mendapat bantuan melawan orang-orang itu, sehingga orang Hagri itu dengan semua orang yang mengikutinya menyerahkan diri ke dalam tangan mereka, sebab mereka telah berseru kepada Allah dalam pertempuran itu. Maka Ia mengabulkan permintaan mereka, sebab mereka percaya kepada-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For, lo, the kings were assembled, they passed by together.
target: Dalam puri-purinya Allah memperkenalkan diri-Nya sebagai benteng.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore their goods shall become a booty, and their houses a desolation: they shall also build houses, but not inhabit them; and they shall plant vineyards, but not drink the wine thereof.
target: Maka harta kekayaannya akan dirampas dan rumah-rumahnya akan menjadi sunyi sepi. Apabila mereka mendirikan rumah, mereka tidak akan mendiaminya; apabila mereka membuat kebun anggur, mereka tidak akan minum anggurnya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if a man shall lie with a woman having her sickness, and shall uncover her nakedness; he hath discovered her fountain, and she hath uncovered the fountain of her blood: and both of them shall be cut off from among their people.
target: Bila seorang laki-laki tidur dengan seorang perempuan yang bercemar kain, jadi ia menyingkapkan aurat perempuan itu dan membuka tutup lelerannya sedang perempuan itu pun membiarkan tutup leleran darahnya itu disingkapkan, keduanya harus dilenyapkan dari tengah-tengah bangsanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He shall judge thy people with righteousness, and thy poor with judgment.
target: Kiranya ia mengadili umat-Mu dengan keadilan dan orang-orang-Mu yang tertindas dengan hukum!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the people of the land rejoiced: and the city was quiet, after that they had slain Athaliah with the sword.
target: Bersukarialah seluruh rakyat negeri dan amanlah kota itu, setelah Atalya mati dibunuh dengan pedang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, my servant shall deal prudently, he shall be exalted and extolled, and be very high.
target: Sesungguhnya, hamba-Ku akan berhasil, ia akan ditinggikan, disanjung dan dimuliakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, as a child that is weaned of his mother: my soul is even as a weaned child.
target: Sesungguhnya, aku telah menenangkan dan mendiamkan jiwaku; seperti anak yang disapih berbaring dekat ibunya, ya, seperti anak yang disapih jiwaku dalam diriku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These are the journeys of the children of Israel, which went forth out of the land of Egypt with their armies under the hand of Moses and Aaron.
target: Inilah tempat-tempat persinggahan orang Israel, setelah mereka keluar dari tanah Mesir, pasukan demi pasukan, di bawah pimpinan Musa dan Harun;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For they are impudent children and stiffhearted. I do send thee unto them; and thou shalt say unto them, Thus saith the Lord GOD.
target: Kepada keturunan inilah, yang keras kepala dan tegar hati, Aku mengutus engkau dan harus kaukatakan kepada mereka: Beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David went out whithersoever Saul sent him, and behaved himself wisely: and Saul set him over the men of war, and he was accepted in the sight of all the people, and also in the sight of Saul's servants.
target: Daud maju berperang dan selalu berhasil ke mana juga Saul menyuruhnya, sehingga Saul mengangkat dia mengepalai para prajurit. Hal ini dipandang baik oleh seluruh rakyat dan juga oleh pegawai-pegawai Saul.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And at Gibeon dwelt the father of Gibeon; whose wife's name was Maachah:
target: Tetapi di Gibeon diam bapa Gibeon, yakni Yeiel, dan nama isterinya ialah Maakha.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let the wilderness and the cities thereof lift up their voice, the villages that Kedar doth inhabit: let the inhabitants of the rock sing, let them shout from the top of the mountains.
target: Baiklah padang gurun menyaringkan suara dengan kota-kotanya dan dengan desa-desa yang didiami Kedar! Baiklah bersorak-sorai penduduk Bukit Batu, baiklah mereka berseru-seru dari puncak gunung-gunung!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us, whether prophecy, let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith;
target: Demikianlah kita mempunyai karunia yang berlain-lainan menurut kasih karunia yang dianugerahkan kepada kita: Jika karunia itu adalah untuk bernubuat baiklah kita melakukannya sesuai dengan iman kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass as they came, when David was returned from the slaughter of the Philistine, that the women came out of all cities of Israel, singing and dancing, to meet king Saul, with tabrets, with joy, and with instruments of musick.
target: Tetapi pada waktu mereka pulang, ketika Daud kembali sesudah mengalahkan orang Filistin itu, keluarlah orang-orang perempuan dari segala kota Israel menyongsong raja Saul sambil menyanyi dan menari-nari dengan memukul rebana, dengan bersukaria dan dengan membunyikan gerincing;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Remove from me reproach and contempt; for I have kept thy testimonies.
target: Gulingkanlah dari atasku cela dan penghinaan, sebab aku memegang peringatan-peringatan-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the wrath of God is revealed from heaven against all ungodliness and unrighteousness of men, who hold the truth in unrighteousness;
target: Sebab murka Allah nyata dari sorga atas segala kefasikan dan kelaliman manusia, yang menindas kebenaran dengan kelaliman.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore, I pray thee, if I have found grace in thy sight, shew me now thy way, that I may know thee, that I may find grace in thy sight: and consider that this nation is thy people.
target: Maka sekarang, jika aku kiranya mendapat kasih karunia di hadapan-Mu, beritahukanlah kiranya jalan-Mu kepadaku, sehingga aku mengenal Engkau, supaya aku tetap mendapat kasih karunia di hadapan-Mu. Ingatlah, bahwa bangsa ini umat-Mu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore the kinsman said unto Boaz, Buy it for thee. So he drew off his shoe.
target: Lalu penebus itu berkata kepada Boas: "Engkau saja yang membelinya." Dan ditanggalkannyalah kasutnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when they had brought their ships to land, they forsook all, and followed him.
target: Dan sesudah mereka menghela perahu-perahunya ke darat, mereka pun meninggalkan segala sesuatu, lalu mengikut Yesus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now if the fall of them be the riches of the world, and the diminishing of them the riches of the Gentiles; how much more their fulness?
target: Sebab jika pelanggaran mereka berarti kekayaan bagi dunia, dan kekurangan mereka kekayaan bagi bangsa-bangsa lain, terlebih-lebih lagi kesempurnaan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou through thy commandments hast made me wiser than mine enemies: for they are ever with me.
target: Perintah-Mu membuat aku lebih bijaksana dari pada musuh-musuhku, sebab selama-lamanya itu ada padaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king of Assyria sent Tartan and Rabsaris and Rabshakeh from Lachish to king Hezekiah with a great host against Jerusalem. And they went up and came to Jerusalem. And when they were come up, they came and stood by the conduit of the upper pool, which is in the highway of the fuller's field.
target: Sesudah itu raja Asyur mengirim panglima, kepala istana dan juru minuman agung dari Lakhis kepada raja Hizkia di Yerusalem disertai suatu tentara yang besar. Mereka maju dan sampai ke Yerusalem. Setelah mereka maju dan sampai di situ, mereka mengambil tempat dekat saluran kolam atas yang di jalan raja pada Padang Tukang Penatu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The young lions roared upon him, and yelled, and they made his land waste: his cities are burned without inhabitant.
target: Terhadapnya singa-singa muda mengaum, menyaringkan suaranya; negerinya dibuat orang menjadi tandus, kota-kotanya terbakar, tidak lagi berpenduduk.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto him, Thus saith the LORD, Because thou hast let go out of thy hand a man whom I appointed to utter destruction, therefore thy life shall go for his life, and thy people for his people.
target: Kata nabi itu kepadanya: "Beginilah firman TUHAN: Oleh karena engkau telah membiarkan lolos orang yang dikhususkan bagi-Ku untuk ditumpas, maka nyawamu adalah ganti nyawanya dan rakyatmu ganti rakyatnya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the ass saw the angel of the LORD standing in the way, and his sword drawn in his hand: and the ass turned aside out of the way, and went into the field: and Balaam smote the ass, to turn her into the way.
target: Ketika keledai itu melihat Malaikat TUHAN berdiri di jalan, dengan pedang terhunus di tangan-Nya, menyimpanglah keledai itu dari jalan dan masuk ke ladang. Maka Bileam memukul keledai itu untuk memalingkannya kembali ke jalan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In Salem also is his tabernacle, and his dwelling place in Zion.
target: Allah terkenal di Yehuda, nama-Nya masyhur di Israel!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Whose mouths must be stopped, who subvert whole houses, teaching things which they ought not, for filthy lucre's sake.
target: Orang-orang semacam itu harus ditutup mulutnya, karena mereka mengacau banyak keluarga dengan mengajarkan yang tidak-tidak untuk mendapat untung yang memalukan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they say unto him, We have here but five loaves, and two fishes.
target: Jawab mereka: "Yang ada pada kami di sini hanya lima roti dan dua ikan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when it was day, he called unto him his disciples: and of them he chose twelve, whom also he named apostles;
target: Ketika hari siang, Ia memanggil murid-murid-Nya kepada-Nya, lalu memilih dari antara mereka dua belas orang, yang disebut-Nya rasul:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The glory of Lebanon shall come unto thee, the fir tree, the pine tree, and the box together, to beautify the place of my sanctuary; and I will make the place of my feet glorious.
target: Kemuliaan Libanon, yaitu pohon sanobar, pohon berangan dan pohon cemara, akan dibawa bersama-sama kepadamu, untuk mempersemarak tempat bait kudus-Ku, sebab Aku hendak memuliakan tempat kaki-Ku berjejak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All the cities of the children of Aaron, the priests, were thirteen cities with their suburbs.
target: Seluruhnya kota-kota kepunyaan anak-anak Harun, para imam itu, ada tiga belas kota dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Whoso is simple, let him turn in hither: as for him that wanteth understanding, she saith to him,
target: "Siapa yang tak berpengalaman, singgahlah ke mari"; dan kepada yang tidak berakal budi katanya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
