input: His lord said unto him, Well done, good and faithful servant; thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.
target: Maka kata tuannya itu kepadanya: Baik sekali perbuatanmu itu, hai hambaku yang baik dan setia, engkau telah setia memikul tanggung jawab dalam perkara yang kecil, aku akan memberikan kepadamu tanggung jawab dalam perkara yang besar. Masuklah dan turutlah dalam kebahagiaan tuanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Our heart is not turned back, neither have our steps declined from thy way;
target: Semuanya ini telah menimpa kami, tetapi kami tidak melupakan Engkau, dan tidak mengkhianati perjanjian-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But in the first year of Cyrus the king of Babylon the same king Cyrus made a decree to build this house of God.
target: Akan tetapi pada tahun pertama zaman Koresh, raja negeri Babel, dikeluarkanlah perintah oleh raja Koresh untuk membangun rumah Allah ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: It is like a grain of mustard seed, which a man took, and cast into his garden; and it grew, and waxed a great tree; and the fowls of the air lodged in the branches of it.
target: Ia seumpama biji sesawi, yang diambil dan ditaburkan orang di kebunnya; biji itu tumbuh dan menjadi pohon dan burung-burung di udara bersarang pada cabang-cabangnya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But when he defied Israel, Jonathan the son of Shimea David's brother slew him.
target: Ia mengolok-olok orang Israel, maka Yonatan, anak Simea kakak Daud, menewaskannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The king of Jarmuth, one; the king of Lachish, one;
target: raja negeri Yarmut, satu; raja negeri Lakhis, satu;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses in the wilderness of Sinai, saying,
target: TUHAN berfirman kepada Musa di padang gurun Sinai:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not suffer a witch to live.
target: "Seorang ahli sihir perempuan janganlah engkau biarkan hidup.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The whole number of the chief of the fathers of the mighty men of valour were two thousand and six hundred.
target: Kepala-kepala puak pahlawan-pahlawan yang gagah perkasa itu seluruhnya berjumlah dua ribu enam ratus orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So the angel that communed with me said unto me, Cry thou, saying, Thus saith the LORD of hosts; I am jealous for Jerusalem and for Zion with a great jealousy.
target: Berkatalah kepadaku malaikat yang berbicara dengan aku itu: Serukanlah ini: Beginilah firman TUHAN semesta alam: Sangat besar usaha-Ku untuk Yerusalem dan Sion,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the word of the LORD is right; and all his works are done in truth.
target: Sebab firman TUHAN itu benar, segala sesuatu dikerjakan-Nya dengan kesetiaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass on the seventh day, that the child died. And the servants of David feared to tell him that the child was dead: for they said, Behold, while the child was yet alive, we spake unto him, and he would not hearken unto our voice: how will he then vex himself, if we tell him that the child is dead?
target: Pada hari yang ketujuh matilah anak itu. Dan pegawai-pegawai Daud takut memberitahukan kepadanya, bahwa anak itu sudah mati. Sebab mereka berkata: "Ketika anak itu masih hidup, kita telah berbicara kepadanya, tetapi ia tidak menghiraukan perkataan kita. Bagaimana kita dapat mengatakan kepadanya: anak itu sudah mati? Jangan-jangan ia mencelakakan diri!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: At the end of every seven years thou shalt make a release.
target: "Pada akhir tujuh tahun engkau harus mengadakan penghapusan hutang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Jeremiah wrote in a book all the evil that should come upon Babylon, even all these words that are written against Babylon.
target: Yeremia telah menuliskan dalam sebuah kitab segenap malapetaka yang akan menimpa Babel, yakni segala perkataan yang tertulis di sini mengenai Babel. —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the priest shall set the woman before the LORD, and uncover the woman's head, and put the offering of memorial in her hands, which is the jealousy offering: and the priest shall have in his hand the bitter water that causeth the curse:
target: Apabila imam sudah menghadapkan perempuan itu kepada TUHAN, haruslah ia menguraikan rambut perempuan itu, lalu meletakkan korban peringatan, yakni korban sajian cemburuan, ke atas telapak tangan perempuan itu, sedang di tangan imam haruslah ada air pahit yang mendatangkan kutuk.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Are there not mockers with me? and doth not mine eye continue in their provocation?
target: Sesungguhnya, aku menjadi ejekan; mataku terpaksa menyaksikan tantangan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So David would not remove the ark of the LORD unto him into the city of David: but David carried it aside into the house of Obededom the Gittite.
target: Sebab itu Daud tidak mau memindahkan tabut TUHAN itu ke tempatnya, ke kota Daud, tetapi Daud menyimpang dan membawanya ke rumah Obed-Edom, orang Gat itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So the messenger went, and came and shewed David all that Joab had sent him for.
target: Lalu pergilah suruhan itu dan sesampainya ia memberitahukan kepada Daud segala yang diperintahkan Yoab kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then asked he them again, Whom seek ye? And they said, Jesus of Nazareth.
target: Maka Ia bertanya pula: "Siapakah yang kamu cari?" Kata mereka: "Yesus dari Nazaret."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And now, because ye have done all these works, saith the LORD, and I spake unto you, rising up early and speaking, but ye heard not; and I called you, but ye answered not;
target: Maka sekarang, oleh karena kamu telah melakukan segala perbuatan itu juga, demikianlah firman TUHAN, dan oleh karena kamu tidak mau mendengarkan, sekalipun Aku berbicara kepadamu terus-menerus, dan kamu tidak mau menjawab, sekalipun Aku berseru kepadamu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall come to pass, while my glory passeth by, that I will put thee in a clift of the rock, and will cover thee with my hand while I pass by:
target: apabila kemuliaan-Ku lewat, maka Aku akan menempatkan engkau dalam lekuk gunung itu dan Aku akan menudungi engkau dengan tangan-Ku, sampai Aku berjalan lewat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he stripped off his clothes also, and prophesied before Samuel in like manner, and lay down naked all that day and all that night. Wherefore they say, Is Saul also among the prophets?
target: Ia pun menanggalkan pakaiannya, dan ia pun juga kepenuhan di depan Samuel. Ia rebah terhantar dengan telanjang sehari-harian dan semalam-malaman itu. Itulah sebabnya orang berkata: "Apakah juga Saul termasuk golongan nabi?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore the fathers shall eat the sons in the midst of thee, and the sons shall eat their fathers; and I will execute judgments in thee, and the whole remnant of thee will I scatter into all the winds.
target: Sebab itu di tengah-tengahmu ayah-ayah akan memakan anak-anaknya dan anak-anak memakan ayahnya dan Aku akan menjatuhkan hukuman kepadamu, sedang semua yang masih tinggal lagi dari padamu akan Kuhamburkan ke semua penjuru angin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If they sin against thee, (for there is no man which sinneth not,) and thou be angry with them, and deliver them over before their enemies, and they carry them away captives unto a land far off or near;
target: Apabila mereka berdosa kepada-Mu — karena tidak ada manusia yang tidak berdosa — dan Engkau murka kepada mereka dan menyerahkan mereka kepada musuh, sehingga mereka diangkut tertawan ke negeri yang jauh atau yang dekat,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: All they that know thee among the people shall be astonished at thee: thou shalt be a terror, and never shalt thou be any more.
target: Semua di antara bangsa-bangsa yang mengenal engkau kaget melihat keadaanmu. Akhir hidupmu mendahsyatkan dan lenyap selamanya engkau."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Though ye offer me burnt offerings and your meat offerings, I will not accept them: neither will I regard the peace offerings of your fat beasts.
target: Sungguh, apabila kamu mempersembahkan kepada-Ku korban-korban bakaran dan korban-korban sajianmu, Aku tidak suka, dan korban keselamatanmu berupa ternak yang tambun, Aku tidak mau pandang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thy servant David's sake turn not away the face of thine anointed.
target: Oleh karena Daud, hamba-Mu, janganlah Engkau menolak orang yang Kauurapi!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If it be torn in pieces, then let him bring it for witness, and he shall not make good that which was torn.
target: Jika binatang itu benar-benar diterkam oleh binatang buas, maka ia harus membawanya sebagai bukti. Tidak usah ia membayar ganti binatang yang diterkam itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye shall know that I am the LORD: for ye have not walked in my statutes, neither executed my judgments, but have done after the manners of the heathen that are round about you.
target: Dan kamu akan mengetahui, bahwa Akulah TUHAN, karena kelakuanmu tidak selaras dengan ketetapan-ketetapan-Ku dan peraturan-peraturan-Ku tidak kamu lakukan; bahkan engkau melakukan peraturan-peraturan bangsa-bangsa yang di sekitarmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the stars of heaven and the constellations thereof shall not give their light: the sun shall be darkened in his going forth, and the moon shall not cause her light to shine.
target: Sebab bintang-bintang dan gugusan-gugusannya di langit tidak akan memancarkan cahayanya; matahari akan menjadi gelap pada waktu terbit, dan bulan tidak akan memancarkan sinarnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the LORD hath taken you, and brought you forth out of the iron furnace, even out of Egypt, to be unto him a people of inheritance, as ye are this day.
target: sedangkan TUHAN telah mengambil kamu dan membawa kamu keluar dari dapur peleburan besi, dari Mesir, untuk menjadi umat milik-Nya sendiri, seperti yang terjadi sekarang ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The fowl of the air, and the fish of the sea, and whatsoever passeth through the paths of the seas.
target: kambing domba dan lembu sapi sekalian, juga binatang-binatang di padang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jesus answered and said unto them, Verily I say unto you, If ye have faith, and doubt not, ye shall not only do this which is done to the fig tree, but also if ye shall say unto this mountain, Be thou removed, and be thou cast into the sea; it shall be done.
target: Yesus menjawab mereka: "Aku berkata kepadamu, sesungguhnya jika kamu percaya dan tidak bimbang, kamu bukan saja akan dapat berbuat apa yang Kuperbuat dengan pohon ara itu, tetapi juga jikalau kamu berkata kepada gunung ini: Beranjaklah dan tercampaklah ke dalam laut! hal itu akan terjadi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he that sat upon the throne said, Behold, I make all things new. And he said unto me, Write: for these words are true and faithful.
target: Ia yang duduk di atas takhta itu berkata: "Lihatlah, Aku menjadikan segala sesuatu baru!" Dan firman-Nya: "Tuliskanlah, karena segala perkataan ini adalah tepat dan benar."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O my God, incline thine ear, and hear; open thine eyes, and behold our desolations, and the city which is called by thy name: for we do not present our supplications before thee for our righteousnesses, but for thy great mercies.
target: Ya Allahku, arahkanlah telinga-Mu dan dengarlah, bukalah mata-Mu dan lihatlah kebinasaan kami dan kota yang disebut dengan nama-Mu, sebab kami menyampaikan doa permohonan kami ke hadapan-Mu bukan berdasarkan jasa-jasa kami, tetapi berdasarkan kasih sayang-Mu yang berlimpah-limpah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the daughter of any priest, if she profane herself by playing the whore, she profaneth her father: she shall be burnt with fire.
target: Apabila anak perempuan seorang imam membiarkan kehormatannya dilanggar dengan bersundal, maka ia melanggar kekudusan ayahnya, dan ia harus dibakar dengan api.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he cometh unto the disciples, and findeth them asleep, and saith unto Peter, What, could ye not watch with me one hour?
target: Setelah itu Ia kembali kepada murid-murid-Nya itu dan mendapati mereka sedang tidur. Dan Ia berkata kepada Petrus: "Tidakkah kamu sanggup berjaga-jaga satu jam dengan Aku?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the children of Israel heard of it, the whole congregation of the children of Israel gathered themselves together at Shiloh, to go up to war against them.
target: Ketika hal itu terdengar oleh orang Israel, berkumpullah segenap umat Israel di Silo, untuk maju memerangi mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He sent from above, he took me; he drew me out of many waters;
target: Ia menjangkau dari tempat tinggi, mengambil aku, menarik aku dari banjir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then certain of the vagabond Jews, exorcists, took upon them to call over them which had evil spirits the name of the LORD Jesus, saying, We adjure you by Jesus whom Paul preacheth.
target: Juga beberapa tukang jampi Yahudi, yang berjalan keliling di negeri itu, mencoba menyebut nama Tuhan Yesus atas mereka yang kerasukan roh jahat dengan berseru, katanya: "Aku menyumpahi kamu demi nama Yesus yang diberitakan oleh Paulus."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Whom I would have retained with me, that in thy stead he might have ministered unto me in the bonds of the gospel:
target: Sebenarnya aku mau menahan dia di sini sebagai gantimu untuk melayani aku selama aku dipenjarakan karena Injil,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also I shook my lap, and said, So God shake out every man from his house, and from his labour, that performeth not this promise, even thus be he shaken out, and emptied. And all the congregation said, Amen, and praised the LORD. And the people did according to this promise.
target: Juga kukebas lipatan bajuku sambil berkata: "Demikianlah setiap orang yang tidak menepati janji ini akan dikebas Allah dari rumahnya dan hasil jerih payahnya. Demikianlah ia dikebas dan menjadi hampa!" Dan seluruh jemaah berkata: "Amin," lalu memuji-muji TUHAN. Maka rakyat berbuat sesuai dengan janji itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If we let him thus alone, all men will believe on him: and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation.
target: Apabila kita biarkan Dia, maka semua orang akan percaya kepada-Nya dan orang-orang Roma akan datang dan akan merampas tempat suci kita serta bangsa kita."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In that day a man shall cast his idols of silver, and his idols of gold, which they made each one for himself to worship, to the moles and to the bats;
target: Pada hari itu berhala-berhala perak dan berhala-berhala emas yang dibuat manusia untuk sujud menyembah kepadanya akan dilemparkannya kepada tikus dan kelelawar,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as for the prophet, and the priest, and the people, that shall say, The burden of the LORD, I will even punish that man and his house.
target: Adapun nabi atau imam atau rakyat yang masih berbicara tentang Sabda yang dibebankan oleh TUHAN, kepada orang itu dan kepada keluarganya akan Kulakukan pembalasan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of strangers shall build up thy walls, and their kings shall minister unto thee: for in my wrath I smote thee, but in my favour have I had mercy on thee.
target: Orang-orang asing akan membangun tembokmu, dan raja-raja mereka akan melayani engkau; sebab dalam murka-Ku Aku telah menghajar engkau, namun Aku telah berkenan untuk mengasihani engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They, and all that appertained to them, went down alive into the pit, and the earth closed upon them: and they perished from among the congregation.
target: Demikianlah mereka dengan semua orang yang ada pada mereka turun hidup-hidup ke dunia orang mati; dan bumi menutupi mereka, sehingga mereka binasa dari tengah-tengah jemaah itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he went up, and lay upon the child, and put his mouth upon his mouth, and his eyes upon his eyes, and his hands upon his hands: and stretched himself upon the child; and the flesh of the child waxed warm.
target: Lalu ia membaringkan dirinya di atas anak itu dengan mulutnya di atas mulut anak itu, dan matanya di atas mata anak itu, serta telapak tangannya di atas telapak tangan anak itu; dan karena ia meniarap di atas anak itu, maka menjadi panaslah badan anak itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let thine ear now be attentive, and thine eyes open, that thou mayest hear the prayer of thy servant, which I pray before thee now, day and night, for the children of Israel thy servants, and confess the sins of the children of Israel, which we have sinned against thee: both I and my father's house have sinned.
target: berilah telinga-Mu dan bukalah mata-Mu dan dengarkanlah doa hamba-Mu yang sekarang kupanjatkan ke hadirat-Mu siang dan malam bagi orang Israel, hamba-hamba-Mu itu, dengan mengaku segala dosa yang kami orang Israel telah lakukan terhadap-Mu. Juga aku dan kaum keluargaku telah berbuat dosa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As one whom his mother comforteth, so will I comfort you; and ye shall be comforted in Jerusalem.
target: Seperti seseorang yang dihibur ibunya, demikianlah Aku ini akan menghibur kamu; kamu akan dihibur di Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then understood they how that he bade them not beware of the leaven of bread, but of the doctrine of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees.
target: Ketika itu barulah mereka mengerti bahwa bukan maksud-Nya supaya mereka waspada terhadap ragi roti, melainkan terhadap ajaran orang Farisi dan Saduki.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The wicked desireth the net of evil men: but the root of the righteous yieldeth fruit.
target: Orang fasik mengingini jala orang jahat, tetapi akar orang benar mendatangkan hasil.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: What is man, that he should be clean? and he which is born of a woman, that he should be righteous?
target: Masakan manusia bersih, masakan benar yang lahir dari perempuan?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he was come into his own country, he taught them in their synagogue, insomuch that they were astonished, and said, Whence hath this man this wisdom, and these mighty works?
target: Setibanya di tempat asal-Nya, Yesus mengajar orang-orang di situ di rumah ibadat mereka. Maka takjublah mereka dan berkata: "Dari mana diperoleh-Nya hikmat itu dan kuasa untuk mengadakan mujizat-mujizat itu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For if we have been planted together in the likeness of his death, we shall be also in the likeness of his resurrection:
target: Sebab jika kita telah menjadi satu dengan apa yang sama dengan kematian-Nya, kita juga akan menjadi satu dengan apa yang sama dengan kebangkitan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And from Lachish Joshua passed unto Eglon, and all Israel with him; and they encamped against it, and fought against it:
target: Kemudian Yosua dengan seluruh Israel berjalan terus dari Lakhis ke Eglon, lalu mereka berkemah mengepung kota itu dan berperang melawannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore ye shall do my statutes, and keep my judgments, and do them; and ye shall dwell in the land in safety.
target: Demikianlah kamu harus melakukan ketetapan-Ku dan tetap berpegang pada peraturan-Ku serta melakukannya, maka kamu akan diam di tanahmu dengan aman tenteram.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joseph died, and all his brethren, and all that generation.
target: Kemudian matilah Yusuf, serta semua saudara-saudaranya dan semua orang yang seangkatan dengan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when they were a good way from the house of Micah, the men that were in the houses near to Micah's house were gathered together, and overtook the children of Dan.
target: Ketika mereka telah jauh dari rumah Mikha, dikerahkanlah orang-orang dari rumah-rumah yang di dekat rumah Mikha dan orang-orang itu mengejar bani Dan itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Acquaint now thyself with him, and be at peace: thereby good shall come unto thee.
target: Berlakulah ramah terhadap Dia, supaya engkau tenteram; dengan demikian engkau memperoleh keuntungan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto his brethren, My money is restored; and, lo, it is even in my sack: and their heart failed them, and they were afraid, saying one to another, What is this that God hath done unto us?
target: Katanya kepada saudara-saudaranya: "Uangku dikembalikan; lihat, ada dalam karungku!" Lalu hati mereka menjadi tawar dan mereka berpandang-pandangan dengan gemetar serta berkata: "Apakah juga yang diperbuat Allah terhadap kita!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When therefore he was risen from the dead, his disciples remembered that he had said this unto them; and they believed the scripture, and the word which Jesus had said.
target: Kemudian, sesudah Ia bangkit dari antara orang mati, barulah teringat oleh murid-murid-Nya bahwa hal itu telah dikatakan-Nya, dan mereka pun percayalah akan Kitab Suci dan akan perkataan yang telah diucapkan Yesus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the gate of the inner court was over against the gate toward the north, and toward the east; and he measured from gate to gate an hundred cubits.
target: Di pelataran dalam ada sebuah pintu gerbang yang berhadapan dengan pintu gerbang utara sama seperti halnya dengan pintu gerbang timur; ia mengukur dari pintu gerbang sampai pintu gerbang: seratus hasta.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Bring forth him that hath cursed without the camp; and let all that heard him lay their hands upon his head, and let all the congregation stone him.
target: "Bawalah orang yang mengutuk itu ke luar perkemahan dan semua orang yang mendengar haruslah meletakkan tangannya ke atas kepala orang itu, sesudahnya haruslah seluruh jemaah itu melontari dia dengan batu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they said unto him, We have dreamed a dream, and there is no interpreter of it. And Joseph said unto them, Do not interpretations belong to God? tell me them, I pray you.
target: Jawab mereka kepadanya: "Kami bermimpi, tetapi tidak ada orang yang dapat mengartikannya." Lalu kata Yusuf kepada mereka: "Bukankah Allah yang menerangkan arti mimpi? Ceritakanlah kiranya mimpimu itu kepadaku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And saying, If thou be the king of the Jews, save thyself.
target: dan berkata: "Jika Engkau adalah raja orang Yahudi, selamatkanlah diri-Mu!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass in the days of Amraphel king of Shinar, Arioch king of Ellasar, Chedorlaomer king of Elam, and Tidal king of nations;
target: Pada zaman Amrafel, raja Sinear, Ariokh, raja Elasar, Kedorlaomer, raja Elam, dan Tideal, raja Goyim, terjadilah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Blind, or broken, or maimed, or having a wen, or scurvy, or scabbed, ye shall not offer these unto the LORD, nor make an offering by fire of them upon the altar unto the LORD.
target: Binatang yang buta atau yang patah tulang, yang luka atau yang berbisul, yang berkedal atau yang berkurap, semuanya itu janganlah kamu persembahkan kepada TUHAN dan binatang yang demikian janganlah kamu taruh sebagai korban api-apian bagi TUHAN ke atas mezbah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us: for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you;
target: Sebab kamu sendiri tahu, bagaimana kamu harus mengikuti teladan kami, karena kami tidak lalai bekerja di antara kamu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in all the land were no women found so fair as the daughters of Job: and their father gave them inheritance among their brethren.
target: Di seluruh negeri tidak terdapat perempuan yang secantik anak-anak Ayub, dan mereka diberi ayahnya milik pusaka di tengah-tengah saudara-saudaranya laki-laki.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the second day they compassed the city once, and returned into the camp: so they did six days.
target: Demikianlah pada hari kedua mereka mengelilingi kota itu sekali saja, lalu pulang ke tempat perkemahan. Dan begitulah dilakukan mereka enam hari lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if thou sell ought unto thy neighbour, or buyest ought of thy neighbour's hand, ye shall not oppress one another:
target: Apabila kamu menjual sesuatu kepada sesamamu atau membeli dari padanya, janganlah kamu merugikan satu sama lain.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the ark of God was taken; and the two sons of Eli, Hophni and Phinehas, were slain.
target: Lagipula tabut Allah dirampas dan kedua anak Eli, Hofni dan Pinehas, tewas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For whether is greater, he that sitteth at meat, or he that serveth? is not he that sitteth at meat? but I am among you as he that serveth.
target: Sebab siapakah yang lebih besar: yang duduk makan, atau yang melayani? Bukankah dia yang duduk makan? Tetapi Aku ada di tengah-tengah kamu sebagai pelayan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he sent out arrows, and scattered them; lightning, and discomfited them.
target: Dilepaskan-Nya panah-panah, sehingga diserakkan-Nya mereka, yakni kilat-kilat, sehingga dikacaukan-Nya mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Bow down thine ear, and hear the words of the wise, and apply thine heart unto my knowledge.
target: Pasanglah telingamu dan dengarkanlah amsal-amsal orang bijak, berilah perhatian kepada pengetahuanku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them, he was received up into heaven, and sat on the right hand of God.
target: Sesudah Tuhan Yesus berbicara demikian kepada mereka, terangkatlah Ia ke sorga, lalu duduk di sebelah kanan Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore thus saith the Lord GOD; Because thou hast set thine heart as the heart of God;
target: Oleh sebab itu beginilah firman Tuhan ALLAH: Karena hatimu menempatkan diri sama dengan Allah

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And therefore did the Jews persecute Jesus, and sought to slay him, because he had done these things on the sabbath day.
target: Dan karena itu orang-orang Yahudi berusaha menganiaya Yesus, karena Ia melakukan hal-hal itu pada hari Sabat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: According to all that I shew thee, after the pattern of the tabernacle, and the pattern of all the instruments thereof, even so shall ye make it.
target: Menurut segala apa yang Kutunjukkan kepadamu sebagai contoh Kemah Suci dan sebagai contoh segala perabotannya, demikianlah harus kamu membuatnya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, I am Abraham's servant.
target: Lalu berkatalah ia: "Aku ini hamba Abraham.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them, I am an hundred and twenty years old this day; I can no more go out and come in: also the LORD hath said unto me, Thou shalt not go over this Jordan.
target: Berkatalah ia kepada mereka: "Aku sekarang berumur seratus dua puluh tahun; aku tidak dapat giat lagi, dan TUHAN telah berfirman kepadaku: Sungai Yordan ini tidak akan kauseberangi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David assembled the children of Aaron, and the Levites:
target: Daud mengumpulkan bani Harun dan orang Lewi:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Both low and high, rich and poor, together.
target: Dengarlah, hai bangsa-bangsa sekalian, pasanglah telinga, hai semua penduduk dunia,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Truly in vain is salvation hoped for from the hills, and from the multitude of mountains: truly in the LORD our God is the salvation of Israel.
target: Sesungguhnya, bukit-bukit pengorbanan adalah tipu daya, yakni keramaian di atas bukit-bukit itu! Sesungguhnya, hanya pada TUHAN, Allah kita, ada keselamatan Israel!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The flakes of his flesh are joined together: they are firm in themselves; they cannot be moved.
target: Ia meninggalkan jejak yang bercahaya, sehingga samudera raya disangka orang rambut putih.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Having your conversation honest among the Gentiles: that, whereas they speak against you as evildoers, they may by your good works, which they shall behold, glorify God in the day of visitation.
target: Milikilah cara hidup yang baik di tengah-tengah bangsa-bangsa bukan Yahudi, supaya apabila mereka memfitnah kamu sebagai orang durjana, mereka dapat melihatnya dari perbuatan-perbuatanmu yang baik dan memuliakan Allah pada hari Ia melawat mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the arches round about were five and twenty cubits long, and five cubits broad.
target: Sekelilingnya ada balai-balai gerbang, panjangnya dua puluh lima hasta dan lebarnya lima hasta. —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And again, I will put my trust in him. And again, Behold I and the children which God hath given me.
target: dan lagi: "Aku akan menaruh kepercayaan kepada-Nya," dan lagi: "Sesungguhnya, inilah Aku dan anak-anak yang telah diberikan Allah kepada-Ku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now, O LORD God, let thy promise unto David my father be established: for thou hast made me king over a people like the dust of the earth in multitude.
target: Maka sekarang, ya TUHAN Allah, tunjukkanlah keteguhan janji-Mu kepada Daud, ayahku, sebab Engkaulah yang telah mengangkat aku menjadi raja atas suatu bangsa yang banyaknya seperti debu tanah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That the blood of all the prophets, which was shed from the foundation of the world, may be required of this generation;
target: supaya dari angkatan ini dituntut darah semua nabi yang telah tertumpah sejak dunia dijadikan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I know, O LORD, that thy judgments are right, and that thou in faithfulness hast afflicted me.
target: Aku tahu, ya TUHAN, bahwa hukum-hukum-Mu adil, dan bahwa Engkau telah menindas aku dalam kesetiaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: On the seventh day, when the heart of the king was merry with wine, he commanded Mehuman, Biztha, Harbona, Bigtha, and Abagtha, Zethar, and Carcas, the seven chamberlains that served in the presence of Ahasuerus the king,
target: Pada hari yang ketujuh, ketika raja riang gembira hatinya karena minum anggur, bertitahlah baginda kepada Mehuman, Bizta, Harbona, Bigta, Abagta, Zetar dan Karkas, yakni ketujuh sida-sida yang bertugas di hadapan raja Ahasyweros,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have made the earth, the man and the beast that are upon the ground, by my great power and by my outstretched arm, and have given it unto whom it seemed meet unto me.
target: Akulah yang menjadikan bumi, manusia dan hewan yang ada di atas muka bumi dengan kekuatan-Ku yang besar dan dengan lengan-Ku yang terentang, dan Aku memberikannya kepada orang yang benar di mata-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But thou, Bethlehem Ephratah, though thou be little among the thousands of Judah, yet out of thee shall he come forth unto me that is to be ruler in Israel; whose goings forth have been from of old, from everlasting.
target: Sebab itu ia akan membiarkan mereka sampai waktu perempuan yang akan melahirkan telah melahirkan; lalu selebihnya dari saudara-saudaranya akan kembali kepada orang Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: (For they had seen before with him in the city Trophimus an Ephesian, whom they supposed that Paul had brought into the temple.)
target: Sebab mereka telah melihat Trofimus dari Efesus sebelumnya bersama-sama dengan Paulus di kota, dan mereka menyangka, bahwa Paulus telah membawa dia ke dalam Bait Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So now the LORD God of Israel hath dispossessed the Amorites from before his people Israel, and shouldest thou possess it?
target: Maka sekarang TUHAN, Allah Israel, telah merebut milik orang Amori, bagi Israel, umat-Nya. Apakah engkau hendak memiliki pula tanah mereka itu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This is the law for all manner of plague of leprosy, and scall,
target: Itulah hukum tentang setiap penyakit kusta, kudis kepala,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses brought out all the rods from before the LORD unto all the children of Israel: and they looked, and took every man his rod.
target: Kemudian Musa membawa semua tongkat itu keluar dari hadapan TUHAN kepada seluruh orang Israel; mereka melihatnya lalu mengambil tongkatnya masing-masing.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yet ye say, The way of the LORD is not equal. Hear now, O house of Israel; Is not my way equal? are not your ways unequal?
target: Tetapi kamu berkata: Tindakan Tuhan tidak tepat! Dengarlah dulu, hai kaum Israel, apakah tindakan-Ku yang tidak tepat ataukah tindakanmu yang tidak tepat?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the voice of harpers, and musicians, and of pipers, and trumpeters, shall be heard no more at all in thee; and no craftsman, of whatsoever craft he be, shall be found any more in thee; and the sound of a millstone shall be heard no more at all in thee;
target: Dan suara pemain-pemain kecapi dan penyanyi-penyanyi, dan peniup-peniup seruling dan sangkakala, tidak akan kedengaran lagi di dalammu, dan seorang yang ahli dalam sesuatu kesenian tidak akan ditemukan lagi di dalammu, dan suara kilangan tidak akan kedengaran lagi di dalammu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I beheld, and, lo, there was no man, and all the birds of the heavens were fled.
target: Aku melihat, ternyata tidak ada manusia, dan semua burung di udara sudah lari terbang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For this cause, when I could no longer forbear, I sent to know your faith, lest by some means the tempter have tempted you, and our labour be in vain.
target: Itulah sebabnya, maka aku, karena tidak dapat tahan lagi, telah mengirim dia, supaya aku tahu tentang imanmu, karena aku kuatir kalau-kalau kamu telah dicobai oleh si penggoda dan kalau-kalau usaha kami menjadi sia-sia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Say to them that are of a fearful heart, Be strong, fear not: behold, your God will come with vengeance, even God with a recompence; he will come and save you.
target: Katakanlah kepada orang-orang yang tawar hati: "Kuatkanlah hati, janganlah takut! Lihatlah, Allahmu akan datang dengan pembalasan dan dengan ganjaran Allah. Ia sendiri datang menyelamatkan kamu!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he took the blind man by the hand, and led him out of the town; and when he had spit on his eyes, and put his hands upon him, he asked him if he saw ought.
target: Yesus memegang tangan orang buta itu dan membawa dia ke luar kampung. Lalu Ia meludahi mata orang itu dan meletakkan tangan-Nya atasnya, dan bertanya: "Sudahkah kaulihat sesuatu?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Pilate asked him, saying, Art thou the King of the Jews? And he answered him and said, Thou sayest it.
target: Pilatus bertanya kepada-Nya: "Engkaukah raja orang Yahudi?" Jawab Yesus: "Engkau sendiri mengatakannya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For how great is his goodness, and how great is his beauty! corn shall make the young men cheerful, and new wine the maids.
target: Sungguh, alangkah baiknya itu dan alangkah indahnya! Teruna bertumbuh pesat karena gandum, dan anak dara karena anggur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But thou must eat them before the LORD thy God in the place which the LORD thy God shall choose, thou, and thy son, and thy daughter, and thy manservant, and thy maidservant, and the Levite that is within thy gates: and thou shalt rejoice before the LORD thy God in all that thou puttest thine hands unto.
target: Tetapi di hadapan TUHAN, Allahmu, haruslah engkau memakannya, di tempat yang akan dipilih TUHAN, Allahmu, engkau ini, anakmu laki-laki dan anakmu perempuan, hambamu laki-laki dan hambamu perempuan, dan orang Lewi yang di dalam tempatmu, dan haruslah engkau bersukaria di hadapan TUHAN, Allahmu, karena segala usahamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then saith Pilate unto him, Speakest thou not unto me? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee, and have power to release thee?
target: Maka kata Pilatus kepada-Nya: "Tidakkah Engkau mau bicara dengan aku? Tidakkah Engkau tahu, bahwa aku berkuasa untuk membebaskan Engkau, dan berkuasa juga untuk menyalibkan Engkau?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the scripture saith unto Pharaoh, Even for this same purpose have I raised thee up, that I might shew my power in thee, and that my name might be declared throughout all the earth.
target: Sebab Kitab Suci berkata kepada Firaun: "Itulah sebabnya Aku membangkitkan engkau, yaitu supaya Aku memperlihatkan kuasa-Ku di dalam engkau, dan supaya nama-Ku dimasyhurkan di seluruh bumi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who gave himself for our sins, that he might deliver us from this present evil world, according to the will of God and our Father:
target: yang telah menyerahkan diri-Nya karena dosa-dosa kita, untuk melepaskan kita dari dunia jahat yang sekarang ini, menurut kehendak Allah dan Bapa kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And what he did unto the army of Egypt, unto their horses, and to their chariots; how he made the water of the Red sea to overflow them as they pursued after you, and how the LORD hath destroyed them unto this day;
target: juga apa yang dilakukan-Nya terhadap pasukan Mesir, dengan kuda-kudanya dan kereta-keretanya, yakni bagaimana Ia membuat air Laut Teberau meluap meliputi mereka, ketika mereka mengejar kamu, sehingga TUHAN membinasakan mereka untuk selamanya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Or if a soul swear, pronouncing with his lips to do evil, or to do good, whatsoever it be that a man shall pronounce with an oath, and it be hid from him; when he knoweth of it, then he shall be guilty in one of these.
target: Atau apabila seseorang bersumpah teledor dengan bibirnya hendak berbuat yang buruk atau yang baik, sumpah apa pun juga yang diucapkan orang dengan teledor, tanpa menyadari hal itu, tetapi kemudian ia mengetahuinya, maka ia bersalah dalam salah satu perkara itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I thank my God always on your behalf, for the grace of God which is given you by Jesus Christ;
target: Aku senantiasa mengucap syukur kepada Allahku karena kamu atas kasih karunia Allah yang dianugerahkan-Nya kepada kamu dalam Kristus Yesus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as we tarried there many days, there came down from Judaea a certain prophet, named Agabus.
target: Setelah beberapa hari kami tinggal di situ, datanglah dari Yudea seorang nabi bernama Agabus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When I would have healed Israel, then the iniquity of Ephraim was discovered, and the wickedness of Samaria: for they commit falsehood; and the thief cometh in, and the troop of robbers spoileth without.
target: apabila Aku menyembuhkan Israel, maka tersingkaplah kesalahan Efraim dan kejahatan-kejahatan Samaria: sebab mereka melakukan penipuan: pencuri mendobrak masuk, gerombolan merampas di luar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the border went up toward Debir from the valley of Achor, and so northward, looking toward Gilgal, that is before the going up to Adummim, which is on the south side of the river: and the border passed toward the waters of Enshemesh, and the goings out thereof were at Enrogel:
target: lalu dari lembah Akhor batas itu naik ke Debir, dan menuju ke utara ke Gilgal di seberang pendakian Adumim, yang di sebelah selatan sungai. Kemudian batas itu terus ke mata air En-Semes dan keluar ke En-Rogel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And said to the mountains and rocks, Fall on us, and hide us from the face of him that sitteth on the throne, and from the wrath of the Lamb:
target: Dan mereka berkata kepada gunung-gunung dan kepada batu-batu karang itu: "Runtuhlah menimpa kami dan sembunyikanlah kami terhadap Dia, yang duduk di atas takhta dan terhadap murka Anak Domba itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hast not thou made an hedge about him, and about his house, and about all that he hath on every side? thou hast blessed the work of his hands, and his substance is increased in the land.
target: Bukankah Engkau yang membuat pagar sekeliling dia dan rumahnya serta segala yang dimilikinya? Apa yang dikerjakannya telah Kauberkati dan apa yang dimilikinya makin bertambah di negeri itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Blessed is the man to whom the Lord will not impute sin.
target: berbahagialah manusia yang kesalahannya tidak diperhitungkan Tuhan kepadanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then came Shemaiah the prophet to Rehoboam, and to the princes of Judah, that were gathered together to Jerusalem because of Shishak, and said unto them, Thus saith the LORD, Ye have forsaken me, and therefore have I also left you in the hand of Shishak.
target: Nabi Semaya datang kepada Rehabeam dan pemimpin-pemimpin Yehuda yang berkumpul di Yerusalem berhubung dengan ancaman Sisak, dan berkata kepada mereka: "Beginilah firman TUHAN: Kamu telah meninggalkan Aku, oleh sebab itu Aku pun meninggalkan kamu juga dalam kuasa Sisak."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These are the families of Issachar according to those that were numbered of them, threescore and four thousand and three hundred.
target: Itulah kaum-kaum Isakhar, dan orang-orang yang dicatat dari mereka, berjumlah enam puluh empat ribu tiga ratus orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Remember ye not, that, when I was yet with you, I told you these things?
target: Tidakkah kamu ingat, bahwa hal itu telah kerapkali kukatakan kepadamu, ketika aku masih bersama-sama dengan kamu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who is gone into heaven, and is on the right hand of God; angels and authorities and powers being made subject unto him.
target: yang duduk di sebelah kanan Allah, setelah Ia naik ke sorga sesudah segala malaikat, kuasa dan kekuatan ditaklukkan kepada-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A dreadful sound is in his ears: in prosperity the destroyer shall come upon him.
target: Bunyi yang dahsyat sampai ke telinganya, pada masa damai ia didatangi perusak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses went out to meet his father in law, and did obeisance, and kissed him; and they asked each other of their welfare; and they came into the tent.
target: Lalu keluarlah Musa menyongsong mertuanya itu, sujudlah ia kepadanya dan menciumnya; mereka menanyakan keselamatan masing-masing, lalu masuk ke dalam kemah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they withstood Uzziah the king, and said unto him, It appertaineth not unto thee, Uzziah, to burn incense unto the LORD, but to the priests the sons of Aaron, that are consecrated to burn incense: go out of the sanctuary; for thou hast trespassed; neither shall it be for thine honour from the LORD God.
target: mereka berdiri di depan raja Uzia dan berkata kepadanya: "Hai, Uzia, engkau tidak berhak membakar ukupan kepada TUHAN, hanyalah imam-imam keturunan Harun yang telah dikuduskan yang berhak membakar ukupan! Keluarlah dari tempat kudus ini, karena engkau telah berubah setia! Engkau tidak akan memperoleh kehormatan dari TUHAN Allah karena hal ini."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He seeing this before spake of the resurrection of Christ, that his soul was not left in hell, neither his flesh did see corruption.
target: Karena itu ia telah melihat ke depan dan telah berbicara tentang kebangkitan Mesias, ketika ia mengatakan, bahwa Dia tidak ditinggalkan di dalam dunia orang mati, dan bahwa daging-Nya tidak mengalami kebinasaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He sent Hadoram his son to king David, to enquire of his welfare, and to congratulate him, because he had fought against Hadarezer, and smitten him; (for Hadarezer had war with Tou;) and with him all manner of vessels of gold and silver and brass.
target: maka ia mengutus Hadoram, anaknya, kepada raja Daud untuk menyampaikan salam dan mengucapkan selamat kepadanya, karena ia telah berperang melawan Hadadezer dan memukul dia kalah, sebab Hadadezer sering memerangi Tou. Dan Hadoram membawa pelbagai barang-barang emas, perak dan tembaga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ziklag, and Bethmarcaboth, and Hazarsusah,
target: Ziklag, Bet-Hamarkabot, Hazar-Susa,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Whereupon neither the first testament was dedicated without blood.
target: Itulah sebabnya, maka perjanjian yang pertama tidak disahkan tanpa darah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Though the waters thereof roar and be troubled, though the mountains shake with the swelling thereof. Selah.
target: Sebab itu kita tidak akan takut, sekalipun bumi berubah, sekalipun gunung-gunung goncang di dalam laut;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thus saith the LORD, Enter not into the house of mourning, neither go to lament nor bemoan them: for I have taken away my peace from this people, saith the LORD, even lovingkindness and mercies.
target: Sungguh, beginilah firman TUHAN: Janganlah masuk ke rumah perkabungan, dan janganlah pergi meratap dan janganlah turut berdukacita dengan mereka, sebab Aku telah menarik damai sejahtera pemberian-Ku dari pada bangsa ini, demikianlah firman TUHAN, juga kasih setia dan belas kasihan-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O LORD, how great are thy works! and thy thoughts are very deep.
target: Sebab telah Kaubuat aku bersukacita, ya TUHAN, dengan pekerjaan-Mu, karena perbuatan tangan-Mu aku akan bersorak-sorai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he builded an altar there, and called upon the name of the LORD, and pitched his tent there: and there Isaac's servants digged a well.
target: Sesudah itu Ishak mendirikan mezbah di situ dan memanggil nama TUHAN. Ia memasang kemahnya di situ, lalu hamba-hambanya menggali sumur di situ.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore they could not believe, because that Esaias said again,
target: Karena itu mereka tidak dapat percaya, sebab Yesaya telah berkata juga:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: An evil disease, say they, cleaveth fast unto him: and now that he lieth he shall rise up no more.
target: Semua orang yang benci kepadaku berbisik-bisik bersama-sama tentang aku, mereka merancangkan yang jahat terhadap aku:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jesus answered them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Whosoever committeth sin is the servant of sin.
target: Kata Yesus kepada mereka: "Aku berkata kepadamu, sesungguhnya setiap orang yang berbuat dosa, adalah hamba dosa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: What if God, willing to shew his wrath, and to make his power known, endured with much longsuffering the vessels of wrath fitted to destruction:
target: Jadi, kalau untuk menunjukkan murka-Nya dan menyatakan kuasa-Nya, Allah menaruh kesabaran yang besar terhadap benda-benda kemurkaan-Nya, yang telah disiapkan untuk kebinasaan —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who maketh his angels spirits; his ministers a flaming fire:
target: yang membuat angin sebagai suruhan-suruhan-Mu, dan api yang menyala sebagai pelayan-pelayan-Mu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Break forth into joy, sing together, ye waste places of Jerusalem: for the LORD hath comforted his people, he hath redeemed Jerusalem.
target: Bergembiralah, bersorak-sorailah bersama-sama, hai reruntuhan Yerusalem! Sebab TUHAN telah menghibur umat-Nya, telah menebus Yerusalem.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I, saith the LORD, will be unto her a wall of fire round about, and will be the glory in the midst of her.
target: Dan Aku sendiri, demikianlah firman TUHAN, akan menjadi tembok berapi baginya di sekelilingnya, dan Aku akan menjadi kemuliaan di dalamnya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye are witnesses of these things.
target: Kamu adalah saksi dari semuanya ini.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that is so impoverished that he hath no oblation chooseth a tree that will not rot; he seeketh unto him a cunning workman to prepare a graven image, that shall not be moved.
target: Orang yang mendirikan arca, memilih kayu yang tidak lekas busuk, mencari tukang yang ahli untuk menegakkan patung yang tidak lekas goyang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The king also said unto them, Take with you the servants of your lord, and cause Solomon my son to ride upon mine own mule, and bring him down to Gihon:
target: dan raja berkata kepada mereka: "Bawalah para pegawai tuanmu ini, naikkan anakku Salomo ke atas bagal betina kendaraanku sendiri, dan bawa dia ke Gihon.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: We have been with child, we have been in pain, we have as it were brought forth wind; we have not wrought any deliverance in the earth; neither have the inhabitants of the world fallen.
target: Kami mengandung, kami menggeliat sakit, tetapi seakan-akan kami melahirkan angin: kami tidak dapat mengadakan keselamatan di bumi, dan tiada lahir penduduk dunia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And again he sent another servant: and they beat him also, and entreated him shamefully, and sent him away empty.
target: Sesudah itu ia menyuruh seorang hamba yang lain, tetapi hamba itu juga dipukul dan dipermalukan oleh mereka, lalu disuruh pulang dengan tangan hampa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan, and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness,
target: Yesus, yang penuh dengan Roh Kudus, kembali dari sungai Yordan, lalu dibawa oleh Roh Kudus ke padang gurun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of Merari was the family of the Mahlites, and the family of the Mushites: these are the families of Merari.
target: Puak Merari terdiri dari kaum Mahli dan kaum Musi; itulah kaum-kaum Merari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Goshen, and Holon, and Giloh; eleven cities with their villages:
target: Gosyen, Holon dan Gilo; sebelas kota dengan desa-desanya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the priest shall look on the plague in the skin of the flesh: and when the hair in the plague is turned white, and the plague in sight be deeper than the skin of his flesh, it is a plague of leprosy: and the priest shall look on him, and pronounce him unclean.
target: Imam haruslah memeriksa penyakit pada kulit itu, dan kalau bulu di tempat penyakit itu sudah berubah menjadi putih, dan penyakit itu kelihatan lebih dalam dari kulit, maka itu penyakit kusta; kalau imam melihat hal itu, haruslah ia menyatakan orang itu najis.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Give ear, O LORD, unto my prayer; and attend to the voice of my supplications.
target: Pasanglah telinga kepada doaku, ya TUHAN, dan perhatikanlah suara permohonanku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, Oh let not the LORD be angry, and I will speak yet but this once: Peradventure ten shall be found there. And he said, I will not destroy it for ten's sake.
target: Katanya: "Janganlah kiranya Tuhan murka, kalau aku berkata lagi sekali ini saja. Sekiranya sepuluh didapati di sana?" Firman-Nya: "Aku tidak akan memusnahkannya karena yang sepuluh itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he will stretch out his hand against the north, and destroy Assyria; and will make Nineveh a desolation, and dry like a wilderness.
target: Ia akan mengacungkan tangan-Nya terhadap Utara, akan membinasakan Asyur, dan akan membuat Niniwe menjadi tempat yang sunyi sepi, kering seperti padang gurun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David gat him a name when he returned from smiting of the Syrians in the valley of salt, being eighteen thousand men.
target: Demikianlah Daud mendapat nama, dan ketika ia pulang, ia menewaskan delapan belas ribu orang Edom di Lembah Asin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And though I bestow all my goods to feed the poor, and though I give my body to be burned, and have not charity, it profiteth me nothing.
target: Dan sekalipun aku membagi-bagikan segala sesuatu yang ada padaku, bahkan menyerahkan tubuhku untuk dibakar, tetapi jika aku tidak mempunyai kasih, sedikit pun tidak ada faedahnya bagiku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, as her soul was in departing, (for she died) that she called his name Benoni: but his father called him Benjamin.
target: Dan ketika ia hendak menghembuskan nafas — sebab ia mati kemudian — diberikannyalah nama Ben-oni kepada anak itu, tetapi ayahnya menamainya Benyamin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God, that he may exalt you in due time:
target: Karena itu rendahkanlah dirimu di bawah tangan Tuhan yang kuat, supaya kamu ditinggikan-Nya pada waktunya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A false witness that speaketh lies, and he that soweth discord among brethren.
target: seorang saksi dusta yang menyembur-nyemburkan kebohongan dan yang menimbulkan pertengkaran saudara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the rest of the sons of Levi were these: Of the sons of Amram; Shubael: of the sons of Shubael; Jehdeiah.
target: Golongan yang masih tinggal dari bani Lewi, dari anak-anak Amram ialah Subael, dari anak-anak Subael ialah Yehdeya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And afterward Moses and Aaron went in, and told Pharaoh, Thus saith the LORD God of Israel, Let my people go, that they may hold a feast unto me in the wilderness.
target: Kemudian Musa dan Harun pergi menghadap Firaun, lalu berkata kepadanya: "Beginilah firman TUHAN, Allah Israel: Biarkanlah umat-Ku pergi untuk mengadakan perayaan bagi-Ku di padang gurun."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For every high priest is ordained to offer gifts and sacrifices: wherefore it is of necessity that this man have somewhat also to offer.
target: Sebab setiap Imam Besar ditetapkan untuk mempersembahkan korban dan persembahan dan karena itu Yesus perlu mempunyai sesuatu untuk dipersembahkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I spake unto thee in thy prosperity; but thou saidst, I will not hear. This hath been thy manner from thy youth, that thou obeyedst not my voice.
target: Aku telah berbicara kepadamu selagi engkau sentosa, tetapi engkau berkata: "Aku tidak mau mendengarkan!" Itulah tingkah langkahmu dari sejak masa mudamu, sebab engkau tidak mau mendengarkan suara-Ku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I said unto them, We after our ability have redeemed our brethren the Jews, which were sold unto the heathen; and will ye even sell your brethren? or shall they be sold unto us? Then held they their peace, and found nothing to answer.
target: Berkatalah aku kepada mereka: "Kami selalu berusaha sedapat-dapatnya untuk menebus sesama orang Yahudi yang dijual kepada bangsa-bangsa lain. Tetapi kamu ini justru menjual saudara-saudaramu, supaya mereka dibeli lagi oleh kami!" Mereka berdiam diri karena tidak dapat membantah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Keep yourselves in the love of God, looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ unto eternal life.
target: Peliharalah dirimu demikian dalam kasih Allah sambil menantikan rahmat Tuhan kita, Yesus Kristus, untuk hidup yang kekal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In that day, saith the LORD, will I assemble her that halteth, and I will gather her that is driven out, and her that I have afflicted;
target: Pada hari itu, demikianlah firman TUHAN, Aku akan mengumpulkan mereka yang pincang, dan akan menghimpunkan mereka yang terpencar-pencar dan mereka yang telah Kucelakakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Be of good courage, and let us play the men for our people, and for the cities of our God: and the LORD do that which seemeth him good.
target: Kuatkanlah hatimu dan marilah kita menguatkan hati untuk bangsa kita dan untuk kota-kota Allah kita. TUHAN kiranya melakukan yang baik di mata-Nya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they brought the colt to Jesus, and cast their garments on him; and he sat upon him.
target: Lalu mereka membawa keledai itu kepada Yesus, dan mengalasinya dengan pakaian mereka, kemudian Yesus naik ke atasnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Howbeit from the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, who made Israel to sin, Jehu departed not from after them, to wit, the golden calves that were in Bethel, and that were in Dan.
target: Hanya, Yehu tidak menjauh dari dosa-dosa Yerobeam bin Nebat, yang mengakibatkan orang Israel berdosa pula, yakni dosa penyembahan anak-anak lembu emas yang di Betel dan yang di Dan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jesus said, Take ye away the stone. Martha, the sister of him that was dead, saith unto him, Lord, by this time he stinketh: for he hath been dead four days.
target: Kata Yesus: "Angkat batu itu!" Marta, saudara orang yang meninggal itu, berkata kepada-Nya: "Tuhan, ia sudah berbau, sebab sudah empat hari ia mati."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they brought the captives, and the prey, and the spoil, unto Moses, and Eleazar the priest, and unto the congregation of the children of Israel, unto the camp at the plains of Moab, which are by Jordan near Jericho.
target: dan dibawalah orang-orang tawanan, rampasan dan jarahan itu kepada Musa dan imam Eleazar dan kepada umat Israel, ke tempat perkemahan di dataran Moab yang di tepi sungai Yordan dekat Yerikho.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Give unto the LORD the glory due unto his name: bring an offering, and come into his courts.
target: Berilah kepada TUHAN kemuliaan nama-Nya, bawalah persembahan dan masuklah ke pelataran-Nya!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Where wast thou when I laid the foundations of the earth? declare, if thou hast understanding.
target: Di manakah engkau, ketika Aku meletakkan dasar bumi? Ceritakanlah, kalau engkau mempunyai pengertian!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Solomon offered a sacrifice of peace offerings, which he offered unto the LORD, two and twenty thousand oxen, and an hundred and twenty thousand sheep. So the king and all the children of Israel dedicated the house of the LORD.
target: Sebagai korban keselamatannya kepada TUHAN Salomo mempersembahkan dua puluh dua ribu ekor lembu sapi dan seratus dua puluh ribu ekor kambing domba. Demikianlah raja dan segenap Israel mentahbiskan rumah TUHAN itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he marvelled because of their unbelief. And he went round about the villages, teaching.
target: Ia merasa heran atas ketidakpercayaan mereka. Lalu Yesus berjalan keliling dari desa ke desa sambil mengajar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As also in all his epistles, speaking in them of these things; in which are some things hard to be understood, which they that are unlearned and unstable wrest, as they do also the other scriptures, unto their own destruction.
target: Hal itu dibuatnya dalam semua suratnya, apabila ia berbicara tentang perkara-perkara ini. Dalam surat-suratnya itu ada hal-hal yang sukar difahami, sehingga orang-orang yang tidak memahaminya dan yang tidak teguh imannya, memutarbalikkannya menjadi kebinasaan mereka sendiri, sama seperti yang juga mereka buat dengan tulisan-tulisan yang lain.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said unto him, This is the land which I sware unto Abraham, unto Isaac, and unto Jacob, saying, I will give it unto thy seed: I have caused thee to see it with thine eyes, but thou shalt not go over thither.
target: Dan berfirmanlah TUHAN kepadanya: "Inilah negeri yang Kujanjikan dengan sumpah kepada Abraham, Ishak dan Yakub; demikian: Kepada keturunanmulah akan Kuberikan negeri itu. Aku mengizinkan engkau melihatnya dengan matamu sendiri, tetapi engkau tidak akan menyeberang ke sana."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now the sons of Keturah, Abraham's concubine: she bare Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the sons of Jokshan; Sheba, and Dedan.
target: Keturunan Ketura, gundik Abraham: perempuan itu melahirkan Zimran, Yoksan, Medan, Midian, Isybak dan Suah. Anak-anak Yoksan ialah Syeba dan Dedan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And now what hast thou to do in the way of Egypt, to drink the waters of Sihor? or what hast thou to do in the way of Assyria, to drink the waters of the river?
target: Dan sekarang, apakah untungmu untuk pergi ke Mesir, hendak meminum air sungai Nil? Dan apakah untungmu untuk pergi ke Asyur, hendak meminum air sungai Efrat?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: On the west side shall be the standard of the camp of Ephraim according to their armies: and the captain of the sons of Ephraim shall be Elishama the son of Ammihud.
target: Panji-panji laskar Efraim, menurut pasukan-pasukan mereka, adalah di sebelah barat. Pemimpin bani Efraim ialah Elisama bin Amihud.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them, Let the LORD be so with you, as I will let you go, and your little ones: look to it; for evil is before you.
target: Tetapi Firaun berkata kepada mereka: "TUHAN boleh menyertai kamu, jika aku membiarkan kamu pergi dengan anak-anakmu! Lihat, jahatlah maksudmu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing, being fruitful in every good work, and increasing in the knowledge of God;
target: sehingga hidupmu layak di hadapan-Nya serta berkenan kepada-Nya dalam segala hal, dan kamu memberi buah dalam segala pekerjaan yang baik dan bertumbuh dalam pengetahuan yang benar tentang Allah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Bring my soul out of prison, that I may praise thy name: the righteous shall compass me about; for thou shalt deal bountifully with me.
target: Perhatikanlah teriakku, sebab aku telah menjadi sangat lemah. Lepaskanlah aku dari pada orang-orang yang mengejar aku, sebab mereka terlalu kuat bagiku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, when they had brought them forth abroad, that he said, Escape for thy life; look not behind thee, neither stay thou in all the plain; escape to the mountain, lest thou be consumed.
target: Sesudah kedua orang itu menuntun mereka sampai ke luar, berkatalah seorang: "Larilah, selamatkanlah nyawamu; janganlah menoleh ke belakang, dan janganlah berhenti di mana pun juga di Lembah Yordan, larilah ke pegunungan, supaya engkau jangan mati lenyap."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For they know not to do right, saith the LORD, who store up violence and robbery in their palaces.
target: "Mereka tidak tahu berbuat jujur," demikianlah firman TUHAN, "mereka itu yang menimbun kekerasan dan aniaya di dalam purinya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it was so, as she rode on the ass, that she came down by the covert on the hill, and, behold, David and his men came down against her; and she met them.
target: Ketika perempuan itu dengan menunggang keledainya, turun dengan terlindung oleh gunung, tampaklah Daud dan orang-orangnya turun ke arahnya, dan perempuan itu bertemu dengan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let her be as the loving hind and pleasant roe; let her breasts satisfy thee at all times; and be thou ravished always with her love.
target: rusa yang manis, kijang yang jelita; biarlah buah dadanya selalu memuaskan engkau, dan engkau senantiasa berahi karena cintanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joseph said unto them, That is it that I spake unto you, saying, Ye are spies:
target: Lalu kata Yusuf kepada mereka: "Sudahlah! Seperti telah kukatakan kepadamu tadi: kamu ini pengintai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I know thy works: behold, I have set before thee an open door, and no man can shut it: for thou hast a little strength, and hast kept my word, and hast not denied my name.
target: Aku tahu segala pekerjaanmu: lihatlah, Aku telah membuka pintu bagimu, yang tidak dapat ditutup oleh seorang pun. Aku tahu bahwa kekuatanmu tidak seberapa, namun engkau menuruti firman-Ku dan engkau tidak menyangkal nama-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the vineyard of the LORD of hosts is the house of Israel, and the men of Judah his pleasant plant: and he looked for judgment, but behold oppression; for righteousness, but behold a cry.
target: Sebab kebun anggur TUHAN semesta alam ialah kaum Israel, dan orang Yehuda ialah tanam-tanaman kegemaran-Nya; dinanti-Nya keadilan, tetapi hanya ada kelaliman, dinanti-Nya kebenaran tetapi hanya ada keonaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said I, Whither goest thou? And he said unto me, To measure Jerusalem, to see what is the breadth thereof, and what is the length thereof.
target: Lalu aku bertanya: "Ke manakah engkau ini pergi?" Maka ia menjawab aku: "Ke Yerusalem, untuk mengukurnya, untuk melihat berapa lebarnya dan panjangnya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But before faith came, we were kept under the law, shut up unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed.
target: Sebelum iman itu datang kita berada di bawah pengawalan hukum Taurat, dan dikurung sampai iman itu telah dinyatakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These things have I spoken unto you, that my joy might remain in you, and that your joy might be full.
target: Semuanya itu Kukatakan kepadamu, supaya sukacita-Ku ada di dalam kamu dan sukacitamu menjadi penuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither shalt thou desire thy neighbour's wife, neither shalt thou covet thy neighbour's house, his field, or his manservant, or his maidservant, his ox, or his ass, or any thing that is thy neighbour's.
target: Jangan mengingini isteri sesamamu, dan jangan menghasratkan rumahnya, atau ladangnya, atau hambanya laki-laki, atau hambanya perempuan, atau lembunya, atau keledainya, atau apa pun yang dipunyai sesamamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then shall his brother's wife come unto him in the presence of the elders, and loose his shoe from off his foot, and spit in his face, and shall answer and say, So shall it be done unto that man that will not build up his brother's house.
target: maka haruslah isteri saudaranya itu datang kepadanya di hadapan para tua-tua, menanggalkan kasut orang itu dari kakinya, meludahi mukanya sambil menyatakan: Beginilah harus dilakukan kepada orang yang tidak mau membangun keturunan saudaranya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he made the holy anointing oil, and the pure incense of sweet spices, according to the work of the apothecary.
target: Dan dibuatnyalah minyak urapan yang kudus itu dan ukupan murni dari wangi-wangian, seperti buatan seorang tukang campur rempah-rempah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt arise, and have mercy upon Zion: for the time to favour her, yea, the set time, is come.
target: Tetapi Engkau, ya TUHAN, bersemayam untuk selama-lamanya, dan nama-Mu tetap turun-temurun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Helkath with her suburbs, and Rehob with her suburbs; four cities.
target: Helkat dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya dan Rehob dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya: empat kota.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither shall ye profane my holy name; but I will be hallowed among the children of Israel: I am the LORD which hallow you,
target: Janganlah melanggar kekudusan nama-Ku yang kudus, supaya Aku dikuduskan di tengah-tengah orang Israel, sebab Akulah TUHAN, yang menguduskan kamu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have fought a good fight, I have finished my course, I have kept the faith:
target: Aku telah mengakhiri pertandingan yang baik, aku telah mencapai garis akhir dan aku telah memelihara iman.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Put me in remembrance: let us plead together: declare thou, that thou mayest be justified.
target: Ingatkanlah Aku, marilah kita beperkara, kemukakanlah segala sesuatu, supaya engkau nyata benar!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in the uppermost basket there was of all manner of bakemeats for Pharaoh; and the birds did eat them out of the basket upon my head.
target: Dalam bakul atas ada berbagai-bagai makanan untuk Firaun, buatan juru roti, tetapi burung-burung memakannya dari dalam bakul yang di atas kepalaku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Eli heard the noise of the crying, he said, What meaneth the noise of this tumult? And the man came in hastily, and told Eli.
target: Ketika Eli mendengar bunyi teriakan itu, bertanyalah ia: "Keributan apakah itu?" Lalu bersegeralah orang itu mendapatkan Eli dan memberitahukannya kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the people of the land slew all them that had conspired against king Amon; and the people of the land made Josiah his son king in his stead.
target: Tetapi rakyat negeri itu membunuh semua orang yang mengadakan persepakatan melawan raja Amon; dan rakyat negeri itu mengangkat Yosia, anaknya, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there abode three months. And when the Jews laid wait for him, as he was about to sail into Syria, he purposed to return through Macedonia.
target: Sesudah tiga bulan lamanya tinggal di situ ia hendak berlayar ke Siria. Tetapi pada waktu itu orang-orang Yahudi bermaksud membunuh dia. Karena itu ia memutuskan untuk kembali melalui Makedonia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because they have forsaken me, and have burned incense unto other gods, that they might provoke me to anger with all the works of their hands; therefore my wrath shall be poured out upon this place, and shall not be quenched.
target: karena mereka meninggalkan Aku dan membakar korban kepada allah lain dengan maksud menimbulkan sakit hati-Ku dengan segala pekerjaan tangan mereka; sebab itu nyala murka-Ku akan dicurahkan ke tempat ini dengan tidak padam-padam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there was trembling in the host, in the field, and among all the people: the garrison, and the spoilers, they also trembled, and the earth quaked: so it was a very great trembling.
target: Lalu timbullah kegentaran di perkemahan, di padang dan di antara seluruh rakyat. Juga pasukan pengawal dan penjarah-penjarah itu gentar, dan bumi gemetar, sehingga menjadi kegentaran yang dari Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Abijam slept with his fathers; and they buried him in the city of David: and Asa his son reigned in his stead.
target: Kemudian Abiam mendapat perhentian bersama-sama dengan nenek moyangnya, dan ia dikuburkan di kota Daud. Maka Asa, anaknya, menjadi raja menggantikan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: What shall we say then that Abraham our father, as pertaining to the flesh, hath found?
target: Jadi apakah akan kita katakan tentang Abraham, bapa leluhur jasmani kita?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who giveth rain upon the earth, and sendeth waters upon the fields:
target: Ia memberi hujan ke atas muka bumi dan menjatuhkan air ke atas ladang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And for a rising, and for a scab, and for a bright spot:
target: tentang bengkak, bintil-bintil dan panau,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If the spirit of the ruler rise up against thee, leave not thy place; for yielding pacifieth great offences.
target: Jika amarah penguasa menimpa engkau, janganlah meninggalkan tempatmu, karena kesabaran mencegah kesalahan-kesalahan besar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And that was counted unto him for righteousness unto all generations for evermore.
target: Hal itu diperhitungkan kepadanya sebagai jasa turun-temurun, untuk selama-lamanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Benhadad the king of Syria gathered all his host together: and there were thirty and two kings with him, and horses, and chariots; and he went up and besieged Samaria, and warred against it.
target: Benhadad, raja Aram, mengumpulkan seluruh tentaranya, tiga puluh dua orang raja bersama-sama dia beserta kuda dan kereta. Lalu ia maju, ia mengepung Samaria dan memeranginya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The sun also ariseth, and the sun goeth down, and hasteth to his place where he arose.
target: Matahari terbit, matahari terbenam, lalu terburu-buru menuju tempat ia terbit kembali.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Notwithstanding in thy days I will not do it for David thy father's sake: but I will rend it out of the hand of thy son.
