target: Hanya, pada waktu hidupmu ini Aku belum mau melakukannya oleh karena Daud, ayahmu; dari tangan anakmulah Aku akan mengoyakkannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did, they had not had sin: but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father.
target: Sekiranya Aku tidak melakukan pekerjaan di tengah-tengah mereka seperti yang tidak pernah dilakukan orang lain, mereka tentu tidak berdosa. Tetapi sekarang walaupun mereka telah melihat semuanya itu, namun mereka membenci baik Aku maupun Bapa-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the boys grew: and Esau was a cunning hunter, a man of the field; and Jacob was a plain man, dwelling in tents.
target: Lalu bertambah besarlah kedua anak itu: Esau menjadi seorang yang pandai berburu, seorang yang suka tinggal di padang, tetapi Yakub adalah seorang yang tenang, yang suka tinggal di kemah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not defraud thy neighbour, neither rob him: the wages of him that is hired shall not abide with thee all night until the morning.
target: Janganlah engkau memeras sesamamu manusia dan janganlah engkau merampas; janganlah kautahan upah seorang pekerja harian sampai besok harinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because, even because they have seduced my people, saying, Peace; and there was no peace; and one built up a wall, and, lo, others daubed it with untempered morter:
target: Oleh karena, ya sungguh karena mereka menyesatkan umat-Ku dengan mengatakan: Damai sejahtera!, padahal sama sekali tidak ada damai sejahtera — mereka itu mendirikan tembok dan lihat, mereka mengapurnya —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Abraham planted a grove in Beersheba, and called there on the name of the LORD, the everlasting God.
target: Lalu Abraham menanam sebatang pohon tamariska di Bersyeba, dan memanggil di sana nama TUHAN, Allah yang kekal.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I would order my cause before him, and fill my mouth with arguments.
target: Maka akan kupaparkan perkaraku di hadapan-Nya, dan kupenuhi mulutku dengan kata-kata pembelaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when they had appointed him a day, there came many to him into his lodging; to whom he expounded and testified the kingdom of God, persuading them concerning Jesus, both out of the law of Moses, and out of the prophets, from morning till evening.
target: Lalu mereka menentukan suatu hari untuk Paulus. Pada hari yang ditentukan itu datanglah mereka dalam jumlah besar ke tempat tumpangannya. Ia menerangkan dan memberi kesaksian kepada mereka tentang Kerajaan Allah; dan berdasarkan hukum Musa dan kitab para nabi ia berusaha meyakinkan mereka tentang Yesus. Hal itu berlangsung dari pagi sampai sore.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall make amends for the harm that he hath done in the holy thing, and shall add the fifth part thereto, and give it unto the priest: and the priest shall make an atonement for him with the ram of the trespass offering, and it shall be forgiven him.
target: Hal kudus yang menyebabkan orang itu berdosa, haruslah dibayar gantinya dengan menambah seperlima, lalu menyerahkannya kepada imam. Imam harus mengadakan pendamaian bagi orang itu dengan domba jantan korban penebus salah itu, sehingga ia menerima pengampunan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In that day shall there be an altar to the LORD in the midst of the land of Egypt, and a pillar at the border thereof to the LORD.
target: Pada waktu itu akan ada mezbah bagi TUHAN di tengah-tengah tanah Mesir dan tugu peringatan bagi TUHAN pada perbatasannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the man said, The woman whom thou gavest to be with me, she gave me of the tree, and I did eat.
target: Manusia itu menjawab: "Perempuan yang Kautempatkan di sisiku, dialah yang memberi dari buah pohon itu kepadaku, maka kumakan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the king said to Joab the captain of the host, which was with him, Go now through all the tribes of Israel, from Dan even to Beersheba, and number ye the people, that I may know the number of the people.
target: Lalu berkatalah raja kepada Yoab dan para panglima tentara yang bersama-sama dengan dia: "Jelajahilah segenap suku Israel dari Dan sampai Bersyeba; adakanlah pendaftaran di antara rakyat, supaya aku tahu jumlah mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the seven had her, and left no seed: last of all the woman died also.
target: Dan begitulah seterusnya, ketujuhnya tidak meninggalkan keturunan. Dan akhirnya, sesudah mereka semua, perempuan itu pun mati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For in thee, O LORD, do I hope: thou wilt hear, O Lord my God.
target: ya, aku ini seperti orang yang tidak mendengar, yang tak ada bantahan dalam mulutnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: What could have been done more to my vineyard, that I have not done in it? wherefore, when I looked that it should bring forth grapes, brought it forth wild grapes?
target: Apatah lagi yang harus diperbuat untuk kebun anggur-Ku itu, yang belum Kuperbuat kepadanya? Aku menanti supaya dihasilkannya buah anggur yang baik, mengapa yang dihasilkannya hanya buah anggur yang asam?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The pastures are clothed with flocks; the valleys also are covered over with corn; they shout for joy, they also sing.
target: tanah-tanah padang gurun menitik, bukit-bukit berikatpinggangkan sorak-sorai;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They that make them are like unto them; so is every one that trusteth in them.
target: Seperti itulah jadinya orang-orang yang membuatnya, dan semua orang yang percaya kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall lay his hand upon the head of the sin offering, and slay it for a sin offering in the place where they kill the burnt offering.
target: Lalu haruslah ia meletakkan tangannya ke atas kepala korban penghapus dosa itu, dan menyembelihnya menjadi korban penghapus dosa di tempat yang biasa orang menyembelih korban bakaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have gone astray like a lost sheep; seek thy servant; for I do not forget thy commandments.
target: Aku sesat seperti domba yang hilang, carilah hamba-Mu ini, sebab perintah-perintah-Mu tidak kulupakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Tell me, O thou whom my soul loveth, where thou feedest, where thou makest thy flock to rest at noon: for why should I be as one that turneth aside by the flocks of thy companions?
target: Ceriterakanlah kepadaku, jantung hatiku, di mana kakanda menggembalakan domba, di mana kakanda membiarkan domba-domba berbaring pada petang hari. Karena mengapa aku akan jadi serupa pengembara dekat kawanan-kawanan domba teman-temanmu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Likewise when the LORD sent you from Kadeshbarnea, saying, Go up and possess the land which I have given you; then ye rebelled against the commandment of the LORD your God, and ye believed him not, nor hearkened to his voice.
target: Dan ketika TUHAN menyuruh kamu pergi dari Kadesh-Barnea dengan berfirman: Majulah dan dudukilah negeri yang Kuberikan kepadamu itu, maka kamu menentang titah TUHAN, Allahmu; kamu tidak percaya kepada-Nya dan tidak mendengarkan suara-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in it have I put the ark, wherein is the covenant of the LORD, that he made with the children of Israel.
target: dan telah menempatkan di sana tabut, yang memuat perjanjian yang telah diikat TUHAN dengan orang Israel."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the two kidneys, and the fat that is upon them, which is by the flanks, and the caul above the liver, with the kidneys, it shall he take away.
target: dan lagi kedua buah pinggang dan lemak yang melekat padanya, yang ada pada pinggang dan umbai hati yang harus dipisahkannya beserta buah pinggang itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I also have given you cleanness of teeth in all your cities, and want of bread in all your places: yet have ye not returned unto me, saith the LORD.
target: "Sekalipun Aku ini telah memberi kepadamu gigi yang tidak disentuh makanan di segala kotamu dan kekurangan roti di segala tempat kediamanmu, namun kamu tidak berbalik kepada-Ku," demikianlah firman TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Saul said to him, Whose son art thou, thou young man? And David answered, I am the son of thy servant Jesse the Bethlehemite.
target: Kata Saul kepadanya: "Anak siapakah engkau, ya orang muda?" Jawab Daud: "Anak hamba tuanku, Isai, orang Betlehem itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Even so we, when we were children, were in bondage under the elements of the world:
target: Demikian pula kita: selama kita belum akil balig, kita takluk juga kepada roh-roh dunia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I have used none of these things: neither have I written these things, that it should be so done unto me: for it were better for me to die, than that any man should make my glorying void.
target: Tetapi aku tidak pernah mempergunakan satu pun dari hak-hak itu. Aku tidak menulis semuanya ini, supaya aku pun diperlakukan juga demikian. Sebab aku lebih suka mati dari pada ...! Sungguh, kemegahanku tidak dapat ditiadakan siapa pun juga!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now it came to pass, when the kingdom was established to him, that he slew his servants that had killed the king his father.
target: Segera sesudah kuasa kerajaan itu kokoh di tangannya, dibunuhnyalah pegawai-pegawainya yang telah membunuh raja, yaitu ayahnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Speak not thou in thine heart, after that the LORD thy God hath cast them out from before thee, saying, For my righteousness the LORD hath brought me in to possess this land: but for the wickedness of these nations the LORD doth drive them out from before thee.
target: Janganlah engkau berkata dalam hatimu, apabila TUHAN, Allahmu, telah mengusir mereka dari hadapanmu: Karena jasa-jasakulah TUHAN membawa aku masuk menduduki negeri ini; padahal karena kefasikan bangsa-bangsa itulah TUHAN menghalau mereka dari hadapanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said I, Lo, I come: in the volume of the book it is written of me,
target: Engkau tidak berkenan kepada korban sembelihan dan korban sajian, tetapi Engkau telah membuka telingaku; korban bakaran dan korban penghapus dosa tidak Engkau tuntut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And another came, saying, Lord, behold, here is thy pound, which I have kept laid up in a napkin:
target: Dan hamba yang ketiga datang dan berkata: Tuan, inilah mina tuan, aku telah menyimpannya dalam sapu tangan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As arrows are in the hand of a mighty man; so are children of the youth.
target: Seperti anak-anak panah di tangan pahlawan, demikianlah anak-anak pada masa muda.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the children of Israel and the children of Judah have only done evil before me from their youth: for the children of Israel have only provoked me to anger with the work of their hands, saith the LORD.
target: Sebab orang Israel dan orang Yehuda hanyalah melakukan yang jahat di mata-Ku sejak masa mudanya; sungguh, orang Israel hanya menimbulkan sakit hati-Ku dengan perbuatan tangan mereka, demikianlah firman TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as the people were in expectation, and all men mused in their hearts of John, whether he were the Christ, or not;
target: Tetapi karena orang banyak sedang menanti dan berharap, dan semuanya bertanya dalam hatinya tentang Yohanes, kalau-kalau ia adalah Mesias,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Solomon reigned over all kingdoms from the river unto the land of the Philistines, and unto the border of Egypt: they brought presents, and served Solomon all the days of his life.
target: Maka Salomo berkuasa atas segala kerajaan mulai dari sungai Efrat sampai negeri orang Filistin dan sampai ke tapal batas Mesir. Mereka menyampaikan upeti dan tetap takluk kepada Salomo seumur hidupnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world. If any man love the world, the love of the Father is not in him.
target: Janganlah kamu mengasihi dunia dan apa yang ada di dalamnya. Jikalau orang mengasihi dunia, maka kasih akan Bapa tidak ada di dalam orang itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For if thou refuse to let them go, and wilt hold them still,
target: Sebab jika engkau menolak membiarkan mereka pergi dan masih menahan mereka,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now when he came nigh to the gate of the city, behold, there was a dead man carried out, the only son of his mother, and she was a widow: and much people of the city was with her.
target: Setelah Ia dekat pintu gerbang kota, ada orang mati diusung ke luar, anak laki-laki, anak tunggal ibunya yang sudah janda, dan banyak orang dari kota itu menyertai janda itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king of Israel said unto Jehoshaphat, I will disguise myself, and enter into the battle; but put thou on thy robes. And the king of Israel disguised himself, and went into the battle.
target: Raja Israel berkata kepada Yosafat: "Aku akan menyamar dan masuk pertempuran, tetapi engkau, pakailah pakaian kebesaranmu." Lalu menyamarlah raja Israel, kemudian masuk ke pertempuran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king said unto him, Go in peace. So he arose, and went to Hebron.
target: Lalu berkatalah raja kepadanya: "Pergilah dengan selamat." Maka berkemaslah Absalom dan pergi ke Hebron.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But lift thou up thy rod, and stretch out thine hand over the sea, and divide it: and the children of Israel shall go on dry ground through the midst of the sea.
target: Dan engkau, angkatlah tongkatmu dan ulurkanlah tanganmu ke atas laut dan belahlah airnya, sehingga orang Israel akan berjalan dari tengah-tengah laut di tempat kering.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not delay to offer the first of thy ripe fruits, and of thy liquors: the firstborn of thy sons shalt thou give unto me.
target: Janganlah lalai mempersembahkan hasil gandummu dan hasil anggurmu. Yang sulung dari anak-anakmu lelaki haruslah kaupersembahkan kepada-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then there arose a question between some of John's disciples and the Jews about purifying.
target: Maka timbullah perselisihan di antara murid-murid Yohanes dengan seorang Yahudi tentang penyucian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if the prophet be deceived when he hath spoken a thing, I the LORD have deceived that prophet, and I will stretch out my hand upon him, and will destroy him from the midst of my people Israel.
target: Jikalau nabi itu membiarkan dirinya tergoda dengan mengatakan suatu ucapan — Aku, TUHAN yang menggoda nabi itu — maka Aku akan mengacungkan tangan-Ku melawan dia dan memunahkannya dari tengah-tengah umat-Ku Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he garnished the house with precious stones for beauty: and the gold was gold of Parvaim.
target: Ruang itu dilapisinya juga dengan batu permata yang mahal-mahal sebagai perhiasan, sedang emasnya emas Parwaim.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD called thy name, A green olive tree, fair, and of goodly fruit: with the noise of a great tumult he hath kindled fire upon it, and the branches of it are broken.
target: Pohon zaitun yang rimbun, elok dipandang mata, pernah TUHAN menamai engkau. Tetapi dengan bunyi keributan yang hebat Ia menyalakan api pada daun-daunnya, sehingga ranting-rantingnya terbakar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That it might take hold of the ends of the earth, that the wicked might be shaken out of it?
target: untuk memegang ujung-ujung bumi, sehingga orang-orang fasik dikebaskan dari padanya?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Concerning Edom, thus saith the LORD of hosts; Is wisdom no more in Teman? is counsel perished from the prudent? is their wisdom vanished?
target: Mengenai Edom. Beginilah firman TUHAN semesta alam: "Tidak adakah lagi kebijaksanaan di T'eman? Sudah hilangkah pertimbangan dari orang-orang yang berakal budi, sudah busukkah kebijaksanaan mereka?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jesus answered them, I told you, and ye believed not: the works that I do in my Father's name, they bear witness of me.
target: Yesus menjawab mereka: "Aku telah mengatakannya kepada kamu, tetapi kamu tidak percaya; pekerjaan-pekerjaan yang Kulakukan dalam nama Bapa-Ku, itulah yang memberikan kesaksian tentang Aku,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass on the third day, when they were sore, that two of the sons of Jacob, Simeon and Levi, Dinah's brethren, took each man his sword, and came upon the city boldly, and slew all the males.
target: Pada hari ketiga, ketika mereka sedang menderita kesakitan, datanglah dua orang anak Yakub, yaitu Simeon dan Lewi, kakak-kakak Dina, setelah masing-masing mengambil pedangnya, menyerang kota itu dengan tidak takut-takut serta membunuh setiap laki-laki.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Circumcise yourselves to the LORD, and take away the foreskins of your heart, ye men of Judah and inhabitants of Jerusalem: lest my fury come forth like fire, and burn that none can quench it, because of the evil of your doings.
target: Sunatlah dirimu bagi TUHAN, dan jauhkanlah kulit khatan hatimu, hai orang Yehuda dan penduduk Yerusalem, supaya jangan murka-Ku mengamuk seperti api, dan menyala-nyala dengan tidak ada yang memadamkan, oleh karena perbuatan-perbuatanmu yang jahat!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD, Behold, I will raise up evil against thee out of thine own house, and I will take thy wives before thine eyes, and give them unto thy neighbour, and he shall lie with thy wives in the sight of this sun.
target: Beginilah firman TUHAN: Bahwasanya malapetaka akan Kutimpakan ke atasmu yang datang dari kaum keluargamu sendiri. Aku akan mengambil isteri-isterimu di depan matamu dan memberikannya kepada orang lain; orang itu akan tidur dengan isteri-isterimu di siang hari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said Jesus unto him, Except ye see signs and wonders, ye will not believe.
target: Maka kata Yesus kepadanya: "Jika kamu tidak melihat tanda dan mujizat, kamu tidak percaya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Nevertheless I tell you the truth; It is expedient for you that I go away: for if I go not away, the Comforter will not come unto you; but if I depart, I will send him unto you.
target: Namun benar yang Kukatakan ini kepadamu: Adalah lebih berguna bagi kamu, jika Aku pergi. Sebab jikalau Aku tidak pergi, Penghibur itu tidak akan datang kepadamu, tetapi jikalau Aku pergi, Aku akan mengutus Dia kepadamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Suppose ye that I am come to give peace on earth? I tell you, Nay; but rather division:
target: Kamu menyangka, bahwa Aku datang untuk membawa damai di atas bumi? Bukan, kata-Ku kepadamu, bukan damai, melainkan pertentangan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That the cruelty done to the threescore and ten sons of Jerubbaal might come, and their blood be laid upon Abimelech their brother, which slew them; and upon the men of Shechem, which aided him in the killing of his brethren.
target: supaya kekerasan terhadap ketujuh puluh anak Yerubaal dibalaskan dan darah mereka ditimpakan kepada Abimelekh, saudara mereka yang telah membunuh mereka dan kepada warga kota Sikhem yang membantu dia membunuh saudara-saudaranya itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The fourth captain for the fourth month was Asahel the brother of Joab, and Zebadiah his son after him: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
target: Yang keempat untuk bulan yang keempat ialah Asael, saudara Yoab, kemudian ia digantikan oleh Zebaja, anaknya, dan dalam rombongannya ada dua puluh empat ribu orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As I live, saith the Lord GOD, ye shall not have occasion any more to use this proverb in Israel.
target: Demi Aku yang hidup, demikianlah firman Tuhan ALLAH, kamu tidak akan mengucapkan kata sindiran ini lagi di Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he brought me to the door of the court; and when I looked, behold a hole in the wall.
target: Dan dibawa-Nya aku ke pintu pelataran, aku melihat, sungguh, ada sebuah lobang di dalam temboknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he sent, and brought him in. Now he was ruddy, and withal of a beautiful countenance, and goodly to look to. And the LORD said, Arise, anoint him: for this is he.
target: Kemudian disuruhnyalah menjemput dia. Ia kemerah-merahan, matanya indah dan parasnya elok. Lalu TUHAN berfirman: "Bangkitlah, urapilah dia, sebab inilah dia."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And one of his servants answered and said, Let some take, I pray thee, five of the horses that remain, which are left in the city, (behold, they are as all the multitude of Israel that are left in it: behold, I say, they are even as all the multitude of the Israelites that are consumed:) and let us send and see.
target: Lalu salah seorang pegawainya menjawab: "Baiklah kita ambil lima ekor dari kuda yang masih tinggal di dalam kota ini; tentulah keadaannya seperti seluruh khalayak ramai Israel yang sudah habis mati itu! Biarlah kita suruh saja orang pergi, supaya kita lihat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The fifth, Shephatiah of Abital: the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.
target: anak yang kelima ialah Sefaca, dari Abital; anak yang keenam ialah Yitream, dari Egla, isterinya itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Samuel said, When thou wast little in thine own sight, wast thou not made the head of the tribes of Israel, and the LORD anointed thee king over Israel?
target: Sesudah itu berkatalah Samuel: "Bukankah engkau, walaupun engkau kecil pada pemandanganmu sendiri, telah menjadi kepala atas suku-suku Israel? Dan bukankah TUHAN telah mengurapi engkau menjadi raja atas Israel?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let him drink, and forget his poverty, and remember his misery no more.
target: Biarlah ia minum dan melupakan kemiskinannya, dan tidak lagi mengingat kesusahannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And these were of the father of Etam; Jezreel, and Ishma, and Idbash: and the name of their sister was Hazelelponi:
target: Inilah anak-anak Etam: Yizreel, Isma dan Idbas; nama saudara perempuan mereka ialah Hazelelponi;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Every one of them is gone back: they are altogether become filthy; there is none that doeth good, no, not one.
target: Allah memandang ke bawah dari sorga kepada anak-anak manusia, untuk melihat apakah ada yang berakal budi dan yang mencari Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then she that is mine enemy shall see it, and shame shall cover her which said unto me, Where is the LORD thy God? mine eyes shall behold her: now shall she be trodden down as the mire of the streets.
target: Musuhku akan melihatnya dan dengan malu ia akan menutupi mukanya, dia yang berkata kepadaku: "Di mana TUHAN, Allahmu?" Mataku akan memandangi dia; sekarang ia diinjak-injak seperti lumpur di jalan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But with many of them God was not well pleased: for they were overthrown in the wilderness.
target: Tetapi sungguhpun demikian Allah tidak berkenan kepada bagian yang terbesar dari mereka, karena mereka ditewaskan di padang gurun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jehiel, and Azaziah, and Nahath, and Asahel, and Jerimoth, and Jozabad, and Eliel, and Ismachiah, and Mahath, and Benaiah, were overseers under the hand of Cononiah and Shimei his brother, at the commandment of Hezekiah the king, and Azariah the ruler of the house of God.
target: sedang Yehiel, Azazya, Nahat, Asael, Yerimot, Yozabad, Eliel, Yismakhya, Mahat dan Benanya adalah penilik di bawah Konanya dan Simei, saudaranya itu, sesuai dengan petunjuk raja Hizkia dan Azarya, kepala rumah Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they cried unto the LORD, and said, We have sinned, because we have forsaken the LORD, and have served Baalim and Ashtaroth: but now deliver us out of the hand of our enemies, and we will serve thee.
target: Mereka berseru-seru kepada TUHAN, katanya: Kami telah berdosa, sebab kami telah meninggalkan TUHAN dan beribadah kepada para Baal dan para Asytoret; maka sekarang lepaskanlah kami dari tangan musuh kami, maka kami akan beribadah kepada-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: That we henceforth be no more children, tossed to and fro, and carried about with every wind of doctrine, by the sleight of men, and cunning craftiness, whereby they lie in wait to deceive;
target: sehingga kita bukan lagi anak-anak, yang diombang-ambingkan oleh rupa-rupa angin pengajaran, oleh permainan palsu manusia dalam kelicikan mereka yang menyesatkan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And about the time of forty years suffered he their manners in the wilderness.
target: Empat puluh tahun lamanya Ia sabar terhadap tingkah laku mereka di padang gurun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joshua set up twelve stones in the midst of Jordan, in the place where the feet of the priests which bare the ark of the covenant stood: and they are there unto this day.
target: Pula Yosua menegakkan dua belas batu di tengah-tengah sungai Yordan itu, di tempat bekas berjejak kaki para imam pengangkat tabut perjanjian itu. Batu-batu itu masih ada di sana sampai sekarang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And came out of the graves after his resurrection, and went into the holy city, and appeared unto many.
target: Dan sesudah kebangkitan Yesus, mereka pun keluar dari kubur, lalu masuk ke kota kudus dan menampakkan diri kepada banyak orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I knew that thou hearest me always: but because of the people which stand by I said it, that they may believe that thou hast sent me.
target: Aku tahu, bahwa Engkau selalu mendengarkan Aku, tetapi oleh karena orang banyak yang berdiri di sini mengelilingi Aku, Aku mengatakannya, supaya mereka percaya, bahwa Engkaulah yang telah mengutus Aku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now when Ezra had prayed, and when he had confessed, weeping and casting himself down before the house of God, there assembled unto him out of Israel a very great congregation of men and women and children: for the people wept very sore.
target: Sementara Ezra berdoa dan mengaku dosa, sambil menangis dengan bersujud di depan rumah Allah, berhimpunlah kepadanya jemaah orang Israel yang sangat besar jumlahnya, laki-laki, perempuan dan anak-anak. Orang-orang itu menangis keras-keras.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But it shall be on the seventh day, that he shall shave all his hair off his head and his beard and his eyebrows, even all his hair he shall shave off: and he shall wash his clothes, also he shall wash his flesh in water, and he shall be clean.
target: Maka pada hari yang ketujuh ia harus mencukur seluruh rambutnya: rambut kepala, janggut, alis, bahkan segala bulunya harus dicukur, pakaiannya dicuci, dan tubuhnya dibasuh dengan air; maka ia menjadi tahir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So the people shouted when the priests blew with the trumpets: and it came to pass, when the people heard the sound of the trumpet, and the people shouted with a great shout, that the wall fell down flat, so that the people went up into the city, every man straight before him, and they took the city.
target: Lalu bersoraklah bangsa itu, sedang sangkakala ditiup; segera sesudah bangsa itu mendengar bunyi sangkakala, bersoraklah mereka dengan sorak yang nyaring. Maka runtuhlah tembok itu, lalu mereka memanjat masuk ke dalam kota, masing-masing langsung ke depan, dan merebut kota itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Will a man rob God? Yet ye have robbed me. But ye say, Wherein have we robbed thee? In tithes and offerings.
target: Bolehkah manusia menipu Allah? Namun kamu menipu Aku. Tetapi kamu berkata: "Dengan cara bagaimanakah kami menipu Engkau?" Mengenai persembahan persepuluhan dan persembahan khusus!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: An Ammonite or Moabite shall not enter into the congregation of the LORD; even to their tenth generation shall they not enter into the congregation of the LORD for ever:
target: Seorang Amon atau seorang Moab janganlah masuk jemaah TUHAN, bahkan keturunannya yang kesepuluh pun tidak boleh masuk jemaah TUHAN sampai selama-lamanya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The beginning of strife is as when one letteth out water: therefore leave off contention, before it be meddled with.
target: Memulai pertengkaran adalah seperti membuka jalan air; jadi undurlah sebelum perbantahan mulai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he will take your daughters to be confectionaries, and to be cooks, and to be bakers.
target: Anak-anakmu perempuan akan diambilnya sebagai juru campur rempah-rempah, juru masak dan juru makanan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD of hosts; Again in this place, which is desolate without man and without beast, and in all the cities thereof, shall be an habitation of shepherds causing their flocks to lie down.
target: Beginilah firman TUHAN semesta alam: Di daerah ini, yang sudah menjadi reruntuhan, tanpa manusia dan tanpa hewan, dan di segala kotanya akan ada lagi padang rumput bagi gembala-gembala yang membaringkan kambing domba di situ.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the people with one accord gave heed unto those things which Philip spake, hearing and seeing the miracles which he did.
target: Ketika orang banyak itu mendengar pemberitaan Filipus dan melihat tanda-tanda yang diadakannya, mereka semua dengan bulat hati menerima apa yang diberitakannya itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The holy portion of the land shall be for the priests the ministers of the sanctuary, which shall come near to minister unto the LORD: and it shall be a place for their houses, and an holy place for the sanctuary.
target: Ini adalah bagian yang kudus dari tanah itu dan menjadi tempat bagi imam-imam yang menyelenggarakan kebaktian di tempat kudus, yang datang mendekat untuk melayani TUHAN. Itulah tempat perumahan mereka dan menjadi daerah kudus untuk tempat kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of the sons of Uzziel; Micah the first and Jesiah the second.
target: Anak-anak Uziel ialah Mikha, seorang kepala, dan Yisia, anak yang kedua.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD appeared unto him in the plains of Mamre: and he sat in the tent door in the heat of the day;
target: Kemudian TUHAN menampakkan diri kepada Abraham dekat pohon tarbantin di Mamre, sedang ia duduk di pintu kemahnya waktu hari panas terik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When I shall send upon them the evil arrows of famine, which shall be for their destruction, and which I will send to destroy you: and I will increase the famine upon you, and will break your staff of bread:
target: tatkala Aku mendatangkan atasmu kelaparan yang dahsyat, yang membinasakan, dan Aku mendatangkannya untuk membinasakan kamu, tatkala Aku memperdahsyat bencana kelaparan atasmu dan memusnahkan persediaan makananmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia.
target: sehingga kamu telah menjadi teladan untuk semua orang yang percaya di wilayah Makedonia dan Akhaya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O God, thou art terrible out of thy holy places: the God of Israel is he that giveth strength and power unto his people. Blessed be God.
target: Akuilah kekuasaan Allah; kemegahan-Nya ada di atas Israel, kekuasaan-Nya di dalam awan-awan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of Zebulun, Ishmaiah the son of Obadiah: of Naphtali, Jerimoth the son of Azriel:
target: untuk suku Zebulon ialah Yismaya bin Obaja; untuk suku Naftali ialah Yerimot bin Azriel;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Zelek the Ammonite, Nahari the Beerothite, armourbearer to Joab the son of Zeruiah,
target: Zelek, orang Amon; Naharai, orang Beerot, pembawa senjata Yoab anak Zeruya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hungry and thirsty, their soul fainted in them.
target: mereka lapar dan haus, jiwa mereka lemah lesu di dalam diri mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Surely thou wilt slay the wicked, O God: depart from me therefore, ye bloody men.
target: Sekiranya Engkau mematikan orang fasik, ya Allah, sehingga menjauh dari padaku penumpah-penumpah darah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Saying to the sixth angel which had the trumpet, Loose the four angels which are bound in the great river Euphrates.
target: dan berkata kepada malaikat yang keenam yang memegang sangkakala itu: "Lepaskanlah keempat malaikat yang terikat dekat sungai besar Efrat itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: From the first day of the seventh month began they to offer burnt offerings unto the LORD. But the foundation of the temple of the LORD was not yet laid.
target: Sejak hari pertama bulan yang ketujuh mereka mulai mempersembahkan korban bakaran kepada TUHAN, namun dasar Bait Suci TUHAN belum juga diletakkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And let these also first be proved; then let them use the office of a deacon, being found blameless.
target: Mereka juga harus diuji dahulu, baru ditetapkan dalam pelayanan itu setelah ternyata mereka tak bercacat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, I waited for your words; I gave ear to your reasons, whilst ye searched out what to say.
target: Ketahuilah, aku telah menantikan kata-katamu, aku telah memperhatikan pemikiranmu, hingga kamu menemukan kata-kata yang tepat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And, hardly passing it, came unto a place which is called The fair havens; nigh whereunto was the city of Lasea.
target: Sesudah kami dengan susah payah melewati tanjung itu, sampailah kami di sebuah tempat bernama Pelabuhan Indah, dekat kota Lasea.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Leah also with her children came near, and bowed themselves: and after came Joseph near and Rachel, and they bowed themselves.
target: Mendekat jugalah Lea beserta anak-anaknya, dan mereka pun sujud. Kemudian mendekatlah Yusuf beserta Rahel, dan mereka juga sujud.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So all the people that Ishmael had carried away captive from Mizpah cast about and returned, and went unto Johanan the son of Kareah.
target: Semua orang yang diangkut sebagai tawanan oleh Ismael dari Mizpa itu berbalik dan pergi mengikuti Yohanan bin Kareah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Likewise, ye wives, be in subjection to your own husbands; that, if any obey not the word, they also may without the word be won by the conversation of the wives;
target: Demikian juga kamu, hai isteri-isteri, tunduklah kepada suamimu, supaya jika ada di antara mereka yang tidak taat kepada Firman, mereka juga tanpa perkataan dimenangkan oleh kelakuan isterinya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Make me to hear joy and gladness; that the bones which thou hast broken may rejoice.
target: Sesungguhnya, Engkau berkenan akan kebenaran dalam batin, dan dengan diam-diam Engkau memberitahukan hikmat kepadaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For this cause have I sent unto you Timotheus, who is my beloved son, and faithful in the Lord, who shall bring you into remembrance of my ways which be in Christ, as I teach every where in every church.
target: Justru itulah sebabnya aku mengirimkan kepadamu Timotius, yang adalah anakku yang kekasih dan yang setia dalam Tuhan. Ia akan memperingatkan kamu akan hidup yang kuturuti dalam Kristus Yesus, seperti yang kuajarkan di mana-mana dalam setiap jemaat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood, to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past, through the forbearance of God;
target: Kristus Yesus telah ditentukan Allah menjadi jalan pendamaian karena iman, dalam darah-Nya. Hal ini dibuat-Nya untuk menunjukkan keadilan-Nya, karena Ia telah membiarkan dosa-dosa yang telah terjadi dahulu pada masa kesabaran-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the glory of the God of Israel was gone up from the cherub, whereupon he was, to the threshold of the house. And he called to the man clothed with linen, which had the writer's inkhorn by his side;
target: Pada saat itu kemuliaan Allah Israel sudah terangkat dari atas kerub, tempatnya semula, ke atas ambang pintu Bait Suci dan Dia memanggil orang yang berpakaian lenan dan yang mempunyai alat penulis di sisinya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they cast dust on their heads, and cried, weeping and wailing, saying, Alas, alas that great city, wherein were made rich all that had ships in the sea by reason of her costliness! for in one hour is she made desolate.
target: Dan mereka menghamburkan debu ke atas kepala mereka dan berseru, sambil menangis dan meratap, katanya: "Celaka, celaka, kota besar, yang olehnya semua orang, yang mempunyai kapal di laut, telah menjadi kaya oleh barangnya yang mahal, sebab dalam satu jam saja ia sudah binasa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore send quickly, and tell David, saying, Lodge not this night in the plains of the wilderness, but speedily pass over; lest the king be swallowed up, and all the people that are with him.
target: Oleh sebab itu, suruhlah dengan segera memberitahukan kepada Daud, demikian: Pada malam ini janganlah bermalam di tempat-tempat penyeberangan ke padang gurun, tetapi menyeberanglah dengan segera, supaya jangan raja dan seluruh rakyat yang bersama-sama dengan dia itu ditelan habis."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And these all, having obtained a good report through faith, received not the promise:
target: Dan mereka semua tidak memperoleh apa yang dijanjikan itu, sekalipun iman mereka telah memberikan kepada mereka suatu kesaksian yang baik.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they tarried till they were ashamed: and, behold, he opened not the doors of the parlour; therefore they took a key, and opened them: and, behold, their lord was fallen down dead on the earth.
target: Lalu mereka menunggu-nunggu sampai menjadi bingung, tetapi raja tidak membuka pintu kamar atas itu. Kemudian mereka mengambil kunci, membuka pintu, maka tampaklah tuan mereka mati tergeletak di lantai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David said on that day, Whosoever getteth up to the gutter, and smiteth the Jebusites, and the lame and the blind that are hated of David's soul, he shall be chief and captain. Wherefore they said, The blind and the lame shall not come into the house.
target: Daud telah berkata pada waktu itu: "Siapa yang hendak memukul kalah orang Yebus, haruslah ia masuk melalui saluran air itu; hati Daud benci kepada orang-orang timpang dan orang-orang buta." Sebab itu orang berkata: "Orang-orang buta dan orang-orang timpang tidak boleh masuk bait."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Achish said, Whither have ye made a road to day? And David said, Against the south of Judah, and against the south of the Jerahmeelites, and against the south of the Kenites.
target: Jika Akhis bertanya: "Di mana kamu menyerbu pada hari ini?" maka jawab Daud: "Di Tanah Negeb Yehuda," atau: "Di Tanah Negeb orang Yerahmeel," atau: "Di Tanah Negeb orang Keni."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now after the time that Amaziah did turn away from following the LORD they made a conspiracy against him in Jerusalem; and he fled to Lachish: but they sent to Lachish after him, and slew him there.
target: Sejak Amazia menjauhi TUHAN, orang mengadakan persepakatan melawan dia di Yerusalem, sebab itu larilah ia ke Lakhis. Tetapi mereka menyuruh mengejar dia ke Lakhis, lalu dibunuhlah ia di sana.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The beasts of the field cry also unto thee: for the rivers of waters are dried up, and the fire hath devoured the pastures of the wilderness.
target: Juga binatang-binatang di padang menjerit karena rindu kepada-Mu, sebab wadi telah kering, dan api pun telah memakan habis tanah gembalaan di padang gurun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Observe thou that which I command thee this day: behold, I drive out before thee the Amorite, and the Canaanite, and the Hittite, and the Perizzite, and the Hivite, and the Jebusite.
target: Tetapi engkau, berpeganglah pada yang Kuperintahkan kepadamu pada hari ini. Lihat, Aku akan menghalau dari depanmu orang Amori, orang Kanaan, orang Het, orang Feris, orang Hewi dan orang Yebus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: An evil man seeketh only rebellion: therefore a cruel messenger shall be sent against him.
target: Orang durhaka hanya mencari kejahatan, tetapi terhadap dia akan disuruh utusan yang kejam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For yourselves, brethren, know our entrance in unto you, that it was not in vain:
target: Kamu sendiri pun memang tahu, saudara-saudara, bahwa kedatangan kami di antaramu tidaklah sia-sia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Shallum the son of Jabesh began to reign in the nine and thirtieth year of Uzziah king of Judah; and he reigned a full month in Samaria.
target: Salum bin Yabesh menjadi raja dalam tahun yang ketiga puluh sembilan zaman Uzia, raja Yehuda. Ia memerintah sebulan lamanya di Samaria.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he was in the hinder part of the ship, asleep on a pillow: and they awake him, and say unto him, Master, carest thou not that we perish?
target: Pada waktu itu Yesus sedang tidur di buritan di sebuah tilam. Maka murid-murid-Nya membangunkan Dia dan berkata kepada-Nya: "Guru, Engkau tidak perduli kalau kita binasa?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The fear of the LORD is a fountain of life, to depart from the snares of death.
target: Takut akan TUHAN adalah sumber kehidupan sehingga orang terhindar dari jerat maut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This city shall not be your caldron, neither shall ye be the flesh in the midst thereof; but I will judge you in the border of Israel:
target: Kota ini tidak akan menjadi periuk bagimu ataupun kamu seakan-akan daging di dalamnya; di tanah Israel Aku akan menghukum kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And a certain man lame from his mother's womb was carried, whom they laid daily at the gate of the temple which is called Beautiful, to ask alms of them that entered into the temple;
target: Di situ ada seorang laki-laki, yang lumpuh sejak lahirnya sehingga ia harus diusung. Tiap-tiap hari orang itu diletakkan dekat pintu gerbang Bait Allah, yang bernama Gerbang Indah, untuk meminta sedekah kepada orang yang masuk ke dalam Bait Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither let Hezekiah make you trust in the LORD, saying, The LORD will surely deliver us, and this city shall not be delivered into the hand of the king of Assyria.
target: Janganlah Hizkia mengajak kamu berharap kepada TUHAN dengan mengatakan: Tentulah TUHAN akan melepaskan kita; dan kota ini tidak akan diserahkan ke dalam tangan raja Asyur.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let thy fountain be blessed: and rejoice with the wife of thy youth.
target: Diberkatilah kiranya sendangmu, bersukacitalah dengan isteri masa mudamu:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Take with you words, and turn to the LORD: say unto him, Take away all iniquity, and receive us graciously: so will we render the calves of our lips.
target: Bertobatlah, hai Israel, kepada TUHAN, Allahmu, sebab engkau telah tergelincir karena kesalahanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For there fell down many slain, because the war was of God. And they dwelt in their steads until the captivity.
target: Banyak orang yang tewas karena mati terbunuh, sebab pertempuran itu adalah dari pada Allah. Lalu mereka menduduki tempat orang-orang itu sampai waktu pembuangan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And out of the tribe of Naphtali, Kedesh in Galilee with her suburbs, to be a city of refuge for the slayer; and Hammothdor with her suburbs, and Kartan with her suburbs; three cities.
target: Dan dari suku Naftali: Kedesh, kota perlindungan untuk pembunuh, di Galilea, dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya, Hamot-Dor dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya dan Kartan dengan tanah-tanah penggembalaannya: tiga kota.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: After it a voice roareth: he thundereth with the voice of his excellency; and he will not stay them when his voice is heard.
target: Kemudian suara-Nya menderu, Ia mengguntur dengan suara-Nya yang megah; Ia tidak menahan kilat petir, bila suara-Nya kedengaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the woman took the two men, and hid them, and said thus, There came men unto me, but I wist not whence they were:
target: Tetapi perempuan itu telah membawa dan menyembunyikan kedua orang itu. Berkatalah ia: "Memang, orang-orang itu telah datang kepadaku, tetapi aku tidak tahu dari mana mereka,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
target: TUHAN berfirman kepada Musa:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O continue thy lovingkindness unto them that know thee; and thy righteousness to the upright in heart.
target: Sebab pada-Mu ada sumber hayat, di dalam terang-Mu kami melihat terang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I said unto the nobles, and to the rulers, and to the rest of the people, The work is great and large, and we are separated upon the wall, one far from another.
target: Berkatalah aku kepada para pemuka dan para penguasa dan kepada orang-orang yang lain: "Pekerjaan ini besar dan luas, dan kita terpencar pada tembok, yang satu jauh dari pada yang lain.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These are the generations of the heavens and of the earth when they were created, in the day that the LORD God made the earth and the heavens,
target: Demikianlah riwayat langit dan bumi pada waktu diciptakan. Ketika TUHAN Allah menjadikan bumi dan langit, —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Our soul waiteth for the LORD: he is our help and our shield.
target: Jiwa kita menanti-nantikan TUHAN. Dialah penolong kita dan perisai kita!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Afterward I came unto the house of Shemaiah the son of Delaiah the son of Mehetabeel, who was shut up; and he said, Let us meet together in the house of God, within the temple, and let us shut the doors of the temple: for they will come to slay thee; yea, in the night will they come to slay thee.
target: Ketika aku pergi ke rumah Semaya bin Delaya bin Mehetabeel, sebab ia berhalangan datang, berkatalah ia: "Biarlah kita bertemu di rumah Allah, di dalam Bait Suci, dan mengunci pintu-pintunya, karena ada orang yang mau datang membunuh engkau, ya, malam ini mereka mau datang membunuh engkau."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it was so, when they came into the midst of the city, that Ishmael the son of Nethaniah slew them, and cast them into the midst of the pit, he, and the men that were with him.
target: Tetapi ketika mereka sampai ke tengah-tengah kota itu, maka mereka disembelih oleh Ismael bin Netanya dengan dibantu oleh orang-orang yang bersama-sama dengan dia; mayat-mayat mereka dicampakkan ke dalam perigi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: We are thine: thou never barest rule over them; they were not called by thy name.
target: Keadaan kami seolah-olah kami dari dahulu kala tidak pernah berada di bawah pemerintahan-Mu, seolah-olah nama-Mu tidak pernah disebut atas kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Festus, willing to do the Jews a pleasure, answered Paul, and said, Wilt thou go up to Jerusalem, and there be judged of these things before me?
target: Tetapi Festus yang hendak mengambil hati orang Yahudi, menjawab Paulus, katanya: "Apakah engkau bersedia pergi ke Yerusalem, supaya engkau dihakimi di sana di hadapanku tentang perkara ini?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jacob said unto Joseph, God Almighty appeared unto me at Luz in the land of Canaan, and blessed me,
target: Berkatalah Yakub kepada Yusuf: "Allah, Yang Mahakuasa telah menampakkan diri kepadaku di Lus di tanah Kanaan dan memberkati aku

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Jacob offered sacrifice upon the mount, and called his brethren to eat bread: and they did eat bread, and tarried all night in the mount.
target: Dan Yakub mempersembahkan korban sembelihan di gunung itu. Ia mengundang makan sanak saudaranya, lalu mereka makan serta bermalam di gunung itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover thou shalt not lie carnally with thy neighbour's wife, to defile thyself with her.
target: Dan janganlah engkau bersetubuh dengan isteri sesamamu, sehingga engkau menjadi najis dengan dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou, even thyself, shalt discontinue from thine heritage that I gave thee; and I will cause thee to serve thine enemies in the land which thou knowest not: for ye have kindled a fire in mine anger, which shall burn for ever.
target: Engkau terpaksa lepas tangan dari milik pusakamu yang telah Kuberikan kepadamu, dan Aku akan membuat engkau menjadi budak musuhmu di negeri yang tidak kaukenal, sebab dalam murka-Ku api telah mencetus yang akan menyala untuk selama-lamanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the third year of the reign of king Belshazzar a vision appeared unto me, even unto me Daniel, after that which appeared unto me at the first.
target: Pada tahun yang ketiga pemerintahan raja Belsyazar, nampaklah kepadaku, Daniel, suatu penglihatan sesudah yang tampak kepadaku dahulu itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When the LORD turned again the captivity of Zion, we were like them that dream.
target: Nyanyian ziarah. Ketika TUHAN memulihkan keadaan Sion, keadaan kita seperti orang-orang yang bermimpi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And ye shall be holy men unto me: neither shall ye eat any flesh that is torn of beasts in the field; ye shall cast it to the dogs.
target: Haruslah kamu menjadi orang-orang kudus bagi-Ku: daging ternak yang diterkam di padang oleh binatang buas, janganlah kamu makan, tetapi haruslah kamu lemparkan kepada anjing."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I through the law am dead to the law, that I might live unto God.
target: Sebab aku telah mati oleh hukum Taurat untuk hukum Taurat, supaya aku hidup untuk Allah. Aku telah disalibkan dengan Kristus;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David commanded to gather together the strangers that were in the land of Israel; and he set masons to hew wrought stones to build the house of God.
target: Daud menyuruh mengumpulkan orang-orang asing yang ada di negeri orang Israel, lalu ditempatkannya tukang-tukang untuk memahat batu-batu pahat yang akan dipakai untuk mendirikan rumah Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his feet shall stand in that day upon the mount of Olives, which is before Jerusalem on the east, and the mount of Olives shall cleave in the midst thereof toward the east and toward the west, and there shall be a very great valley; and half of the mountain shall remove toward the north, and half of it toward the south.
target: Pada waktu itu kaki-Nya akan berjejak di bukit Zaitun yang terletak di depan Yerusalem di sebelah timur. Bukit Zaitun itu akan terbelah dua dari timur ke barat, sehingga terjadi suatu lembah yang sangat besar; setengah dari bukit itu akan bergeser ke utara dan setengah lagi ke selatan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: It came even to pass on the third day, that, behold, a man came out of the camp from Saul with his clothes rent, and earth upon his head: and so it was, when he came to David, that he fell to the earth, and did obeisance.
target: maka datanglah pada hari ketiga seorang dari tentara, dari pihak Saul, dengan pakaian terkoyak-koyak dan tanah di atas kepala. Ketika ia sampai kepada Daud, sujudlah ia ke tanah dan menyembah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I besought thy disciples to cast him out; and they could not.
target: Dan aku telah meminta kepada murid-murid-Mu supaya mereka mengusir roh itu, tetapi mereka tidak dapat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This spake he, signifying by what death he should glorify God. And when he had spoken this, he saith unto him, Follow me.
target: Dan hal ini dikatakan-Nya untuk menyatakan bagaimana Petrus akan mati dan memuliakan Allah. Sesudah mengatakan demikian Ia berkata kepada Petrus: "Ikutlah Aku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there was much murmuring among the people concerning him: for some said, He is a good man: others said, Nay; but he deceiveth the people.
target: Dan banyak terdengar bisikan di antara orang banyak tentang Dia. Ada yang berkata: "Ia orang baik." Ada pula yang berkata: "Tidak, Ia menyesatkan rakyat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But thine eyes and thine heart are not but for thy covetousness, and for to shed innocent blood, and for oppression, and for violence, to do it.
target: Tetapi matamu dan hatimu hanya tertuju kepada pengejaran untung, kepada penumpahan darah orang yang tak bersalah, kepada pemerasan dan kepada penganiayaan!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They shall not offer wine offerings to the LORD, neither shall they be pleasing unto him: their sacrifices shall be unto them as the bread of mourners; all that eat thereof shall be polluted: for their bread for their soul shall not come into the house of the LORD.
target: Mereka tidak akan mempersembahkan korban curahan anggur kepada TUHAN dan korban-korban sembelihan mereka tidak akan menyenangkan hati-Nya. Roti mereka adalah seperti roti perkabungan, semua orang yang memakannya akan menjadi najis, sebab roti mereka adalah untuk dirinya sendiri, tidak boleh dibawa ke dalam rumah TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover he must have a good report of them which are without; lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil.
target: Hendaklah ia juga mempunyai nama baik di luar jemaat, agar jangan ia digugat orang dan jatuh ke dalam jerat Iblis.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But he shall not defile himself, being a chief man among his people, to profane himself.
target: Sebagai suami janganlah ia menajiskan diri di antara orang-orang sebangsanya dan dengan demikian melanggar kekudusannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hearken not to Hezekiah: for thus saith the king of Assyria, Make an agreement with me by a present, and come out to me, and then eat ye every man of his own vine, and every one of his fig tree, and drink ye every one the waters of his cistern:
target: Janganlah dengarkan Hizkia, sebab beginilah kata raja Asyur: Adakanlah perjanjian penyerahan dengan aku dan datanglah ke luar kepadaku, maka setiap orang dari padamu akan makan dari pohon anggurnya dan dari pohon aranya serta minum dari sumurnya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joseph's master took him, and put him into the prison, a place where the king's prisoners were bound: and he was there in the prison.
target: Lalu Yusuf ditangkap oleh tuannya dan dimasukkan ke dalam penjara, tempat tahanan-tahanan raja dikurung. Demikianlah Yusuf dipenjarakan di sana.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not wrest the judgment of thy poor in his cause.
target: Janganlah engkau memperkosa hak orang miskin di antaramu dalam perkaranya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: From thirty years old and upward even unto fifty years old shalt thou number them, every one that entereth into the service, to do the work of the tabernacle of the congregation.
target: Catatlah mereka yang berumur tiga puluh tahun ke atas sampai yang berumur lima puluh tahun, yakni setiap orang yang kena wajib tugas, supaya mereka melakukan pekerjaan jabatan pada Kemah Pertemuan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: What man is he that liveth, and shall not see death? shall he deliver his soul from the hand of the grave? Selah.
target: Ingatlah apa umur hidup itu, betapa sia-sia Kauciptakan semua anak manusia!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore thus saith the LORD, If thou return, then will I bring thee again, and thou shalt stand before me: and if thou take forth the precious from the vile, thou shalt be as my mouth: let them return unto thee; but return not thou unto them.
target: Karena itu beginilah jawab TUHAN: "Jika engkau mau kembali, Aku akan mengembalikan engkau menjadi pelayan di hadapan-Ku, dan jika engkau mengucapkan apa yang berharga dan tidak hina, maka engkau akan menjadi penyambung lidah bagi-Ku. Biarpun mereka akan kembali kepadamu, namun engkau tidak perlu kembali kepada mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they made two ouches of gold, and two gold rings; and put the two rings in the two ends of the breastplate.
target: Dibuat merekalah dua ikat emas dan dua gelang emas dan kedua gelang itu dipasang pada kedua ujung tutup dada.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thus saith the LORD; Sing with gladness for Jacob, and shout among the chief of the nations: publish ye, praise ye, and say, O LORD, save thy people, the remnant of Israel.
target: Sebab beginilah firman TUHAN: Bersorak-sorailah bagi Yakub dengan sukacita, bersukarialah tentang pemimpin bangsa-bangsa! Kabarkanlah, pujilah dan katakanlah: TUHAN telah menyelamatkan umat-Nya, yakni sisa-sisa Israel!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And we took all his cities at that time, and utterly destroyed the men, and the women, and the little ones, of every city, we left none to remain:
target: Pada waktu itu kita merebut segala kotanya dan menumpas penduduk setiap kota: laki-laki dan perempuan serta anak-anak. Tidak ada seorang pun yang kita biarkan terluput;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night.
target: karena kamu sendiri tahu benar-benar, bahwa hari Tuhan datang seperti pencuri pada malam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then they shall bring out the damsel to the door of her father's house, and the men of her city shall stone her with stones that she die: because she hath wrought folly in Israel, to play the whore in her father's house: so shalt thou put evil away from among you.
target: maka haruslah si gadis dibawa ke luar ke depan pintu rumah ayahnya, dan orang-orang sekotanya haruslah melempari dia dengan batu, sehingga mati — sebab dia telah menodai orang Israel dengan bersundal di rumah ayahnya. Demikianlah harus kauhapuskan yang jahat itu dari tengah-tengahmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As the fire burneth a wood, and as the flame setteth the mountains on fire;
target: Ya Allahku, buatlah mereka seperti dedak yang beterbangan, seperti jerami yang ditiup angin!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And thou shalt gather all the spoil of it into the midst of the street thereof, and shalt burn with fire the city, and all the spoil thereof every whit, for the LORD thy God: and it shall be an heap for ever; it shall not be built again.
target: Seluruh jarahan harus kaukumpulkan di tengah-tengah lapangan dan harus kaubakar habis kota dengan seluruh jarahan itu sebagai korban bakaran yang lengkap bagi TUHAN, Allahmu. Semuanya itu akan tetap menjadi timbunan puing untuk selamanya dan tidak akan dibangun kembali.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thou art not sent to a people of a strange speech and of an hard language, but to the house of Israel;
target: Sebab engkau tidak diutus kepada suatu bangsa yang berbahasa asing dan yang berat lidah, tetapi kepada kaum Israel;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them, What manner of man was he which came up to meet you, and told you these words?
target: Lalu bertanyalah ia kepada mereka: "Bagaimanakah rupa orang yang telah datang menemui kamu itu dan yang mengatakan perkataan ini kepadamu?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hast thou not heard long ago how I have done it, and of ancient times that I have formed it? now have I brought it to pass, that thou shouldest be to lay waste fenced cities into ruinous heaps.
target: Bukankah telah kaudengar, bahwa Aku telah menentukannya dari jauh hari, dan telah merancangnya pada zaman purbakala? Sekarang Aku mewujudkannya, bahwa engkau membuat sunyi senyap kota-kota yang berkubu menjadi timbunan batu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there followed another angel, saying, Babylon is fallen, is fallen, that great city, because she made all nations drink of the wine of the wrath of her fornication.
target: Dan seorang malaikat lain, malaikat kedua, menyusul dia dan berkata: "Sudah rubuh, sudah rubuh Babel, kota besar itu, yang telah memabukkan segala bangsa dengan anggur hawa nafsu cabulnya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he laid hold on the dragon, that old serpent, which is the Devil, and Satan, and bound him a thousand years,
target: ia menangkap naga, si ular tua itu, yaitu Iblis dan Satan. Dan ia mengikatnya seribu tahun lamanya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said unto Moses, Is the LORD'S hand waxed short? thou shalt see now whether my word shall come to pass unto thee or not.
target: Tetapi TUHAN menjawab Musa: "Masakan kuasa TUHAN akan kurang untuk melakukan itu? Sekarang engkau akan melihat apakah firman-Ku terjadi kepadamu atau tidak!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when they opposed themselves, and blasphemed, he shook his raiment, and said unto them, Your blood be upon your own heads; I am clean; from henceforth I will go unto the Gentiles.
target: Tetapi ketika orang-orang itu memusuhi dia dan menghujat, ia mengebaskan debu dari pakaiannya dan berkata kepada mereka: "Biarlah darahmu tertumpah ke atas kepalamu sendiri; aku bersih, tidak bersalah. Mulai dari sekarang aku akan pergi kepada bangsa-bangsa lain."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For he doth not afflict willingly nor grieve the children of men.
target: Karena tidak dengan rela hati Ia menindas dan merisaukan anak-anak manusia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And now, Israel, what doth the LORD thy God require of thee, but to fear the LORD thy God, to walk in all his ways, and to love him, and to serve the LORD thy God with all thy heart and with all thy soul,
target: "Maka sekarang, hai orang Israel, apakah yang dimintakan dari padamu oleh TUHAN, Allahmu, selain dari takut akan TUHAN, Allahmu, hidup menurut segala jalan yang ditunjukkan-Nya, mengasihi Dia, beribadah kepada TUHAN, Allahmu, dengan segenap hatimu dan dengan segenap jiwamu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: At the last it biteth like a serpent, and stingeth like an adder.
target: tetapi kemudian memagut seperti ular, dan menyemburkan bisa seperti beludak.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And many shall follow their pernicious ways; by reason of whom the way of truth shall be evil spoken of.
target: Banyak orang akan mengikuti cara hidup mereka yang dikuasai hawa nafsu, dan karena mereka Jalan Kebenaran akan dihujat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But thou shalt open thine hand wide unto him, and shalt surely lend him sufficient for his need, in that which he wanteth.
target: tetapi engkau harus membuka tangan lebar-lebar baginya dan memberi pinjaman kepadanya dengan limpahnya, cukup untuk keperluannya, seberapa ia perlukan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I heard a loud voice saying in heaven, Now is come salvation, and strength, and the kingdom of our God, and the power of his Christ: for the accuser of our brethren is cast down, which accused them before our God day and night.
target: Dan aku mendengar suara yang nyaring di sorga berkata: "Sekarang telah tiba keselamatan dan kuasa dan pemerintahan Allah kita, dan kekuasaan Dia yang diurapi-Nya, karena telah dilemparkan ke bawah pendakwa saudara-saudara kita, yang mendakwa mereka siang dan malam di hadapan Allah kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And to him they agreed: and when they had called the apostles, and beaten them, they commanded that they should not speak in the name of Jesus, and let them go.
target: Mereka memanggil rasul-rasul itu, lalu menyesah mereka dan melarang mereka mengajar dalam nama Yesus. Sesudah itu mereka dilepaskan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let the wicked fall into their own nets, whilst that I withal escape.
target: Orang-orang fasik akan jatuh serentak ke dalam jala mereka, tetapi aku melangkah lalu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: IT IS A GOOD THING TO GIVE THANKS UNTO THE LORD, AND TO SING PRAISES UNTO THY NAME, O MOST HIGH:
target: Mazmur. Nyanyian untuk hari Sabat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And all the princes, and the mighty men, and all the sons likewise of king David, submitted themselves unto Solomon the king.
target: Lalu semua pemimpin dan pahlawan, juga semua anak raja Daud mengakui kekuasaan raja Salomo.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then hear thou their prayer and their supplication in heaven thy dwelling place, and maintain their cause,
target: maka Engkau kiranya mendengarkan di sorga, tempat kediaman-Mu yang tetap, kepada doa dan permohonan mereka dan Engkau kiranya memberikan keadilan kepada mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The one lamb thou shalt offer in the morning; and the other lamb thou shalt offer at even:
target: Domba yang satu haruslah kauolah pada waktu pagi dan domba yang lain kauolah pada waktu senja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Her house is the way to hell, going down to the chambers of death.
target: Rumahnya adalah jalan ke dunia orang mati, yang menurun ke ruangan-ruangan maut.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Abraham sojourned in the Philistines' land many days.
target: Dan masih lama Abraham tinggal sebagai orang asing di negeri orang Filistin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover the LORD spake again unto Ahaz, saying,
target: TUHAN melanjutkan firman-Nya kepada Ahas, kata-Nya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O LORD, thou hast pleaded the causes of my soul; thou hast redeemed my life.
target: "Ya Tuhan, Engkau telah memperjuangkan perkaraku, Engkau telah menyelamatkan hidupku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he called them unto him, and said unto them in parables, How can Satan cast out Satan?
target: Yesus memanggil mereka, lalu berkata kepada mereka dalam perumpamaan: "Bagaimana Iblis dapat mengusir Iblis?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus looked round about, and saith unto his disciples, How hardly shall they that have riches enter into the kingdom of God!
target: Lalu Yesus memandang murid-murid-Nya di sekeliling-Nya dan berkata kepada mereka: "Alangkah sukarnya orang yang beruang masuk ke dalam Kerajaan Allah."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: We looked for peace, but no good came; and for a time of health, and behold trouble!
target: Kita mengharapkan damai, tetapi tidak datang sesuatu yang baik, mengharapkan waktu kesembuhan, tetapi yang ada hanya kengerian!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Tremble, ye women that are at ease; be troubled, ye careless ones: strip you, and make you bare, and gird sackcloth upon your loins.
target: Gentarlah, hai perempuan-perempuan yang hidup aman, gemetarlah, hai perempuan-perempuan yang hidup tenteram, tanggalkanlah dan bukalah pakaianmu, kenakanlah kain kabung pada pinggangmu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The time is come, the day draweth near: let not the buyer rejoice, nor the seller mourn: for wrath is upon all the multitude thereof.
target: Waktunya datang, harinya mendekat! Biarlah si pembeli jangan bergembira dan biarlah si penjual jangan berdukacita, karena kehangatan murka tertimpa atas segala kegemparan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Yet they went in unto her, as they go in unto a woman that playeth the harlot: so went they in unto Aholah and unto Aholibah, the lewd women.
target: Mereka datang kepadanya seperti orang mendatangi perempuan sundal. Demikianlah mereka datang kepada Ohola dan Oholiba untuk melakukan kemesuman.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD executeth righteousness and judgment for all that are oppressed.
target: TUHAN menjalankan keadilan dan hukum bagi segala orang yang diperas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For unto me the children of Israel are servants; they are my servants whom I brought forth out of the land of Egypt: I am the LORD your God.
target: Karena pada-Kulah orang Israel menjadi hamba; mereka itu adalah hamba-hamba-Ku yang Kubawa keluar dari tanah Mesir; Akulah TUHAN, Allahmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The children of Asnah, the children of Mehunim, the children of Nephusim,
target: bani Asna, bani Meunim, bani Nefusim;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jerubbaal the son of Joash went and dwelt in his own house.
target: Lalu Yerubaal bin Yoas pergilah dan diam di rumahnya sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: His own iniquities shall take the wicked himself, and he shall be holden with the cords of his sins.
target: Orang fasik tertangkap dalam kejahatannya, dan terjerat dalam tali dosanya sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they caught him, and beat him, and sent him away empty.
target: Tetapi mereka menangkap hamba itu dan memukulnya, lalu menyuruhnya pergi dengan tangan hampa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he sent forth a raven, which went forth to and fro, until the waters were dried up from off the earth.
target: Lalu ia melepaskan seekor burung gagak; dan burung itu terbang pulang pergi, sampai air itu menjadi kering dari atas bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the whole city was filled with confusion: and having caught Gaius and Aristarchus, men of Macedonia, Paul's companions in travel, they rushed with one accord into the theatre.
target: Seluruh kota menjadi kacau dan mereka ramai-ramai membanjiri gedung kesenian serta menyeret Gayus dan Aristarkhus, keduanya orang Makedonia dan teman seperjalanan Paulus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They say unto him, Lord, that our eyes may be opened.
target: Jawab mereka: "Tuhan, supaya mata kami dapat melihat."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he sent the letters unto all the Jews, to the hundred twenty and seven provinces of the kingdom of Ahasuerus, with words of peace and truth,
target: Lalu dikirimkanlah surat-surat kepada semua orang Yahudi di dalam keseratus dua puluh tujuh daerah kerajaan Ahasyweros, dengan kata-kata salam dan setia,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the LORD for ever.
target: Kebajikan dan kemurahan belaka akan mengikuti aku, seumur hidupku; dan aku akan diam dalam rumah TUHAN sepanjang masa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said he unto the disciples, It is impossible but that offences will come: but woe unto him, through whom they come!
target: Yesus berkata kepada murid-murid-Nya: "Tidak mungkin tidak akan ada penyesatan, tetapi celakalah orang yang mengadakannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses commanded the children of Israel according to the word of the LORD, saying, The tribe of the sons of Joseph hath said well.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In their streets they shall gird themselves with sackcloth: on the tops of their houses, and in their streets, every one shall howl, weeping abundantly.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Pleasant words are as an honeycomb, sweet to the soul, and health to the bones.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Rehabeam mengangkat Abia, anak Maakha, sebagai pemuka, yakni sebagai pemimpin di antara saudara-saudaranya, karena ia bermaksud menjadikan dia raja.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Itulah hukum tentang korban bakaran, korban sajian, korban penghapus dosa, korban penebus salah, persembahan pentahbisan dan korban keselamatan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Zilpah, Leah's handmaid: Gad, and Asher: these are the sons of Jacob, which were born to him in Padanaram.
target: Dan anak-anak Zilpa, budak perempuan Lea ialah Gad dan Asyer. Itulah anak-anak lelaki Yakub, yang dilahirkan baginya di Padan-Aram.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
