target: "Guru, hukum manakah yang terutama dalam hukum Taurat?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Kepada Makhir kuberikan Gilead.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If thou shalt afflict my daughters, or if thou shalt take other wives beside my daughters, no man is with us; see, God is witness betwixt me and thee.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the clean person shall sprinkle upon the unclean on the third day, and on the seventh day: and on the seventh day he shall purify himself, and wash his clothes, and bathe himself in water, and shall be clean at even.
target: orang yang tahir itu haruslah memercik kepada orang yang najis itu pada hari yang ketiga dan pada hari yang ketujuh, dan pada hari yang ketujuh itu haruslah ia menghapus dosa orang itu; dan orang yang najis itu haruslah mencuci pakaiannya dan membasuh badannya dengan air, lalu ia tahir pada waktu matahari terbenam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So he drove out the man; and he placed at the east of the garden of Eden Cherubims, and a flaming sword which turned every way, to keep the way of the tree of life.
target: Ia menghalau manusia itu dan di sebelah timur taman Eden ditempatkan-Nyalah beberapa kerub dengan pedang yang bernyala-nyala dan menyambar-nyambar, untuk menjaga jalan ke pohon kehidupan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore didst thou flee away secretly, and steal away from me; and didst not tell me, that I might have sent thee away with mirth, and with songs, with tabret, and with harp?
target: Mengapa engkau lari diam-diam dan mengakali aku? Mengapa engkau tidak memberitahu kepadaku, supaya aku menghantarkan engkau dengan sukacita dan nyanyian dengan rebana dan kecapi?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For this is the day of the Lord GOD of hosts, a day of vengeance, that he may avenge him of his adversaries: and the sword shall devour, and it shall be satiate and made drunk with their blood: for the Lord GOD of hosts hath a sacrifice in the north country by the river Euphrates.
target: Hari itu ialah hari Tuhan ALLAH semesta alam, hari pembalasan untuk melakukan pembalasan kepada para lawan-Nya. Pedang akan makan sampai kenyang, dan akan puas minum darah mereka. Sebab Tuhan ALLAH semesta alam mengadakan korban penyembelihan di tanah utara, dekat sungai Efrat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Nibshan, and the city of Salt, and Engedi; six cities with their villages.
target: Nibsan, Kota Garam dan En-Gedi; enam kota dengan desa-desanya.

input: The eleventh to Azareel, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
target: undian yang kesebelas pada Azareel, anak-anaknya dan saudara-saudaranya, dua belas orang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Inilah suatu ketetapan untuk selamanya bagi kamu turun-temurun di segala tempat kediamanmu: janganlah sekali-kali kamu makan lemak dan darah."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

input: Then said he unto me, These waters issue out toward the east country, and go down into the desert, and go into the sea: which being brought forth into the sea, the waters shall be healed.
target: Ia berkata kepadaku: "Sungai ini mengalir menuju wilayah timur, dan menurun ke Araba-Yordan, dan bermuara di Laut Asin, air yang mengandung banyak garam dan air itu menjadi tawar,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And that he might make known the riches of his glory on the vessels of mercy, which he had afore prepared unto glory,
target: justru untuk menyatakan kekayaan kemuliaan-Nya atas benda-benda belas kasihan-Nya yang telah dipersiapkan-Nya untuk kemuliaan,

input: And Ham, the father of Canaan, saw the nakedness of his father, and told his two brethren without.
target: Maka Ham, bapa Kanaan itu, melihat aurat ayahnya, lalu diceritakannya kepada kedua saudaranya di luar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And over the king's treasures was Azmaveth the son of Adiel: and over the storehouses in the fields, in the cities, and in the villages, and in the castles, was Jehonathan the son of Uzziah:
target: Yang mengawasi persediaan raja ialah Azmawet bin Adiel dan yang mengawasi persediaan di luar kota, di kota-kota, di desa-desa dan di dalam menara-menara lumbung ialah Yonatan bin Uzia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore pray not thou for this people, neither lift up a cry or prayer for them: for I will not hear them in the time that they cry unto me for their trouble.
target: Adapun engkau, janganlah engkau berdoa untuk bangsa ini dan janganlah naikkan permohonan dan doa untuk mereka, sebab Aku tidak akan mendengarkan pada waktu mereka berseru kepada-Ku karena malapetaka mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For I have told him that I will judge his house for ever for the iniquity which he knoweth; because his sons made themselves vile, and he restrained them not.
target: Sebab telah Kuberitahukan kepadanya, bahwa Aku akan menghukum keluarganya untuk selamanya karena dosa yang telah diketahuinya, yakni bahwa anak-anaknya telah menghujat Allah, tetapi ia tidak memarahi mereka!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And a mighty king shall stand up, that shall rule with great dominion, and do according to his will.
target: Kemudian akan muncul seorang raja yang gagah perkasa, yang akan memerintah dengan kekuasaan yang besar dan akan berbuat sekehendaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Blessed is the man whose strength is in thee; in whose heart are the ways of them.
target: Berbahagialah orang-orang yang diam di rumah-Mu, yang terus-menerus memuji-muji Engkau. S e l a

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But Nadab and Abihu died before their father, and had no children: therefore Eleazar and Ithamar executed the priest's office.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall come to pass, as soon as I am gone from thee, that the Spirit of the LORD shall carry thee whither I know not; and so when I come and tell Ahab, and he cannot find thee, he shall slay me: but I thy servant fear the LORD from my youth.
target: Mungkin terjadi, apabila aku sudah pergi dari padamu, Roh TUHAN mengangkat engkau ke tempat yang tidak kuketahui. Kalau aku sampai kepada Ahab untuk memberitahukannya dan engkau tidak didapatinya, tentulah ia akan membunuh aku, padahal hambamu ini dari sejak kecil takut akan TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jesus answered and said unto him, What I do thou knowest not now; but thou shalt know hereafter.
target: Jawab Yesus kepadanya: "Apa yang Kuperbuat, engkau tidak tahu sekarang, tetapi engkau akan mengertinya kelak."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:

target: Baru saja aku meninggalkan mereka, kutemui jantung hatiku; kupegang dan tak kulepaskan dia, sampai kubawa dia ke rumah ibuku, ke kamar orang yang melahirkan aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Also of your own selves shall men arise, speaking perverse things, to draw away disciples after them.
target: Bahkan dari antara kamu sendiri akan muncul beberapa orang, yang dengan ajaran palsu mereka berusaha menarik murid-murid dari jalan yang benar dan supaya mengikut mereka.

input: Then will I also confess unto thee that thine own right hand can save thee.

target: Dan pada jam tiga berserulah Yesus dengan suara nyaring: "Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakhtani?", yang berarti: Allahku, Allahku, mengapa Engkau meninggalkan Aku?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And unto the angel of the church in Thyatira write; These things saith the Son of God, who hath his eyes like unto a flame of fire, and his feet are like fine brass;

target: dan bersama-sama mereka itu saudara-saudara mereka dari tingkat kedua: Zakharia, Yaaziel, Semiramot, Yehiel, Uni, Eliab, Benaya, Maaseya, Matica, Elifele, Mikneya, dan Obed-Edom serta Yeiel, para penunggu pintu gerbang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because thou hast kept the word of my patience, I also will keep thee from the hour of temptation, which shall come upon all the world, to try them that dwell upon the earth.
target: Karena engkau menuruti firman-Ku, untuk tekun menantikan Aku, maka Aku pun akan melindungi engkau dari hari pencobaan yang akan datang atas seluruh dunia untuk mencobai mereka yang diam di bumi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king of Israel said unto Jehoshaphat, Did I not tell thee that he would prophesy no good concerning me, but evil?
target: Kemudian raja Israel berkata kepada Yosafat: "Bukankah telah kukatakan kepadamu: Tidak pernah ia menubuatkan yang baik tentang aku, melainkan hanya malapetaka?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense.
target: Maka tampaklah kepada Zakharia seorang malaikat Tuhan berdiri di sebelah kanan mezbah pembakaran ukupan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Abraham took Ishmael his son, and all that were born in his house, and all that were bought with his money, every male among the men of Abraham's house; and circumcised the flesh of their foreskin in the selfsame day, as God had said unto him.
target: Setelah itu Abraham memanggil Ismael, anaknya, dan semua orang yang lahir di rumahnya, juga semua orang yang dibelinya dengan uang, yakni setiap laki-laki dari isi rumahnya, lalu ia mengerat kulit khatan mereka pada hari itu juga, seperti yang telah difirmankan Allah kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But the wheat and the rie were not smitten: for they were not grown up.
target: Tetapi gandum dan sekoi tidak tertimpa binasa, sebab belum lagi musimnya. —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Therefore by the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in his sight: for by the law is the knowledge of sin.
target: Sebab tidak seorang pun yang dapat dibenarkan di hadapan Allah oleh karena melakukan hukum Taurat, karena justru oleh hukum Taurat orang mengenal dosa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But while he thought on these things, behold, the angel of the LORD appeared unto him in a dream, saying, Joseph, thou son of David, fear not to take unto thee Mary thy wife: for that which is conceived in her is of the Holy Ghost.
target: Tetapi ketika ia mempertimbangkan maksud itu, malaikat Tuhan nampak kepadanya dalam mimpi dan berkata: "Yusuf, anak Daud, janganlah engkau takut mengambil Maria sebagai isterimu, sebab anak yang di dalam kandungannya adalah dari Roh Kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For first of all, when ye come together in the church, I hear that there be divisions among you; and I partly believe it.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou answeredst them, O LORD our God: thou wast a God that forgavest them, though thou tookest vengeance of their inventions.
target: TUHAN, Allah kami, Engkau telah menjawab mereka, Engkau Allah yang mengampuni bagi mereka, tetapi yang membalas perbuatan-perbuatan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To overthrow their seed also among the nations, and to scatter them in the lands.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses said unto the children of Israel, See, the LORD hath called by name Bezaleel the son of Uri, the son of Hur, of the tribe of Judah;
target: Berkatalah Musa kepada orang Israel: "Lihatlah, TUHAN telah menunjuk Bezaleel bin Uri bin Hur, dari suku Yehuda,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And after these things I heard a great voice of much people in heaven, saying, Alleluia; Salvation, and glory, and honour, and power, unto the Lord our God:
target: Kemudian dari pada itu aku mendengar seperti suara yang nyaring dari himpunan besar orang banyak di sorga, katanya: "Haleluya! Keselamatan dan kemuliaan dan kekuasaan adalah pada Allah kita,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moreover all the chief of the priests, and the people, transgressed very much after all the abominations of the heathen; and polluted the house of the LORD which he had hallowed in Jerusalem.
target: Juga semua pemimpin di antara para imam dan rakyat berkali-kali berubah setia dengan mengikuti segala kekejian bangsa-bangsa lain. Rumah yang dikuduskan TUHAN di Yerusalem itu dinajiskan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There is none greater in this house than I; neither hath he kept back any thing from me but thee, because thou art his wife: how then can I do this great wickedness, and sin against God?
target: bahkan di rumah ini ia tidak lebih besar kuasanya dari padaku, dan tiada yang tidak diserahkannya kepadaku selain dari pada engkau, sebab engkau isterinya. Bagaimanakah mungkin aku melakukan kejahatan yang besar ini dan berbuat dosa terhadap Allah?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Husham died, and Hadad the son of Bedad, who smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in his stead: and the name of his city was Avith.
target: Setelah Husyam mati, Hadad bin Bedad menjadi raja menggantikan dia; dialah yang memukul kalah orang Midian di daerah Moab, dan kotanya bernama Awit.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Moses went up from the plains of Moab unto the mountain of Nebo, to the top of Pisgah, that is over against Jericho. And the LORD shewed him all the land of Gilead, unto Dan,
target: Kemudian naiklah Musa dari dataran Moab ke atas gunung Nebo, yakni ke atas puncak Pisga, yang di tentangan Yerikho, lalu TUHAN memperlihatkan kepadanya seluruh negeri itu: daerah Gilead sampai ke kota Dan,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For there is no faithfulness in their mouth; their inward part is very wickedness; their throat is an open sepulchre; they flatter with their tongue.
target: TUHAN, tuntunlah aku dalam keadilan-Mu karena seteruku; ratakanlah jalan-Mu di depanku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD said, Judah shall go up: behold, I have delivered the land into his hand.
target: Firman TUHAN: "Suku Yehudalah yang harus maju; sesungguhnya telah Kuserahkan negeri itu ke dalam tangannya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David said unto Jonathan, Behold, to morrow is the new moon, and I should not fail to sit with the king at meat: but let me go, that I may hide myself in the field unto the third day at even.
target: Lalu kata Daud kepada Yonatan: "Kautahu, besok bulan baru, maka sebenarnya aku harus duduk makan bersama-sama dengan raja. Jika engkau membiarkan aku pergi, maka aku akan bersembunyi di padang sampai lusa petang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, through the power of the Holy Ghost.
target: Semoga Allah, sumber pengharapan, memenuhi kamu dengan segala sukacita dan damai sejahtera dalam iman kamu, supaya oleh kekuatan Roh Kudus kamu berlimpah-limpah dalam pengharapan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, the days come, saith the LORD, that I will sow the house of Israel and the house of Judah with the seed of man, and with the seed of beast.
target: "Sesungguhnya, waktunya akan datang, demikianlah firman TUHAN, bahwa Aku akan melimpahi kaum Israel dan kaum Yehuda dengan benih manusia dan benih hewan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Give me now wisdom and knowledge, that I may go out and come in before this people: for who can judge this thy people, that is so great?
target: Berilah sekarang kepadaku hikmat dan pengertian, supaya aku dapat keluar dan masuk sebagai pemimpin bangsa ini, sebab siapakah yang dapat menghakimi umat-Mu yang besar ini?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: We will not return unto our houses, until the children of Israel have inherited every man his inheritance.
target: kami tidak akan pulang ke rumah kami, sampai setiap orang Israel memperoleh milik pusakanya;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But to sit on my right hand and on my left hand is not mine to give; but it shall be given to them for whom it is prepared.
target: Tetapi hal duduk di sebelah kanan-Ku atau di sebelah kiri-Ku, Aku tidak berhak memberikannya. Itu akan diberikan kepada orang-orang bagi siapa itu telah disediakan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Hath God forgotten to be gracious? hath he in anger shut up his tender mercies? Selah.
target: Sudah lenyapkah untuk seterusnya kasih setia-Nya, telah berakhirkah janji itu berlaku turun-temurun?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, While the child was yet alive, I fasted and wept: for I said, Who can tell whether GOD will be gracious to me, that the child may live?
target: Jawabnya: "Selagi anak itu hidup, aku berpuasa dan menangis, karena pikirku: siapa tahu TUHAN mengasihani aku, sehingga anak itu tetap hidup.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Israel was greatly impoverished because of the Midianites; and the children of Israel cried unto the LORD.
target: sehingga orang Israel menjadi sangat melarat oleh perbuatan orang Midian itu. Lalu berserulah orang Israel kepada TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: (For of necessity he must release one unto them at the feast.)
target: Sebab ia wajib melepaskan seorang bagi mereka pada hari raya itu.]

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Gracious is the LORD, and righteous; yea, our God is merciful.
target: TUHAN adalah pengasih dan adil, Allah kita penyayang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He hath stripped me of my glory, and taken the crown from my head.
target: Ia telah menanggalkan kemuliaanku dan merampas mahkota di kepalaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if thy brother that dwelleth by thee be waxen poor, and be sold unto thee; thou shalt not compel him to serve as a bondservant:
target: Apabila saudaramu jatuh miskin di antaramu, sehingga menyerahkan dirinya kepadamu, maka janganlah memperbudak dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will plant in the wilderness the cedar, the shittah tree, and the myrtle, and the oil tree; I will set in the desert the fir tree, and the pine, and the box tree together:
target: Aku akan menanam pohon aras di padang gurun, pohon penaga, pohon murad dan pohon minyak; Aku akan menumbuhkan pohon sanobar di padang belantara dan pohon berangan serta pohon cemara di sampingnya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ, let him be Anathema Maranatha.
target: Siapa yang tidak mengasihi Tuhan, terkutuklah ia. Maranata!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the revenger of blood find him without the borders of the city of his refuge, and the revenger of blood kill the slayer; he shall not be guilty of blood:
target: dan penuntut darah mendapat dia di luar batas kota perlindungannya, dan penuntut darah membunuh pembunuh itu, maka tidaklah ia berhutang darah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A fruitful land into barrenness, for the wickedness of them that dwell therein.
target: tanah yang subur menjadi padang asin, oleh sebab kejahatan orang-orang yang diam di dalamnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Sigh therefore, thou son of man, with the breaking of thy loins; and with bitterness sigh before their eyes.
target: Dan engkau anak manusia, mengeranglah! Mengeranglah di hadapan mereka seperti seorang yang tulang pinggangnya patah dan yang berada dalam kesengsaraan yang pahit.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For when they shall rise from the dead, they neither marry, nor are given in marriage; but are as the angels which are in heaven.
target: Sebab apabila orang bangkit dari antara orang mati, orang tidak kawin dan tidak dikawinkan melainkan hidup seperti malaikat di sorga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the people murmured against Moses, saying, What shall we drink?
target: Lalu bersungut-sungutlah bangsa itu kepada Musa, kata mereka: "Apakah yang akan kami minum?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I call to remembrance my song in the night: I commune with mine own heart: and my spirit made diligent search.
target: Aku memikir-mikir hari-hari zaman purbakala, tahun-tahun zaman dahulu aku ingat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, they belch out with their mouth: swords are in their lips: for who, say they, doth hear?
target: Pada waktu senja mereka datang kembali, mereka melolong seperti anjing dan mengelilingi kota.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Keep thee far from a false matter; and the innocent and righteous slay thou not: for I will not justify the wicked.
target: Haruslah kaujauhkan dirimu dari perkara dusta. Orang yang tidak bersalah dan orang yang benar tidak boleh kaubunuh, sebab Aku tidak akan membenarkan orang yang bersalah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king said unto her, Be not afraid: for what sawest thou? And the woman said unto Saul, I saw gods ascending out of the earth.
target: Maka berbicaralah raja kepadanya: "Janganlah takut; tetapi apakah yang kaulihat?" Perempuan itu menjawab Saul: "Aku melihat sesuatu yang ilahi muncul dari dalam bumi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I am the LORD thy God, which have brought thee out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of bondage.
target: "Akulah TUHAN, Allahmu, yang membawa engkau keluar dari tanah Mesir, dari tempat perbudakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king said unto Barzillai, Come thou over with me, and I will feed thee with me in Jerusalem.
target: Berkatalah raja kepada Barzilai: "Ikutlah aku, aku akan memelihara engkau di tempatku di Yerusalem."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said Agrippa unto Festus, This man might have been set at liberty, if he had not appealed unto Caesar.
target: Kata Agripa kepada Festus: "Orang itu sebenarnya sudah dapat dibebaskan sekiranya ia tidak naik banding kepada Kaisar."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He will keep the feet of his saints, and the wicked shall be silent in darkness; for by strength shall no man prevail.
target: Langkah kaki orang-orang yang dikasihi-Nya dilindungi-Nya, tetapi orang-orang fasik akan mati binasa dalam kegelapan, sebab bukan oleh karena kekuatannya sendiri seseorang berkuasa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For a testament is of force after men are dead: otherwise it is of no strength at all while the testator liveth.
target: Karena suatu wasiat barulah sah, kalau pembuat wasiat itu telah mati, sebab ia tidak berlaku, selama pembuat wasiat itu masih hidup.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, I come quickly: hold that fast which thou hast, that no man take thy crown.
target: Aku datang segera. Peganglah apa yang ada padamu, supaya tidak seorang pun mengambil mahkotamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I went unto the angel, and said unto him, Give me the little book. And he said unto me, Take it, and eat it up; and it shall make thy belly bitter, but it shall be in thy mouth sweet as honey.
target: Lalu aku pergi kepada malaikat itu dan meminta kepadanya, supaya ia memberikan gulungan kitab itu kepadaku. Katanya kepadaku: "Ambillah dan makanlah dia; ia akan membuat perutmu terasa pahit, tetapi di dalam mulutmu ia akan terasa manis seperti madu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And lo a voice from heaven, saying, This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased.
target: lalu terdengarlah suara dari sorga yang mengatakan: "Inilah Anak-Ku yang Kukasihi, kepada-Nyalah Aku berkenan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let not the waterflood overflow me, neither let the deep swallow me up, and let not the pit shut her mouth upon me.
target: Lepaskanlah aku dari dalam lumpur, supaya jangan aku tenggelam, biarlah aku dilepaskan dari orang-orang yang membenci aku, dan dari air yang dalam!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Woe to her that is filthy and polluted, to the oppressing city!
target: Celakalah si pemberontak dan si cemar, hai kota yang penuh penindasan!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As a dog returneth to his vomit, so a fool returneth to his folly.
target: Seperti anjing kembali ke muntahnya, demikianlah orang bebal yang mengulangi kebodohannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But after two years Porcius Festus came into Felix' room: and Felix, willing to shew the Jews a pleasure, left Paul bound.
target: Tetapi sesudah genap dua tahun, Feliks digantikan oleh Perkius Festus, dan untuk mengambil hati orang Yahudi, ia membiarkan Paulus tetap dalam penjara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore the wheat, and the barley, the oil, and the wine, which my lord hath spoken of, let him send unto his servants:
target: Baiklah sekarang tuanku kirim kepada hamba-hamba tuanku gandum dan jelai, minyak dan anggur yang telah tuanku sebutkan itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now that being broken, whereas four stood up for it, four kingdoms shall stand up out of the nation, but not in his power.
target: Dan bahwa tanduk itu patah dan pada tempatnya itu muncul empat buah, berarti: empat kerajaan akan muncul dari bangsa itu, tetapi tidak sekuat yang terdahulu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Speak unto the children of Israel, saying, He that offereth the sacrifice of his peace offerings unto the LORD shall bring his oblation unto the LORD of the sacrifice of his peace offerings.
target: "Katakanlah kepada orang Israel: Orang yang mempersembahkan korban keselamatannya kepada TUHAN, haruslah membawa kepada TUHAN sebagian dari korban keselamatannya itu sebagai persembahannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: According to all that the LORD commanded Moses, so the children of Israel made all the work.
target: Tepat seperti yang diperintahkan TUHAN kepada Musa, demikianlah dilakukan orang Israel segala pekerjaan melengkapi itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that oppresseth the poor reproacheth his Maker: but he that honoureth him hath mercy on the poor.
target: Siapa menindas orang yang lemah, menghina Penciptanya, tetapi siapa menaruh belas kasihan kepada orang miskin, memuliakan Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And king Rehoboam took counsel with the old men that had stood before Solomon his father while he yet lived, saying, What counsel give ye me to return answer to this people?
target: Sesudah itu Rehabeam meminta nasihat dari para tua-tua yang selama hidup Salomo mendampingi Salomo, ayahnya, katanya: "Apakah nasihatmu untuk menjawab rakyat itu?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king said to Absalom, Nay, my son, let us not all now go, lest we be chargeable unto thee. And he pressed him: howbeit he would not go, but blessed him.
target: Tetapi raja berkata kepada Absalom: "Maaf, anakku, jangan kami semua pergi, supaya kami jangan menyusahkan engkau." Lalu Absalom mendesak, tetapi raja tidak mau pergi, ia hanya memberi restu kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Jeroboam built Shechem in mount Ephraim, and dwelt therein; and went out from thence, and built Penuel.
target: Kemudian Yerobeam memperkuat Sikhem di pegunungan Efraim, lalu diam di sana. Ia keluar dari sana, lalu memperkuat Pnuel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Shammah the Harodite, Elika the Harodite,
target: Sama, orang Harod; Elika, orang Harod;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if a house be divided against itself, that house cannot stand.
target: dan jika suatu rumah tangga terpecah-pecah, rumah tangga itu tidak dapat bertahan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they removed from the Red sea, and encamped in the wilderness of Sin.
target: Mereka berangkat dari Laut Teberau, lalu berkemah di padang gurun Sin.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Moses hearkened to the voice of his father in law, and did all that he had said.
target: Musa mendengarkan perkataan mertuanya itu dan dilakukannyalah segala yang dikatakannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Ebedmelech the Ethiopian said unto Jeremiah, Put now these old cast clouts and rotten rags under thine armholes under the cords. And Jeremiah did so.
target: Berserulah Ebed-Melekh, orang Etiopia itu, kepada Yeremia: "Taruhlah pakaian yang buruk-buruk dan robek-robek itu di bawah ketiakmu sebagai ganjal tali!" Yeremia pun berbuat demikian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he wrote on the tables, according to the first writing, the ten commandments, which the LORD spake unto you in the mount out of the midst of the fire in the day of the assembly: and the LORD gave them unto me.
target: Dan pada loh itu Ia menuliskan, sama dengan tulisan yang mula-mula, Kesepuluh Firman yang telah diucapkan TUHAN kepadamu di atas gunung dari tengah-tengah api pada hari kamu berkumpul; sesudah itu TUHAN memberikannya kepadaku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold now, I have two daughters which have not known man; let me, I pray you, bring them out unto you, and do ye to them as is good in your eyes: only unto these men do nothing; for therefore came they under the shadow of my roof.
target: Kamu tahu, aku mempunyai dua orang anak perempuan yang belum pernah dijamah laki-laki, baiklah mereka kubawa ke luar kepadamu; perbuatlah kepada mereka seperti yang kamu pandang baik; hanya jangan kamu apa-apakan orang-orang ini, sebab mereka memang datang untuk berlindung di dalam rumahku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the children of Israel did so: and Joseph gave them wagons, according to the commandment of Pharaoh, and gave them provision for the way.
target: Demikianlah dilakukan oleh anak-anak Israel itu. Yusuf memberikan kereta kepada mereka menurut perintah Firaun; juga diberikan kepada mereka bekal di jalan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Son of man, these men have set up their idols in their heart, and put the stumblingblock of their iniquity before their face: should I be enquired of at all by them?
target: "Hai anak manusia, orang-orang ini menjunjung berhala-berhala mereka dalam hatinya dan menempatkan di hadapan mereka batu sandungan, yang menjatuhkan mereka ke dalam kesalahan. Apakah Aku mau mereka meminta petunjuk dari pada-Ku?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Return, return, O Shulamite; return, return, that we may look upon thee. What will ye see in the Shulamite? As it were the company of two armies.
target: Kembalilah, kembalilah, ya gadis Sulam, kembalilah, kembalilah, supaya kami dapat melihat engkau! Mengapa kamu senang melihat gadis Sulam itu seperti melihat tari-tarian perang?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And know ye this day: for I speak not with your children which have not known, and which have not seen the chastisement of the LORD your God, his greatness, his mighty hand, and his stretched out arm,
target: Kamu tahu sekarang — kukatakan bukan kepada anak-anakmu, yang tidak mengenal dan tidak melihat hajaran TUHAN, Allahmu — kebesaran-Nya, tangan-Nya yang kuat dan lengan-Nya yang teracung,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I thank God through Jesus Christ our Lord. So then with the mind I myself serve the law of God; but with the flesh the law of sin.
target: Syukur kepada Allah! oleh Yesus Kristus, Tuhan kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And David came to Saul, and stood before him: and he loved him greatly; and he became his armourbearer.
target: Demikianlah Daud sampai kepada Saul dan menjadi pelayannya. Saul sangat mengasihinya, dan ia menjadi pembawa senjatanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither shall there be any work for Egypt, which the head or tail, branch or rush, may do.
target: Dan tidak ada usaha Mesir yang akan berhasil yang dilakukan oleh pemimpin dan pengikut, oleh pemuka dan orang biasa.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I, brethren, when I came to you, came not with excellency of speech or of wisdom, declaring unto you the testimony of God.
target: Demikianlah pula, ketika aku datang kepadamu, saudara-saudara, aku tidak datang dengan kata-kata yang indah atau dengan hikmat untuk menyampaikan kesaksian Allah kepada kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the LORD shall comfort Zion: he will comfort all her waste places; and he will make her wilderness like Eden, and her desert like the garden of the LORD; joy and gladness shall be found therein, thanksgiving, and the voice of melody.
target: Sebab TUHAN menghibur Sion, menghibur segala reruntuhannya; Ia membuat padang gurunnya seperti taman Eden dan padang belantaranya seperti taman TUHAN. Di situ terdapat kegirangan dan sukacita, nyanyian syukur dan lagu yang nyaring.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I suffer not a woman to teach, nor to usurp authority over the man, but to be in silence.
target: Aku tidak mengizinkan perempuan mengajar dan juga tidak mengizinkannya memerintah laki-laki; hendaklah ia berdiam diri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He that hath a froward heart findeth no good: and he that hath a perverse tongue falleth into mischief.
target: Orang yang serong hatinya tidak akan mendapat bahagia, orang yang memutar-mutar lidahnya akan jatuh ke dalam celaka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Paul, a servant of Jesus Christ, called to be an apostle, separated unto the gospel of God,
target: Dari Paulus, hamba Kristus Yesus, yang dipanggil menjadi rasul dan dikuduskan untuk memberitakan Injil Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass about ten days after, that the LORD smote Nabal, that he died.
target: Dan kira-kira sepuluh hari sesudah itu TUHAN memukul Nabal, sehingga ia mati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And repayeth them that hate him to their face, to destroy them: he will not be slack to him that hateth him, he will repay him to his face.
target: tetapi terhadap diri setiap orang dari mereka yang membenci Dia, Ia melakukan pembalasan dengan membinasakan orang itu. Ia tidak bertangguh terhadap orang yang membenci Dia. Ia langsung mengadakan pembalasan terhadap orang itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD of hosts, I remember that which Amalek did to Israel, how he laid wait for him in the way, when he came up from Egypt.
target: Beginilah firman TUHAN semesta alam: Aku akan membalas apa yang dilakukan orang Amalek kepada orang Israel, karena orang Amalek menghalang-halangi mereka, ketika orang Israel pergi dari Mesir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: No man can enter into a strong man's house, and spoil his goods, except he will first bind the strong man; and then he will spoil his house.
target: Tetapi tidak seorang pun dapat memasuki rumah seorang yang kuat untuk merampas harta bendanya apabila tidak diikatnya dahulu orang kuat itu. Sesudah itu barulah dapat ia merampok rumah itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, thou art called a Jew, and restest in the law, and makest thy boast of God,
target: Tetapi, jika kamu menyebut dirimu orang Yahudi dan bersandar kepada hukum Taurat, bermegah dalam Allah,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And after that many days were fulfilled, the Jews took counsel to kill him:
target: Beberapa hari kemudian orang Yahudi merundingkan suatu rencana untuk membunuh Saulus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The wise in heart will receive commandments: but a prating fool shall fall.
target: Siapa bijak hati, memperhatikan perintah-perintah, tetapi siapa bodoh bicaranya, akan jatuh.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When all Israel is come to appear before the LORD thy God in the place which he shall choose, thou shalt read this law before all Israel in their hearing.
target: apabila seluruh orang Israel datang menghadap hadirat TUHAN, Allahmu, di tempat yang akan dipilih-Nya, maka haruslah engkau membacakan hukum Taurat ini di depan seluruh orang Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So, as much as in me is, I am ready to preach the gospel to you that are at Rome also.
target: Itulah sebabnya aku ingin untuk memberitakan Injil kepada kamu juga yang diam di Roma.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then sent Sanballat his servant unto me in like manner the fifth time with an open letter in his hand;
target: Lalu dengan cara yang sama untuk kelima kalinya Sanbalat mengirim seorang anak buahnya kepadaku yang membawa surat yang terbuka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the lot eastward fell to Shelemiah. Then for Zechariah his son, a wise counsellor, they cast lots; and his lot came out northward.
target: Undian untuk pintu timur jatuh pada Selemya; selanjutnya mereka membuang undi bagi Zakharia, anaknya, seorang penasihat yang berakal budi, lalu jatuhlah undiannya untuk pintu utara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD was with him; and he prospered whithersoever he went forth: and he rebelled against the king of Assyria, and served him not.
target: Maka TUHAN menyertai dia; ke mana pun juga ia pergi berperang, ia beruntung. Ia memberontak kepada raja Asyur dan tidak lagi takluk kepadanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I saw an angel standing in the sun; and he cried with a loud voice, saying to all the fowls that fly in the midst of heaven, Come and gather yourselves together unto the supper of the great God;
target: Lalu aku melihat seorang malaikat berdiri di dalam matahari dan ia berseru dengan suara nyaring kepada semua burung yang terbang di tengah langit, katanya: "Marilah ke sini dan berkumpullah untuk turut dalam perjamuan Allah, perjamuan yang besar,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And over the herds that fed in Sharon was Shitrai the Sharonite: and over the herds that were in the valleys was Shaphat the son of Adlai:
target: Yang mengawasi lembu sapi yang digembalakan di tanah Saron ialah Sitrai, orang Saron; yang mengawasi lembu sapi di lembah-lembah ialah Safat bin Adlai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the men of Babylon made Succothbenoth, and the men of Cuth made Nergal, and the men of Hamath made Ashima,
target: orang-orang Babel membuat patung Sukot-Benot, orang-orang Kuta membuat patung Nergal, orang-orang Hamat membuat patung Asima,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then said the LORD unto me, Pray not for this people for their good.
target: TUHAN berfirman kepadaku: "Janganlah engkau berdoa untuk kebaikan bangsa ini!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus, when he came out, saw much people, and was moved with compassion toward them, because they were as sheep not having a shepherd: and he began to teach them many things.
target: Ketika Yesus mendarat, Ia melihat sejumlah besar orang banyak, maka tergeraklah hati-Nya oleh belas kasihan kepada mereka, karena mereka seperti domba yang tidak mempunyai gembala. Lalu mulailah Ia mengajarkan banyak hal kepada mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And, behold, the LORD stood above it, and said, I am the LORD God of Abraham thy father, and the God of Isaac: the land whereon thou liest, to thee will I give it, and to thy seed;
target: Berdirilah TUHAN di sampingnya dan berfirman: "Akulah TUHAN, Allah Abraham, nenekmu, dan Allah Ishak; tanah tempat engkau berbaring ini akan Kuberikan kepadamu dan kepada keturunanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The adversaries of the LORD shall be broken to pieces; out of heaven shall he thunder upon them: the LORD shall judge the ends of the earth; and he shall give strength unto his king, and exalt the horn of his anointed.
target: Orang yang berbantah dengan TUHAN akan dihancurkan; atas mereka Ia mengguntur di langit. TUHAN mengadili bumi sampai ke ujung-ujungnya; Ia memberi kekuatan kepada raja yang diangkat-Nya dan meninggikan tanduk kekuatan orang yang diurapi-Nya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then come unto him the Sadducees, which say there is no resurrection; and they asked him, saying,
target: Datanglah kepada Yesus beberapa orang Saduki, yang berpendapat, bahwa tidak ada kebangkitan. Mereka bertanya kepada-Nya:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If ye will fear the LORD, and serve him, and obey his voice, and not rebel against the commandment of the LORD, then shall both ye and also the king that reigneth over you continue following the LORD your God:
target: asal saja kamu takut akan TUHAN, beribadah kepada-Nya, mendengarkan firman-Nya dan tidak menentang titah TUHAN, dan baik kamu, maupun raja yang akan memerintah kamu itu mengikuti TUHAN, Allahmu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Jehu came forth to the servants of his lord: and one said unto him, Is all well? wherefore came this mad fellow to thee? And he said unto them, Ye know the man, and his communication.
target: Apabila Yehu keluar mendapatkan pegawai-pegawai tuannya, berkatalah seorang kepadanya: "Apa kabar? Mengapa orang gila itu datang kepadamu?" Jawabnya kepada mereka: "Kamu sendiri mengenal orang itu dengan omongannya!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Fear none of those things which thou shalt suffer: behold, the devil shall cast some of you into prison, that ye may be tried; and ye shall have tribulation ten days: be thou faithful unto death, and I will give thee a crown of life.
target: Jangan takut terhadap apa yang harus engkau derita! Sesungguhnya Iblis akan melemparkan beberapa orang dari antaramu ke dalam penjara supaya kamu dicobai dan kamu akan beroleh kesusahan selama sepuluh hari. Hendaklah engkau setia sampai mati, dan Aku akan mengaruniakan kepadamu mahkota kehidupan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Rimmon the Beerothite, Rechab and Baanah, went, and came about the heat of the day to the house of Ishbosheth, who lay on a bed at noon.
target: Anak-anak Rimon, orang Beerot itu, yakni Rekhab dan Baana, pergi, lalu sampai pada waktu hari panas terik ke rumah Isyboset, ketika ia sedang berbaring siang hari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they shall be gathered together, as prisoners are gathered in the pit, and shall be shut up in the prison, and after many days shall they be visited.
target: Mereka akan dikumpulkan bersama-sama, seperti tahanan dimasukkan dalam liang; mereka akan dimasukkan dalam penjara dan akan dihukum sesudah waktu yang lama.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou hast given him his heart's desire, and hast not withholden the request of his lips. Selah.
target: TUHAN, karena kuasa-Mulah raja bersukacita; betapa besar kegirangannya karena kemenangan yang dari pada-Mu!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For thou bringest certain strange things to our ears: we would know therefore what these things mean.
target: Sebab engkau memperdengarkan kepada kami perkara-perkara yang aneh. Karena itu kami ingin tahu, apakah artinya semua itu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And immediately I was in the spirit: and, behold, a throne was set in heaven, and one sat on the throne.
target: Segera aku dikuasai oleh Roh dan lihatlah, sebuah takhta terdiri di sorga, dan di takhta itu duduk Seorang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So that the priests could not stand to minister because of the cloud: for the glory of the LORD had filled the house of the LORD.
target: sehingga imam-imam tidak tahan berdiri untuk menyelenggarakan kebaktian oleh karena awan itu, sebab kemuliaan TUHAN memenuhi rumah TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Nevertheless mine eye spared them from destroying them, neither did I make an end of them in the wilderness.
target: Tetapi Aku merasa sayang melihat mereka, sehingga Aku tidak membinasakannya dan tidak menghabisinya di padang gurun.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: This was the dedication of the altar, in the day when it was anointed, by the princes of Israel: twelve chargers of silver, twelve silver bowls, twelve spoons of gold:
target: Itulah persembahan pentahbisan mezbah pada hari mezbah itu diurapi, dari pihak para pemimpin Israel, yaitu dua belas pinggan perak, dua belas bokor penyiraman dari perak, dua belas cawan emas.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He shall dwell with thee, even among you, in that place which he shall choose in one of thy gates, where it liketh him best: thou shalt not oppress him.
target: Bersama-sama engkau ia boleh tinggal, di tengah-tengahmu, di tempat yang dipilihnya di salah satu tempatmu, yang dirasanya baik; janganlah engkau menindas dia."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And, behold, God himself is with us for our captain, and his priests with sounding trumpets to cry alarm against you. O children of Israel, fight ye not against the LORD God of your fathers; for ye shall not prosper.
target: Lihatlah, pada pihak kami Allah yang memimpin, sedang imam-imam-Nya siap meniup tanda serangan terhadap kamu dengan nafiri isyarat-isyarat. Hai orang Israel, jangan kamu berperang melawan TUHAN, Allah nenek moyangmu, karena kamu tidak akan beruntung!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the remnant of the sodomites, which remained in the days of his father Asa, he took out of the land.
target: Selebihnya dari riwayat Yosafat dan kepahlawanan yang dilakukannya dan bagaimana ia berperang, bukankah semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Yehuda?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of a truth I say unto you, that he will make him ruler over all that he hath.
target: Aku berkata kepadamu: Sesungguhnya tuannya itu akan mengangkat dia menjadi pengawas segala miliknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And see, if it goeth up by the way of his own coast to Bethshemesh, then he hath done us this great evil: but if not, then we shall know that it is not his hand that smote us: it was a chance that happened to us.
target: Perhatikanlah: apabila tabut itu mengambil jalan ke daerahnya, ke Bet-Semes, maka Dialah itu yang telah mendatangkan malapetaka yang hebat ini kepada kita. Dan jika tidak, maka kita mengetahui, bahwa bukanlah tangan-Nya yang telah menimpa kita; kebetulan saja hal itu terjadi kepada kita."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: What is it therefore? the multitude must needs come together: for they will hear that thou art come.
target: Jadi bagaimana sekarang? Tentu mereka akan mendengar, bahwa engkau telah datang ke mari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They are terrible and dreadful: their judgment and their dignity shall proceed of themselves.
target: Bangsa itu dahsyat dan menakutkan; keadilannya dan keluhurannya berasal dari padanya sendiri.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Saying, Go unto this people, and say, Hearing ye shall hear, and shall not understand; and seeing ye shall see, and not perceive:
target: Pergilah kepada bangsa ini, dan katakanlah: Kamu akan mendengar dan mendengar, namun tidak mengerti, kamu akan melihat dan melihat, namun tidak menanggap.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Stolen waters are sweet, and bread eaten in secret is pleasant.
target: "Air curian manis, dan roti yang dimakan dengan sembunyi-sembunyi lezat rasanya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The heart knoweth his own bitterness; and a stranger doth not intermeddle with his joy.
target: Hati mengenal kepedihannya sendiri, dan orang lain tidak dapat turut merasakan kesenangannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his fame went throughout all Syria: and they brought unto him all sick people that were taken with divers diseases and torments, and those which were possessed with devils, and those which were lunatick, and those that had the palsy; and he healed them.
target: Maka tersiarlah berita tentang Dia di seluruh Siria dan dibawalah kepada-Nya semua orang yang buruk keadaannya, yang menderita pelbagai penyakit dan sengsara, yang kerasukan, yang sakit ayan dan yang lumpuh, lalu Yesus menyembuhkan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When thou buildest a new house, then thou shalt make a battlement for thy roof, that thou bring not blood upon thine house, if any man fall from thence.
target: Apabila engkau mendirikan rumah yang baru, maka haruslah engkau memagari sotoh rumahmu, supaya jangan kaudatangkan hutang darah kepada rumahmu itu, apabila ada seorang jatuh dari atasnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the priest shall take cedar wood, and hyssop, and scarlet, and cast it into the midst of the burning of the heifer.
target: Dan imam haruslah mengambil kayu aras, hisop dan kain kirmizi dan melemparkannya ke tengah-tengah api yang membakar habis lembu itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jacob came unto Isaac his father unto Mamre, unto the city of Arbah, which is Hebron, where Abraham and Isaac sojourned.
target: Lalu sampailah Yakub kepada Ishak, ayahnya, di Mamre dekat Kiryat-Arba — itulah Hebron — tempat Abraham dan Ishak tinggal sebagai orang asing.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let me not, I pray you, accept any man's person, neither let me give flattering titles unto man.
target: Aku tidak akan memihak kepada siapa pun dan tidak akan menyanjung-nyanjung siapa pun,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he had begun to reckon, one was brought unto him, which owed him ten thousand talents.
target: Setelah ia mulai mengadakan perhitungan itu, dihadapkanlah kepadanya seorang yang berhutang sepuluh ribu talenta.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall consecrate unto the LORD the days of his separation, and shall bring a lamb of the first year for a trespass offering: but the days that were before shall be lost, because his separation was defiled.
target: dan mengkhususkan waktu kenazirannya bagi TUHAN. Ia harus membawa seekor domba jantan berumur setahun menjadi korban penebus salah. Hari-hari yang sudah lewat dianggap batal, karena rambut kenazirannya telah menjadi najis.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I have not written unto you because ye know not the truth, but because ye know it, and that no lie is of the truth.
target: Aku menulis kepadamu, bukan karena kamu tidak mengetahui kebenaran, tetapi justru karena kamu mengetahuinya dan karena kamu juga mengetahui, bahwa tidak ada dusta yang berasal dari kebenaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not consent unto him, nor hearken unto him; neither shall thine eye pity him, neither shalt thou spare, neither shalt thou conceal him:
target: maka janganlah engkau mengalah kepadanya dan janganlah mendengarkan dia. Janganlah engkau merasa sayang kepadanya, janganlah mengasihani dia dan janganlah menutupi salahnya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The nineteenth to Mallothi, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
target: undian yang kesembilan belas pada Maloti, anak-anaknya dan saudara-saudaranya, dua belas orang;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: We have dealt very corruptly against thee, and have not kept the commandments, nor the statutes, nor the judgments, which thou commandedst thy servant Moses.
target: Kami telah sangat bersalah terhadap-Mu dan tidak mengikuti perintah-perintah, ketetapan-ketetapan dan peraturan-peraturan yang telah Kauperintahkan kepada Musa, hamba-Mu itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore, if I come, I will remember his deeds which he doeth, prating against us with malicious words: and not content therewith, neither doth he himself receive the brethren, and forbiddeth them that would, and casteth them out of the church.
target: Karena itu, apabila aku datang, aku akan meminta perhatian atas segala perbuatan yang telah dilakukannya, sebab ia meleter melontarkan kata-kata yang kasar terhadap kami; dan belum merasa puas dengan itu, ia sendiri bukan saja tidak mau menerima saudara-saudara yang datang, tetapi juga mencegah orang-orang, yang mau menerima mereka dan mengucilkan orang-orang itu dari jemaat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he shall judge among many people, and rebuke strong nations afar off; and they shall beat their swords into plowshares, and their spears into pruninghooks: nation shall not lift up a sword against nation, neither shall they learn war any more.
target: Ia akan menjadi hakim antara banyak bangsa, dan akan menjadi wasit bagi suku-suku bangsa yang besar sampai ke tempat yang jauh; mereka akan menempa pedang-pedangnya menjadi mata bajak, dan tombak-tombaknya menjadi pisau pemangkas; bangsa tidak akan lagi mengangkat pedang terhadap bangsa, dan mereka tidak akan lagi belajar perang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O God, why hast thou cast us off for ever? why doth thine anger smoke against the sheep of thy pasture?
target: Nyanyian pengajaran Asaf. Mengapa, ya Allah, Kaubuang kami untuk seterusnya? Mengapa menyala murka-Mu terhadap kambing domba gembalaan-Mu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Jesus saith unto them, Children, have ye any meat? They answered him, No.
target: Kata Yesus kepada mereka: "Hai anak-anak, adakah kamu mempunyai lauk-pauk?" Jawab mereka: "Tidak ada."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And, behold, two of them went that same day to a village called Emmaus, which was from Jerusalem about threescore furlongs.
target: Pada hari itu juga dua orang dari murid-murid Yesus pergi ke sebuah kampung bernama Emaus, yang terletak kira-kira tujuh mil jauhnya dari Yerusalem,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Even all the Jews returned out of all places whither they were driven, and came to the land of Judah, to Gedaliah, unto Mizpah, and gathered wine and summer fruits very much.
target: maka kembalilah semua orang Yehuda dari segala tempat ke mana mereka telah berserak-serak, dan masuk ke tanah Yehuda kepada Gedalya di Mizpa; mereka mengumpulkan hasil anggur dan buah-buahan amat sangat banyaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the days of Terah were two hundred and five years: and Terah died in Haran.
target: Umur Terah ada dua ratus lima tahun; lalu ia mati di Haran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thus saith the LORD of hosts, the God of Israel; Ye have seen all the evil that I have brought upon Jerusalem, and upon all the cities of Judah; and, behold, this day they are a desolation, and no man dwelleth therein,
target: "Beginilah firman TUHAN semesta alam, Allah Israel: Kamu telah mengalami segenap malapetaka yang telah Kudatangkan atas Yerusalem dan atas segala kota Yehuda; sungguh, semuanya itu kini sudah menjadi reruntuhan dan tidak ada seorang pun diam di sana.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But what went ye out for to see? A prophet? Yea, I say unto you, and much more than a prophet.
target: Jadi untuk apakah kamu pergi? Melihat nabi? Benar, dan Aku berkata kepadamu, bahkan lebih dari pada nabi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The proud have forged a lie against me: but I will keep thy precepts with my whole heart.
target: Orang yang kurang ajar menodai aku dengan dusta, tetapi aku, dengan segenap hati aku akan memegang titah-titah-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto him, Behold now, there is in this city a man of God, and he is an honourable man; all that he saith cometh surely to pass: now let us go thither; peradventure he can shew us our way that we should go.
target: Tetapi orang ini berkata kepadanya: "Tunggu, di kota ini ada seorang abdi Allah, seorang yang terhormat; segala yang dikatakannya pasti terjadi. Marilah kita pergi ke sana sekarang juga, mungkin ia dapat memberitahukan kepada kita tentang perjalanan yang kita tempuh ini."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They rewarded me evil for good to the spoiling of my soul.
target: Mereka membalas kebaikanku dengan kejahatan; perasaan bulus mencekam aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the king of the north shall return, and shall set forth a multitude greater than the former, and shall certainly come after certain years with a great army and with much riches.
target: Lalu untuk kedua kalinya raja negeri Utara itu akan mengerahkan sejumlah tentara besar, lebih besar dari yang pertama, dan beberapa tahun kemudian, ia akan bergerak maju melawan dia dengan tentara yang besar dan dengan banyak perlengkapan perang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Even a full wind from those places shall come unto me: now also will I give sentence against them.
target: melainkan angin yang keras datang atas perintah-Ku. Sekarang Aku sendiri akan menjatuhkan hukuman atas mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.
target: Dia memberi kekuatan kepada yang lelah dan menambah semangat kepada yang tiada berdaya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither shall the inheritance remove from one tribe to another tribe; but every one of the tribes of the children of Israel shall keep himself to his own inheritance.
target: Sebab milik pusaka itu tidak boleh beralih dari suku ke suku, tetapi suku-suku orang Israel haruslah masing-masing memegang milik pusakanya sendiri."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Neither shall they take for their wives a widow, nor her that is put away: but they shall take maidens of the seed of the house of Israel, or a widow that had a priest before.
target: Janda atau seorang perempuan yang telah diceraikan oleh suaminya jangan mereka ambil menjadi isteri, tetapi hanya seorang perawan dari keturunan kaum Israel, atau seorang janda imam boleh mereka ambil.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when Saul was come to Jerusalem, he assayed to join himself to the disciples: but they were all afraid of him, and believed not that he was a disciple.
target: Setibanya di Yerusalem Saulus mencoba menggabungkan diri kepada murid-murid, tetapi semuanya takut kepadanya, karena mereka tidak dapat percaya, bahwa ia juga seorang murid.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass, that when Jeremiah had made an end of speaking unto all the people all the words of the LORD their God, for which the LORD their God had sent him to them, even all these words,
target: Ketika Yeremia selesai mengatakan kepada seluruh rakyat segala firman TUHAN, Allah mereka, yang disuruh TUHAN, Allah mereka, disampaikannya kepada mereka, yaitu segala firman yang tersebut di atas,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And as we have borne the image of the earthy, we shall also bear the image of the heavenly.
target: Sama seperti kita telah memakai rupa dari yang alamiah, demikian pula kita akan memakai rupa dari yang sorgawi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I heard him speaking unto me out of the house; and the man stood by me.
target: Lalu aku mendengar Dia berfirman kepadaku dari dalam Bait Suci itu — orang yang mengukur Bait Suci itu berdiri di sampingku —

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will go before thee, and make the crooked places straight: I will break in pieces the gates of brass, and cut in sunder the bars of iron:
target: Aku sendiri hendak berjalan di depanmu dan hendak meratakan gunung-gunung, hendak memecahkan pintu-pintu tembaga dan hendak mematahkan palang-palang besi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: We have heard of the pride of Moab; he is very proud: even of his haughtiness, and his pride, and his wrath: but his lies shall not be so.
target: Kami telah mendengar tentang keangkuhan Moab, alangkah angkuhnya dia, tentang kecongkakannya, keangkuhannya dan kegemasannya, dan tentang cakap anginnya yang tidak benar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the men of Israel went out of Mizpeh, and pursued the Philistines, and smote them, until they came under Bethcar.
target: Keluarlah orang-orang Israel dari Mizpa, mengejar orang Filistin itu dan memukul mereka kalah sampai hilir Bet-Kar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love; in honour preferring one another;
target: Hendaklah kamu saling mengasihi sebagai saudara dan saling mendahului dalam memberi hormat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These shall ye eat of all that are in the waters: whatsoever hath fins and scales in the waters, in the seas, and in the rivers, them shall ye eat.
target: Inilah yang boleh kamu makan dari segala yang hidup di dalam air: segala yang bersirip dan bersisik di dalam air, di dalam lautan, dan di dalam sungai, itulah semuanya yang boleh kamu makan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then Samuel took a vial of oil, and poured it upon his head, and kissed him, and said, Is it not because the LORD hath anointed thee to be captain over his inheritance?
target: Lalu Samuel mengambil buli-buli berisi minyak, dituangnyalah ke atas kepala Saul, diciumnyalah dia sambil berkata: "Bukankah TUHAN telah mengurapi engkau menjadi raja atas umat-Nya Israel? Engkau akan memegang tampuk pemerintahan atas umat TUHAN, dan engkau akan menyelamatkannya dari tangan musuh-musuh di sekitarnya. Inilah tandanya bagimu, bahwa TUHAN telah mengurapi engkau menjadi raja atas milik-Nya sendiri:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in the fourteenth year came Chedorlaomer, and the kings that were with him, and smote the Rephaims in Ashteroth Karnaim, and the Zuzims in Ham, and the Emins in Shaveh Kiriathaim,
target: Dalam tahun yang keempat belas datanglah Kedorlaomer serta raja-raja yang bersama-sama dengan dia, lalu mereka mengalahkan orang Refaim di Asyterot-Karnaim, orang Zuzim di Ham, orang Emim di Syawe-Kiryataim

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Saying, Give me also this power, that on whomsoever I lay hands, he may receive the Holy Ghost.
target: serta berkata: "Berikanlah juga kepadaku kuasa itu, supaya jika aku menumpangkan tanganku di atas seseorang, ia boleh menerima Roh Kudus."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Let thy work appear unto thy servants, and thy glory unto their children.
target: Biarlah kelihatan kepada hamba-hamba-Mu perbuatan-Mu, dan semarak-Mu kepada anak-anak mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And also of the son of the bondwoman will I make a nation, because he is thy seed.
target: Tetapi keturunan dari hambamu itu juga akan Kubuat menjadi suatu bangsa, karena ia pun anakmu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But when Sanballat the Horonite, and Tobiah the servant, the Ammonite, and Geshem the Arabian, heard it, they laughed us to scorn, and despised us, and said, What is this thing that ye do? will ye rebel against the king?
target: Ketika Sanbalat, orang Horon, dan Tobia, orang Amon, pelayan itu, dan Gesyem, orang Arab, mendengar itu, mereka mengolok-olokkan dan menghina kami. Kata mereka: "Apa yang kamu lakukan itu? Apa kamu mau berontak terhadap raja?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: O generation of vipers, how can ye, being evil, speak good things? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh.
target: Hai kamu keturunan ular beludak, bagaimanakah kamu dapat mengucapkan hal-hal yang baik, sedangkan kamu sendiri jahat? Karena yang diucapkan mulut meluap dari hati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The LORD upholdeth all that fall, and raiseth up all those that be bowed down.
target: TUHAN itu penopang bagi semua orang yang jatuh dan penegak bagi semua orang yang tertunduk.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For through the anger of the LORD it came to pass in Jerusalem and Judah, till he had cast them out from his presence, that Zedekiah rebelled against the king of Babylon.
target: Sebab oleh karena murka TUHANlah hal itu terjadi terhadap Yerusalem dan Yehuda, yakni bahwa Ia sampai membuang mereka dari hadapan-Nya. Zedekia memberontak terhadap raja Babel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto his disciples, Therefore I say unto you, Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat; neither for the body, what ye shall put on.
target: Yesus berkata kepada murid-murid-Nya: "Karena itu Aku berkata kepadamu: Janganlah kuatir akan hidupmu, akan apa yang hendak kamu makan, dan janganlah kuatir pula akan tubuhmu, akan apa yang hendak kamu pakai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Only the trees which thou knowest that they be not trees for meat, thou shalt destroy and cut them down; and thou shalt build bulwarks against the city that maketh war with thee, until it be subdued.
target: Hanya pohon-pohon, yang engkau tahu tidak menghasilkan makanan, boleh kaurusakkan dan kautebang untuk mendirikan pagar pengepungan terhadap kota yang berperang melawan engkau, sampai kota itu jatuh."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia, and answereth to Jerusalem which now is, and is in bondage with her children.
target: Hagar ialah gunung Sinai di tanah Arab — dan ia sama dengan Yerusalem yang sekarang, karena ia hidup dalam perhambaan dengan anak-anaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me? why art thou so far from helping me, and from the words of my roaring?
target: Untuk pemimpin biduan. Menurut lagu: Rusa di kala fajar. Mazmur Daud.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For the kingdom of God is not meat and drink; but righteousness, and peace, and joy in the Holy Ghost.
target: Sebab Kerajaan Allah bukanlah soal makanan dan minuman, tetapi soal kebenaran, damai sejahtera dan sukacita oleh Roh Kudus.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore they cried unto the LORD, and said, We beseech thee, O LORD, we beseech thee, let us not perish for this man's life, and lay not upon us innocent blood: for thou, O LORD, hast done as it pleased thee.
target: Lalu berserulah mereka kepada TUHAN, katanya: "Ya TUHAN, janganlah kiranya Engkau biarkan kami binasa karena nyawa orang ini dan janganlah Engkau tanggungkan kepada kami darah orang yang tidak bersalah, sebab Engkau, TUHAN, telah berbuat seperti yang Kaukehendaki."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But of all clean fowls ye may eat.
target: Segala burung yang tidak haram boleh kamu makan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Shall they not rise up suddenly that shall bite thee, and awake that shall vex thee, and thou shalt be for booties unto them?
target: Bukankah akan bangkit dengan sekonyong-konyong mereka yang menggigit engkau, dan akan terjaga mereka yang mengejutkan engkau, sehingga engkau menjadi barang rampasan bagi mereka?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.
target: Semoga Allah damai sejahtera menguduskan kamu seluruhnya dan semoga roh, jiwa dan tubuhmu terpelihara sempurna dengan tak bercacat pada kedatangan Yesus Kristus, Tuhan kita.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And God saw their works, that they turned from their evil way; and God repented of the evil, that he had said that he would do unto them; and he did it not.
target: Ketika Allah melihat perbuatan mereka itu, yakni bagaimana mereka berbalik dari tingkah lakunya yang jahat, maka menyesallah Allah karena malapetaka yang telah dirancangkan-Nya terhadap mereka, dan Ia pun tidak jadi melakukannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the LORD spake unto Moses, saying,
target: TUHAN berfirman kepada Musa:

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then shall the priest command to take for him that is to be cleansed two birds alive and clean, and cedar wood, and scarlet, and hyssop:
target: maka imam harus memerintahkan, supaya bagi orang yang akan ditahirkan itu diambil dua ekor burung yang hidup dan yang tidak haram, juga kayu aras, kain kirmizi dan hisop.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the angels which kept not their first estate, but left their own habitation, he hath reserved in everlasting chains under darkness unto the judgment of the great day.
target: Dan bahwa Ia menahan malaikat-malaikat yang tidak taat pada batas-batas kekuasaan mereka, tetapi yang meninggalkan tempat kediaman mereka, dengan belenggu abadi di dalam dunia kekelaman sampai penghakiman pada hari besar,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Know ye not that we shall judge angels? how much more things that pertain to this life?
target: Tidak tahukah kamu, bahwa kita akan menghakimi malaikat-malaikat? Jadi apalagi perkara-perkara biasa dalam hidup kita sehari-hari.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king said, Divide the living child in two, and give half to the one, and half to the other.
target: Kata raja: "Penggallah anak yang hidup itu menjadi dua dan berikanlah setengah kepada yang satu dan yang setengah lagi kepada yang lain."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For every one that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.
target: Karena setiap orang yang meminta, menerima dan setiap orang yang mencari, mendapat dan setiap orang yang mengetok, baginya pintu dibukakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But whoso keepeth his word, in him verily is the love of God perfected: hereby know we that we are in him.
target: Tetapi barangsiapa menuruti firman-Nya, di dalam orang itu sungguh sudah sempurna kasih Allah; dengan itulah kita ketahui, bahwa kita ada di dalam Dia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Likewise all the men of Israel which had hid themselves in mount Ephraim, when they heard that the Philistines fled, even they also followed hard after them in the battle.
target: Bahkan, ketika semua orang Israel yang telah bersembunyi di pegunungan Efraim, mendengar bahwa orang Filistin telah lari, orang-orang itu pun bergabung dengan mereka dalam pertempuran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then the disciples looked one on another, doubting of whom he spake.
target: Murid-murid itu memandang seorang kepada yang lain, mereka ragu-ragu siapa yang dimaksudkan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Who covereth the heaven with clouds, who prepareth rain for the earth, who maketh grass to grow upon the mountains.
target: Dia, yang menutupi langit dengan awan-awan, yang menyediakan hujan bagi bumi, yang membuat gunung-gunung menumbuhkan rumput.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But go thou thy way till the end be: for thou shalt rest, and stand in thy lot at the end of the days.
target: Tetapi engkau, pergilah sampai tiba akhir zaman, dan engkau akan beristirahat, dan akan bangkit untuk mendapat bagianmu pada kesudahan zaman."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the parched ground shall become a pool, and the thirsty land springs of water: in the habitation of dragons, where each lay, shall be grass with reeds and rushes.
target: tanah pasir yang hangat akan menjadi kolam, dan tanah kersang menjadi sumber-sumber air; di tempat serigala berbaring akan tumbuh tebu dan pandan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then took Johanan the son of Kareah, and all the captains of the forces that were with him, all the remnant of the people whom he had recovered from Ishmael the son of Nethaniah, from Mizpah, after that he had slain Gedaliah the son of Ahikam, even mighty men of war, and the women, and the children, and the eunuchs, whom he had brought again from Gibeon:
target: Lalu Yohanan bin Kareah serta semua perwira tentara yang bersama-sama dengan dia mengumpulkan seluruh sisa-sisa rakyat yang diangkut sebagai tawanan oleh Ismael bin Netanya dari Mizpa, setelah ia memukul mati Gedalya bin Ahikam: yaitu laki-laki, prajurit-prajurit, perempuan, anak-anak dan pegawai-pegawai istana yang dibawa kembali dari Gibeon,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the Pharisees and scribes murmured, saying, This man receiveth sinners, and eateth with them.
target: Maka bersungut-sungutlah orang-orang Farisi dan ahli-ahli Taurat, katanya: "Ia menerima orang-orang berdosa dan makan bersama-sama dengan mereka."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: There is gold, and a multitude of rubies: but the lips of knowledge are a precious jewel.
target: Sekalipun ada emas dan permata banyak, tetapi yang paling berharga ialah bibir yang berpengetahuan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They have heard that I sigh: there is none to comfort me: all mine enemies have heard of my trouble; they are glad that thou hast done it: thou wilt bring the day that thou hast called, and they shall be like unto me.
target: Dengarlah bagaimana keluh kesahku, sedang tiada penghibur bagiku; seteru-seteruku mendengar tentang kecelakaanku, mereka gembira karena Engkau yang mendatangkannya! Datanglah kiranya hari yang telah Engkau umumkan itu, dan biarlah mereka menjadi seperti aku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These are the families of the sons of Noah, after their generations, in their nations: and by these were the nations divided in the earth after the flood.
target: Itulah segala kaum anak-anak Nuh menurut keturunan mereka, menurut bangsa mereka. Dan dari mereka itulah berpencar bangsa-bangsa di bumi setelah air bah itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So they hired thirty and two thousand chariots, and the king of Maachah and his people; who came and pitched before Medeba. And the children of Ammon gathered themselves together from their cities, and came to battle.
target: Mereka menyewa tiga puluh dua ribu kereta, serta raja negeri Maakha dengan tentaranya, yang datang berkemah dekat Medeba. Juga bani Amon itu berkumpul dari kota-kota mereka dan datang untuk berperang.
