en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And she said, I pray you, let me glean and gather after the reapers among the sheaves: so she came, and hath continued even from the morning until now, that she tarried a little in the house.
target: Tadi ia berkata: Izinkanlah kiranya aku memungut dan mengumpulkan jelai dari antara berkas-berkas jelai ini di belakang penyabit-penyabit. Begitulah ia datang dan terus sibuk dari pagi sampai sekarang dan seketika pun ia tidak berhenti."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Igal the son of Nathan of Zobah, Bani the Gadite,
target: Yigal bin Natan, dari Zoba; Bani, orang Gad;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the kings of the earth, and the great men, and the rich men, and the chief captains, and the mighty men, and every bondman, and every free man, hid themselves in the dens and in the rocks of the mountains;
target: Dan raja-raja di bumi dan pembesar-pembesar serta perwira-perwira, dan orang-orang kaya serta orang-orang berkuasa, dan semua budak serta orang merdeka bersembunyi ke dalam gua-gua dan celah-celah batu karang di gunung.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there were voices, and thunders, and lightnings; and there was a great earthquake, such as was not since men were upon the earth, so mighty an earthquake, and so great.
target: Maka memancarlah kilat dan menderulah bunyi guruh, dan terjadilah gempa bumi yang dahsyat seperti belum pernah terjadi sejak manusia ada di atas bumi. Begitu hebatnya gempa bumi itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the sons of Eliezer were, Rehabiah the chief. And Eliezer had none other sons; but the sons of Rehabiah were very many.
target: Anak Eliezer ialah Rehabya, seorang kepala; Eliezer tidak mempunyai anak-anak lain, tetapi anak-anak Rehabya luar biasa banyaknya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Nevertheless they shall be his servants; that they may know my service, and the service of the kingdoms of the countries.
target: Tetapi mereka akan menjadi hamba-hambanya, supaya mereka tahu membedakan antara mengabdi kepada-Ku dan mengabdi kepada kerajaan-kerajaan duniawi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And by the border of Simeon, from the east side unto the west side, Issachar a portion.
target: Berbatasan dengan wilayah Simeon, dari perbatasan sebelah timur sampai perbatasan sebelah barat, terdapat bagian Isakhar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall come to pass, if ye shall hearken diligently unto my commandments which I command you this day, to love the LORD your God, and to serve him with all your heart and with all your soul,
target: Jika kamu dengan sungguh-sungguh mendengarkan perintah yang kusampaikan kepadamu pada hari ini, sehingga kamu mengasihi TUHAN, Allahmu, dan beribadah kepada-Nya dengan segenap hatimu dan dengan segenap jiwamu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold Israel after the flesh: are not they which eat of the sacrifices partakers of the altar?
target: Perhatikanlah bangsa Israel menurut daging: bukankah mereka yang makan apa yang dipersembahkan mendapat bagian dalam pelayanan mezbah?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Because I knew that thou art obstinate, and thy neck is an iron sinew, and thy brow brass;
target: Oleh karena Aku tahu, bahwa engkau tegar tengkuk, keras kepala dan berkepala batu,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But take heed lest by any means this liberty of yours become a stumblingblock to them that are weak.
target: Tetapi jagalah, supaya kebebasanmu ini jangan menjadi batu sandungan bagi mereka yang lemah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he believed in the LORD; and he counted it to him for righteousness.
target: Lalu percayalah Abram kepada TUHAN, maka TUHAN memperhitungkan hal itu kepadanya sebagai kebenaran.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Joshua sent messengers, and they ran unto the tent; and, behold, it was hid in his tent, and the silver under it.
target: Lalu Yosua menyuruh orang segera pergi ke kemah itu, dan sesungguhnya, semuanya itu disembunyikan dalam kemah Akhan, dan perak itu ada di bawah sekali.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Even the whole bullock shall he carry forth without the camp unto a clean place, where the ashes are poured out, and burn him on the wood with fire: where the ashes are poured out shall he be burnt.
target: jadi lembu jantan itu seluruhnya harus dibawanya ke luar perkemahan, ke suatu tempat yang tahir, ke tempat pembuangan abu, dan lembu itu harus dibakarnya sampai habis di atas kayu api di tempat pembuangan abu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jacob rose up early in the morning, and took the stone that he had put for his pillows, and set it up for a pillar, and poured oil upon the top of it.
target: Keesokan harinya pagi-pagi Yakub mengambil batu yang dipakainya sebagai alas kepala dan mendirikan itu menjadi tugu dan menuang minyak ke atasnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said unto them, Follow after me: for the LORD hath delivered your enemies the Moabites into your hand. And they went down after him, and took the fords of Jordan toward Moab, and suffered not a man to pass over.
target: Berkatalah ia kepada mereka: "Ikutlah aku, sebab TUHAN telah menyerahkan musuhmu, orang-orang Moab itu, ke dalam tanganmu." Maka turunlah mereka mengikuti dia, lalu mereka merebut tempat penyeberangan sungai Yordan ke Moab dan tidak seorang pun dibiarkan mereka menyeberang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Pilate, when he had called together the chief priests and the rulers and the people,
target: Lalu Pilatus mengumpulkan imam-imam kepala dan pemimpin-pemimpin serta rakyat,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: His brethren therefore said unto him, Depart hence, and go into Judaea, that thy disciples also may see the works that thou doest.
target: Maka kata saudara-saudara Yesus kepada-Nya: "Berangkatlah dari sini dan pergi ke Yudea, supaya murid-murid-Mu juga melihat perbuatan-perbuatan yang Engkau lakukan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in process of time the daughter of Shuah Judah's wife died; and Judah was comforted, and went up unto his sheepshearers to Timnath, he and his friend Hirah the Adullamite.
target: Setelah beberapa lama matilah anak Syua, isteri Yehuda. Habis berkabung pergilah Yehuda ke Timna, kepada orang-orang yang menggunting bulu domba-dombanya, bersama dengan Hira, sahabatnya, orang Adulam itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Hazor shall be a dwelling for dragons, and a desolation for ever: there shall no man abide there, nor any son of man dwell in it.
target: Hazor akan menjadi tempat persembunyian bagi serigala, menjadi tempat tandus sampai selama-lamanya; seorang pun tidak akan diam lagi di sana dan seorang manusia pun tidak akan tinggal lagi di dalamnya."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the fourth year was the foundation of the house of the LORD laid, in the month Zif:
target: Dalam tahun yang keempat, dalam bulan Ziw, diletakkanlah dasar rumah TUHAN,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When he made a decree for the rain, and a way for the lightning of the thunder:
target: ketika Ia membuat ketetapan bagi hujan, dan jalan bagi kilat guruh,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they smote all the souls that were therein with the edge of the sword, utterly destroying them: there was not any left to breathe: and he burnt Hazor with fire.
target: Semua makhluk yang ada di dalamnya dibunuhnya dengan mata pedang, sambil menumpas orang-orang itu. Tidak ada yang tinggal hidup dari semua yang bernafas dan Hazor dibakarnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in every province, and in every city, whithersoever the king's commandment and his decree came, the Jews had joy and gladness, a feast and a good day. And many of the people of the land became Jews; for the fear of the Jews fell upon them.
target: Demikian juga di tiap-tiap daerah dan di tiap-tiap kota, di tempat mana pun titah dan undang-undang raja telah sampai, ada sukacita dan kegirangan di antara orang Yahudi, dan perjamuan serta hari gembira; dan lagi banyak dari antara rakyat negeri itu masuk Yahudi, karena mereka ditimpa ketakutan kepada orang Yahudi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then did I beat them as small as the dust of the earth, I did stamp them as the mire of the street, and did spread them abroad.
target: Aku menggiling mereka halus-halus seperti debu tanah, aku menumbuk mereka dan menginjak-injak mereka seperti lumpur di jalan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To turn aside the right of a man before the face of the most High,
target: kalau hak orang dibelokkan di hadapan Yang Mahatinggi,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Every day they wrest my words: all their thoughts are against me for evil.
target: kepada Allah, yang firman-Nya kupuji, kepada Allah aku percaya, aku tidak takut. Apakah yang dapat dilakukan manusia terhadap aku?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he took up his parable, and said, Alas, who shall live when God doeth this!
target: Diucapkannyalah juga sanjaknya, katanya: "Celaka! Siapakah yang akan hidup, apabila Allah melakukan hal itu?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: My brethren, be not many masters, knowing that we shall receive the greater condemnation.
target: Saudara-saudaraku, janganlah banyak orang di antara kamu mau menjadi guru; sebab kita tahu, bahwa sebagai guru kita akan dihakimi menurut ukuran yang lebih berat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Elisha saw it, and he cried, My father, my father, the chariot of Israel, and the horsemen thereof. And he saw him no more: and he took hold of his own clothes, and rent them in two pieces.
target: Ketika Elisa melihat itu, maka berteriaklah ia: "Bapaku, bapaku! Kereta Israel dan orang-orangnya yang berkuda!" Kemudian tidak dilihatnya lagi, lalu direnggutkannya pakaiannya dan dikoyakkannya menjadi dua koyakan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Tell it not in Gath, publish it not in the streets of Askelon; lest the daughters of the Philistines rejoice, lest the daughters of the uncircumcised triumph.
target: Janganlah kabarkan itu di Gat, janganlah beritakan itu di lorong-lorong Askelon, supaya jangan bersukacita anak-anak perempuan orang Filistin, supaya jangan beria-ria anak-anak perempuan orang-orang yang tidak bersunat!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Cursed be he that confirmeth not all the words of this law to do them. And all the people shall say, Amen.
target: Terkutuklah orang yang tidak menepati perkataan hukum Taurat ini dengan perbuatan. Dan seluruh bangsa itu haruslah berkata: Amin!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: (For he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship of the circumcision, the same was mighty in me toward the Gentiles:)
target: — karena Ia yang telah memberikan kekuatan kepada Petrus untuk menjadi rasul bagi orang-orang bersunat, Ia juga yang telah memberikan kekuatan kepadaku untuk orang-orang yang tidak bersunat.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Cainan lived seventy years and begat Mahalaleel:
target: Setelah Kenan hidup tujuh puluh tahun, ia memperanakkan Mahalaleel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And whether it be cow, or ewe, ye shall not kill it and her young both in one day.
target: Seekor lembu atau kambing atau domba janganlah kamu sembelih bersama dengan anaknya pada satu hari juga.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when he had agreed with the labourers for a penny a day, he sent them into his vineyard.
target: Setelah ia sepakat dengan pekerja-pekerja itu mengenai upah sedinar sehari, ia menyuruh mereka ke kebun anggurnya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They have built also the high places of Baal, to burn their sons with fire for burnt offerings unto Baal, which I commanded not, nor spake it, neither came it into my mind:
target: Mereka telah mendirikan bukit-bukit pengorbanan bagi Baal untuk membakar anak-anak mereka sebagai korban bakaran kepada Baal, suatu hal yang tidak pernah Kuperintahkan atau Kukatakan dan yang tidak pernah timbul dalam hati-Ku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So I bought her to me for fifteen pieces of silver, and for an homer of barley, and an half homer of barley:
target: Lalu aku membeli dia bagiku dengan bayaran lima belas syikal perak dan satu setengah homer jelai.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A voice was heard upon the high places, weeping and supplications of the children of Israel: for they have perverted their way, and they have forgotten the LORD their God.
target: Dengar! Di atas bukit-bukit gundul kedengaran tangis memohon-mohon dari anak-anak Israel, sebab mereka telah memilih jalan yang sesat, dan telah melupakan TUHAN, Allah mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When thou passest through the waters, I will be with thee; and through the rivers, they shall not overflow thee: when thou walkest through the fire, thou shalt not be burned; neither shall the flame kindle upon thee.
target: Apabila engkau menyeberang melalui air, Aku akan menyertai engkau, atau melalui sungai-sungai, engkau tidak akan dihanyutkan; apabila engkau berjalan melalui api, engkau tidak akan dihanguskan, dan nyala api tidak akan membakar engkau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: One kid of the goats for a sin offering; beside the sin offering of atonement, and the continual burnt offering, and the meat offering of it, and their drink offerings.
target: dan seekor kambing jantan sebagai korban penghapus dosa, selain dari pada korban penghapus dosa pembawa pendamaian dan korban bakaran yang tetap serta dengan korban sajiannya dan korban-korban curahannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joshua said unto all the people, Thus saith the LORD God of Israel, Your fathers dwelt on the other side of the flood in old time, even Terah, the father of Abraham, and the father of Nachor: and they served other gods.
target: Berkatalah Yosua kepada seluruh bangsa itu: "Beginilah firman TUHAN, Allah Israel: Dahulu kala di seberang sungai Efrat, di situlah diam nenek moyangmu, yakni Terah, ayah Abraham dan ayah Nahor, dan mereka beribadah kepada allah lain.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Wherefore have ye not eaten the sin offering in the holy place, seeing it is most holy, and God hath given it you to bear the iniquity of the congregation, to make atonement for them before the LORD?
target: "Mengapa tidak kamu makan korban penghapus dosa itu di tempat yang kudus? Bukankah itu sesuatu bagian maha kudus dan TUHAN memberikannya kepadamu, supaya kamu mengangkut kesalahan umat itu dan mengadakan pendamaian bagi mereka di hadapan TUHAN?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Samuel said, Gather all Israel to Mizpeh, and I will pray for you unto the LORD.
target: Lalu berkatalah Samuel: "Kumpulkanlah segenap orang Israel ke Mizpa; maka aku akan berdoa untuk kamu kepada TUHAN."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: How are the mighty fallen in the midst of the battle! O Jonathan, thou wast slain in thine high places.
target: Betapa gugur para pahlawan di tengah-tengah pertempuran! Yonatan mati terbunuh di bukit-bukitmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But if thou shalt indeed obey his voice, and do all that I speak; then I will be an enemy unto thine enemies, and an adversary unto thine adversaries.
target: Tetapi jika engkau sungguh-sungguh mendengarkan perkataannya, dan melakukan segala yang Kufirmankan, maka Aku akan memusuhi musuhmu, dan melawan lawanmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Six days shall work be done, but on the seventh day there shall be to you an holy day, a sabbath of rest to the LORD: whosoever doeth work therein shall be put to death.
target: Enam hari lamanya boleh dilakukan pekerjaan, tetapi pada hari yang ketujuh haruslah ada perhentian kudus bagimu, yakni sabat, hari perhentian penuh bagi TUHAN; setiap orang yang melakukan pekerjaan pada hari itu, haruslah dihukum mati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled, and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel, which ye have heard, and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven; whereof I Paul am made a minister;
target: Sebab itu kamu harus bertekun dalam iman, tetap teguh dan tidak bergoncang, dan jangan mau digeser dari pengharapan Injil, yang telah kamu dengar dan yang telah dikabarkan di seluruh alam di bawah langit, dan yang aku ini, Paulus, telah menjadi pelayannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Saul said, Cast lots between me and Jonathan my son. And Jonathan was taken.
target: Kata Saul: "Buanglah undi antara aku dan anakku Yonatan." Lalu didapati Yonatan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Stablish thy word unto thy servant, who is devoted to thy fear.
target: Teguhkanlah pada hamba-Mu ini janji-Mu, yang berlaku bagi orang yang takut kepada-Mu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall come to pass, if they say unto thee, Whither shall we go forth? then thou shalt tell them, Thus saith the LORD; Such as are for death, to death; and such as are for the sword, to the sword; and such as are for the famine, to the famine; and such as are for the captivity, to the captivity.
target: Dan apabila mereka bertanya kepadamu: Ke manakah kami harus pergi?, maka jawablah mereka: Beginilah firman TUHAN: Yang ke maut, ke mautlah! Yang ke pedang, ke pedanglah! Yang ke kelaparan, ke kelaparanlah! dan yang ke tawanan, ke tawananlah!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now there was leaning on Jesus' bosom one of his disciples, whom Jesus loved.
target: Seorang di antara murid Yesus, yaitu murid yang dikasihi-Nya, bersandar dekat kepada-Nya, di sebelah kanan-Nya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will praise the name of God with a song, and will magnify him with thanksgiving.
target: Tetapi aku ini tertindas dan kesakitan, keselamatan dari pada-Mu, ya Allah, kiranya melindungi aku!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Shalt thou reign, because thou closest thyself in cedar? did not thy father eat and drink, and do judgment and justice, and then it was well with him?
target: Sangkamu rajakah engkau, jika engkau bertanding dalam hal pemakaian kayu aras? Tidakkah ayahmu makan minum juga dan beroleh kenikmatan? Tetapi ia melakukan keadilan dan kebenaran,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Bow down thine ear, O LORD, hear me: for I am poor and needy.
target: Doa Daud. Sendengkanlah telinga-Mu, ya TUHAN, jawablah aku, sebab sengsara dan miskin aku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Beside the sabbaths of the LORD, and beside your gifts, and beside all your vows, and beside all your freewill offerings, which ye give unto the LORD.
target: belum termasuk hari-hari Sabat TUHAN dan belum termasuk persembahan-persembahanmu atau segala korban nazarmu atau segala korban sukarelamu, yang kamu hendak persembahkan kepada TUHAN.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Joseph came in unto them in the morning, and looked upon them, and, behold, they were sad.
target: Ketika pada waktu pagi Yusuf datang kepada mereka, segera dilihatnya, bahwa mereka bersusah hati.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they returned to Joshua, and said unto him, Let not all the people go up; but let about two or three thousand men go up and smite Ai; and make not all the people to labour thither; for they are but few.
target: Kemudian kembalilah mereka kepada Yosua dan berkata kepadanya: "Tidak usah seluruh bangsa itu pergi, biarlah hanya kira-kira dua atau tiga ribu orang pergi untuk menggempur Ai itu; janganlah kaususahkan seluruh bangsa itu dengan berjalan ke sana, sebab orang-orang di sana sedikit saja."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the rest of the acts of Shallum, and his conspiracy which he made, behold, they are written in the book of the chronicles of the kings of Israel.
target: Selebihnya dari riwayat Salum dan persepakatan yang diadakannya, sesungguhnya semuanya itu tertulis dalam kitab sejarah raja-raja Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And, behold, all the men of Israel came to the king, and said unto the king, Why have our brethren the men of Judah stolen thee away, and have brought the king, and his household, and all David's men with him, over Jordan?
target: Tetapi seluruh orang Israel datang menghadap raja dan berkata kepada raja: "Mengapa saudara-saudara kami, orang-orang Yehuda itu, menculik raja dan membawa dia menyeberangi sungai Yordan dengan keluarganya dan semua orang Daud yang menyertai dia?"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Blessings are upon the head of the just: but violence covereth the mouth of the wicked.
target: Berkat ada di atas kepala orang benar, tetapi mulut orang fasik menyembunyikan kelaliman.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the king's servants said unto the king, Behold, thy servants are ready to do whatsoever my lord the king shall appoint.
target: Para pegawai raja berkata kepada raja: "Terserah kepada tuanku raja! Hamba-hambamu ini siap!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The twelfth captain for the twelfth month was Heldai the Netophathite, of Othniel: and in his course were twenty and four thousand.
target: Yang kedua belas untuk bulan yang kedua belas ialah Heldai, orang Netofa itu, keturunan Otniel, dan dalam rombongannya ada dua puluh empat ribu orang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the wild beasts of the islands shall cry in their desolate houses, and dragons in their pleasant palaces: and her time is near to come, and her days shall not be prolonged.
target: anjing-anjing hutan akan menyalak di dalam puri-purinya, dan serigala-serigala di dalam istana-istana kesenangan. Waktunya akan datang segera, dan usianya tidak akan diperpanjang.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He shall suck the poison of asps: the viper's tongue shall slay him.
target: Bisa ular tedung akan diisapnya, ia akan dibunuh oleh lidah ular.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I will arise and go to my father, and will say unto him, Father, I have sinned against heaven, and before thee,
target: Aku akan bangkit dan pergi kepada bapaku dan berkata kepadanya: Bapa, aku telah berdosa terhadap sorga dan terhadap bapa,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done of them in secret.
target: Sebab menyebutkan saja pun apa yang dibuat oleh mereka di tempat-tempat yang tersembunyi telah memalukan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And his brethren, Shemaiah, and Azarael, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Nethaneel, and Judah, Hanani, with the musical instruments of David the man of God, and Ezra the scribe before them.
target: dan saudara-saudaranya, yakni: Semaya, Azareel, Milalai, Gilalai, Maai, Netaneel, Yehuda dan Hanani dengan bunyi-bunyian Daud, abdi Allah itu, sedang Ezra, ahli kitab itu berjalan di depan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Then she went in, and fell at his feet, and bowed herself to the ground, and took up her son, and went out.
target: Masuklah perempuan itu, lalu tersungkur di depan kaki Elisa dan sujud menyembah dengan mukanya sampai ke tanah. Kemudian diangkatnyalah anaknya, lalu keluar.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: It shall be accomplished before his time, and his branch shall not be green.
target: Sebelum genap masanya, ajalnya akan sampai; dan rantingnya pun tidak akan menghijau.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Ye shall not round the corners of your heads, neither shalt thou mar the corners of thy beard.
target: Janganlah kamu mencukur tepi rambut kepalamu berkeliling dan janganlah engkau merusakkan tepi janggutmu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it shall be, that the city which is next unto the slain man, even the elders of that city shall take an heifer, which hath not been wrought with, and which hath not drawn in the yoke;
target: Kota yang ternyata paling dekat dengan tempat orang yang terbunuh itu, para tua-tua kota itulah harus mengambil seekor lembu betina yang muda, yang belum pernah dipakai, yang belum pernah menghela dengan kuk.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But prophesy not again any more at Bethel: for it is the king's chapel, and it is the king's court.
target: Tetapi jangan lagi bernubuat di Betel, sebab inilah tempat kudus raja, inilah bait suci kerajaan."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he made the candlestick of pure gold: of beaten work made he the candlestick; his shaft, and his branch, his bowls, his knops, and his flowers, were of the same:
target: Dibuatnyalah kandil itu dari emas murni; dari emas tempaan dibuatnya kandil itu, baik kakinya baik batangnya; kelopaknya — dengan tombolnya dan kembangnya — dibuat seiras dengan kandil itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And Jesus said unto him, Receive thy sight: thy faith hath saved thee.
target: Lalu kata Yesus kepadanya: "Melihatlah engkau, imanmu telah menyelamatkan engkau!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: I am the God of Bethel, where thou anointedst the pillar, and where thou vowedst a vow unto me: now arise, get thee out from this land, and return unto the land of thy kindred.
target: Akulah Allah yang di Betel itu, di mana engkau mengurapi tugu, dan di mana engkau bernazar kepada-Ku; maka sekarang, bersiaplah engkau, pergilah dari negeri ini dan pulanglah ke negeri sanak saudaramu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Your lamb shall be without blemish, a male of the first year: ye shall take it out from the sheep, or from the goats:
target: Anak dombamu itu harus jantan, tidak bercela, berumur setahun; kamu boleh ambil domba atau kambing.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A bruised reed shall he not break, and the smoking flax shall he not quench: he shall bring forth judgment unto truth.
target: Buluh yang patah terkulai tidak akan diputuskannya, dan sumbu yang pudar nyalanya tidak akan dipadamkannya, tetapi dengan setia ia akan menyatakan hukum.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But ye shall receive power, after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you: and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem, and in all Judaea, and in Samaria, and unto the uttermost part of the earth.
target: Tetapi kamu akan menerima kuasa, kalau Roh Kudus turun ke atas kamu, dan kamu akan menjadi saksi-Ku di Yerusalem dan di seluruh Yudea dan Samaria dan sampai ke ujung bumi."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And if, when the priest seeth it, behold, it be in sight lower than the skin, and the hair thereof be turned white; the priest shall pronounce him unclean: it is a plague of leprosy broken out of the boil.
target: Kalau menurut pemeriksaannya panau itu kelihatan lebih dalam dari pada kulit dan bulunya telah berubah menjadi putih, maka imam harus menyatakan orang itu najis, karena penyakit kustalah yang timbul di dalam barah itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And there was there an herd of many swine feeding on the mountain: and they besought him that he would suffer them to enter into them. And he suffered them.
target: Adalah di sana sejumlah besar babi sedang mencari makan di lereng gunung, lalu setan-setan itu meminta kepada Yesus, supaya Ia memperkenankan mereka memasuki babi-babi itu. Yesus mengabulkan permintaan mereka.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I sent them with commandment unto Iddo the chief at the place Casiphia, and I told them what they should say unto Iddo, and to his brethren the Nethinims, at the place Casiphia, that they should bring unto us ministers for the house of our God.
target: dengan suatu pesan untuk Ido, kepala setempat di Kasifya. Aku menaruh perkataan-perkataan ke dalam mulut mereka untuk dikatakan kepada Ido dan saudara-saudaranya, para budak di bait Allah di Kasifya itu, supaya mereka mendatangkan kepada kami orang-orang yang harus menyelenggarakan kebaktian di rumah Allah kami.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Forasmuch as this people refuseth the waters of Shiloah that go softly, and rejoice in Rezin and Remaliah's son;
target: "Oleh karena bangsa ini telah menolak air Syiloah yang mengalir lamban, dan telah tawar hati terhadap Rezin dan anak Remalya,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And the standard of the camp of the children of Ephraim set forward according to their armies: and over his host was Elishama the son of Ammihud.
target: Kemudian berangkatlah laskar yang di bawah panji-panji bani Efraim menurut pasukan mereka;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: He hath put down the mighty from their seats, and exalted them of low degree.
target: Ia menurunkan orang-orang yang berkuasa dari takhtanya dan meninggikan orang-orang yang rendah;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the day of prosperity be joyful, but in the day of adversity consider: God also hath set the one over against the other, to the end that man should find nothing after him.
target: Pada hari mujur bergembiralah, tetapi pada hari malang ingatlah, bahwa hari malang ini pun dijadikan Allah seperti juga hari mujur, supaya manusia tidak dapat menemukan sesuatu mengenai masa depannya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father, and ye in me, and I in you.
target: Pada waktu itulah kamu akan tahu, bahwa Aku di dalam Bapa-Ku dan kamu di dalam Aku dan Aku di dalam kamu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For it is the life of all flesh; the blood of it is for the life thereof: therefore I said unto the children of Israel, Ye shall eat the blood of no manner of flesh: for the life of all flesh is the blood thereof: whosoever eateth it shall be cut off.
target: Karena darah itulah nyawa segala makhluk. Sebab itu Aku telah berfirman kepada orang Israel: Darah makhluk apa pun janganlah kamu makan, karena darah itulah nyawa segala makhluk: setiap orang yang memakannya haruslah dilenyapkan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: These are their generations: The firstborn of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam,
target: Inilah keturunan mereka: anak sulung Ismael ialah Nebayot, lalu Kedar, Adbeel, Mibsam,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: To open the blind eyes, to bring out the prisoners from the prison, and them that sit in darkness out of the prison house.
target: untuk membuka mata yang buta, untuk mengeluarkan orang hukuman dari tempat tahanan dan mengeluarkan orang-orang yang duduk dalam gelap dari rumah penjara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia;
target: Kemudian aku pergi ke daerah-daerah Siria dan Kilikia.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Teach me, O LORD, the way of thy statutes; and I shall keep it unto the end.
target: Perlihatkanlah kepadaku, ya TUHAN, petunjuk ketetapan-ketetapan-Mu, aku hendak memegangnya sampai saat terakhir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And I will harden Pharaoh's heart, that he shall follow after them; and I will be honoured upon Pharaoh, and upon all his host; that the Egyptians may know that I am the LORD. And they did so.
target: Aku akan mengeraskan hati Firaun, sehingga ia mengejar mereka. Dan terhadap Firaun dan seluruh pasukannya Aku akan menyatakan kemuliaan-Ku, sehingga orang Mesir mengetahui, bahwa Akulah TUHAN." Lalu mereka berbuat demikian.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And they crucified him, and parted his garments, casting lots: that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet, They parted my garments among them, and upon my vesture did they cast lots.
target: Sesudah menyalibkan Dia mereka membagi-bagi pakaian-Nya dengan membuang undi.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: A fool's mouth is his destruction, and his lips are the snare of his soul.
target: Orang bebal dibinasakan oleh mulutnya, bibirnya adalah jerat bagi nyawanya.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: The fortress also shall cease from Ephraim, and the kingdom from Damascus, and the remnant of Syria: they shall be as the glory of the children of Israel, saith the LORD of hosts.
target: Kubu-kubu akan hilang dari Efraim dan kuasa kerajaan akan lenyap dari Damsyik, juga sisa-sisa Aram, semuanya akan lenyap sama seperti kemuliaan orang Israel, demikianlah firman TUHAN semesta alam.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: When thou art come into the land which the LORD thy God giveth thee, thou shalt not learn to do after the abominations of those nations.
target: "Apabila engkau sudah masuk ke negeri yang diberikan kepadamu oleh TUHAN, Allahmu, maka janganlah engkau belajar berlaku sesuai dengan kekejian yang dilakukan bangsa-bangsa itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost.
target: Tetapi aku akan tinggal di Efesus sampai hari raya Pentakosta,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: In the first place went the standard of the camp of the children of Judah according to their armies: and over his host was Nahshon the son of Amminadab.
target: Terdahulu berangkatlah laskar yang di bawah panji-panji bani Yehuda menurut pasukan mereka; yang mengepalai laskar itu ialah Nahason bin Aminadab;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Now therefore write ye this song for you, and teach it the children of Israel: put it in their mouths, that this song may be a witness for me against the children of Israel.
target: Oleh sebab itu tuliskanlah nyanyian ini dan ajarkanlah kepada orang Israel, letakkanlah di dalam mulut mereka, supaya nyanyian ini menjadi saksi bagi-Ku terhadap orang Israel.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Moab is confounded; for it is broken down: howl and cry; tell ye it in Arnon, that Moab is spoiled,
target: Moab sudah malu, karena ia terkejut! Merataplah dan berteriaklah, beritahukanlah di sungai Arnon: Sungguh, Moab sudah binasa!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Behold, they are all vanity; their works are nothing: their molten images are wind and confusion.
target: Sesungguhnya, sekaliannya mereka seperti tidak ada, perbuatan-perbuatan mereka hampa, patung-patung tuangan mereka angin dan kesia-siaan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Seeing then that I will cut off from thee the righteous and the wicked, therefore shall my sword go forth out of his sheath against all flesh from the south to the north:
target: Oleh karena Aku hendak melenyapkan dari tengah-tengahmu orang benar dan orang fasik, maka pedang-Ku akan terhunus dari sarungnya terhadap semua manusia dari selatan sampai utara.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: For again the Edomites had come and smitten Judah, and carried away captives.
target: Karena orang Edom telah datang pula dan mengalahkan Yehuda serta mengangkut tawanan-tawanan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And when the inhabitants of Jabeshgilead heard of that which the Philistines had done to Saul;
target: Ketika penduduk Yabesh-Gilead mendengar tentang apa yang telah dilakukan orang Filistin kepada Saul,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: With whomsoever of thy servants it be found, both let him die, and we also will be my lord's bondmen.
target: Pada siapa dari hamba-hambamu ini kedapatan piala itu, biarlah ia mati, juga kami ini akan menjadi budak tuanku."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And cried with a loud voice, and said, What have I to do with thee, Jesus, thou Son of the most high God? I adjure thee by God, that thou torment me not.
target: dan dengan keras ia berteriak: "Apa urusan-Mu dengan aku, hai Yesus, Anak Allah Yang Mahatinggi? Demi Allah, jangan siksa aku!"

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he bought the hill Samaria of Shemer for two talents of silver, and built on the hill, and called the name of the city which he built, after the name of Shemer, owner of the hill, Samaria.
target: Kemudian ia membeli gunung Samaria dari pada Semer dengan dua talenta perak. Ia mendirikan suatu kota di gunung itu dan menamainya Samaria, menurut nama Semer, pemilik gunung itu.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Thou shalt not see a fierce people, a people of a deeper speech than thou canst perceive; of a stammering tongue, that thou canst not understand.
target: Tidak lagi akan kaulihat bangsa yang biadab itu, bangsa yang logatnya samar, sehingga tidak dapat dipahami, yang bahasanya gagap, sehingga tiada yang mengerti.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But I said, Not so, Lord: for nothing common or unclean hath at any time entered into my mouth.
target: Tetapi aku berkata: Tidak, Tuhan, tidak, sebab belum pernah sesuatu yang haram dan yang tidak tahir masuk ke dalam mulutku.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Depart ye, depart ye, go ye out from thence, touch no unclean thing; go ye out of the midst of her; be ye clean, that bear the vessels of the LORD.
target: Menjauhlah, menjauhlah! Keluarlah dari sana! Janganlah engkau kena kepada yang najis! Keluarlah dari tengah-tengahnya, sucikanlah dirimu, hai orang-orang yang mengangkat perkakas rumah TUHAN!

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And he said, They were my brethren, even the sons of my mother: as the LORD liveth, if ye had saved them alive, I would not slay you.
target: Lalu kata Gideon: "Saudara-saudarakulah itu, anak-anak ibuku! Demi TUHAN yang hidup, seandainya kamu membiarkan mereka hidup, aku tidak akan membunuh kamu."

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Shew us thy mercy, O LORD, and grant us thy salvation.
target: Apakah Engkau tidak mau menghidupkan kami kembali, sehingga umat-Mu bersukacita karena Engkau?

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: They compassed me about also with words of hatred; and fought against me without a cause.
target: dengan kata-kata kebencian mereka menyerang aku dan memerangi aku tanpa alasan.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: But for us also, to whom it shall be imputed, if we believe on him that raised up Jesus our Lord from the dead;
target: tetapi ditulis juga untuk kita; sebab kepada kita pun Allah memperhitungkannya, karena kita percaya kepada Dia, yang telah membangkitkan Yesus, Tuhan kita, dari antara orang mati,

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: So Joshua arose, and all the people of war, to go up against Ai: and Joshua chose out thirty thousand mighty men of valour, and sent them away by night.
target: Lalu bersiaplah Yosua beserta seluruh tentara untuk pergi ke Ai. Yosua memilih tiga puluh ribu orang, pahlawan-pahlawan yang gagah perkasa, mereka disuruhnya pergi pada waktu malam

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Jehoahaz was twenty and three years old when he began to reign; and he reigned three months in Jerusalem. And his mother's name was Hamutal, the daughter of Jeremiah of Libnah.
target: Yoahas berumur dua puluh tiga tahun pada waktu ia menjadi raja dan tiga bulan lamanya ia memerintah di Yerusalem. Nama ibunya ialah Hamutal binti Yeremia, dari Libna.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And it came to pass at the end of the four hundred and thirty years, even the selfsame day it came to pass, that all the hosts of the LORD went out from the land of Egypt.
target: Sesudah lewat empat ratus tiga puluh tahun, tepat pada hari itu juga, keluarlah segala pasukan TUHAN dari tanah Mesir.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: Of Asher; Pagiel the son of Ocran.
target: dari suku Asyer: Pagiel bin Okhran;

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: As free, and not using your liberty for a cloke of maliciousness, but as the servants of God.
target: Hiduplah sebagai orang merdeka dan bukan seperti mereka yang menyalahgunakan kemerdekaan itu untuk menyelubungi kejahatan-kejahatan mereka, tetapi hiduplah sebagai hamba Allah.

en_instruction: Translate this English sentence to Indonesian:
input: And in every province, whithersoever the king's commandment and his decree came, there was great mourning among the Jews, and fasting, and weeping, and wailing; and many lay in sackcloth and ashes.
target: Di tiap-tiap daerah, ke mana titah dan undang-undang raja telah sampai, ada perkabungan yang besar di antara orang Yahudi disertai puasa dan ratap tangis; oleh banyak orang dibentangkan kain kabung dengan abu sebagai lapik tidurnya.
